verses.pt: Embora, desde a partida, passem pelo caminho tão amplo, não vêem o caminho estreito no final.
verses.en_6th_ed: However broad a way you may have set out on, you do not see the narrow lane that is in your future.
verses.ro: degake kara ikana omichi toritemo   sue ni hosomichi miete nai kara
verses.jp1: てがけからいかなをふみちとふりても
verses.jp2: すゑのほそみちみゑてないから
verses.kanji: 出がけから如何な大道通りても   末の細道見えて無いぞや
verses.english: However broad a way you may set out on, you can never foresee the narrow lane in the future.

verses.pt: Como os seres humanos são superficiais, não entendem de fato o curso final do caminho.
verses.en_6th_ed: As you human beings are shallow, you can never see where your paths will lead in the future.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   sue no michisuji sarani wakaran
verses.jp1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp2: すゑのみちすじさらにわからん
verses.kanji: 人間はあざない者で有るからに   末の道筋更に分からん
verses.english: Human beings are indeed shallow-minded. Therefore they are quite ignorant of their way of the future.

verses.pt: Não digam nada acerca das coisas atuais, pois será avistado o amplo caminho do porvir.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not complain about your present situation. A broad path will appear ahead of you.
verses.ro: ima no koto nanimo yu dewa nai hodoni   saki no okwan michi ga mieru de
verses.jp1: いまの事なにもゆうでハないほどに
verses.jp2: さきのをふくハんみちがみへるで
verses.kanji: 今の事何も言うでは無い程に   先の往還道が見えるで
verses.english: Do not complain of your present situation! In the near future the broad way shall come into sight.

verses.pt: Qual seja o caminho atual, não o lamentem. Tenham prazer com o caminho real do porvir.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not grieve over whatever path you are now on. Take delight in the main path that lies ahead.
verses.ro: ima no michi ikana michi demo nagekuna yo   saki no honmichi tanoshun de iyo
verses.jp1: いまのみちいかなみちでもなけくなよ
verses.jp2: さきのほんみちたのしゆでいよ
verses.kanji: 今の道如何な道でも嘆くなよ   先の本道楽しんで居よ
verses.english: Do not deplore of your present way, whatever kind of way it may be! Look forward with delight to the main road ahead of you!

verses.pt: Se têm realmente espírito de dedicação única à salvação, embora nada digam, aceito-o firme.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you are truly of a mind to save others single-heartedly, I shall firmly accept you, even if you say nothing.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni tasuke ichijo no kokoro nara   nani yuwai demo shikato uketoru
verses.jp1: しんぢつにたすけ一ぢよの心なら
verses.jp2: なにゆハいでもしかとうけとる
verses.kanji: 真実に救け一条の心なら   何言わいでも確と受け取る
verses.english: If you truly and single-heartedly resolve to save others, I will surely accept you, though you may say nothing.

verses.pt: Desnecessária é a lisonja apenas de lábia. Se há a sinceridade no íntimo do espírito...
verses.en_6th_ed: Words of flattery are unwanted. If only there is sincerity in the core of your mind...
verses.ro: kuchi saki no tsuisho bakari wa iran mono   shin no kokoro ni makoto aru nara
verses.jp1: 口さきのついしよはかりハいらんもの
verses.jp2: しんの心にまことあるなら
verses.kanji: 口先の追従ばかりは要らんもの   真の心に誠有るなら
verses.english: Mere flattery of the lips is useless. I will accept you, if you have true sincerity in the core of your mind.

verses.pt: Este mundo é corpo de Deus. Reflitam a respeito disso em tudo.
verses.en_6th_ed: This universe is the body of God. Ponder this in all matters step by step.
verses.ro: dandan to nani goto nitemo kono yo wa   Kami no karada ya shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: たん／＼となに事にてもこのよふわ
verses.jp2: 神のからだやしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: 段々と何事にてもこの世は   神の身体や思案してみよ
verses.english: Any and everything of this universe is all the body of God. Ponder deeply and understand it well!

verses.pt: Os corpos humanos são todos coisas emprestadas por Deus. Com que pensamento estão usando?
verses.en_6th_ed: All human bodies are things lent by God. With what thought are you using them?
verses.ro: ningen wa minamina Kami no kashimono ya   nanto omote tsukote iru yara
verses.jp1: にんけんハみな／＼神のかしものや
verses.jp2: なんとをもふてつこているやら
verses.kanji: 人間は皆々神の貸し物や   何と思うて使て居るやら
verses.english: All human bodies are things lent by God. With what thought are you using them?

verses.pt: Este ano, começando as coisas extraordinárias, realizarei as coisas desconhecidas até agora.
verses.en_6th_ed: This year, I shall begin marvelous things. I shall do things you have never known before.
verses.ro: kotoshi niwa mezurashi koto o hajime kake   imamade shiranu koto o suru zo ya
verses.jp1: ことしにハめつらし事をはじめかけ
verses.jp2: いまゝでしらぬ事をするぞや
verses.kanji: 今年には珍しい事を初め掛け   今迄知らぬ事をするぞや
verses.english: This year I will begin remarkable things, and will do some-thing which you have never known until now.

verses.pt: Até agora, tudo era comum ao mundo. Doravante, o entenderão do íntimo do coração.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have understood everything in an ordinary way. From now on, you will understand from your innermost heart.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo sekainami   korekara wakaru mune no uchi yori
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなによの事もせかいなみ
verses.jp2: これからわかるむねのうちより
verses.kanji: 今迄は何よの事も世界並   これから分かる胸の内より
verses.english: Hitherto you have understood whatever things in worldly human way on any and everything. But from now on you shall become awakened from your innermost heart.

verses.pt: Desta vez, começo a dedicação única à salvação, após tê-la experimentado no meu próprio corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I begin the single-hearted salvation after having tested it on Myself.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tasuke ichijo ni kakaru no mo   waga mi no tameshi kakaritaru ue
verses.jp1: このたびハたすけ一ちよにかゝるのも
verses.jp2: わがみのためしかゝりたるうゑ
verses.kanji: この度は救け一条に掛かるのも   我が身の試し掛かりたる上
verses.english: This time I commenced the single-hearted salvation after I Myself had gone through the test.

verses.pt: Esta salvação, não farei por meio de preces e evocações, nem através de consultas de oráculos.
verses.en_6th_ed: This salvation is not brought about by formulas of worship, or by exorcism, or by calling on oracles.
verses.ro: tasuke demo ogami kito de ikude nashi   ukagai tatete iku de nakeredo
verses.jp1: たすけでもをかみきとふでいくてなし
verses.jp2: うかがいたてゝいくでなけれど
verses.kanji: 救けでも拝み祈祷で行くで無し   伺い立てゝ行くで無けれど
verses.english: I save you, though not by the formulas of worship, nor by exorcism nor by conjuring oracles.

verses.pt: Deste lugar, faço explicações de todas as coisas. Com devoção única a Deus, do íntimo do coração,
verses.en_6th_ed: At this place, I shall teach everything. Be single-hearted with God, and from your innermost heart...
verses.ro: kono tokoro yorozu no koto o tokikikasu   Kami ichijo de mune no uchi yori
verses.jp1: このところよろつの事をときゝかす
verses.jp2: 神いちじよでむねのうちより
verses.kanji: この所万の事を説き聞かす   神一条で胸の内より
verses.english: At this place I teach any and everything. This is the way of single-hearted　devotion to God! And you shall be saved by complete reform from your innermost heart.

verses.pt: Reflitam do íntimo do coração para entenderem. Salvando os outros, estará salvando a si mesmo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder from your innermost heart to understand. Through saving others, you will be saved.
verses.ro: wakaru yo mune no uchi yori shiyan seyo   hito tasuketara waga mi tasukaru
verses.jp1: わかるよふむねのうちよりしやんせよ
verses.jp2: 人たすけたらわがみたすかる
verses.kanji: 分かる様胸の内より思案せよ   人救けたら我が身助かる
verses.english: Ponder over it from your innermost heart! And understand that through saving others you shall also be saved!

verses.pt: Embora os altos montes submetam todas as pessoas à sua vontade, não podem prever o futuro.
verses.en_6th_ed: The high mountains are doing as they please with the whole world, but they cannot see the future.
verses.ro: takayama wa sekai ichiretsu omou yo   mamani suredomo saki wa mien de
verses.jp1: 高山ハせかい一れつをもうよふ
verses.jp2: まゝにすれともさきハみゑんで
verses.kanji: 高山は世界一列思う様   侭にすれども先は見えんで
verses.english: People on the high mountains are ruling the whole world as they please. But they cannot foresee the future.

verses.pt: Dentre estas numerosas árvores que gradualmente tenho reunido, não há uma que seja madeira usável.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I have gathered many trees, but there is none yet that is useful timber.
verses.ro: dandan to oku yosetaru kono tachiki   yoboku ni naru mono wa nai zo ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼とをふくよせたるこのたちき
verses.jp2: よふほくになるものハないぞや
verses.kanji: 段々と多く寄せたるこの立ち木   用木に成る者は無いぞや
verses.english: I have gathered a lot of trees, yet I can find none which will become useful timber.

verses.pt: Embora tenha reunido muitas árvores de toda espécie, não posso usá-las se forem tortas ou recurvas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though I have gathered many and varied trees, those bent or crooked are of no use.
verses.ro: ikana ki mo oku yosete wa aru keredo   igami kagami wa kore wa kanawan
verses.jp1: いかなきもをふくよせてハあるけれど
verses.jp2: いがみかゞみハこれわかなハん
verses.kanji: 如何な木も多く寄せては有るけれど   歪み屈みはこれは適わん
verses.english: Of the many trees which I have gathered, those bent or crooked are of no use.

verses.pt: Mostrar depressa o pilar central, do íntimo dos corações do mundo, é a instância de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Sweeping the innermost heart of everyone in the world, God is hastening to show the central pillar.
verses.ro: sekaiju mune no uchi yori Shinbashira   Kami no sekikomi hayaku misetai
verses.jp1: せかいぢうむねのうちよりしんばしら
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみはやくみせたい
verses.kanji: 世界中胸の内より真柱   神の急込み早く見せたい
verses.english: Cleansing dust from the innermost hearts of everyone of the whole world, God is impatiently hastening to show you the central pillar.

verses.pt: Nesta limpeza do íntimo dos corações de todos, Deus é a vassoura. Observem atentos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Throughout the world, God is the broom for the sweeping of the innermost heart. Watch carefully.
verses.ro: sekaiju mune no uchi yori kono soji   Kami ga hoke ya shikato mite iyo
verses.jp1: せかいぢうむねのうちよりこのそふぢ
verses.jp2: 神がほふけやしかとみでいよ
verses.kanji: 世界中胸の内よりこの掃除   神が箒や確と見て居よ
verses.english: Acting as broom I, God, will sweep dust from the innermost hearts of everyone of the whole world. Behold attentively, all of you!

verses.pt: Doravante, Deus, revelando-se ao mundo e indo às montanhas, fará a limpeza.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, God will go forth and attend to the sweeping in the mountains.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami ga omote i arawarete   yama i kakarite soji suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これからハ神がをもていあらわれて
verses.jp2: 山いかゝりてそふちするぞや
verses.kanji: これからは神が表へ現れて   山へ掛かりて掃除するぞや
verses.english: Henceforth, I, God, will reveal Myself to the fore, and entering into the mountains, will accomplish the sweeping of human minds.

verses.pt: Se Deus fizer a limpeza em todas as pessoas, o espírito se animará e será repleto de alegria.
verses.en_6th_ed: When God accomplishes the sweeping of all humankind, you will be spirited and full of joy.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni Kami ga soji o suru naraba   kokoro isande yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: いちれつに神がそうちをするならば
verses.jp2: 心いさんてよふきつくめや
verses.kanji: 一列に神が掃除をするならば   心勇んで陽気ずくめや
verses.english: When God accomplishes the sweeping of all people equally, you shall become heartedly cheered up and full of joy.

verses.pt: Desde que Deus se encarregará de todas as coisas, usará da onipotência no que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: As it is God who undertakes all matters, everything will be accomplished freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Kami ga hikiuke suru kara wa   donna koto demo juyojizai o
verses.jp1: なにもかも神がひきうけするからハ
verses.jp2: どんな事でもぢうよぢさを
verses.kanji: 何もかも神が引き受けするからは   どんな事でも自由自在を
verses.english: As God will take charge of any and everything, I will work My omnipotence on whatever kinds of matters.

verses.pt: Desta vez, purificando a água, quero determinar depressa o Shimbashira para pacificação interna.
verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, after purifying the water, I desire quickly to take in the Shinbashira, who is to settle matters within.
verses.ro: konotabi wa uchi o osameru Shinbashira   hayaku iretai mizu o sumashite
verses.jp1: このたびハうちをふさめるしんばしら
verses.jp2: はやくいれたい水をすまして
verses.kanji: この度は内を治める真柱   早く入れたい水を澄まして
verses.english: This time, purifying the water, I desire to take in quickly the Shinbashira, who is to control the internal affairs.

verses.pt: Nos altos montes, a pessoa central é aquela não-esclarecida. Isto é a maior ira de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: The central pillar of the high mountains is that of Kara. This is the prime cause of the anger of God.
verses.ro: takayama no shin no hashira wa tojin ya   kore ga daiichi Kami no rippuku
verses.jp1: 高山のしんのはしらハとふじんや
verses.jp2: これが大一神のりいふく
verses.kanji: 高山の真の柱は唐人や   これが第一神の立腹
verses.english: The central idea of those who are on the high mountains lacks My teachings. This is the prime cause of the anger of God.

verses.pt: Os superiores gradualmente fazem do mundo à vontade. O que pensam sobre o pesar de Deus?
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, those in high places are doing as they please with the world. What thought is given to God's regret?
verses.ro: kami taru wa dandan sekai mamani suru   Kami no zannen nanto omou zo
verses.jp1: 上たるハだん／＼せかいまゝにする
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんなんとをもうぞ
verses.kanji: 上たるは段々世界侭にする   神の残念何と思うぞ
verses.english: The upper people increasingly manage the world as they please. What do you think of the regret of God?

verses.pt: Embora tenha dito quaisquer coisas até agora, nada tem sido visto. Mas, desta vez, chegou o tempo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have seen nothing I have told you. Now at last, the time has come.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani o yutemo miete nai   mo konotabi wa setsu ga kita
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにをゆうてもみへてない
verses.jp2: もふこのたびハせへつうがきた
verses.kanji: 今迄は何を言うても見えて無い   もうこの度は節が来た
verses.english: Until now, whatever I may have foretold you, nothing has appeared. But now at last the time has come.

verses.pt: Doravante, começarei de novo o Serviço Alegre. Não poderão compreender facilmente o que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall resume My hastening for the Joyous Service. This might not be easy to understand.
verses.ro: korekara wa Yoki-zutome ni mata kakaru   nanno koto yara choto ni shiremai
verses.jp1: これからハよふきづとめにまたかゝる
verses.jp2: なんの事やら一寸にしれまい
verses.kanji: これからは陽気勤めにまた掛かる   何の事やら一寸に知れまい
verses.english: From now on I will resume the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service. Perhaps you cannot easily comprehend what it means.

verses.pt: Até agora, embora seja conhecido e tenha explanado e explicado, não o têm entendido.
verses.en_6th_ed: I have already told you and told you what is known to Me. The teachings have been told, but you know not what they mean.
verses.ro: imamade mo shirite hanashite hanashi tomo   toite aredomo nanno koto yara
verses.jp1: 今までもしりてはなしてはなしとも
verses.jp2: といてあれどもなんの事やら
verses.kanji: 今迄も知りて話して話しとも   説いて有れども何の事やら
verses.english: Hitherto I have told you ever so often what I know. But you do not understand what it means.

verses.pt: Até o presente, embora tenha explicado tudo, nada foi visto, pois o dia não havia chegado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have not seen whatever I told you, because the day had not arrived.
verses.ro: koremade wa ikana hanashi o toita tote   hi ga kitarande miete nai zo ya
verses.jp1: これまでハいかなはなしをといたとて
verses.jp2: ひがきたらんでみへてないぞや
verses.kanji: これ迄は如何な話を説いたとて   日が来たらんで見えて無いぞや
verses.english: Until now, of whatever I have told you, nothing has appeared because the day has not yet come.

verses.pt: Desde que o tempo já tenha chegado, doravante, o que disser será visto tal qual.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, as the time has come, you will see it just as I tell you.
verses.ro: korekara wa mo setsu ga kitaru kara   yueba sono mama miete kuru zo ya
verses.jp1: これからわもふせへつうがきたるから
verses.jp2: ゆへばそのまゝみへてくるぞや
verses.kanji: これからはもう節が来たるから   言えばその侭見えて来るぞや
verses.english: From now on, as the time has already come, what I say shall appear as I say at once.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! À tarde do dia vinte e cinco, o ano trinta e seis, Deus limpará os corações.
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! In the evening of the twenty-fifth day in the thirty-sixth year, God will cleanse your heart.
verses.ro: shikato kike san roku ni go no kureyai ni   mune no soji o Kami ga suru zo ya
verses.jp1: しかときけ三六二五のくれやいに
verses.jp2: むねのそふぢを神がするぞや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け三六二五の暮れ合いに   胸の掃除を神がするぞや
verses.english: Listen attentively! On the evening of the twenty-fifth day in the thirty-sixth year, God will work the sweeping of your heart.

verses.pt: Reflitam profundamente. Quão pura seja a água, se puser barro, se tornará suja.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder this: no matter how clear the water may be, if you put mud into it, it will become turbid.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo nanbo sundaru mizu ya tote   doro o iretara nigoru koto nari
verses.jp1: しやんせよなんぼすんだる水やとて
verses.jp2: とろをいれたらにごる事なり
verses.kanji: 思案せよ何ぼ澄んだる水やとて   泥を入れたら濁る事なり
verses.english: Ponder over it deeply! However clear the water may be, if you put mud into it, it will become turbid at once.

verses.pt: Se a água suja não for rapidamente purificada, não terei meios para colocar o pilar central.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unless the muddy water is purified quickly, there is no way to put in the central pillar.
verses.ro: nigori mizu hayaku sumasan koto nitewa   shin no hashira no ireyo ga nai
verses.jp1: にごり水はやくすまさん事にてわ
verses.jp2: しんのはしらのいれよふがない
verses.kanji: 濁り水早く澄まさん事にては   真の柱の入れ様が無い
verses.english: Unless the muddy water becomes quickly purified, I cannot find the way of setting in the central pillar.

verses.pt: Se ao menos colocar o pilar rapidamente, a paz se estabelecerá firmemente para todo o sempre.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only the central pillar is quickly put in, everything will be settled firmly forever.
verses.ro: hashira sai hayaku iretaru koto naraba   matsudai shikato osamari ga tsuku
verses.jp1: はしらさいはやくいれたる事ならば
verses.jp2: まつたいしかとをさまりがつく
verses.kanji: 柱さい早く入れたる事ならば   末代確と治まりが着く
verses.english: If only the central pillar is quickly set in, all shall become settled firmly and forever.

verses.pt: Explicarei a verdade de Deus, que iniciou o mundo. Não julguem ser mentira.
verses.en_6th_ed: God, who began this world, teaches the truth. Never take it to be false.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no shinjitsu o   toite kikasuru uso to omouna
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめた神のしんぢつを
verses.jp2: といてきかするうそとをもうな
verses.kanji: この世を初めた神の真実を   説いて聞かする嘘と思うな
verses.english: I will tell you the true heart of God who created this world. Never take it to be false!

verses.pt: Embora houvesse até agora ensinamentos morais e antigos registros, não há quem conheça a origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, there have been teachings, ethical and ancient, but there has been no one who knows the origin.
verses.ro: imamade mo shingaku koki aru keredo   moto o shiritaru mono wa nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでもしんがくこふきあるけれど
verses.jp2: もとをしりたるものハないぞや
verses.kanji: 今迄も心学こうき有るけれど   元を知りたる者は無いぞや
verses.english: Hitherto there have been shingaku and koki, but there has been no one who understands the truth of the origin.

verses.pt: É natural que não haja quem a tenha conhecido, pois é a caminhada no mar de lama.
verses.en_6th_ed: So should it be, for there should be no one who knows the course of the path in the muddy ocean.
verses.ro: sono hazu ya doroumi naka no michisugara   shiritaru mono wa nai hazu no koto
verses.jp1: そのはづやどろうみなかのみちすがら
verses.jp2: しりたるものハないはづの事
verses.kanji: その筈や泥海中の道すがら   知りたる者は無い筈の事
verses.english: It is no wonder that you know nothing about the process in the muddy ocean.

verses.pt: Explicarei gradualmente a respeito dos fatos ainda não revelados desde o início do mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall tell you things unknown since the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: koremade wa kono yo hajimete nai koto o   dandan toite kikasu koto nari
verses.jp1: これまでハこのよはじめてない事を
verses.jp2: たん／＼といてきかす事なり
verses.kanji: これ迄はこの世初めて無い事を   段々説いて聞かす事なり
verses.english: Hitherto I have told you about things which have never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Embora explique sobre todos os fatos não existentes, não há nenhum erro neles.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though I teach solely of things unknown, there is nothing I teach that is untrue.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo nai koto bakari toku keredo   kore ni machigota koto wa nai zo ya
verses.jp1: なにもかもない事はかりとくけれど
verses.jp2: これにまちごた事ハないぞや
verses.kanji: 何もかも無い事ばかり説くけれど   これに間違ごた事は無いぞや
verses.english: Though I teach only those things which have never existed, there is nothing which differs from the truth.

verses.pt: Aos onze, o nove acabará e a angústia será esquecida, e espero o dia vinte e seis do primeiro mês.
verses.en_6th_ed: On the eleventh, the nine will be gone and hardship forgotten. I await the twenty-sixth of the first month.
verses.ro: ju ichi ni ku ga nakunarite shin wasure   shogatsu niju roku nichi o matsu
verses.jp1: 十一に九がなくなりてしんわすれ
verses.jp2: 正月廿六日をまつ
verses.kanji: 十一に九が無くなりて真忘れ   正月二十六日を待つ
verses.english: The nine shall be gone at eleven, then you shall forget hardships. And I will look forward to the twenty-sixth day of the first month.

verses.pt: Neste ínterim, o centro será fixado, a ambição esquecida e o Serviço preparado com o pessoal completo.
verses.en_6th_ed: By that time, the core will be settled and greed forgotten. Let all performers assemble and prepare for the Service.
verses.ro: kono aida shin mo tsukikuru yoku wasure   ninju sorote Tsutome koshirae
verses.jp1: このあいだしんもつきくるよくハすれ
verses.jp2: にんぢうそろふてつとめこしらゑ
verses.kanji: この間真も付き来る欲忘れ   人衆揃うて勤め拵え
verses.english: In the meantime the center shall be established. And everyone forgetting avarice shall prepare to perform the Service in full numbers.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, a instância do espírito de Deus está em mostrar logo a onipotência.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the mind of God hastens to show you free and unlimited workings quickly.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   juyojizai o hayaku misetai
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp2: ぢうよじざいをはやくみせたい
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心の急き込みは   自由自在を早く見せたい
verses.english: The one thing for which the mind of God is daily impatient is to manifest My omnipotence to you quickly.

verses.pt: Doravante, farão o Serviço com o pessoal completo. Com isso, a região dos esclarecidos se pacificará certamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, the performers will assemble and do the Service. This will truly settle Nihon.
verses.ro: korekara wa ninju sorote Tsutome suru   kore de tashikani nihon osamaru
verses.jp1: これからハにんぢうそろをてつとめする
verses.jp2: これでたしかににほんをさまる
verses.kanji: これからは人衆揃うて勤めする   これで確かに日本治まる
verses.english: From now on the Service shall be performed with the full number of performers. The peace shall surely reign all over the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.pt: Por ser realmente a dedicação única à salvação, não há nada a temer em absoluto.
verses.en_6th_ed: Since My aim is truly single-hearted salvation, there is nothing at all for you to fear.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni tasuke ichijo de aru karani   nanimo kowami wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: しんぢつにたすけ一ぢよてあるからに
verses.jp2: なにもこわみハさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: 真実に救け一条で有るからに   何も怖みは更に無いぞや
verses.english: You need fear nothing. Because My aim is solely the true and single-hearted salvation.

verses.pt: Impedindo de qualquer maneira a dedicação única à salvação, o pesar de Deus manifestará no corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you dare to stop all works for single-hearted salvation, the regret of God will appear as a disorder of the body.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo tasuke ichijo tomeru nara   Kami no zannen mi ni sawari tsuku
verses.jp1: なにもかもたすけ一ぢよとめるなら
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんみにさハりつく
verses.kanji: 何もかも救け一条止めるなら   神の残念身に障り着く
verses.english: If you try to stop any and every work of single-hearted salvation, the regret of God shall appear as a disorder of your body.

verses.pt: Reflitam sobre esta preparação de todas as salvações. Não a julguem nunca como um trabalho humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder well! Never think that these preparations for universal salvation are human workings.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo yorozu tasuke no kono moyo   ningen waza to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: しやんせよ万たすけのこのもよふ
verses.jp2: にんけんハざとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 思案せよ万救けのこの模様   人間業と更に思うな
verses.english: Ponder deeply! Never take these arangements for every kind of salvation as the work of a mere human being.

verses.pt: Até agora, não entenderam coisa alguma, pois todos tinham somente cogitação humana.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have not been able to understand anything. There was nothing but human thinking.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanika yorozu ga wakaraide   mina ningen no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにかよろづがハからいで
verses.jp2: みなにんけんの心ばかりで
verses.kanji: 今迄は何か万が分からいで   皆人間の心ばかりで
verses.english: Until now you have not been able to understand any truth. All of you have been thinking with human thoughts alone.

verses.pt: Doravante, farei a confrontação entre os espíritos: o de Deus e o dos superiores.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall compare the minds of those in high places with the mind of God.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no kokoro to kami taru no   kokoro to kokoro no hikiyawase suru
verses.jp1: これからハ神の心と上たるの
verses.jp2: 心と心のひきやハせする
verses.kanji: これからは神の心と上たるの   心と心の引き合わせする
verses.english: From now on I will bring together the mind of God and that of the upper people.

verses.pt: Não pensem serem insignificantes estas palavras, porque Deus não pode ficar indiferente à verdade.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not take this talk lightly. God truly cannot bear to look on.
verses.ro: kono hanashi chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   Kami ga shinjitsu mikanetaru yue
verses.jp1: このはなし一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 神がしんぢつみかねたるゆへ
verses.kanji: この話一寸の事やと思うなよ   神が真実見兼ねたる故
verses.english: Never take this talk to be a mere trifle! This is because God could not bear to remain as a mere spectator.

verses.pt: Saibam que, doravante, farei a competição de forças entre a de Deus e a dos superiores.
verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the strength of God will be pitted against the strength of those in high places from now on.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no chikara to kami taru no   chikara kurabe o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: これからハ神のちからと上たるの
verses.jp2: ちからくらべをするとをもへよ
verses.kanji: これからは神の力と上たるの   力比べをすると思えよ
verses.english: Expect that from now on I, God, will compare My might with that of the upper people!

verses.pt: Se existe alguém tão forte, apresentem-no. Deus lhe mostrará o dobro da força.
verses.en_6th_ed: Have your strongest come against Me. God has twice the strength.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki araba dashite miyo   Kami no ho nimo bai no chikara o
verses.jp1: いかほどのごふてきあらばだしてみよ
verses.jp2: 神のほふにもばいのちからを
verses.kanji: 如何程の強敵有らば出してみよ   神の方にも倍の力を
verses.english: However strong a man there may be, let him come against Me! I Myself have twice as much strength as he.

verses.pt: Desde que é Deus verdadeiro que se revela, saibam que será feita toda e qualquer preparação.
verses.en_6th_ed: As God in Truth is going out to the fore, know that every arrangement will be made.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami ga omote i deru kara wa   ikana moyo mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: しんぢつの神がをもていでるからハ
verses.jp2: いかなもよふもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 真実の神が表へ出るからは   如何な模様もすると思えよ
verses.english: I, the true God, am coming to the fore, and will do any and every arrangement. Understand it well!

verses.pt: Até agora, a região dos não-esclarecidos impôs sua vontade à dos esclarecidos. Que fazer com o pesar de Deus?
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, those of Kara have done as they pleased with Nihon. What can be done about the regret of God?
verses.ro: imamade wa kara ga nihon o mamani shita   Kami no zannen nanto shiyo yara
verses.jp1: いまゝでわからがにほんをまゝにした
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんなんとしよやら
verses.kanji: 今迄は唐が日本を侭にした   神の残念何としよなら
verses.english: Until now the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later have managed as they please the people of the region where My teachings spread early. The regret of God was so severe that I could not find any way to clear it away.

verses.pt: Doravante, a região dos esclarecidos fará à sua vontade com a dos não-esclarecidos. Fiquem todos igualmente cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, Nihon will do as it pleases with those of Kara. Be aware of it, all of you.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nihon ga kara o mamani suru   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: このさきハにほんがからをまゝにする
verses.jp2: みな一れつハしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: この先は日本が唐を侭にする   皆一列は承知して居よ
verses.english: Henceforth the people of the region where My teachings spread early will lead the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later. All of you, be aware and expect it!

verses.pt: Ainda que sejam raízes e ramos da mesma árvore, os ramos se quebrarão, mas as raízes prosperarão.
verses.en_6th_ed: Root and branches of the same tree: branches will break, yet the root will prosper.
verses.ro: onaji ki no ne to eda to no koto naraba   eda wa orekuru ne wa sakai deru
verses.jp1: をなじきのねへとゑだとの事ならバ
verses.jp2: ゑたハをれくるねハさかいでる
verses.kanji: 同じ木の根と枝との事ならば   枝は折れ来る根は栄え出る
verses.english: They are the root and branches of the same tree. Branches may be broken, yet the root will grow prosperous.

verses.pt: Até agora, a região dos não-esclarecidos era tida como importante, mas, de agora em diante, virá somente a dobrar-se.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, those of Kara were said to be great, but from now on they will only be broken.
verses.ro: imamade wa kara wa erai to yu taredo   korekara saki wa oreru bakari ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでわからハゑらいとゆうたれど
verses.jp2: これからさきハをれるはかりや
verses.kanji: 今迄は唐は偉いと言うたれど   これから先は折れるばかりや
verses.english: Until now the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later have been said to be great; henceforth they shall only be broken.

verses.pt: Vejam a região dos esclarecidos. Embora julguem ser pequena, será respeitada quando sua raiz for revelada.
verses.en_6th_ed: Look at Nihon! It is thought to be tiny, but when the root appears, you will be overwhelmed with amazement.
verses.ro: nihon miyo chiisai yoni omotaredo   ne ga arawareba osore iru zo ya
verses.jp1: にほんみよちいさいよふにをもたれど
verses.jp2: ねがあらハればをそれいるぞや
verses.kanji: 日本見よ小さい様に思うたれど   根が現れば恐れ入るぞや
verses.english: Look at the region where My teachings spread early! Formerly it was said to be tiny. But when the might of the root appears, every one shall become overwhelmed with amazement.

verses.pt: Não poderão julgar esta força como humana. É a força de Deus, e não poderão enfrentá-la.
verses.en_6th_ed: This power cannot be thought of as being human strength. It is the power of God which nothing can match.
verses.ro: kono chikara ningen waza to omowaren   Kami no chikara ya kore wa kanawan
verses.jp1: このちからにんけんハさとをもハれん
verses.jp2: 神のちからやこれハかなわん
verses.kanji: この力人間業と思われん   神の力やこれは敵わん
verses.english: This power cannot be taken to be the work of a man. It is the might of God, which no one can match.

verses.pt: Embora este mundo viva animado, não há quem conheça a origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: In this world, people are living merrily, but there is no one who knows the origin.
verses.ro: kono yo wa nigiwashi kurashi iru keredo   moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node
verses.jp1: このよふハにぎハしくらしいるけれど
verses.jp2: もとをしりたるものハないので
verses.kanji: この世は賑わし暮らし居るけれど   元を知るたる者は無いので
verses.english: In this world many people are living merrily. But there is no one who has understood the origin.

verses.pt: Se conhecerem detalhadamente esta origem, não surgirá nenhum caso de doença.
verses.en_6th_ed: If this origin is known in detail, there should be no cause for illness.
verses.ro: kono moto o kuwashiku shirita koto naraba   yamai no okoru koto wa nai no ni
verses.jp1: このもとをくハしくしりた事ならバ
verses.jp2: やまいのをこる事わないのに
verses.kanji: この元を詳しく知りた事ならば   病の起こる事は無いのに
verses.english: If you become aware of this origin in detail, there shall be no case in which you shall suffer from illness.

verses.pt: Estes filhos que vivem sem nada saberem, inspiram compaixão aos olhos de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: These children, living their lives knowing nothing, pitiful are they in the eyes of God.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo shirazu ni kurasu kono kodomo   Kami no me niwa ijirashiki koto
verses.jp1: なにもかもしらずにくらすこの子共
verses.jp2: 神のめへにハいぢらき事
verses.kanji: 何もかも知らずに暮らすこの子供   神の目にはいじらしき事
verses.english: These children who live their lives knowing nothing about any truth are really pitiful in the eyes of God.

verses.pt: Seja o que for, nada há que possa chamar-se de doença. É porque existe o caminho do erro espiritual.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is nothing at all which should be called illness. It is only because there are paths of the mistaken mind.
verses.ro: nani nitemo yamai to yute sarani nashi   kokoro chigai no michi ga aru kara
verses.jp1: なにゝてもやまいとゆうてさらになし
verses.jp2: 心ちがいのみちがあるから
verses.kanji: 何にても病と言うて更に無し   心違いの道が有るから
verses.english: There is indeed nothing which can be called illness. It is because you are using your mind on some mistaken path.

verses.pt: Este caminho é a mesquinhez, a cobiça e o amor-próprio, a ambição e o orgulho. Estas são as poeiras.
verses.en_6th_ed: These paths are miserliness, covetousness, self-love, greed, and arrogance. They are the dusts.
verses.ro: kono michi wa oshii hoshii to kawaii to   yoku to koman kore ga hokori ya
verses.jp1: このみちハをしいほしいとかハいと
verses.jp2: よくとこふまんこれがほこりや
verses.kanji: この道は惜しい欲しいと可愛いと   欲と高慢これが埃や
verses.english: These paths are miserliness, covetousness, selfish love, avarice and arrogance. They are indeed the dust in human minds.

verses.pt: Os seres humanos do mundo são todos filhos de Deus. Ouçam atentamente e entendam os dizeres de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: All human beings in this world are the children of God. Listen and understand well the words of God!
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen wa mina Kami no ko ya   Kami no yu koto shikato kikiwake
verses.jp1: このよふのにんけんハみな神のこや
verses.jp2: 神のゆう事しかときゝわけ
verses.kanji: この世の人間は皆神の子や   神の言う事確と聞き分け
verses.english: All human beings in this world are children of God. Listen attentively and understand well the words of God!

verses.pt: Se ao menos limparem completamente as poeiras, depois realizarei a salvação extraordinária.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only the dusts are cleanly swept away, then I shall work marvelous salvation.
verses.ro: hokori sai sukiyaka harota koto naraba   ato wa mezurashi tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp1: ほこりさいすきやかはろた事ならば
verses.jp2: あとハめづらしたすけするぞや
verses.kanji: 埃さい清きやか払ろた事ならば   後は珍し救けするぞや
verses.english: If only you have finished the sweeping of your mental dust, I will work remarkable salvation.

verses.pt: Esta salvação, segundo o espírito sincero, é para não terem doença, morte e enfraquecimento.
verses.en_6th_ed: By this salvation given in accordance with the mind of sincerity, you shall be freed from illness, death, and weakening.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro shidai no kono tasuke   yamazu shinazu ni yowari naki yo
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心しだいのこのたすけ
verses.jp2: やますしなずによハりなきよふ
verses.kanji: 真実の心次第のこの救け   病まず死なずに弱り無き様に
verses.english: You shall be saved according to the true sincerity of your mind. You shall not fall ill, die or become weakened.

verses.pt: Esta salvação é a intenção única de Deus de fixar a vida natural em cento e quinze anos.
verses.en_6th_ed: By this salvation, to fix the natural term of life at one hundred and fifteen years is the single desire of God.
verses.ro: kono tasuke hyaku ju go sai jomyo to   sadame tsuketai Kami no ichijo
verses.jp1: このたすけ百十五才ぢよみよと
verses.jp2: さだめつけたい神の一ぢよ
verses.kanji: この救け百十五才定命と   定め付けたい神の一条
verses.english: By this salvation I, God, intend single-heartedly to fix the natural term of human life at one hundred and fifteen years.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, sobre a instância do espírito de Deus, o que as pessoas próximas estão pensando?
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the mind of God hastens. You who are close to Me, what are you thinking of it?
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o   soba naru mono wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみを
verses.jp2: そばなるものハなんとをもてる
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心の急き込みを   側なる者は何と思うて居る
verses.english: Day by day the mind of God hastens impatiently. What are you close to Me thinking of it?

verses.pt: Estão desanimados por ter medo dos superiores, mas não há nada a temer, pois é a instância de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: For fear of those in high places, you are depressed. Fear not, for God is hastening.
verses.ro: kami taru o kowai to omote izumi iru   Kami no sekikomi kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp1: 上たるをこわいとをもていすみいる
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみこわみないぞや
verses.kanji: 上たるを怖いと思うていずみ居る   神の急き込み怖み無いぞや
verses.english: For fear of the upper people, you are hesitating. Fear not! This is the urging of God.

verses.pt: Não julguem o mal do peito como uma doença, pois é a instância de Deus que se encontra no limite.
verses.en_6th_ed: The tightness in your chest: do not take it as an illness. It is the hastening of God being blocked.
verses.ro: mune ashiku kore o yamai to omouna yo   Kami no sekikomi tsukaetaru yue
verses.jp1: むねあしくこれをやまいとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみつかゑたるゆへ
verses.kanji: 胸悪しくこれを病と思うなよ   神の急き込み痞えたる故
verses.english: If you feel tightness in your chest, do not take it as an illness! It is nothing but the impatience of God.

verses.pt: Gradualmente, o espírito de Deus revela os fatos maravilhosos e insta a salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: Working miracles one after another, the mind of God hastens for your salvation.
verses.ro: dandan to Kami no kokoro to yu mono wa   fushigi arawashi tasuke sekikomu
verses.jp1: たん／＼と神の心とゆうものわ
verses.jp2: ふしぎあらハしたすけせきこむ
verses.kanji: 段々と神の心と言う物は   不思議現し救け急き込む
verses.english: Working marvels one after another, the mind of God is hastening to save you all.

verses.pt: O que estão pensando serem estes fatos maravilhosos? Espanando as poeiras, realizarei a limpeza.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think these miracles are? Sweeping the dust away, I shall complete the cleansing.
verses.ro: kono fushigi nanno koto ya to omote iru   hokori harote soji shitateru
verses.jp1: このふしきなんの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: ほこりはろふてそふぢしたてる
verses.kanji: この不思議何の事やと思うて居る   埃払うて掃除仕立てる
verses.english: What do you think these marvels mean? Sweeping dust away, I will accomplish the cleansing of your mind.

verses.pt: Depois disso, se colocarem prontamente o pilar, a paz se estabelecerá no mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, the pillar will be quickly put in. When it is done, the world will settle.
verses.ro: ato naru ni hayaku hashira o ireta nara   kore de kono yo no sadame tsuku nari
verses.jp1: あとなるにはやくはしらをいれたなら
verses.jp2: これでこのよのさだめつくなり
verses.kanji: 後なるに早く柱を入れたなら   これでこの世の定め着くなり
verses.english: Thereafter I will quickly set in the central pillar. Then things of this world shall become settled.

verses.pt: Se esta explanação se evidenciar prontamente, convençam-se todos, quem quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you quickly see the truth of this talk, become convinced, everyone, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono hanashi hayaku mietaru koto naraba   ikana mono demo mina tokushin se
verses.jp1: このはなしはやくみへたる事ならば
verses.jp2: いかなものでもみなとくしんせ
verses.kanji: この話早く見えたる事ならば   如何な者でも皆得心せ
verses.english: When this talk is quickly realized, be convinced of it, who-ever you may be!

verses.pt: Tenho dito até agora sobre a prova evidente, porém, não sabem o que seja o Kanrodai.
verses.en_6th_ed: I have told you before about the test for proof, but you do not even understand what the Kanrodai is about.
verses.ro: imamade wa shoko tameshi to yue aredo   Kanrodai mo nanno koto yara
verses.jp1: いまゝでハしよこためしとゆへあれど
verses.jp2: かんろふだいもなんの事やら
verses.kanji: 今迄は証拠試しと言うて有れど   甘露台も何の事やら
verses.english: Hitherto I have told you that I will make the test for proof. But you do not understand yet what the meaning of Kanrodai is.

verses.pt: Tendo levado esta pessoa há quatro anos, Deus abriga-a em seus braços. Isto é a prova.
verses.en_6th_ed: Having received this one four years ago, God is holding her in a tight embrace. This is the proof.
verses.ro: kono mono o yo nen izen ni mukaitori   Kami ga dakishime kore ga shoko ya
verses.jp1: このものを四ねんいせんにむかいとり
verses.jp2: 神がだきしめこれがしよこや
verses.kanji: この者を四年以前に迎い取り   神が抱き締めこれが証拠や
verses.english: Having received this one four years ago, I, God, have been embracing her in My bosom. This is the proof.

verses.pt: Estou preparando realmente para devolvê-la logo. Esta é a maior instância de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Truly, the preparation to return her quickly is the first matter in the hastening of God.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni hayaku kayasuru moyodate   Kami no sekikomi kore ga daiichi
verses.jp1: しんぢつにはやくかやするもよふたて
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみこれがたい一
verses.kanji: 真実に早く返する模様建て   神の急き込みこれが第一
verses.english: Truly I am preparing to return this one quickly. God is impatiently hastening this matter before anything else.

verses.pt: Até agora, freqüentemente, tenho explicado a minha onipotência, mas ainda nada tem sido visto.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have often told you about My free and unlimited workings, but you have seen nothing yet.
verses.ro: koremade wa juyojizai to mama tokedo   nanimo mietaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: これまでハぢうよじざいとまゝとけど
verses.jp2: なにもみへたる事わなけれど
verses.kanji: これ迄は自由自在と間々説けど   何も見えたる事は無けれど
verses.english: Until now I have often told you of My omnipotence, but nothing has appeared yet.

verses.pt: Doravante, deixarei explanado acerca de tudo. Quando isto for visto, será a minha onipotência.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall teach you everything beforehand. When seen, you will understand that I work freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: korekara wa ikana hanashi mo tokioite   sore mieta nara juyojizai ya
verses.jp1: これからハいかなはなしもときをいて
verses.jp2: それみゑたならじうよぢざいや
verses.kanji: これからは如何な話も説き置いて   それ見えたなら自由自在や
verses.english: From now on I will teach everything beforehand. When it is realized, it shall be the evidence of My omnipotence.

verses.pt: Não digam nada dos fatos ocorridos até agora. Começarei a partir do dia vinte e seis.
verses.en_6th_ed: Please do not speak about things in the past. I shall begin on the twenty-sixth day.
verses.ro: imamade no koto wa nan nimo yute kurena   niju roku nichi ni hajime kakeru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでの事ハなんにもゆてくれな
verses.jp2: 廿六日にはじめかけるで
verses.kanji: 今迄の事は何にも言うて呉れな   廿六日に初め掛けるで
verses.english: Please do not speak about things in the past! For I am going to begin My work on the twenty-sixth day.

verses.pt: Doravante, animando o espírito de todas as pessoas, prepararei para estabelecer a paz na região dos esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall make the minds of the world spirited and prepare to settle Nihon.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekai no kokoro isame kake   nihon osameru moyo suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これからハせかいの心いさめかけ
verses.jp2: にほんをさめるもよふするぞや
verses.kanji: これからは世界の心勇め掛け   日本治める模様するぞやる
verses.english: Henceforth, I will cheer up the minds of the world, and thus arrange to bring peace to the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.pt: Por ser superficial o espírito humano, diz somente a respeito das coisas que são vistas.
verses.en_6th_ed: The minds of human beings are indeed shallow. You talk only about things already visible.
verses.ro: ningen no kokoro to yu wa azanote   mietaru koto o bakari yu nari
verses.jp1: にんけんの心とゆうハあざのふて
verses.jp2: みへたる事をばかりゆうなり
verses.kanji: 人間の心と言うはあざのうて   見えたる事をばかり言うなり
verses.english: As you human beings are shallow-minded, you talk only about things now visible to your eyes.

verses.pt: Doravante, explicarei somente os fatos inexistentes. Observem firmemente o porvir.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall talk only about things that have not appeared. Watch the future closely.
verses.ro: korekara wa nai koto bakari toite oku   korekara saki o tashika mite iyo
verses.jp1: これからハない事ばかりといてをく
verses.jp2: これからさきをたしかみていよ
verses.kanji: これからは無い事ばかり説いて置く   これから先を確か見て居よ
verses.english: From now on I will teach solely about those things which do not yet exist. Wait and look certainly at those things which shall appear in the future!

verses.pt: Gradualmente, começarei a falar sobre quaisquer fatos. Não direi absolutamente sobre os já vistos.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to tell you about whatever things step by step, but never about things already visible.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo dandan yuikakeru   mietaru koto wa sarani yuwan de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事もたん／＼ゆいかける
verses.jp2: みへたる事ハさらにゆハんで
verses.kanji: どの様な事も段々言い掛ける   見えたる事は更に言わんで
verses.english: I will begin to tell you any and everything step by step but never about the things which have already appeared.

verses.pt: A intenção única de Deus, que iniciou o mundo, é fixar depressa o pilar central.
verses.en_6th_ed: To set up quickly the central pillar of God, who began this world, is God's single desire.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no Shinbashira   hayaku tsuketai Kami no ichijo
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめた神のしんばしら
verses.jp2: はやくつけたい神の一ぢよ
verses.kanji: この世を初めた神の真柱   早く着けたい神の一条
verses.english: I, God, single-heartedly desire to quickly set up the central pillar of God who created this world.

verses.pt: Escutando gradualmente a respeito das palavras e ações de Deus invisível, reflitam profundamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen and ponder step by step over the words and works of God, who is invisible to your eyes.
verses.ro: me ni men Kami no yu koto nasu koto o   dandan kiite shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: めへにめん神のゆう事なす事を
verses.jp2: たん／＼きいてしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: 目に見えん神の言う事為す事を   段々聞いて思案してみよ
verses.english: Listen and try to ponder step by step over the words and works of God who is quite invisible to your eyes!

verses.pt: É errado pensar que o caminho atual está à vontade dos superiores, está à vontade de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: You are thinking that the present path is at the mercy of the high places, but you are mistaken. It will be as God pleases.
verses.ro: ima no michi kami no mama ya to omote iru   kokoro chigau de Kami no mama nari
verses.jp1: いまのみち上のまゝやとをもている
verses.jp2: 心ちがうで神のまゝなり
verses.kanji: 今の道上の侭やと思うて居る   心違うで神の侭なり
verses.english: The upper people are thinking that at present they can manage everything as they please. But their minds are all mistaken. Really it is ruled over by God.

verses.pt: Os superiores fazem do mundo à sua vontade. Será que não conhecem o pesar de Deus?
verses.en_6th_ed: Those in high places are doing as they please with all the world. Do you not know the regret of God?
verses.ro: kami taru wa sekaiju o mamani suru   Kami no zannen kore o shiran ka
verses.jp1: 上たるハせかいぢううをまゝにする
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんこれをしらんか
verses.kanji: 上たるは世界中を侭にする   神の残念これを知らんか
verses.english: The upper people are managing the whole world as they please. Do you not know the severe regret of God?

verses.pt: Até agora, o mundo todo estava à vontade dos superiores. De agora em diante, mudarei de expressão.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, everything in the world has gone according to those in high places. From now on, there will be changes.
verses.ro: koremade wa yorozu sekai wa kami no mama   mo korekara wa monku kawaru zo
verses.jp1: これまでハよろづせかいハ上のまゝ
verses.jp2: もふこれからハもんくかハるぞ
verses.kanji: これ迄は万世界は上の侭   もうこれからは文句変わるぞ
verses.english: Until now the upper people have managed everything in the world as they please. But henceforth things shall be changed.

verses.pt: Desde quando iniciei este mundo, ainda não expliquei todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Since the time I began this world, I have not yet taught you everything.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara wa nanimo kamo   toite kikashita koto wa nai node
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめてからハなにもかも
verses.jp2: といてきかした事ハないので
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからは何もかも   説いて聞かした事は無いので
verses.english: Since I created this world, I have taught you nothing yet.

verses.pt: Os superiores estão pensando que podem fazer do mundo à sua vontade, mas isto é errado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Those in high places are thinking of the whole world on their own terms, but their minds are wrong.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sekaiju o waga mamani   omote iru no wa kokoro chigau de
verses.jp1: 上たるハせかいぢううをハがまゝに
verses.jp2: をもているのハ心ちかうで
verses.kanji: 上たるは世界中を我侭に   思うて居るのは心違うで
verses.english: The upper people are thinking that they can manage the whole world as they please, but it is quite a mistake.

verses.pt: As árvores que crescem tanto nos altos montes como no fundo dos vales são todas iguais.
verses.en_6th_ed: The trees which grow in the high mountains and the trees which grow in the low valleys are all the same.
verses.ro: takayama ni sodatsuru kii mo tanisoko ni   sodatsuru kii mo mina onaji koto
verses.jp1: 高山にそだつる木もたにそこに
verses.jp2: そたつる木もみなをなじ事
verses.kanji: 高山に育つる木も谷底に   育つる木も皆同じ事
verses.english: They are all on equal terms, whether they may be the trees which grow on the high mountains or the trees which grow at the bottom of the valleys.

verses.pt: Os corpos humanos são todos coisas emprestadas por Deus. Não conhecem a onipotência de Deus?
verses.en_6th_ed: All human bodies are things lent by God. Do you not know the free and unlimited workings of God?
verses.ro: ningen wa minamina Kami no kashimono ya   Kami no juyo kore o shiran ka
verses.jp1: にんけんハみな／＼神のかしものや
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふこれをしらんか
verses.kanji: 人間は皆々神の貸し物や   神の自由これを知らんか
verses.english: Human bodies are all things lent by God. Do you not know the　omnipotence of God?

verses.pt: Todas as pessoas, cuidem cada qual do seu corpo, pois não sabem quando e para onde Deus irá.
verses.en_6th_ed: Let all of you in the world take care. There is no knowing when or where God will go.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa minamina waga mi ki o tsuke yo   Kami ga nandoki doko e iku yara
verses.jp2: 神がなんどきとこへいくやら
verses.kanji: 一列は皆々我が身気を付けよ   神が何時何処へ行くやら
verses.english: All of you must equally take care of yourselves because there is no knowing when and for where God is leaving.

verses.pt: Uma palavra! A instância do espírito de Deus consiste somente em reunir as madeiras usáveis.
verses.en_6th_ed: Just a word: the hastening in the mind of God is solely to prepare to assemble useful timber.
verses.ro: choto hanashi Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   yoboku yoseru moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: 一寸はなし神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp2: よふぼくよせるもよふばかりを
verses.kanji: 一寸話神の心の急き込みは   用木寄せる模様ばかりを
verses.english: Just a word! The mind of God is single-heartedly hastening to call together useful timber.

verses.pt: Embora existam inúmeras e variadas árvores, não se sabe quais serão as madeiras usáveis.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though there are many and varied trees, perhaps no one knows which will become useful timber.
verses.ro: dandan to oku tachiki mo aru keredo   dore ga yoboku naru ya shiremai
verses.jp1: たん／＼とをふくたちきもあるけれど
verses.jp2: どれがよふほくなるしれまい
verses.kanji: 段々と多く立ち木も有るけれど   どれが用木成るや知れまい
verses.english: One by one a lot of trees are coming together, but perhaps no one can know which shall turn out to be useful timber.

verses.pt: Das madeiras usáveis, não falo de poucas, pois desejo muitas árvores usáveis.
verses.en_6th_ed: Of these timbers, it is not to be just a few. I desire a great number of timbers.
verses.ro: yoboku mo chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   oku yoki ga hoshii koto kara
verses.jp1: よふぼくも一寸の事でハないほどに
verses.jp2: をふくよふきがほしい事から
verses.kanji: 用木も一寸の事では無い程に   多く用木が欲しい事から
verses.english: I desire to collect My useful timber not in a few but in great numbers.

verses.pt: Cuidarei dia a dia das madeiras usáveis. Não pensem jamais que aí haja algum mal.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, I shall tend those trees which are to become My useful timber. Never take it to be illness.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni yoboku nitewa teiri suru   doko ga ashiki to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: にち／＼によふほくにてわていりする
verses.jp2: どこがあしきとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 日々に用木にては手入りする   何処が悪しきと更に思うな
verses.english: Day after day I will use My hand to trim those trees which are to be taken as My useful timber. Never take it as an illness!

verses.pt: Entre as árvores, há as que cuidarei gradualmente e outras que serão deixadas tal qual derrubadas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Among the trees, there will be some that I shall tend step by step and others that I shall let fall as they are.
verses.ro: onaji ki mo dandan teiri suru mo ari   sono mama kokasu kii mo aru nari
verses.jp1: をなじきもたん／＼ていりするもあり
verses.jp2: そのまゝこかすきいもあるなり
verses.kanji: 同じ木も段々手入りするも有り   その侭倒す木も有るなり
verses.english: Among those similar trees, some of them shall be trimmed by My hand by degrees, and others shall soon be brought down just as they are.

verses.pt: Esta prova de toda minha onipotência jamais será realizada fora deste lugar.
verses.en_6th_ed: This test for proof of all of My free and unlimited workings, I shall never do at any other place.
verses.ro: ika naru no juyojizai no kono tameshi   hoka naru toko de sarani sen zo ya
verses.jp1: いかなるのぢうよじざいのこのためし
verses.jp2: ほかなるとこでさらにせんぞや
verses.kanji: 如何なるの自由自在のこの試し   他なる所で更にせんぞや
verses.english: This test of any and every omnipotence, I will never do at any other place.

verses.pt: Até agora, embora explicasse como sendo prova, já, desta vez, será a prova conclusiva.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have often taught you, saying that it is to be a test. Now at this time, I shall end the test.
verses.ro: imamade mo tameshi to yute toitaredo   mo konotabi wa tameshi osame ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでもためしとゆうてといたれど
verses.jp2: もふこのたびハためしをさめや
verses.kanji: 今迄も試しと言うて説いたれど   もうこの度は試し納めや
verses.english: Hitherto I have often told you about the test. But this is final.

verses.pt: Este mundo é corpo de Deus. Reflitam a respeito disso em tudo.
verses.en_6th_ed: This universe is the body of God. Ponder this in all matters step by step.
verses.ro: dandan to nani goto nitemo kono yo wa   Kami no karada ya shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: たん／＼となに事にてもこのよふわ
verses.jp2: 神のからだやしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: 段々と何事にてもこの世は   神の身体や思案してみよ
verses.english: Any and everything of this universe is all the body of God. Ponder deeply and understand it well!

verses.pt: Desta vez, por Deus ter-se revelado ao mundo, ensinará tudo acerca de todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, as God is openly revealed, I shall teach you any and all things.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i deteru kara   yorozu no koto o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このたびハ神がをもていでゝるから
verses.jp2: よろづの事をみなをしへるで
verses.kanji: この度は神が表へ出てるから   万の事を皆教えるで
verses.english: This time I, God, have come to the fore; I will teach you any and everything.

verses.pt: Se não souberem que o corpo de cada um é tomado emprestado, não compreenderão nada.
verses.en_6th_ed: So long as you remain unknowing that the body is a thing borrowed, you can understand nothing at all.
verses.ro: meme no minouchi yori no karimono o   shirazu ni ite wa nanimo wakaran
verses.jp1: めへ／＼のみのうちよりのかりものを
verses.jp2: しらずにいてハなにもわからん
verses.kanji: 銘々の身の内よりの借り物を   知らずに居ては何も分からん
verses.english: So long as you remain ignorant of the truth that you borrow your body from God, you can understand nothing at all.

verses.pt: Reflitam! Não há jamais o que se diz doença. É a indicação do caminho e a advertência de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over it! There is nothing at all which should be called illness. It is but a road sign or an admonition from God.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo yamai to yute sarani nashi   Kami no michiose iken naru zo ya
verses.jp1: しやんせよやまいとゆうてさらになし
verses.jp2: 神のみちをせいけんなるぞや
verses.kanji: 思案せよ病と言うて更に無し   神の道教え意見なるぞや
verses.english: Ponder over it deeply! There is nothing which should be called illness. They are all signposts or admonitions by God.

verses.pt: Tanto um pequeno mal dos olhos como uma ferida, uma tonteira ou uma dor são orientações de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: A slight ailment of the eyes, swellings, dizziness, and pain are but the guidance of God.
verses.ro: choto shitaru me no ashiku mo dekimono ya   nobose itami wa Kami no tebiki ya
verses.jp1: 一寸したるめへのあしくもできものや
verses.jp2: のぼせいたみハ神のてびきや
verses.kanji: 一寸したる目の悪しくも出来物や   逆上せ痛みは神の手引きや
verses.english: A slight sore of the eyes, swelling and dizziness, they are all the guidance of God.

verses.pt: Embora tenha dito até agora em altos montes, não foi vista neles uma madeira usável.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, among the high mountains no useful timber has yet appeared.
verses.ro: imamade wa takai yama ya to yuta tote   yoboku mieta koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ高い山やとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: よふほくみへた事ハなけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は高い山やと言うたとて   用木見えた事は無けれど
verses.english: Until now, even though there are many trees on the high mountains, I have not been able to find My useful timber among them.

verses.pt: Doravante, também nos altos montes, prepararei gradualmente para descobrir as madeiras usáveis.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall make preparations to find useful timber step by step even in the high mountains.
verses.ro: konosaki wa takayama nitemo dandan to   yoboku midasu moyo suru zo ya
verses.jp1: このさきハ高山にてもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: よふぼくみだすもよふするぞや
verses.kanji: この先は高山にても段々と   用木見出す模様するぞや
verses.english: But henceforth I will arrange to find them one by one also on the high mountains.

verses.pt: Eis a preparação que logo salvará todos, animando o espírito dos superiores e dos inferiores.
verses.en_6th_ed: This preparation is for saving all humankind quickly. I shall make the minds of both the high and the low be spirited.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni hayaku tasukeru kono moyo   kami shimo tomoni kokoro isamete
verses.jp1: いちれつにはやくたすけるこのもよふ
verses.jp2: 上下ともに心いさめで
verses.kanji: 一列に早く救けるこの模様   上下共に心勇めて
verses.english: As I am arranging to save all mankind equally, I will make the minds of both the upper and lower people all cheerful.

verses.pt: Se o espírito de todas as pessoas se animar dia a dia, a colheita de todas as coisas será animadora.
verses.en_6th_ed: If the minds of the world are spirited day after day, the growth of all crops will be spirited, too.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni sekai no kokoro isamu nara   mono no ryuke wa mina isami deru
verses.jp1: にち／＼にせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp2: ものゝりうけハみないさみでる
verses.kanji: 日々に世界の心勇むなら   物の立毛は皆勇み出る
verses.english: Day by day, when the minds of the world become cheerful, all crops shall also come up abundantly.

verses.pt: Como se trata da dedicação única à salvação de todas as coisas, desejo cortar rapidamente a raiz dos conflitos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Since My intent is single-hearted salvation in all matters, I desire to cut off the root of rebellion quickly.
verses.ro: nani nitemo tasuke ichijo de aru karani   muhon no ne o hayaku kiritai
verses.jp1: なにゝてもたすけ一ちよであるからに
verses.jp2: むほんねへをはやくきりたい
verses.kanji: 何にても救け一条で有るからに   謀反の根を早く切りたい
verses.english: As I am single-heartedly hastening to save you all in any and every matter, I desire first to cut off the root of rebellion.

verses.pt: Como o caminho atual está cheio de poeiras, façam a limpeza utilizando a vassoura.
verses.en_6th_ed: The present path is covered with dust. Take up a broom and do the sweeping.
verses.ro: ima no michi hokori darake de aru karani   hoke o mochite soji o shitate
verses.jp1: いまのみちほこりだらけであるからに
verses.jp2: ほふけをもちてそうぢふしたて
verses.kanji: 今の道埃だらけで有るからに   箒を持ち掃除を仕立て
verses.english: The present way is indeed too dusty. So take a broom and sweep it away!

verses.pt: O caminho posterior será amplo e sem sujeira. Passem levando quantas pessoas desejarem.
verses.en_6th_ed: The path thereafter will be broad and clear. Take along with you as many others as you wish.
verses.ro: ato naru wa michi wa hirokute gomoku nashi   ikutari nari to tsurete tore yo
verses.jp1: あとなるハみちハひろくでごもくなし
verses.jp2: いくたりなりとつれてとふれよ
verses.kanji: 後なるは道は広くてごもく無し   幾たりなりと連れて通れよ
verses.english: Thereafter the way shall become broad and clear. Then you may pass through it, bringing as many persons as you wish.

verses.pt: À quinta hora do vigésimo segundo dia do segundo mês, explicarei a predestinação de todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to speak at five on the twenty-second of the second month and teach you the causality of everything.
verses.ro: nii nii no nii no itsutsu ni hanashi kake   yorozu innen mina tokikikasu
verses.jp1: 二二の二の五つにはなしかけ
verses.jp2: よろついんねんみなときゝかす
verses.kanji: 二二の二の五つに話し掛け   万因縁皆説き聞かす
verses.english: Beginning My talk at eight o'clock in the evening on the twenty-second day of the second month, I will teach you the causality concerning any and everything.

verses.pt: Escutem os sermões dos altos montes e as palavras do Deus verdadeiro e reflitam profundamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: After listening to the sermons of those on the high mountains, listen to the teachings of God in Truth and ponder.
verses.ro: takayama no sekkyo kiite shinjitsu no   Kami no hanashi o kiite shiyan se
verses.jp1: 高山のせきゝよきいてしんしつの
verses.jp2: 神のはなしをきいてしやんせ
verses.kanji: 高山の説教聞いて真実の   神の話を聞いて思案せ
verses.english: After listening to the sermons of the high mountains, listen to the teachings of this true God and then ponder over them deeply!

verses.pt: Escutem diária e gradualmente as palavras de Deus e tenham prazer, pois isto será o Registro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, listen to the teachings of God step by step and enjoy them. It is the Divine Record.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no hanashi o dandan to   kiite tanoshime Koki naru zo ya
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のはなしをたん／＼と
verses.jp2: きいてたのしめこふきなるぞや
verses.kanji: 日々に神の話を段々と   聞いて楽しめこうきなるぞや
verses.english: Listen and enjoy the talk of God day after day and one after another! It is the Koki, the Divine Record, of salvation for eternity.

verses.pt: Que estão pensando que seja o presente caminho? Embora seja um caminho um tanto incompreensível…
verses.en_6th_ed: The present path: what kind of path do you think it is? Though it seems to you to be unclear,
verses.ro: ima no michi nanno michi ya to omote iru   nanika wakaran michi de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまのみちなんのみちやとをもている
verses.jp2: なにかわからんみちであれども
verses.kanji: 今の道何の道やと思うて居る   何か分からん道で有れども
verses.english: What do you think this present way is? Even though it is indeed a way which you cannot take to be trustworthy,

verses.pt: Adiante se avista um amplo caminho. Já está ali, bem próximo.
verses.en_6th_ed: I already see a broad path ahead. You are saying that it is over there, but it is already before you.
verses.ro: konosaki wa okwan michi ga miete aru   mo ako ni aru koko i kita nari
verses.jp1: このさきハをふくハんみちがみへてある
verses.jp2: もふあこにあるこゝいきたなり
verses.kanji: この先は往還道が見えて有る   もうあこに有る此処へ来たなり
verses.english: In the near future, a broad way is coming into sight. While you are saying that it is over there, it is already before you.

verses.pt: Quando estão pensando que será este dia? Surgirá certamente no quinto dia do quinto mês.
verses.en_6th_ed: When do you think this day will come? On the fifth of the fifth month, it will definitely appear.
verses.ro: kono higara itsu no koto ya to omote iru   go gatsu itsuka ni tashika detekuru
verses.jp1: このひがらいつの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: 五月五日にたしかでゝくる
verses.kanji: この日柄何時の事やと思うて居る   五月五日に確か出て来る
verses.english: When do you think this day will come? On the fifth day of the fifth month people will surely come here to call upon Me.

verses.pt: Desde então, começará a surgir a peregrinação. Vejam isto. Chegarão ao ponto de não distinguir entre o dia e a noite.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then a thanksgiving pilgrimage will begin. Look for it. People will come whether it be night or day.
verses.ro: sore yori mo okage hajimaru kore o miyo   yoru hiru shiren yoni naru zo ya
verses.jp1: それよりもをかけはぢまるこれをみよ
verses.jp2: よるひるしれんよふになるぞや
verses.kanji: それよりもお蔭初まるこれを見よ   夜昼知れん様になるぞや
verses.english: Thence the thanksgiving pilgrimage similar to the okagemairi will begin. Wait and see it! The distinction between day and night will be forgotten.

verses.pt: Saibam que, gradualmente, quando chegar o sexto mês, concederei o amuleto-prova.
verses.en_6th_ed: By and by, when the sixth month comes, know that I shall grant the Proof-Amulet.
verses.ro: dandan to roku gatsu ni naru koto naraba   Shoko Mamori o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: たん／＼と六月になる事ならば
verses.jp2: しよこまむりをするとをもへよ
verses.kanji: 段々と六月になる事ならば   証拠守りをすると思えよ
verses.english: Step by step promoting the preparation, when the sixth month comes, I will begin to grant the Shoko-mamori, the Amulet in proof of returning to the Jiba.

verses.pt: Depois disso, ao instar gradativamente a construção, todos ficarão atarefados.
verses.en_6th_ed: After that, I shall hasten the construction step by step, and it will become busy in all matters.
verses.ro: sorekara wa dandan fushin sekikonde   nanika isogashi koto ni naru nari
verses.jp1: それからハたん／＼ふしんせきこんで
verses.jp2: なにかいそがし事になるなり
verses.kanji: それからは段々普請急き込んで   何か忙しい事になるなり
verses.english: After that I will hasten the construction more and more. So you will become busy in everything.

verses.pt: Doravante, convençam-se de que há dia a dia a instância no espírito de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, the mind of God will hasten day by day. Be aware of it.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no kokoro wa nichinichi ni   sekikomi aru to omoikoso shire
verses.jp1: これからハ神の心ハにち／＼に
verses.jp2: せきこみあるとをもいこそしれ
verses.kanji: これからは神の心は日々に   急き込み有ると思いこそ知れ
verses.english: From now on you must be convinced that the mind of God is impatiently hastening day by day.

verses.pt: Embora seja tão intensa a minha instância, não direi absolutamente nada através da palavra.
verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how great My haste may be, I shall say nothing by word of mouth.
verses.ro: ika hodono oku sekikomi aru totemo   kuchi dewa nanimo yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いかほどのをふくせきこみあるとても
verses.jp2: くちでハなにもゆうでないぞや
verses.kanji: 如何程の多く急き込み有るとても   口では何も言うで無いぞや
verses.english: However impatient I may be, I will speak nothing by mouth.

verses.pt: Desejo, doravante, deixar informado logo, que muitas pessoas virão.
verses.en_6th_ed: I wish to let you know quickly of the many people that will come in the future.
verses.ro: konosaki wa oku miekuru hitobito o   hayaku shirashite oko to omoedo
verses.jp1: このさきハをふくみへくる人ゞを
verses.jp2: はやくしらしてをことをもゑど
verses.kanji: この先は多く見え来る人々を   早く知らして置こうと思えど
verses.english: Though I wish to let you know of the numerous people who will appear in the near future,

verses.pt: Gradualmente, pessoas inesperadas são vistas. Será que não há olhos capazes de vê-las?
verses.en_6th_ed: I see new faces coming one after another. Is there no one who can see them with his own eyes?
verses.ro: dandan to mezurashi hito ga miete aru   tare ga me nimo kore ga mien ka
verses.jp1: だん／＼とめつらし人がみへてある
verses.jp2: たれがめへにもこれがみゑんか
verses.kanji: 段々と珍しい人が見えて有る   誰が目にもこれが見えんか
verses.english: One by one new faces are coming into My sight. Can you not see them with your own eyes?

verses.pt: Haverá muitas explanações daqui em diante. Observem bem este caminho extraordinário.
verses.en_6th_ed: Watch this marvelous path. There will be a mountain of stories about it from now on.
verses.ro: korekara no ato naru hanashi yamayama no   michi o mite iyo mezurashiki michi
verses.jp1: これからのあとなるはなし山／＼の
verses.jp2: みちをみていよめづらしきみち
verses.kanji: これからの後なる話山々の   道を見て居よ珍しき道
verses.english: Look at the way about which I will tell you much about it from now on! You will wonder how remarkable it is.

verses.pt: Que prazer! Grande número de pessoas se reunirão. Virão desejando a dádiva do céu.
verses.en_6th_ed: How delightful it will be! So many people will assemble, coming to ask for the gifts of heaven.
verses.ro: omoshiro ya oku no hito ga atsumarite   ten no atae to yute kuru zo ya
verses.jp1: をもしろやをふくの人があつまりて
verses.jp2: 天のあたゑとゆうてくるそや
verses.kanji: 面白や多くの人が集まりて   天の与えと言うて来るぞや
verses.english: How delightful it should be! So many people flocking together will come to Me, praying for the Gift of Heaven.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, os molestados do corpo vêm de novo, sem saber da impaciente expectativa de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, disorders will befall you, and you will come again. But no one knows how impatiently God waits.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mi ni sawari tsuku mata kita ka   Kami no machikane kore o shirazu ni
verses.jp1: にち／＼にみにさハりつくまたきたか
verses.jp2: 神のまちかねこれをしらすに
verses.kanji: 日々に身に障り付くまた来たか   神の待ち兼ねこれを知らずに
verses.english: Day after day people will come back here so often, because they feel disorders in their bodies. But no one is aware of the impatient waiting of God.

verses.pt: O pessoal do Serviço completa-se gradualmente, e tudo surgirá tendo isto como um sinal.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, the performers of the Service will all assemble. Taking this as a sign, I shall begin all My workings.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsutome no ninju te ga soroi   kore o aizu ni nanimo dekakeru
verses.jp1: だん／＼とつとめのにんぢうてがそろい
verses.jp2: これをあいつになにもでかける
verses.kanji: 段々と勤めの人衆手が揃い   これを合図に何も出掛ける
verses.english: One by one the members of the Service will all assemble. Then taking that as a signal, I will start any and every working.

verses.pt: Se o espírito diário de Deus for mostrado pronta e gradualmente ao espírito dos superiores...
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, I desire to make the mind of God quickly known to the minds of the high places step by step.
verses.ro: nichinichi no Kami no kokoro wa dandan to   kami no kokoro ni hayaku misetara
verses.jp1: にち／＼の神の心わだん／＼と
verses.jp2: 上の心にはやくみせたら
verses.kanji: 日々の神の心は段々と   上の心に早く見せたら
verses.english: Day after day I desire to make the mind of God known to the upper people step by step.

verses.pt: É estranho que o espírito dos superiores se sujeite aos não-esclarecidos, sem nada conhecer.
verses.en_6th_ed: Knowing nothing, those in high places obey those of Kara. How pitiful are such minds.
verses.ro: kami taru wa nanimo shirazu ni tojin o   shitagau kokoro kore ga okashii
verses.jp1: 上たるわなにもしらずにとふぢんを
verses.jp2: したがう心これがをかしい
verses.kanji: 上たるは何も知らずに唐人を   従う心これが可笑しい
verses.english: It is ridiculous that because of their ignorance of the truth the upper people follow those who shall understand My teachings later.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, a instância do espírito de Deus está em desejar a imediata conversão dos não-esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the mind of God impatiently awaits those of Kara to replace their minds entirely.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   tojin korori kore o matsu nari
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp2: とふぢんころりこれをまつなり
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心の急き込みは   唐人ころりこれを待つなり
verses.english: Day by day the mind of God is impatiently waiting for those who will understand Me later to completely convert their minds.

verses.pt: Reflitam sobre o prenunciador caminho bovino de até agora. Que todos os superiores se acautelem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Remember what followed the epidemic of the cows in the past. Let all of you in high places beware.
verses.ro: imamade no ushi no sakimichi omote miyo   kami taru tokoro mina ki o tsuke yo
verses.jp1: いまゝでのうしのさきみちをもてみよ
verses.jp2: 上たるところみなきをつけよ
verses.kanji: 今迄の牛の先道思うてみよ   上たる所皆気を付けよ
verses.english: Remember the forerunning epidemics of the cows in the past! All of those who are in the upper place must be attentive.

verses.pt: Se ao menos isto for inteiramente visto, o espírito de todas as pessoas se animará.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only all of this comes to be seen, all the minds of the world will be spirited.
verses.ro: kore saika mina mie kitaru koto naraba   sekai no kokoro mina isami kuru
verses.jp1: これさいかみなみへきたる事ならば
verses.jp2: せかいの心みないさみくる
verses.kanji: これさいか皆見え来たる事ならば   世界の心皆勇み来る
verses.english: If only this is truly realized, all the minds of the world will become cheered up.

verses.pt: Se, em tudo, o espírito de todas as pessoas se animar, o espírito de Deus também se animará.
verses.en_6th_ed: If the minds of the world are spirited in all matters, the mind of God, also, will be spirited.
verses.ro: nani nitemo sekai no kokoro isamu nara   Kami no kokoro mo mina isamu nari
verses.jp1: なにゝてもせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp2: 神の心もみないさむなり
verses.kanji: 何にても世界の心勇むなら   神の心も皆勇むなり
verses.english: When the minds of the world become cheered about any and everything, the mind of God will also become cheered up.

verses.pt: Como pensam ser o caminho de hoje? Serão vistos fatos extraordinários.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think the path of today is about? Marvelous things will come into sight.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa ika naru michi to omou kana   mezurashi koto ga miete kuru zo ya
verses.jp1: けふの日ハいかなるみちとをもうかな
verses.jp2: めづらし事がみゑてくるぞや
verses.kanji: 今日の日は如何なる道と思うかな   珍しい事が見えて来るぞや
verses.english: What do you think of the way of today? A truly remarkable affair will come into sight.

verses.pt: Gradualmente, aparecerão todas as coisas. Qual seja o caminho, todos tenham prazer.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, all things will come into sight. Whatever your path may be, take delight in it all.
verses.ro: dandan ni nanika no koto mo miete kuru   ika naru michi mo mina tanoshime yo
verses.jp1: だん／＼になにかの事もみへてくる
verses.jp2: いかなるみちもみなたのしめよ
verses.kanji: 段々に何かの事も見えて来る   如何なる道も皆楽しめよ
verses.english: Step by step any and everything will appear. So take delight in your path, whatever it may be!

verses.pt: Se o movimento das mãos do Serviço Alegre for feito dia a dia, quão intenso será o prazer de Deus!
verses.en_6th_ed: If the hand movements of the Joyous Service are learned day by day, how delighted God will be.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Yoki-zutome no te ga tsukeba   Kami no tanoshimi ika hodono koto
verses.jp1: にち／＼によふきづとめのてがつけば
verses.jp2: 神のたのしゆみいかほとの事
verses.kanji: 日々に陽気勤めの手が付けば   神の楽しみ如何程の事
verses.english: If you become learned in the hand-gestures of the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service, day by day, how delighted God would be!

verses.pt: Espero ansioso que se complete logo o pessoal do Serviço. O que pensam os próximos?
verses.en_6th_ed: I impatiently await the performers of the Service to gather quickly. What are you close to Me thinking?
verses.ro: hayabaya to Tsutome no ninju machikaneru   soba na kokoro wa nani o omou ya
verses.jp1: はや／＼とつとめのにんぢうまちかねる
verses.jp2: そばな心わなにをふもうや
verses.kanji: 早々と勤めの人衆待ち兼ねる   側な心は何を思うや
verses.english: I am impatiently waiting for the members of the Service to gather quickly. What are you close to Me thinking of it?

verses.pt: Embora não haja nada que possa ser chamado de doença, o incômodo que se apega no corpo é uma mensagem de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Nothing should be called illness. Should your body be afflicted, it is God's call for your service.
verses.ro: ika naru no yamai to yute nai keredo   mi ni sawari tsuku Kami no yomuki
verses.jp1: いかなるのやまいとゆうてないけれど
verses.jp2: みにさわりつく神のよふむき
verses.kanji: 如何なるの病と言うて無いけれど   身に障り付く神の用向き
verses.english: There is nothing which can be called illness. But if a disorder comes to your body, it is a sign from God of an errand.

verses.pt: Não poderão saber facilmente o que seja a mensagem. São as intenções de Deus muito acumuladas.
verses.en_6th_ed: This call for your service might not easily be understood, for the thoughts of God are mountainous.
verses.ro: yomuki mo nanino koto yara choto shiren   Kami no omowaku yamayama no koto
verses.jp1: よふむきもなにの事やら一寸しれん
verses.jp2: 神のをもわくやま／＼の事
verses.kanji: 用向きも何の事やら一寸知れん   神の思惑山々の事
verses.english: Perhaps you cannot easily understand what kind of errand it is. There are so many intentions of God piled up.

verses.pt: Seja em que for, tudo são intenções de Deus. O espírito se animará se tudo for explicado.
verses.en_6th_ed: If all the thoughts of God about everything are taught to you, your minds will be spirited.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Kami no omowaku nani nitemo   mina toita nara kokoro isamu de
verses.jp1: なにもかも神のをもハくなにゝても
verses.jp2: みなといたなら心いさむで
verses.kanji: 何もかも神の思惑何にても   皆説いたなら心勇むで
verses.english: When I explain any and every intention of God, you will become cheered up.

verses.pt: Se, pouco a pouco, todas as intenções forem esclarecidas completamente, o corpo se tornará saudável.
verses.en_6th_ed: When I have taught you all of My thoughts step by step, your bodies, too, will be refreshed.
verses.ro: dandan ni nanimo omowaku tokikireba   minouchi yori mo susuyaka ni naru
verses.jp1: だん／＼になにもをもハくときゝれば
verses.jp2: みのうちよりもすゝやかになる
verses.kanji: 段々に何も思惑説き切れば   身の内よりも涼やかになる
verses.english: When I explain any and every intention step by step, you will feel refreshed and become healthy.

verses.pt: Espero ansioso pelo posterior Serviço Alegre. Se indagarem o que seja, é o Serviço de Kagura.
verses.en_6th_ed: Again, I impatiently await the coming Joyous Service. What it is, is the Kagura Service.
verses.ro: matasaki no Yoki-zutome o machikaneru   nanno koto nara Kagura-zutome ya
verses.jp1: またさきのよふきづとめをまちかねる
verses.jp2: なんの事ならかぐらつとめや
verses.kanji: また先の陽気勤めを待ち兼ねる   何の事なら神楽勤めや
verses.english: I am waiting impatiently for the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service, in the future. If you ask what it is, it is the Kagura-Zutome, the Service with the Holy Masks.

verses.pt: Embora haja numerosas pessoas no mundo, não há quem tenha conhecido o espírito de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though there are many people throughout the world, there is no one who knows the mind of God.
verses.ro: sekaiju oku no hito de aru keredo   Kami no kokoro o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: せかいぢうをふくの人であるけれど
verses.jp2: 神の心をしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 世界中多くの人で有るけれど   神の心を知りた者無し
verses.english: There are many people in the whole world, but no one can comprehend the mind of God.

verses.pt: Desta vez, ensinarei detalhadamente tudo a respeito da verdade do espírito de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall teach you in detail all of the truth in the mind of God.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami no kokoro no shinjitsu o   nanika isai o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このたびハ神の心のしんぢつを
verses.jp2: なにかいさいをみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: この度は神の心の真実を   何か委細を皆教えるで
verses.english: This time I will teach you any and every detail of the truth of the mind of God.

verses.pt: Seja em que for, se entenderem a devoção única a Deus, não serão vencidos pela região dos não-esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: In all matters, if you come to know the truth of single-heartedness with God, you will never be overcome by Kara.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami ichijo o shirita nara   kara ni makeso na koto wa nai zo ya
verses.jp1: なにゝても神一ちよをしりたなら
verses.jp2: からにまけそな事ハないぞや
verses.kanji: 何にても神一条を知りたなら   唐に負けそうな事は無いぞや
verses.english: If you become convinced of the way of single-hearted devotion to God in any and every case, you will never be defeated by those who will understand My teachings later.

verses.pt: Doravante, farei a preparação para distinguir clara e gradualmente a região dos não-esclarecidos da região dos esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, My only concern will be the preparations quickly to distinguish between Kara and Nihon step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa kara to nihon o sumiyaka ni   dandan wakeru moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: このさきハからとにほんをすみやかに
verses.jp2: だん／＼ハけるもよふばかりを
verses.kanji: この先は唐と日本を速やかに   段々分ける模様ばかりを
verses.english: Henceforth I will hasten solely arrangements to distinguish step by step the region where My teachings spread early from the region where My teachings shall spread later.

verses.pt: Se ao menos compreenderem prontamente esta distinção, o pesar de Deus será extinto.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only this distinction is made quickly, the regret of God will be cleared away.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku wakarita koto naraba   Kami no zannen hareru koto nari
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくわかりた事ならば
verses.jp2: 神のざんねんはれる事なり
verses.kanji: これさいか早く分かりた事ならば   神の残念晴れる事なり
verses.english: If only this is clearly distinguished, the regret of God will entirely disappear.

verses.pt: Se o pesar de Deus verdadeiro for extinto, o espírito de todas as pessoas ficará animado.
verses.en_6th_ed: If the regret of God in Truth is cleared away, all minds in the world will be spirited.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami no zannen hareta nara   sekai no kokoro mina isami deru
verses.jp1: しんぢつの神のざんねんはれたなら
verses.jp2: せかいの心みないさみでる
verses.kanji: 真実に神の残念晴れたなら   世界の心皆勇み出る
verses.english: When the regret of the true God becomes cleared away, the minds of the world will become cheered up.

verses.pt: Gradualmente, realizarei somente o preparo para salvar verdadeiramente o mundo inteiro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I am solely making preparations truly to save the whole world.
verses.ro: dandan to sekaiju o shinjitsu ni   tasukeru moyo bakari suru zo ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼とせかいぢううをしんぢつに
verses.jp2: たすけるもよふはかりするぞや
verses.kanji: 段々と世界中を真実に   救ける模様ばかりするぞや
verses.english: Step by step I am single-heartedly preparing to truly save people of the whole world.

verses.pt: Depois disso, sem doença, morte e enfraquecimento, fiquem até quando for, conforme o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: After that, you may stay as long as you wish, without illness, death, or weakening.
verses.ro: sono nochi wa yamazu shinazu ni yowarazu ni   kokoro shidai ni itsu made mo iyo
verses.jp1: そのゝちハやまずしなすによハらすに
verses.jp2: 心したいにいつまでもいよ
verses.kanji: その後は病まず死なずに弱らずに   心次第に何時迄も居よ
