verses.english: After that you may live as long as you like, never falling ill, dying or becoming weakened.

verses.pt: Mais adiante, quando os anos tiverem passado, não terão sequer um indício de envelhecimento.
verses.en_6th_ed: Further, after the passage of long years, there will be no aging at all.
verses.ro: matasaki wa nengen tachita koto naraba   toshi o yoru me wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: またさきハねんけんたちた事ならば
verses.jp2: としをよるめハさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: また先は年限経ちた事ならば   年を寄るめは更に無いぞや
verses.english: Further, after the lapse of long years, there shall be no fear of aging at all.

verses.pt: Até agora, nada era entendido, mas doravante, ensinarei a respeito de tudo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, you have known nothing, but from now on I shall teach you everything.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanino koto demo shirenanda   korekara saki wa mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにの事でもしれなんだ
verses.jp2: これからさきハみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: 今迄は何の事でも知れなんだ   これから先は皆教えるで
verses.english: Until now you have known nothing of any matter, but henceforth I will teach you any and everything.

verses.pt: Atualmente, é grande a diferença entre o espírito de todos e o dos de casa.
verses.en_6th_ed: At present, the minds of all, as well as the minds of those within, are greatly mistaken.
verses.ro: ima dewa na mina no kokoro to uchi naru no   kokoro ga oi chigai naredomo
verses.jp1: いまてハなみなの心とうちなるの
verses.jp2: 心かをふいちがいなれども
verses.kanji: 今ではな皆の心と内なるの   心が大い違いなれども
verses.english: Now there is a large difference between the minds of those familiar with Me and the minds of all the other people.

verses.pt: A partir de amanhã, começarei a pedir de qualquer modo. As palavras de Deus devem ser seguidas.
verses.en_6th_ed: From tomorrow on, I shall begin to request anything of you. You must follow the words of God.
verses.ro: asunichi wa nandemo tanomi kakeru de na   Kami no iijo ni tsukaneba naran
verses.jp1: あすにちハなんでもたのみかけるでな
verses.jp2: 神のいぢよにつかねばならん
verses.kanji: 明日日は何でも頼み掛けるでな   神の言い条に付かねばならん
verses.english: From tomorrow I will begin to request anything from you. You should obey the words of God.

verses.pt: Convençam-se de que o incômodo que surge dia a dia no corpo é o aviso de Deus sobre o erro espiritual.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day, disorders will come to your bodies. Ponder over it! God is informing you of your mistaken minds.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mi ni sawari tsuku tokushin se   kokoro chigai o Kami ga shirasuru
verses.jp1: にち／＼にみにさハりつくとくしんせ
verses.jp2: 心ちがいを神がしらする
verses.kanji: 日々に身に障り付く得心せ   心違いを神が知らする
verses.english: Day after day disorders will appear in your bodies. Ponder over it! It is a warning from God that your minds are mistaken.

verses.pt: Cada qual, refletindo acerca do próprio corpo e determinando o espírito, ampare-se em Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Each of you, after pondering over the body, resolve the mind and lean on God.
verses.ro: meme no minouchi yori mo shiyan shite   kokoro sadamete Kami ni motare yo
verses.jp1: めへ／＼のみのうちよりもしやんして
verses.jp2: 心さだめて神にもたれよ
verses.kanji: 銘々の身の内よりも思案して   心定めて神に凭たれよ
verses.english: Everyone of you, pondering over your body, lean upon God with your mind firmly determined!

verses.pt: Seja em que for, é profunda a intenção de Deus, porém, as pessoas próximas não sabem disso.
verses.en_6th_ed: The thoughts of God about all matters are profound, but you close to Me are unaware of this.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no omowaku fukaku aru   soba naru mono wa sore o shirazu ni
verses.jp1: なにゝても神のをもわくふかくある
verses.jp2: そばなるものハそれをしらすに
verses.kanji: 何にても神の思惑深く有る   側なる者はそれを知らずに
verses.english: The intention of God is deep in whatever kinds of things. But you close to Me are unaware of it.

verses.pt: Embora até hoje não fosse visto nenhum caminho, logo será visto. Reflitam e determinem o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you have not been able to see any path whatever. It can be seen quickly. Ponder and resolve.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani yono michi mo miene domo   hayaku mieru de shiyan sadame yo
verses.jp1: けふまでハなによのみちもみへねども
verses.jp2: はやくみゑるでしやんさだめよ
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何よの道も見えねども   早く見えるで思案定めよ
verses.english: Until today no way of any kind has appeared. But now they will soon appear. Therefore, determine your mind!

verses.pt: Embora pense em informar logo este caminho, isto é difícil porque não há a compreensão.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though I wish to have you know this path quickly, it is difficult because there is no understanding.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku shiraso to omoe domo   satori ga note kore ga mutsukashi
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくしらそとをもへども
verses.jp2: さとりがのふてこれがむつかし
verses.kanji: この道を早く知らそうと思えども   悟りが無うてこれが難し
verses.english: I am impatient to let you know this way quickly. But it is difficult because you are not spiritually awakened.

verses.pt: Embora tenha informado gradualmente com o pincel, a falta de compreensão é o pesar de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though I have made it known by My writing brush step by step, your lack of understanding is the regret of God.
verses.ro: dandan to fude ni shirashite aru keredo   satori nai no ga Kami no zannen
verses.jp1: たん／＼とふでにしらしてあるけれど
verses.jp2: さとりないのが神のざんねん
verses.kanji: 段々と筆に知らして有るけれど   悟り無いのが神の残念
verses.english: Step by step I have informed you with My writing brush. But you have not become awakened. This is the cause of the regret of God.

verses.pt: Seja em que for, ouçam bem as palavras de Deus. Tudo será segundo o espírito de cada um.
verses.en_6th_ed: In everything, listen closely to the words of God. Everything depends on the mind of each of you.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no yu koto shikato kike   mina meme no kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp1: なにゝても神のゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp2: みなめゑめの心しだいや
verses.kanji: 何にても神の言う事確と聞け   皆銘々の心次第や
verses.english: Listen attentively to anything which I, God, say! Everything depends on your mind.

verses.pt: Refletindo com o espírito realmente animado, e amparados em Deus, executem o Serviço Alegre.
verses.en_6th_ed: Truly be spirited and ponder. Then lean on God and do the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro isande shiyan shite   Kami ni motarete Yoki-zutome o
verses.jp1: しんぢつに心いさんでしやんして
verses.jp2: 神にもたれてよふきづとめを
verses.kanji: 真実に心勇んで思案して   神に凭れて陽気勤めを
verses.english: Truly cheer up your mind, ponder deeply and then lean upon God! And thus perform the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service!

verses.pt: Não pensem o que possam ser estas explanações. São unicamente explanações sobre o fertilizante.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder what this talk is about. It is solely about the matter of the fertilizer.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto ya to omouna yo   koe ichijo no hanashi naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このはなしなにの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: こゑ一ぢよのはなしなるぞや
verses.kanji: この話何の事やと思うなよ   肥一条の話なるぞや
verses.english: Never wonder what the meaning of this talk is! I am talking to you single-heartedly about the matter of fertilizer.

verses.pt: Não pensem que a eficácia está no fertilizante, mas sim, na sinceridade verdadeira do espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: This fertilizer: do not wonder what is effective. The mind's true sincerity is its effectiveness.
verses.ro: koe ya tote nani ga kiku towa omouna yo   kokoro no makoto shinjitsu ga kiku
verses.jp1: こへやとてなにがきくとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 心のまことしんぢつがきく
verses.kanji: 肥やとて何が効くとは思うなよ   心の誠真実が効く
verses.english: Speaking of the fertilizer, never wonder what is effective on the crop! It is the true sincerity of your mind.

verses.pt: Se o espírito sincero for verificado, saibam que realizarei qualquer providência.
verses.en_6th_ed: When I have discerned your mind of sincerity, know that I shall provide any protection.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro misadame tsuita nara   ikana shugo mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心みさだめついたなら
verses.jp2: いかなしゆこふもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 真実の心見定め付いたなら   如何な守護もすると思えよ
verses.english: When I have ascertained the sincerity of your mind, I will surely work whatever kind of protection.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Ensinarei tudo sobre todas as coisas. Não haverá qualquer discriminação em absoluto.
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen closely! I teach all things to everyone. I do not discriminate among any of you ever.
verses.ro: shikato kike yorozu no koto o mina oshie   doko ni hedate wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: しかときけよろつの事をみなをしへ
verses.jp2: どこにへだてわさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け万の事を皆教え   何処に隔ては更に無いぞや
verses.english: Listen attentively! I teach whatever kinds of things to you all, and never make any discrimination at all.

verses.pt: Não importa de que lugares venham as pessoas, porque todas são predestinadas.
verses.en_6th_ed: People come to Me from whatever places. It is because they all are of the original causality.
verses.ro: dono yona tokoro no hito ga detekite mo   mina innen no mono de aru kara
verses.jp1: どのよふなところの人がでゝきても
verses.jp2: みないんねんのものであるから
verses.kanji: どの様な所の人が出て来ても   皆因縁の者で有るから
verses.english: From whatever places people may come to visit Me, it is because they all have original affinities to Me.

verses.pt: É a Residência onde criei os seres humanos, e é por essa predestinação que desci do céu.
verses.en_6th_ed: This is the Residence where I began human beings. Because of this causality, it is here that I descended.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime dashitaru yashiki nari   sono innen de amakudarita de
verses.jp1: にんけんをはじめだしたるやしきなり
verses.jp2: そのいんねんであまくたりたで
verses.kanji: 人間を初め出したる屋敷なり   その因縁で天降りたで
verses.english: This is the Residence where I have created human beings. Because of this Preordination, here I have revealed Myself.

verses.pt: Doravante, instruirei tudo acerca da providência que salvará igualmente todas as pessoas do mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall teach all about My workings for the salvation of everyone throughout the world.
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju o ichiretsu ni   tasuke shugo o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このさきハせかいぢううを一れつに
verses.jp2: たすけしゆごふをみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: この先は世界中を一列に   救け守護を皆教えるで
verses.english: Henceforth I will teach the protection of salvation to people all over the world.

verses.pt: Gradualmente, ensinando a salvação de todas as coisas, apenas distinguirei a região dos não-esclarecidos da região dos esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall teach all about universal salvation step by step, and solely distinguish between Kara and Nihon.
verses.ro: dandan to yorozu tasuke o mina oshie   kara to nihon o wakeru bakari ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼とよろづたすけをみなをしへ
verses.jp2: からとにほんをわけるばかりや
verses.kanji: 段々と万救けを皆教え   唐と日本を分けるばかりや
verses.english: Step by step I will teach any and every kind of salvation. And thus I will solely distinguish the region where My teachings shall spread later from the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, o caminho que distingue a região dos não-esclarecidos da região dos esclarecidos, é a instância única de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the path that distinguishes between Kara and Nihon: this is the single intent of God's hastening.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni kara to nihon o wakeru michi   Kami no sekikomi kore ga ichijo
verses.jp1: にち／＼にからとにほんをわけるみち
verses.jp2: 神のせきこみこれが一ぢよ
verses.kanji: 日々に唐と日本を分ける道   神の急き込みこれが一条
verses.english: I, God, am single-heartedly hastening day by day to distinguish the region where My teachings shall spread later from the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.pt: Quando este caminho for prontamente distinto, todas as coisas posteriores serão como Deus deseja.
verses.en_6th_ed: If this path is quickly distinguished, everything will proceed as God intends.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku waketaru koto naraba   ato no yorozu wa Kami no mama nari
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくわけたる事ならば
verses.jp2: あとのよろづハ神のまゝなり
verses.kanji: この道を早く分けたる事ならば   後の万は神の侭なり
verses.english: If this way is quickly distinguished, thereafter everything will be managed as God intends.

verses.pt: O dia de hoje é o início de algo extraordinário. Todos me seguirão por serem predestinados.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today is the beginning of marvelous things. All of you will come along with Me because of the original causality.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanika mezurashi hajime dashi   yorozu innen mina tsuite kuru
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにかめづらしはじめだし
verses.jp2: よろづいんねんみなついてくる
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何か珍し初め出し   万因縁皆付いて来る
verses.english: Today I will begin something completely remarkable, and all who have affinities to Me will come along with Me.

verses.pt: Quanto à predestinação, embora sejam numerosas as pessoas, não pensem que haja qualquer discriminação.
verses.en_6th_ed: About causality: though people are numerous, never think that I discriminate among any of you.
verses.ro: innen mo oku no hito de aru karani   doko ni hedate wa aru to omouna
verses.jp1: いんねんもをふくの人であるからに
verses.jp2: とこにへだてハあるとをもうな
verses.kanji: 因縁も多くの人で有るからに   何処に隔ては有ると思うな
verses.english: Though there are numerous kinds of people, never think that there is any discrimination whatsoever between the affinity of one person and that of others!

verses.pt: Como sou Deus que iniciou este mundo, todos são igualmente meus filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: To God, who began this world, all of you in the world are equally My beloved children.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no koto naraba   sekai ichiretsu mina waga ko nari
verses.jp1: このよふを初た神の事ならば
verses.jp2: せかい一れつみなわがこなり
verses.kanji: この世を初めた神の事ならば   世界一列皆我が子なり
verses.english: For Me, God, who created this world, all human beings are My children.

verses.pt: Por ter afeição profunda por todos os filhos, tenho dedicado o meu espírito de vários modos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because of My love for all My children, I exhaust My mind in every kind of way.
verses.ro: ichiretsu no kodomo ga kawai sore yue ni   iroiro kokoro tsukushi kiru nari
verses.jp1: いちれつのこともがかハいそれゆへに
verses.jp2: いろ／＼心つくしきるなり
verses.kanji: 一列の子供が可愛いそれ故に   色々心尽くし切るなり
verses.english: Because of My love for all My children, I exert My mind and heart in every kind of way.

verses.pt: Desejo ensinar prontamente quaisquer fatos aos filhos. Vejam esta instância do espírito de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: I desire to teach everything to you children quickly. Take notice of this hastening in the mind of God!
verses.ro: kono kodomo nanimo oshiete hayabaya to   Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o miyo
verses.jp2: 神の心のせきこみをみよ
verses.kanji: この子供何も教えて早々と   神の心の急き込みを見よ
verses.english: I am in haste to teach you children any and everything. Look at this impatience of the mind of God!

verses.pt: Espero ansiosamente a maturação gradual dos filhos. É somente isto a intenção de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: I wait impatiently for My children to awaken to the truth. There is nothing else in the thoughts of God.
verses.ro: dandan to kodomo no shusse machikaneru   Kami no omowaku kore bakari nari
verses.jp1: だん／＼とこどものしゆせまちかねる
verses.jp2: 神のをもわくこればかりなり
verses.kanji: 段々と子供の出世待ち兼ねる   神の思惑こればかりなり
verses.english: I am impatienly waiting for the spiritual awakening of you children step by step. This is the single truth of the intention of God.

verses.pt: Se ao menos enviar logo os filhos ao mundo, tornarei a região dos não-esclarecidos na dos esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: If I can only bring My children out into the open, I shall change Kara into Nihon.
verses.ro: kodomo sai hayaku omote i dashita nara   kara o nihon no jii ni suru nari
verses.jp1: こどもさいはやくをもていだしたなら
verses.jp2: からをにほんのぢいにするなり
verses.kanji: 子供さい早く表へ出したなら   唐を日本の地にするなり
verses.english: If only I can bring My children out to the fore, I will make the region where My teachings shall spread later into the region where My teachings spread.

verses.pt: Que o espírito dos filhos se firme realmente, pois o espírito de Deus está somente apressado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Make your minds truly firm, all My children! The mind of God only hastens.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kodomo no kokoro shikato seyo   Kami no kokoro wa seku bakari ya de
verses.jp1: しんぢつにこどもの心しかとせよ
verses.jp2: 神の心ハせくばかりやで
verses.kanji: 真実に子供の心確とせよ   神の心は急くばかりやで
verses.english: Truly affirm your minds, all My children! The mind of God is solely hastening it impatiently.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, devido a esta pressa e à preocupação de Deus, façam logo os preparativos para a salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, God hastens in agony. Please, quickly make preparations for salvation.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no sekikomi kono nayami   hayaku tasukeru moyo shite kure
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のせきこみこのなやみ
verses.jp2: はやくたすけるもよふしてくれ
verses.kanji: 日々に神の急き込みこの悩み   早く救ける模様して呉れ
verses.english: I, God, ask you to arrange to accomplish My salvation, to drive away this daily impatience and agony of God.

verses.pt: Os de casa estão desanimados, pensando nos superiores, mas não temam, pois Deus lhes assegura.
verses.en_6th_ed: Thinking of the high places, those of you within are depressed. But fear not, for God assures you.
verses.ro: uchi naru wa kami o omote izumi iru   kowami nai zo ya Kami no ukeyai
verses.jp1: うちなるハ上をふもふていづみいる
verses.jp2: こわみないぞや神のうけやい
verses.kanji: 内なるは上を思うていずみ居る   怖み無いぞや神の請け合い
verses.english: The people who are familiar with Me are hesitating, because they are afraid of the upper people. But there is nothing to be afraid of as I, God, assure it.

verses.pt: O caminho está diferente do que era até agora. Apressem-se ao amplo caminho.
verses.en_6th_ed: The path already differs from what it once was. Hurry! Hasten to the broad path!
verses.ro: imamade to michi ga kawarite aru hodoni   hayaku sekikomi okwan no michi
verses.jp1: いまゝでとみちがかわりてあるほどに
verses.jp2: はやくせきこみをふくハんのみち
verses.kanji: 今迄と道が変わりて有る程に   早く急き込み往還の道
verses.english: The way has already been changed from what it was. Hurry and go out to the broad way!

verses.pt: Para quando estão pensando ser este caminho? Procurem sair logo, este é o momento.
verses.en_6th_ed: You are wondering when this path will come. Come out quickly, now is the time!
verses.ro: kono michi wa itsu no koto ya to omote iru   hayaku dete miyo mo ima no koto
verses.jp1: このみちハいつの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: はやくてゝみよもふいまの事
verses.kanji: この道は何時の事やと思うて居る   早く出て見よもう今の事
verses.english: You are wondering when such a way will come. Go out quickly! It is an immediate matter.

verses.pt: Desde que tenho informado gradualmente com o pincel, devem compreender prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I have informed you by My writing brush. Quickly awaken your mind to it!
verses.ro: dandan to fude ni shirashite aru hodoni   hayaku kokoro ni satori toru yo
verses.jp1: だん／＼とふてにしらしてあるほどに
verses.jp2: はやく心にさとりとるよふ
verses.kanji: 段々と筆に知らして有る程に   早く心に悟り取るよう
verses.english: Indeed, step by step I have informed you with My writing brush. Quickly awaken your mind to it!

verses.pt: Se ao menos chegarem a compreender isto logo, ficarão aliviados dos sofrimentos no corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you only come to understand this quickly, your sufferings of the body will be cleared away.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku satori ga tsuita nara   minouchi nayami suzuyaka ni naru
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくさとりがついたなら
verses.jp2: みのうちなやみすゞやかになる
verses.kanji: これさいか早く悟りが付いたなら   身の内悩み涼やかになる
verses.english: If only you become convinced of this truth, the suffering of your body will be cleared away.

verses.pt: Quanto ao Serviço, primeiro o Teodori e depois o Kagura. Tenho aberto apenas um caminho estreito.
verses.en_6th_ed: About the Service: first the Teodori, then the Kagura. Thus, I have opened just a narrow path.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo hajime Teodori mata Kagura   choto no hosomichi tsukete aredomo
verses.jp1: つとめても初てをどりまたかぐら
verses.jp2: 一寸のほそみちつけてあれども
verses.kanji: 勤めでも初め手踊りまた神楽   一寸の細道付けて有れども
verses.english: Concerning the Service, I have taught the Teodori at first and then the Kagura. Thus I have already opened a narrow path.

verses.pt: Não se distingue o caminho devido ao mato que cresce gradualmente. Preparem-se para abrir logo o caminho real.
verses.en_6th_ed: But weeds have gradually grown thick and the path is obscure. Quickly, the preparations to open the main path!
verses.ro: dandan to kusa ga shikorite michi shirezu   hayaku honmichi tsukeru moyo o
verses.jp1: だん／＼とくさがしこりてみちしれす
verses.jp2: はやくほんみちつけるもよふを
verses.kanji: 段々と草がしこりて道知れず   早く本道付ける模様を
verses.english: But weeds have gradually grown thick and the path is obscure. So, quickly begin arrangements for opening the main road!

verses.pt: Apressem-se dia a dia com espírito animado. Se abrirem prontamente o caminho real…
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, hasten with spirited minds. If only the main path be quickly opened...
verses.ro: nichinichi ni kokoro isande sekikome yo   hayaku honmichi tsuketa koto nara
verses.jp1: にち／＼に心いさんでせきこめよ
verses.jp2: はやくほんみちつけた事なら
verses.kanji: 日々に心勇んで急き込めよ   早く本道付けた事なら
verses.english: Cheer up your mind day by day, and hurry up! If only the main road be quickly opened,

verses.pt: Se este caminho real for aberto verdadeiramente, o futuro será promissor e repleto de alegria.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this main path is truly opened, thereafter you will lead a life full of joy and promise.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kono honmichi ga tsuita nara   sue wa tanomoshi yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: しんぢつにこのほんみちがついたなら
verses.jp2: すへハたのもしよふきづくめや
verses.kanji: 真実にこの本道が付いたなら   末は頼もし陽気ずくめや
verses.english: When this main road is truly opened, you will enjoy the delightful and all joyous life in the future.

verses.pt: Apressa-se mais a salvação dos da vizinhança. Reflitam logo sobre isso.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even more do I hasten to save the villagers. Please ponder quickly!
verses.ro: murakata wa naomo tasuke o sete iru   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp1: 村かたハなをもたすけをせへている
verses.jp2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ
verses.kanji: 村方は尚も救けを急いて居る   早く思案をして呉れるよう
verses.english: I am hastening to save the villagers still more quickly! Please ponder over it in haste!

verses.pt: Para mim, Deus, o mundo todo são meus filhos. Saibam todos que sou o Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: To God, people throughout the world are all My children. All of you equally, know that I am your Parent!
verses.ro: sekaiju Kami no ta niwa mina waga ko   ichiretsu wa mina Oya to omoe yo
verses.jp1: せかいぢう神のたあにハみなわがこ
verses.jp2: 一れつハみなをやとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 世界中神のたあには皆我が子   一列は皆親と思えよ
verses.english: For God, people of the whole world are all My children. All of you equally must understand that I am your Parent.

verses.pt: No mundo inteiro, tenho começado com sermões. Devem ir ouvir o que está sendo explicado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Throughout the world, I have begun what is known as sermons. When they are delivered, you may go and hear them.
verses.ro: sekaiju sekkyo to shite hajime kake   toite kikasuru kiki ni iku nari
verses.jp1: せかいぢうせきゝよとしてはちめかけ
verses.jp2: といてきかするきゝにいくなり
verses.kanji: 世界中説教として初め掛け   説いて聞かする聞きに行くなり
verses.english: All around the world, I have begun various sermons. When those are delivered, you may go and hear them.

verses.pt: Embora se falem tanto sobre coisas já vistas, se não conhecerem a origem, nunca as entenderão.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever may be said about things already seen, unless the origin is known, there can be no understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mietaru koto o yuta tote   moto o shiraneba wakaru me wa nashi
verses.jp1: いかほどにみゑたる事をゆうたとて
verses.jp2: もとをしらねばハかるめハなし
verses.kanji: 如何程に見えたる事を言うたとて   元を知らねば分かるめは無し
verses.english: However skillfully they may preach things which have already appeared, the truth will not be expounded. Because they do not know the origin.

verses.pt: Deixo dito gradualmente apenas coisas inexistentes. Quando surgirem, saberão que são verdades.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall tell you solely about things unknown. When they appear, you will know that it is the truth.
verses.ro: dandan to nai koto bakari yute oite   sore deta naraba kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼とない事ばかりゆてをいて
verses.jp2: それでたならばこれがまことや
verses.kanji: 段々と無い事ばかり言うて置いて   それ出たならばこれが誠や
verses.english: One by one I will tell you things which do not yet exist. When it is realized, you will understand that My word is true.

verses.pt: Todos os filhos que se amparam em Deus, preparem-se para saírem logo ao mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: All of you children who lean on God, quickly make preparations to go out into the open.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni Kami ni motareru kono kodomo   hayaku omote i deru moyo seyo
verses.jp1: 一れつに神にもたれるこのこども
verses.jp2: はやくをもていでるもよふせよ
verses.kanji: 一列に神に凭れるこの子供   早く表へ出る模様せよ
verses.english: All of you children who lean upon God, quickly prepare to go out to the fore!

verses.pt: Se pensam realmente em sair ao mundo, procurem a essência, acalmando o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you truly desire to go out into the open, calm your mind and seek the core.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni omote deyo to omou nara   kokoro shizumete shin o tazune yo
verses.jp1: しんぢつにをもてゞよふとをもうなら
verses.jp2: 心しづめてしんをたづねよ
verses.kanji: 真実に表へ出ようと思うなら   心静めて真を訪ねよ
verses.english: If you truly wish to go out to the fore, calm your mind and look for the core of the world!

verses.pt: Se a sinceridade for verificada no íntimo do coração dos filhos, farei toda e qualquer preparação.
verses.en_6th_ed: You children, when the innermost heart has been truly ascertained, you shall have all My arrangements.
verses.ro: kono kodomo shinjitsu yori mo mune no uchi   misadame tsukeba ikana moyo mo
verses.jp1: このこどもしんぢつよりもむねのうち
verses.jp2: みさだめつけばいかなもよふも
verses.kanji: この子供真実よりも胸の内   見定め付けば如何な模様も
verses.english: When I truly ascertain the innermost hearts of these children, I will prepare any and every work.

verses.pt: Embora o espírito de Deus se apresse dia a dia, não há compreensão no espírito dos filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though the mind of God hastens day after day, there is no understanding in the minds of you children.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro wa sekikomedo   kodomo no kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心わせきこめど
verses.jp2: こともの心わかりないので
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心は急き込めど   子供の心分かり無いので
verses.english: Day by day the mind of God is impatiently hastening. But the minds of children cannot understand it.

verses.pt: Por não serem poucos os filhos, muitos corações nada compreendem.
verses.en_6th_ed: With My children, as their number is not small, there are so many whose heart is yet without understanding.
verses.ro: kodomo demo chotto no hito dewa nai karani   oku no mune ga sarani wakaran
verses.jp1: こともでも一寸の人でハないからに
verses.jp2: をふくのむねがさらにハからん
verses.kanji: 子供でも一寸の人では無いからに   多くの胸が更に分からん
verses.english: Speaking of My children, as their number is not small, it is more difficult to open so many minds to reason.

verses.pt: Embora até agora tenham enfatizado as ciências, nada sabem sobre coisas ainda não vistas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though people speak highly of a thing called learning, no one knows of things yet unseen.
verses.ro: imamade wa gakumon nazo to yuta tote   miete nai koto sarani shiromai
verses.jp1: いまゝでハがくもんなぞとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: みゑてない事さらにしろまい
verses.kanji: 今迄は学問なぞと言うたとて   見えて無い事更に知ろまい
verses.english: Until now there has been a matter which is called learning. But you can never know things which have not yet appeared.

verses.pt: Doravante, deixarei explicado gradualmente tudo sobre todas as coisas ainda não vistas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall teach you any and all things yet unseen, step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa miete nai koto dandan to   yorozu no koto o mina toite oku
verses.jp1: このさきハみへてない事だん／＼と
verses.jp2: よろずの事をみなといてをく
verses.kanji: この先は見えて無い事段々と   万の事を皆説いて置く
verses.english: Henceforth I will teach you one by one all matters which have not yet appeared.

verses.pt: Doravante, ensino gradualmente o Serviço não tido desde o início deste mundo, e o movimento das mãos.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, step by step, I shall teach you the Service unknown since this world began and train you in its hand movements.
verses.ro: korekara wa kono yo hajimete nai Tsutome   dandan oshie te o tsukeru nari
verses.jp1: これからハこのよはじめてないつとめ
verses.jp2: だん／＼をしへてをつけるなり
verses.kanji: これからはこの世初めて無い勤め   段々教え手を付けるなり
verses.english: From now on I will teach you the Service which has never existed since the creation of this world, and train you in the hand-gestures of it.

verses.pt: Este Serviço é o caminho para salvar o mundo inteiro, que fará até um mudo falar.
verses.en_6th_ed: This Service is the path of salvation for the entire world. I shall enable even a mute to speak.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome sekaiju no tasuke michi   oshi demo mono o yuwasu koto nari
verses.jp1: このつとめせかいぢううのたすけみち
verses.jp2: をしでもものをゆハす事なり
verses.kanji: この勤め世界中の救け道   唖でも物を言わす事なり
verses.english: Verily this Service is the way to save the whole world. Through this even a mute begins to speak.

verses.pt: Que o pessoal do Serviço firmem dia a dia o espírito. Aprendam logo o mover das mãos, acalmando o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Be firm day after day, you performers of the Service! Calm your minds and learn the hand movements quickly!
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsutome no ninju shikato seyo   kokoro shizumete hayaku te o tsuke
verses.jp1: にち／＼につとめのにんぢうしかとせよ
verses.jp2: 心しづめてはやくてをつけ
verses.kanji: 日々に勤めの人衆確とせよ   心静めて早く手を付け
verses.english: Determine your minds day after day, you the members of the Service! You must learn the hand-gestures quickly, keeping your minds calm.

verses.pt: Que pensam ser este Serviço? É somente a salvação, pacificando o mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this Service is about? It is solely to bring peace to the world and salvation to all.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome nanino koto ya to omote iru   sekai osamete tasuke bakari o
verses.jp1: このつとめなにの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: せかいをさめてたすけばかりを
verses.kanji: この勤め何の事やと思うて居る   世界治めて救けばかりを
verses.english: What do you think this Service is? Through it I will bring peace to the world and thus single-heartedly save all mankind.

verses.pt: Quando este caminho for certamente visto, as raízes das doenças serão todas cortadas.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this path is clearly seen, the root of illness will be cut off entirely.
verses.ro: kono michi ga tashika mietaru koto naraba   yamai no ne wa kirete shimau de
verses.jp1: このみちがたしかみゑたる事ならば
verses.jp2: やまいのねゑわきれてしまうで
verses.kanji: この道が確か見えたる事ならば   病の根は切れてしまうで
verses.english: When this way is surely realized, the root of disease will be cut off.

verses.pt: Seja quem for, segundo a sinceridade de cada um, jamais negarei qualquer providência.
verses.en_6th_ed: According to your mind of sincerity, I deny My protection to no one, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro shidai ni izukata mo   ikana shugo mo sen to yuwan de
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心しだいにいづかたも
verses.jp2: いかなしゆごふもせんとゆハんで
verses.english: If only I find sincerity in your mind, I will not deny any protection to you, whoever you may be.

verses.pt: O atual caminho é a instância de Deus. Que os de casa não se preocupem e observem atentamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: About the present path: God is hastening. Those of you within need not worry. Watch carefully!
verses.ro: ima no michi Kami no sekikomi uchi naru wa   anji nai zo ya shikato mite iyo
verses.jp1: いまのみち神のせきこみうちなるハ
verses.jp2: あんぢないぞやしかとみていよ
verses.kanji: 今の道神の急き込み内なるは   案じ無いぞや確と見て居よ
verses.english: As it is God who is impatiently hastening the present way, there is nothing to fear for those who are familiar with Me. Wait and watch carefully!

verses.pt: Tenho dito que o caminho de até agora se transformará. Deus não diz nada errado.
verses.en_6th_ed: I have already told you the path will be changed from what it was until now. There is no mistake in what God says.
verses.ro: koremade to michi ga kawaru to yute aru   Kami wa chigota koto wa yuwan de
verses.jp1: これまでとみちがかわるとゆうてある
verses.jp2: 神ハちごふた事ハゆハんで
verses.kanji: これ迄と道が変わると言うて有る   神は違うた事は言わんで
verses.english: I have foretold you that the way will be changed. God never says what shall not be realized.

verses.pt: Doravante, mesmo querendo, não há como expressar em palavras a instância do espírito de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall not be able to tell you of this growing impatience in the mind of God, even should I so desire.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o   kuchi dewa domu yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp1: このさきハ神の心のせきこみを
verses.jp2: くちでハどふむゆうにゆハれん
verses.kanji: この先は神の心の急き込みを   口ではどうも言うに言われん
verses.english: Henceforth I cannot tell you by mouth the impatience of the mind of God, even though I may endeavor to do so.

verses.pt: Por mais que tenha dito ser difícil, se deixar de explicar, jamais poderão entendê-lo.
verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult it may be, if things are left untold, there will be no chance of understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   tokazu ni ite wa wakaru me wa nashi
verses.jp1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: とかすにいてハわかるめハなし
verses.kanji: 如何程に難し事と言うたとて   説かずに居ては分かるめは無し
verses.english: However difficult it may be, unless I teach it to you, you　will not be able to understand.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, deixarei explicado gradualmente a intenção de Deus. Ouçam a respeito disso.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day and step by step, I shall teach you the thoughts of God. Please listen to Me.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no omowaku dandan to   toite oku zo ya kore kiite kure
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のをもわくだんだんと
verses.jp2: といてをくぞやこれきいてくれ
verses.kanji: 日々に神の思惑段々と   説いて置くぞやこれ聞いて呉れ
verses.english: Day after day I will reveal to you the divine intention of God. Please listen and understand it well!

verses.pt: Este caminho é algo difícil e extraordinário. Fiquem observando atentamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: This path may be somewhat difficult, but it is marvelous indeed. Watch it carefully.
verses.ro: kono michi wa nanika mutsukashi mezurashii   michi de aru zo ya tashika mite iyo
verses.jp1: このみちハなにかむつかしめつらしい
verses.jp2: みちであるぞやたしかみていよ
verses.kanji: この道は何か難し珍しい   道で有るぞや確か見て居よ
verses.english: This way is somewhat difficult but remarkable indeed. Wait and watch it surely!

verses.pt: Se passarem por este caminho, desde então, a região dos não-esclarecidos estará transformada na dos esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: After you have completed taking this path, Kara will have become part of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono michi o torinuketara sonosaki wa   kara wa nihon no jii ni shite aru
verses.jp1: このみちをとふりぬけたらそのさきハ
verses.jp2: からハにほんのぢいにしてある
verses.kanji: この道を通り抜けたらその先は   唐は日本の地にして有る
verses.english: When we have passed through this way, the region where My teachings shall spread later will be made the region where My teachings spread.

verses.pt: Se a região dos não-esclarecidos for transformada na dos esclarecidos, isto será o motivo de viver animadamente para todo o sempre.
verses.en_6th_ed: When Kara becomes Nihon, this will be the passage to eternal joy.
verses.ro: kara no ji o nihon no jii ni shita naraba   kore matsudai no iki dori nari
verses.jp1: からのぢをにほんぢいにしたならば
verses.jp2: これまつだいのいきどふりなり
verses.kanji: 唐の地を日本の地にしたならば   これ末代の生き通りなり
verses.english: When the region where My teachings shall spread later is made the region where My teachings spread, this joy will continue living eternally.

verses.pt: Os superiores governam este mundo, e Deus, o universo. Distinguirei o espírito dos superiores do de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: The high places rule this world, but Heaven is also high. I shall make a distinction between the minds of the high places and the mind of God.
verses.ro: kono yo o osameru mo kami ten mo Kami   kami to Kami to no kokoro wakeru de
verses.jp1: このよふを納も上天もかみ
verses.jp2: 上と神との心わけるで
verses.kanji: この世を治めるも上天も神   上と神との心分けるで
verses.english: Those who govern this world are called kami, and Heaven is also called Kami, and I will distinguish the mind of God from those of the upper people.

verses.pt: Deixarei dito gradualmente coisas ainda não vistas. Se forem vistas posteriormente, estas serão manifestações de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall tell you about things yet unseen. When they come into sight in the future, it is God!
verses.ro: dandan to mien koto oba yute oite   saki de mietara kore ga Kami ya de
verses.jp1: だん／＼とみゑん事をばゆてをいて
verses.jp2: さきでみゑたらこれが神やで
verses.kanji: 段々と見えん事をば言うて置いて   先で見えたらこれが神やで
verses.english: One by one I will foretell you things yet unseen. When they are realized, it is the proof that these are the words of God.

verses.pt: Embora se falem tanto sobre coisas já vistas, se não forem vistas posteriormente, não as entenderão.
verses.en_6th_ed: No matter what people say about things already seen, if what is said is not seen in the future, perhaps there is no understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mietaru koto o yuta tote   saki de mieneba wakari arumai
verses.jp1: いかほどにみゑたる事をゆうたとて
verses.jp2: さきでみゑねはわかりあるまい
verses.kanji: 如何程に見えたる事を言うたとて   先で見えねば分かり有るまい
verses.english: However minutely one can explain things which are already visible, if one's words are not realized in the future, one cannot be said to know everything.

verses.pt: Doravante, distinguirei o íntimo dos corações de todo mundo, tanto dos superiores como dos inferiores.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall bring understanding by making a distinction in the innermost hearts of both the high and the low all over the world.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekaiju no mune no uchi   kami shimo tomoni wakete miseru de
verses.jp1: これからハせかいぢううのむねのうち
verses.jp2: 上下ともにわけてみせるで
verses.kanji: これからは世界中の胸の内   上下共に分けて見せるで
verses.english: Henceforth I will distinguish between the innermost hearts of people of the whole world, the upper and lower people equally.

verses.pt: Vejam isto! Não discrimino os do mundo dos de casa e farei a limpeza do íntimo dos seus corações.
verses.en_6th_ed: Watch! I shall cleanse the innermost hearts of those within and all others in the world without discrimination.
verses.ro: kore o miyo sekai mo uchi mo hedate nai   mune no uchi yori soji suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これをみよせかいもうちもへたてない
verses.jp2: むねのうちよりそふぢするぞや
verses.kanji: これを見よ世界も内も隔て無い   胸の内より掃除するぞや
verses.english: Look at this! I will clean up the innermost hearts of both those who are familiar with Me and the worldly people without any discrimination.

verses.pt: Embora esta limpeza seja uma coisa difícil, deixo dito que não há o que se chama doença.
verses.en_6th_ed: This cleansing will be a difficult matter, but I say to you beforehand: there is nothing to be called illness.
verses.ro: kono soji mutsukashi koto de aru keredo   yamai to yu wa nai to yute oku
verses.jp1: このそふぢむつかし事であるけれど
verses.jp2: やまいとゆうわないとゆてをく
verses.kanji: この掃除難し事で有るけれど   病と言うは無いと言うて置く
verses.english: This sweeping may be difficult to accomplish. But I warn you: there is nothing to be called illness.

verses.pt: Qualquer que seja a dor, o sofrimento, a ferida, a febre ou a diarréia, tudo são poeiras.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever pains, sufferings, tumors, fevers, or looseness of the bowels: all are from dust.
verses.ro: dono yona itami nayami mo dekemono ya   netsu mo kudari mo mina hokori ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふないたみなやみもでけものや
verses.jp2: ねつもくだりもみなほこりやで
verses.kanji: どの様な痛み悩みも出来物や   熱も下りも皆埃やで
verses.english: Whatever kinds of pains, sufferings, swellings, fevers or loose bowels are nothing but dust.

verses.pt: Desde que iniciei este mundo, nada foi ensinado aos superiores.
verses.en_6th_ed: Not since I began this world have I taught everything to those in high places.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nanimo kamo   kami e oshieta koto wa arumai
verses.jp1: このよふを初てからになにもかも
verses.jp2: 上ゑをしへた事ハあるまい
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに何もかも   上へ教えた事は有るまい
verses.english: Since the creation I have never taught anything to the upper people.

verses.pt: Desta vez, se deixar informado aos superiores quaisquer fatos a respeito de tudo...
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, if I should inform those in high places about the truth of any and all matters,
verses.ro: konotabi wa nanika yorozu o kami taru e   shirashite oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このたびハなにかよろづを上たるゑ
verses.jp2: しらしてをいた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この度は何か万を上たるへ   知らして置いた事で有るなら
verses.english: But this time I will teach any and everything to the upper people.

verses.pt: Desde então, haverá entre eles quem reflita. Quando todos se reunirem e dialogarem,
verses.en_6th_ed: Then, some among them may ponder. And if they all gather and speak to one another,
verses.ro: sorekara wa naka niwa shiyan suru mo aro   mina yoriyote hanashi shita nara
verses.jp1: それからハなかにハしやんするもあろ
verses.jp2: みなよりよふてはなししたなら
verses.kanji: それからは中には思案するも有ろう   皆寄り合うて話したなら
verses.english: Then someone among them may ponder and, gathering altogether, talk about the matter to each other.

verses.pt: Dentre eles, haverá quem venha a compreender com espírito sincero que isto seja promissor.
verses.en_6th_ed: Some among them will understand and truly feel hopeful over the teachings.
verses.ro: sono naka ni shinjitsu kokoro tanomoshii   omote shiyan o suru mono mo aru
verses.jp1: そのなかにしんぢつ心たのもしい
verses.jp2: をもてしやんをするものもある
verses.kanji: その中に真実心頼もしい   思うて思案をする者も有る
verses.english: Among them there may be some who think that this is indeed the true and trustworthy teaching.

verses.pt: Se este caminho atingir os superiores, revelarei prontamente o trabalho onipotente de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this path reaches through to the high places, God will reveal free and unlimited workings at once.
verses.ro: kono michi o kami e torita koto naraba   Kami no juyo suguni arawasu
verses.jp1: このみちを上ゑとふりた事ならば
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふすぐにあらわす
verses.kanji: この道を上へ通りた事ならば   神の自由直ぐに表す
verses.english: When this way becomes understood by the upper people, I will manifest My omnipotence at once.

verses.pt: Por não ter sido mostrado ainda a onipotência de Deus, que iniciou este mundo,
verses.en_6th_ed: I have not yet shown you any of the free and unlimited workings of God, who began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no juyo o   misetaru koto wa sarani nai node
verses.jp1: このよふを初た神のぢうよふを
verses.jp2: みせたる事ハさらにないので
verses.kanji: この世を初めた神の自由を   見せたる事は更に無いので
verses.english: I have not yet manifested the omnipotence of God who created this world.

verses.pt: Seja o que for, ficará como está enquanto ignorarem, mas, quando forem informados sobre a onipotência de Deus...
verses.en_6th_ed: In everything, as long as you know nothing, you remain as you are. But if I let you know of God's free and unlimited workings,
verses.ro: nani nitemo shiran aida wa sono mama ya   Kami no juyo shirashitaru nara
verses.jp1: なにゝてもしらんあいだハそのまゝや
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふしらしたるなら
verses.kanji: 何にても知らん間はその侭や   神の自由知らしたるなら
verses.english: On whatever kinds of things, as long as you know nothing, you remain as you were. But if I let you know the omnipotence of God,

verses.pt: Ouvindo-o, todas as pessoas devem refletir. Todas as coisas dependem do espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: On hearing of it, all of you in the world must ponder. Any and all matters are according to the mind.
verses.ro: kore kiite mina ichiretsu wa shiyan seyo   nanika yorozu wa kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp1: これきいてみな一れつわしやんせよ
verses.jp2: なにかよろつハ心しだいや
verses.kanji: これ聞いて皆一列は思案せよ   何か万は心次第や
verses.english: On hearing this, all of you must ponder over it deeply. Any and everything will be manifested in accord with the working of your minds.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, embora ainda nada seja visto, vejam o sexto mês, tudo começará a surgir.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, nothing can be seen, but be watchful! In the sixth month, everything will begin to appear.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani ga mieru ya nai keredo   roku gatsu o miyo mina dekakeru de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにがみへるやないけれど
verses.jp2: 六月をみよみなでかけるで
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何が見えるや無いけれど   六月を見よ皆出掛けるで
verses.english: At present you can see nothing. But look on the sixth month! Everything will begin to appear.

verses.pt: Até agora, os altos montes vivem se vangloriando enquanto os do fundo dos vales vivem humilhados.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, the high mountains have been boastful while the low valleys withered.
verses.ro: imamade wa takai yama ya to yute iru   tanisoko nitewa shiken bakari o
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ高い山やとゆうている
verses.jp2: たにそこにてハしけんばかりを
verses.kanji: 今迄は高い山やと言うて居る   谷底にては時化んばかりを
verses.english: Hitherto some have been boasting on the high mountains, and others were going to wither at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.pt: Doravante, explicarei a criação original tanto nos altos montes como no fundo dos vales.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall teach both the high mountains and the low valleys about the beginnings of origin.
verses.ro: korekara wa takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   moto hajimari o yute kikasuru
verses.jp1: これからわ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp2: もとはじまりをゆうてきかする
verses.kanji: これからは高山にても谷底も   元初まりを言うて聞かする
verses.english: From now on I will teach you both on the high mountains and at the bottoms of the valleys how this world was created.

verses.pt: No início, este mundo era um mar de lama, e, no seu interior, existiam somente cadozes.
verses.en_6th_ed: The beginning of this universe was a muddy ocean. Therein were only loaches.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi wa doro no umi   sono naka yori mo dojo bakari ya
verses.jp1: このよふのはぢまりだしハとろのうみ
verses.jp2: そのなかよりもどちよばかりや
verses.kanji: この世の初まり出しは泥の海   その中よりも泥鰌ばかりや
verses.english: At the beginning this universe was a muddy ocean. And therein were living only a numerous number of loaches.

verses.pt: O que pensam serem estes cadozes? São as sementes dos seres humanos.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think these loaches were? They were the very seeds of human beings.
verses.ro: kono dojo nanino koto ya to omote iru   kore ningen no tane de aru zo ya
verses.jp1: このどぢよなにの事やとをもている
verses.jp2: これにんけんのたねであるそや
verses.kanji: この泥鰌何の事やと思うて居る   これ人間の種で有るぞや
verses.english: What do you think these loaches were? They were the very seeds of human beings.

verses.pt: Deus os atraiu, comeu e os tornou gradualmente em seres humanos por meio de sua providência.
verses.en_6th_ed: God drew them up and consumed them all, and through providence brought them up into human beings step by step.
verses.ro: kono mono o Kami ga hikiage kute shimote   dandan shugo ningen to nashi
verses.jp1: このものを神がひきあけくてしもて
verses.jp2: だん／＼しゆごふにんけんとなし
verses.kanji: この者を神が引き上げ喰うてしもて   段々守護人間と成し
verses.english: Dipping them up, God ate all of them and step by step through divine protection brought them up into human beings.

verses.pt: Desde então, o que se diz providência de Deus não tem sido nada fácil.
verses.en_6th_ed: From that time on, God's providence has been by no means an easy matter.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Kami no shugo to yu mono wa   nami taitei na koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: それよりも神のしゆことゆうものわ
verses.jp2: なみたいていな事でないぞや
verses.kanji: それよりも神の守護と言うものは   並大抵な事で無いぞや
verses.english: From that time on God has exerted an extraordinary effort to protect the growth of man.

verses.pt: Não pensem serem insignificantes estas palavras, pois desejo salvar todos do mundo igualmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think of this talk as being trivial. I desire to save all people in the world.
verses.ro: kono hanashi chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   sekai ichiretsu tasuketai kara
verses.jp1: このはなし一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: せかい一れつたすけたいから
verses.kanji: この話一寸の事やと思うなよ   世界一列救けたいから
verses.english: Never think that this talk is a mere trifle! I wish indeed to save all people of the world equally.

verses.pt: Saibam que, no dia-a-dia, há verdadeiramente uma profunda intenção no espírito de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the mind of God is truly filled with deep concerns for you day after day.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no shinjitsu wa   fukai omowaku aru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神の心のしんぢつわ
verses.jp2: ふかいをもわくあるとをもへよ
verses.kanji: 日々に神の心の真実は   深い思惑有ると思えよ
verses.english: You must understand that day after day there is deep intention in the true sincerity of the mind of God.

verses.pt: Até agora, a região dos esclarecidos tem-se sujeitado à vontade da região dos não-esclarecidos. Isto é o pesar de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, to God's regret, Nihon has been dominated, obeying those of Kara.
verses.ro: imamade wa nihon ga kara ni shitagote   mamani shirareta Kami no zannen
verses.jp1: いまゝでハにほんかからにしたごふて
verses.jp2: まゝにしられた神のざんねん
verses.kanji: 今迄は日本が唐に従ごうて   侭にしられた神の残念
verses.english: Until now the people of the region where My teachings spread early have been following after and have been under the control of the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later. This is the reason of the regret of God.

verses.pt: Vejam esta devolução que é trabalho de Deus. Seja quem for, não poderá imitá-lo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Watch the workings of God given in return! No one will be able to imitate Me, whoever one may be.
verses.ro: kono kayashi Kami no hataraki kore o miyo   ikana mono demo mane wa dekemai
verses.jp1: このかやし神のはたらきこれをみよ
verses.jp2: いかなものでもまねわでけまい
verses.kanji: この返し神の働きこれを見よ   如何な者でも真似は出来まい
verses.english: In return for this I, God, will manifest My work. Look at this! No one will be able to imitate it, whoever he may be.

verses.pt: Não importa quão fortes sejam, Deus se retirará e então nada poderão fazer.
verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how strong they may be, if God should withdraw, they will be powerless.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki taru to yuta tote   Kami ga shirizoku kore kanaimai
verses.jp1: いかほどのごふてきたるとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 神がしりぞくこれかないまい
verses.kanji: 如何程の強敵たると言うたとて   神が退くこれ敵いまい
verses.english: However strong you may be; you will be able to do nothing, if God withdraws from your body.

verses.pt: Seja em que for, todos estão sob este princípio. Saibam que Deus trabalha onipotentemente.
verses.en_6th_ed: It is the same as this for everyone in all matters. Know that God will work freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: nani nitemo mina ichiretsu wa kono dori   Kami ga juyo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: なにゝてもみな一れつハこのどふり
verses.jp2: 神がぢうよふするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 何にても皆一列はこの道理   神が自由すると思えよ
verses.english: It is the same as this for any and every person and on whatever kinds of matters. You must understand the omnipotence of God in all cases.

verses.pt: Reflitam! Sejam jovens, idosos ou fracos, qualquer onipotência será segundo o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder well! No matter how young, old, or weak you may be, I shall give you My free and unlimited workings according to your mind.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo wakai toshiyori yowaki demo   kokoro shidai ni ikana juyo
verses.jp1: しやんせよハかいとしよりよハきでも
verses.jp2: 心しだいにいかなぢうよふ
verses.kanji: 思案せよ若い年寄り弱きでも   心次第に如何な自由
verses.english: Ponder over it well! No matter how young, old or weak you may be, you will be protected with My omnipotence as your mind deserves.

verses.pt: Embora tenham vivido do mesmo modo até agora, não há quem conheça a onipotência de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though you have lived in the same way, none of you has known of God's free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: imamade mo onaji kurashite itaru tomo   Kami no juyo shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: いまゝでもをなぢくらしていたるとも
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 今迄も同じ暮らして居たるとも   神の自由知りた者無し
verses.english: Until now you have been living just as you do now. But there has been no one who understands the omnipotence of God.

verses.pt: Doravante, explicarei tudo sobre todas as coisas. Façam com que não tenham erros espirituais.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall teach you about any and all matters. Make certain you make no errors of the mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa yorozu no koto o mina tokude   kokoro chigai no nai yoni seyo
verses.jp1: これからハよろづの事をみなとくで
verses.jp2: 心ちがいのないよふにせよ
verses.kanji: これからは万の事を皆説くで   心違いの無い様にせよ
verses.english: Henceforth I will teach you any and everything. Take care lest you should misuse your mind!

verses.pt: Até agora, tem-se falado de bois e cavalos, mas nunca foram capazes de conhecer o passado e o futuro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been much talk of rebirth as oxen or horses, but there has been no one who knows his past or future.
verses.ro: imamade wa gyuba to yu wa mama aredo   ato saki shireta koto wa arumai
verses.jp1: いまゝでハぎうばとゆうハまゝあれど
verses.jp2: あとさきしれた事ハあるまい
verses.kanji: 今迄は牛馬と言うは侭有れど   後先知れた事は有るまい
verses.english: Until now it has been said that some people will occasionally be reborn as oxen or horses. But there has been no one who knows one's previous and future lives.

verses.pt: Desta vez, deixo informado o futuro já nesta vida. Vejam os incômodos no corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall make your future known in this life: look at the disorder of the body!
verses.ro: konotabi wa saki naru koto o kono yo kara   shirashite oku de mi ni sawari miyo
verses.jp1: このたびハさきなる事を此よから
verses.jp2: しらしてをくでみにさハりみよ
verses.kanji: この度は先なる事をこの世から   知らして置くで身に障り見よ
verses.english: This time I will let you know your future life while you are still alive. Look at the disorders in your own bodies!

verses.pt: Embora cuidem tanto de si mesmos neste mundo, ninguém poderá resistir à ira de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: In this world, however much you may be concerned about yourself, you are helpless against the anger of God.
verses.ro: kono yo wa ika hodo waga mi omotemo   Kami no rippuku kore wa kanawan
verses.jp1: このよふハいかほどハがみをもふても
verses.jp2: 神のりいふくこれハかなハん
verses.kanji: この世は如何程我が身思うても   神の立腹これは敵わん
verses.english: In this world, however well you may think of your own selves, you are not match against the anger of God.

verses.pt: Cogitações egocêntricas individuais são desnecessárias. Deus distinguirá um a um.
verses.en_6th_ed: None of you needs self-centered concern. God will distinguish between each of you.
verses.ro: meme ni waga mi shiyan wa iran mono   Kami ga sorezore miwake suru zo ya
verses.jp1: めへ／＼にハがみしやんハいらんもの
verses.jp2: 神がそれ／＼みわけするぞや
verses.kanji: 銘々に我が身思案は要らんもの   神がそれぞれ見分けするぞや
verses.english: Each of you need not worry about yourselves. God will distinguish between each of you just as you deserve.

verses.pt: Embora estejam vivendo na mesma casa, saibam que aí existem tanto deuses como iluminados.
verses.en_6th_ed: Among those living in the same residence, know that there are both god and buddha.
verses.ro: hito yashiki onaji kurashite iru uchi ni   Kami mo hotoke mo aru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: 一やしきをなじくらしているうちに
verses.jp2: 神もほとけもあるとをもへよ
verses.kanji: 一屋敷同じ暮らして居るうちに   神も仏も有ると思えよ
verses.english: Among the members of a family living in one residence, there is as great a difference as that between god and Buddha.

verses.pt: Vendo isto, seja quem for, convençam-se, pois mostrarei distinguindo entre o bem e o mal.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you see this, be convinced, whoever you may be: God will distinguish between good and evil.
verses.ro: kore o mite ikana mono demo tokushin se   zen to aku to o wakete miseru de
verses.jp1: これをみていかなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp2: 善とあくとをわけてみせるで
verses.kanji: これを見て如何な者でも得心せ   善と悪とを分けて見せるで
verses.english: Looking at this, whatever kind of person you may be, you must become convinced of the truth that I, God, will distinguish good from evil.

verses.pt: Reflitam todas as pessoas sobre esta explanação. Não existem absolutamente espíritos iguais.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over this talk, all of you in the world. There is no mind the same as another.
verses.ro: kono hanashi mina ichiretsu wa shiyan seyo   onaji kokoro wa sarani arumai
verses.jp1: このはなしみな一れつハしやんせよ
verses.jp2: をなじ心わさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: この話皆一列は思案せよ   同じ心は更に有るまい
verses.english: Ponder deeply over this talk, all of you! There is indeed no mind which is completely the same as another.

verses.pt: Mesmo entre pais e filhos, marido e mulher ou entre irmãos, os espíritos são diferentes um do outro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even between parent and child, husband and wife, and brothers and sisters: their minds all differ from one another.
verses.ro: oyako demo fufu no naka mo kyodai mo   mina meme ni kokoro chigau de
verses.jp1: をやこでもふう／＼のなかもきよたいも
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼に心ちがうで
verses.kanji: 親子でも夫婦の仲も兄弟も   皆銘々に心違うで
verses.english: Even between parents and children, husband and wife or brothers and sisters, their minds all differ from each other.

verses.pt: Não digo quem, de que lugar do mundo. As poeiras do espírito apegam-se ao corpo como incômodos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Indicating no one in the world in particular, I say to you: dust in the mind causes disorders of the body.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko no mono towa yuwan de na   kokoro no hokori mi ni sawari tsuku
verses.jp1: せかいぢうどこのものとハゆハんでな
verses.jp2: 心のほこりみにさハりつく
verses.kanji: 世界中何処の者とは言わんでな   心の埃身に障り付く
verses.english: I do not indicate any person or place in the world in particular. The dust of the mind causes disorders of the body.

verses.pt: Refletindo sobre os sofrimentos do corpo, determinem o espírito de se amparar em Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over your sufferings of the body and then ponder the mind that leans on God.
verses.ro: minouchi no nayamu koto oba shiyan shite   Kami ni motareru kokoro shiyan se
verses.jp1: みのうちのなやむ事をばしやんして
verses.jp2: 神にもたれる心しやんせ
verses.kanji: 身の内の悩む事をば思案して   神に凭れる心思案せ
verses.english: Pondering over the suffering of your body, determine your mind to lean upon God!

verses.pt: Não importa quão difícil seja o caso, quero mostrar depressa a onipotência de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: It does not matter how difficult your condition may be, for God desires to reveal free and unlimited workings quickly.
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   Kami no juyo hayaku misetai
verses.jp1: どのよふなむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 神のぢうよふはやくみせたい
verses.kanji: どの様な難し事と言うたとて   神の自由早く見せたい
verses.english: However difficult your circumstances may be, I desire to reveal quickly the omnipotence of God.

verses.pt: Até agora, não houve absolutamente quem tenha conhecido a verdade da onipotência de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been no one who knows the truth of God's free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami no juyo shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nai node
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ神のぢうよふしんぢつを
verses.jp2: しりたるものさらにないので
verses.kanji: 今迄は神の自由真実を   知りたる者は更に無いので
verses.english: Until now there has been no one who knows the truth of the omnipotence of God.

verses.pt: Doravante, quão difícil seja a doença, não há a que não se cure segundo o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, no matter how serious your illness may be, nothing is incurable. It depends on your mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa ikana mutsukashi yamai demo   kokoro shidai ni naorande nashi
verses.jp1: これからハいかなむつかしやまいでも
verses.jp2: 心したいになをらんでなし
verses.kanji: これからは如何な難し病でも       心次第に直らんで無し
verses.english: From now on, however serious your illness may be, you will be cured, depending on the way you use your mind.

verses.pt: Se Deus aceitar o espírito sincero, mostrará toda a onipotência.
verses.en_6th_ed: If God accepts your mind of sincerity, I shall work freely and unlimitedly in any matter.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro o Kami ga uketoreba   ikana juyo shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心を神がうけとれば
verses.jp2: いかなぢうよふしてみせるてな
verses.kanji: 真実の心を神が受け取れば   如何な自由して見せるでな
verses.english: When I, God, have accepted the true sincerity of your mind, I will work any and every kind of omnipotence.

verses.pt: Diante destas palavras tão sinceras de Deus, as pessoas próximas devem compreender depressa.
verses.en_6th_ed: You close to Me, quickly become enlightened in this teaching of the truth of God.
verses.ro: kora hodono Kami no shinjitsu kono hanashi   soba naru mono wa hayaku satore yo
verses.jp1: こらほどの神のしんぢつこのはなし
verses.jp2: そばなるものハはやくさとれよ
verses.kanji: こら程の神の真実この話   側なる者は早く悟れよ
verses.english: You who are close to Me must quickly understand this true sincerity of God who is admonishing you so earnestly.

verses.pt: Se ao menos chegarem a compreender isto logo, seja em que for, tudo será segundo este princípio.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you quickly become enlightened in this one matter, everything will proceed accordingly.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku satori ga tsuita nara   nani ni tsuitemo mina kono dori
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくさとりがついたなら
verses.jp2: なにゝついてもみなこのどふり
verses.kanji: これさいか早く悟りが付いたなら   何に就いても皆この道理
verses.english: If only you can quickly understand this, it will be the same for everything else.

verses.pt: Embora, até hoje, em nada tenha apressado, já agora, apresso o amplo caminho.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, I have never hastened you in any way. Now, I hasten you toward the broad path.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani yono koto mo sekane domo   mo sekikomu de okwan no michi
verses.jp1: けふまでハなによの事もせかねとも
verses.jp2: もふせきこむでをふくハんのみち
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何よの事も急かねども   もう急き込むで往還の道
verses.english: Until today I have never hastened you in any matters. But now I hasten your going out to the broad way.

verses.pt: Não pensem ser este um caminho comum. É o início do Registro para todo o sempre.
verses.en_6th_ed: Never think this path is worldly common. It is the beginning of the Divine Record for eternity.
verses.ro: kono michi wa sekainami towa omouna yo   kore matsudai no Koki hajimari
verses.jp1: このみちハせかいなみとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: これまつだいのこふきはぢまり
verses.kanji: この道は世界並とは思うなよ   これ末代のこうき初まり
verses.english: Never take this way to be wordly common! This is the beginning of the Koki, the Divine Record, for eternity.

verses.pt: Não direi onde se encontra este pessoal. Todos virão por causa dos incômodos no corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: I do not say where the performers will be found. All will come because of disorders of the body.
verses.ro: kono ninju doko ni aru towa yuwan de na   minouchi sawari mina kuru de aro
verses.jp1: このにんぢうとこにあるとハゆハんでな
verses.jp2: みのうちさハりみなくるであろ
verses.kanji: この人衆何処に有るとは言わんでな   身の内障り皆来るで有ろ
verses.english: I do not mention where these performers will be found. All shall gather around Me on account of the disorders of their bodies.

verses.pt: Este incômodo é minha orientação, advertência ou ira. Reflitam todos individualmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: These disorders are from My guidance, admonition, or anger. Ponder, each of you.
verses.ro: kono sawari tebiki iken mo rippuku mo   mina meme ni shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: このさハりてびきいけんもりいふくも
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼にしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: この障り手引き意見も立腹も   皆銘々に思案して見よ
verses.english: Among these disorders are included My guidance, admonition and anger. Ponder over your own case, each of you!

verses.pt: Com que pensamento estão ouvindo esta explanação? Insisto porque tenho profunda afeição.
verses.en_6th_ed: What are your thoughts on hearing this talk? I appeal to you repeatedly out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   kawai amarite kudoku koto nari
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp2: かハいあまりてくどく事なり
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて聞いて居る   可愛い余りて口説く事なり
verses.english: With what feeling are you listening to My words? I persuade you repeatedly out of My profound love for you.

verses.pt: Por mais que expresse a minha advertência e ira, não digo jamais que não os salvarei.
verses.en_6th_ed: However I may express My admonition or anger, I shall never say that you will not be saved.
verses.ro: dono yoni iken rippuku yuta tote   kore tasuken to sarani yuwan de
verses.jp1: どのよふにいけんりいふくゆうたとて
verses.jp2: これたすけんとさらにゆハんで
verses.kanji: どの様に意見立腹言うたとて   これ救けんと更に言わんで
verses.english: However strongly I may show anger and admonition, I will never say that any case is beyond My salvaton.

verses.pt: Pensem na advertência do homem aos seus filhos. A minha ira vem também em razão da afeição.
verses.en_6th_ed: Think of you humans admonishing your children. The anger, too, comes from love.
verses.ro: ningen no waga ko no iken omote miyo   hara no tatsu no mo kawai yue kara
verses.jp1: にんけんのハがこのいけんをもてみよ
verses.jp2: はらのたつのもかハいゆへから
verses.kanji: 人間の我が子の意見思うて見よ   腹の立つのも可愛い故から
verses.english: Think of a man admonishing his own children! The anger comes from his parmental love.

verses.pt: Reflitam e sigam-me determinando o espírito, no futuro terão um caminho promissor.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder and come follow Me with firm resolve. There is a path of hope in the future.
verses.ro: shiyan shite kokoro sadamete tsuitekoi   sue wa tanomoshi michi ga aru zo ya
verses.jp1: しやんして心さためてついてこい
verses.jp2: すゑハたのもしみちがあるぞや
verses.kanji: 思案して心定めて随いて来い   末は頼もし道が有るぞや
verses.english: After deep consideration, follow Me with resolute determination! In the future there shall appear a road of hope before you.

verses.pt: Até agora, embora tivessem erros espirituais, vim perdoando, pois o dia não havia chegado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, because the day had not yet come, I have overlooked your mistaken minds.
verses.ro: imamade wa kokoro chigai wa arita tote   hi ga kitarande miyurushite ita
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ心ちがいわありたとて
verses.jp2: ひがきたらんてみゆるしていた
verses.kanji: 今迄は心違いは有りたとて   日が来たらんで見許して居た
verses.english: Until now I have overlooked your misuse of the mind, because the day has not yet come.

verses.pt: Fiquem todos cientes que, desta vez, limparei o íntimo dos corações de qualquer modo.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I shall sweep clean your innermost heart. Be forewarned!
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo mune no uchi   soji o suru de mina shochi seyo
verses.jp1: このたびはなんでもかでもむねのうち
verses.jp2: そうちをするでみなしよちせよ
verses.kanji: この度は何でもかでも胸の内   掃除をするで皆承知せよ
verses.english: But this time I will by all means sweep dust from yourinnermost hearts. Be aware of it, all of you!

verses.pt: Digo que limparei o íntimo dos corações porque existe a profunda intenção de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: The reason for this sweeping of your innermost heart is that the intent of God is deep.
verses.ro: mune no uchi soji o suru to yu no mo na   Kami no omowaku fukaku aru kara
verses.jp1: むねのうちそふぢをするとゆうのもな
verses.jp2: 神のをもハくふかくあるから
verses.kanji: 胸の内掃除をすると言うのもな   神の思惑深く有るから
verses.english: It is from the deep intention of God that I am going to sweep dust from your innermost hearts.

verses.pt: Se não fizerem esta limpeza completamente, não entenderão a verdade do meu coração.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unless the sweeping is thoroughly accomplished, you will not understand the truth of My heart.
verses.ro: kono soji sukiyaka shitate sen koto ni   mune no shinjitsu wakari nai kara
verses.jp1: このそふぢすきやかしたてせん事に
verses.jp2: むねのしんぢつわかりないから
verses.kanji: この掃除清きやか仕立てせん事に   胸の真実分かり無いから
verses.english: Unless this sweeping clear is accomplished, you will remain ignorant of the true sincerity of My heart.

verses.pt: Se entenderem realmente este espírito, ensinarei os movimentos das mãos do início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: When you have truly come to understand My mind, I shall teach you the hand movements of the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono kokoro shin kara wakari tsuita nara   kono yo hajimari te o tsukeru nari
verses.jp1: この心しんからわかりついたなら
verses.jp2: このよはぢまりてをつけるなり
verses.kanji: この心真から分かり付いたなら   この世初まり手を付けるなり
verses.english: When you have thoroughly understood My intention, I will teach you the hand-gestures of the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Não tomem atalhos, nem tenham ambição ou orgulho, sigam apenas o único caminho real.
verses.en_6th_ed: Take no short cuts. Have no greed or arrogance. Come out to the single and straight main path.
verses.ro: chikamichi mo yoku mo koman nai yoni   tada hitosuji no honmichi ni deyo
verses.jp1: ちかみちもよくもこふまんないように
verses.jp2: たゞ一すぢのほんみちにでよ
verses.kanji: 近道も欲も高慢無い様に   ただ一筋の本道に出よ
verses.english: Never be tempted by a short cut, avarice or arrogance! Go out to the single and straight main road!

verses.pt: Se alcançarem este caminho, isto será para todo o sempre o Registro da região dos esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: When you have come onto this path, this will be the Divine Record forever in Nihon.
verses.ro: kono michi ni tsuitaru naraba itsu made mo   kore nippon no Koki naru no ya
verses.jp1: このみちについたるならばいつまても
verses.jp2: これにいほんのこふきなるのや
verses.kanji: この道に付いたるならば何時迄も   これ日本のこうきなるのや
verses.english: If you firmly follow this way, it will become the Koki, the Divine Record, for eternity achieved in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.pt: Se o Registro for feito na região dos esclarecidos, conduzirei de qualquer modo a região dos não-esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: When the Divine Record is made in Nihon, I shall by all means manage Kara as I please.
verses.ro: nihon nimo Koki ga deketa koto naraba   nandemo kara o mamani suru nari
verses.jp1: にほんにもこふきがでけた事ならば
verses.jp2: なんでもからをまゝにするなり
verses.kanji: 日本にもこうきが出来た事ならば   何でも唐を侭にするなり
verses.english: When the Koki, the Divine Record, is written in the region where My teachings spread early, by all means I will make the people of the region where My teachings shall spread later understand Me as freely as I please.

verses.pt: Não tenho falado ainda até agora sobre a verdade desde quando iniciei este mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: I have not spoken yet about the truth of those things that came after I began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara no shinjitsu o   mada imamade wa yuta koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふをはぢめてからのしんぢつを
verses.jp2: またいまゝでハゆうた事なし
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからの真実を   未だ今迄は言うた事無し
verses.english: Until now I have never told you about the truth since the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Embora esta explanação seja algo difícil, se não a fizer, ninguém virá a saber.
verses.en_6th_ed: This talk will be difficult to understand, but if it is left untold, no one will know.
verses.ro: kono hanashi mutsukashi koto de aru keredo   yuwazu ni ireba tare mo shiran de
verses.jp1: このはなしむつかし事であるけれど
verses.jp2: ゆハずにいればたれもしらんで
verses.kanji: この話難し事で有るけれど   言わずに居れば誰も知らんで
verses.english: This talk will be difficult to understand. But, if it is left untold, no one will be able to understand it.

verses.pt: Explicarei gradualmente quaisquer fatos. Ouçam firmemente, acalmando o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall tell you of any and all matters. Calm your mind and listen closely!
verses.ro: dandan to dono yona koto mo yute kikasu   kokoro shizumete shikato kiku nari
verses.jp1: たん／＼とどのよな事もゆてきかす
verses.jp2: 心しずめてしかときくなり
verses.kanji: 段々とどの様な事も言うて聞かす   心静めて確と聞くなり
verses.english: Step by step I will teach you any and everything. Therefore, calm your mind and listen attentively to My remarks!

verses.pt: Até agora, vieram falando de certos ritos, mas doravante, eles serão ineficazes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been talk about various magical rites. From now on, they shall have no effect.
verses.ro: imanade wa ika naru ho to yuta tote   mo korekara wa ho wa kikande
verses.jp1: いまゝでハいかなるほふとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: もふこれからハほふハきかんで
verses.kanji: 今迄は如何なる法と言うたとて   もうこれからは法は効かんで
verses.english: Until now incantations have been said to be effective, but henceforth such rites shall become ineffective.

verses.pt: Embora até o presente tenham sido ensinado às pontas dos ramos como ritos, fiquem observando o futuro.
verses.en_6th_ed: In the past, such magical rites have been taught to the branches, but watch the future.
verses.ro: koremade wa edasaki nitewa ho nazo to   oshiete aredo saki o mite iyo
verses.jp1: これまてハゑださきにてわほふなぞと
verses.jp2: をしへてあれどさきをみていよ
verses.kanji: これ迄は枝先にては法なぞと   教えて有れど先を見て居よ
verses.english: Hitherto I have taught such rites at the twig part of the world. But look at things which shall appear in the future!

verses.pt: Embora a região dos esclarecidos nada soubesse até agora, tenham prazer com o caminho do futuro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Nihon has known nothing until now, but look forward to the future path.
verses.ro: nihon niwa imamade nanimo shirai demo   korekara saki no michi o tanoshume
verses.jp1: にほんにハいまゝでなにもしらいでも
verses.jp2: これからさきのみちをたのしゆめ
verses.kanji: 日本には今迄何も知らいでも   これから先の道を楽しめ
verses.english: The people of the region where My teachings spread early have known nothing until now. But anticipate the delightful way which shall appear in the future!

verses.pt: Mesmo os ritos, não pensem quem os realiza. São realizações de Deus, que iniciou este mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: About magical rites: do not wonder who is making them effective. They are worked by God, who began this world.
verses.ro: ho ya tote tare ga suru towa omouna yo   kono yo hajimeta Kami no nasu koto
verses.jp1: ほふやとてたれがするとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: このよ初た神のなす事
verses.kanji: 法やとて誰がするとは思うなよ   この世初めた神の為す事
verses.english: Never wonder who was making the incantations effective! It was also the work of God who created this world.

verses.pt: Não importa quão difícil seja o fato, se Deus aceitar a sinceridade...
verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult matters may be, if only your sincerity is accepted by God...
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   Kami ga shinjitsu uketorita nara
verses.jp1: どのよふなむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 神がしんちつうけとりたなら
verses.kanji: どの様な難し事と言うたとて   神が真実受け取りたなら
verses.english: However serious your case may be, if only your sincerity is accepted by God, you shall all be saved.

verses.pt: Até agora, embora dissesse sobre a região dos não-esclarecidos e a dos esclarecidos, doravante, direi apenas da região dos esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, there has been talk about Kara and Nihon, but from now on there will only be Nihon.
verses.ro: imamade wa kara ya nihon to yutaredo   korekara saki wa nihon bakari ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでハからやにほんとゆうたれど
verses.jp2: これからさきハにほんばかりや
verses.kanji: 今迄は唐や日本と言うたれど   これから先は日本ばかりや
verses.english: Hitherto I have spoken of the regions where My teachings shall spread early, later and last. But henceforth all shall become the region where My teachings spread.

verses.pt: As pontas dos ramos parecem grandes, mas são fracas. Tocando-as, quebrarão. Observem o futuro.
verses.en_6th_ed: The branches may look big, but they are weak and break when handled. Watch the future.
verses.ro: edasaki wa oki ni miete akan mono   kamaeba oreru saki o mite iyo
verses.jp1: ゑださきハをふきにみへてあかんもの
verses.jp2: かまへばをれるさきをみていよ
verses.kanji: 枝先は大きに見えてあかんもの   かまえば折れる先を見て居よ
verses.english: The twigs may look bulky at a glance. But it will be easily snapped off at a touch. Look at the future!

verses.pt: Embora a origem pareça pequena, a raiz é forte. Em qualquer coisa, devem conhecer a sua origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: The origin may seem small, but the root is great. In all things, know the origin!
verses.ro: moto naru wa chiisai yo de ne ga erai   dono yona koto mo moto o shiru nari
verses.jp1: もとなるハちいさいよふでねがえらい
verses.jp2: とのよな事も元をしるなり
verses.kanji: 元なるは小さい様で根が偉い   どの様な事も元を知るなり
verses.english: The origin may look tiny. But the work of the root is great. So, on whatever kinds of things, it is necessary to know the origin.

verses.pt: Não pensem que as magias e os ritos são grandes, mas sim, a sinceridade do espírito. Isto é a verdade.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think that incantations or magical arts are great. The mind's sincerity is the true art.
verses.ro: jitsu ya tote ho ga erai to omouna yo   kokoro no makoto kore ga shinjitsu
verses.jp1: ぢつやとてほふがへらいとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: こゝろのまことこれがしんぢつ
verses.kanji: 術やとて法が偉いと思うなよ   心の誠これが真実
verses.english: Never think that incantations or magical arts are great! True sincerity in your mind is itself the true art.

verses.pt: Como os seres humanos são superficiais, atribuem as coisas extraordinárias aos ritos.
verses.en_6th_ed: As you humans are shallow, you say that all marvels are magic.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   mezurashi koto o ho nazo to yu
verses.jp1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp2: めづらし事をほふなぞとゆう
verses.kanji: 人間はあざないもので有るからに   珍し事を法なぞと言う
verses.english: As man is shallow-minded, he may attribute something remarkable to incantations or magic.

verses.pt: Embora até agora Deus tenha-se revelado, ainda não há quem tenha conhecido a verdade.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, though God is openly revealed, there is yet no one who knows the truth.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami ga araware detaru tote   mada shinjitsu o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ神があらハれでたるとて
verses.jp2: まだしんぢつをしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 今迄は神が現れ出たるとて   未だ真実を知りた者無し
verses.english: Hitherto, though I, God, have already revealed Myself, there has been no one who knows the truth.

verses.pt: De agora em diante, seja o que for, se deixar ensinado toda a verdade...
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, when I have taught you the truth of all things,
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   oshiete oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このさきハどのよな事もしんじつを
verses.jp2: をしへてをいた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な事も真実を   教えて置いた事で有るなら
verses.english: Henceforth I will teach you the truth of whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Depois disso, em qualquer trabalho de Deus, mostrarei realizando toda a onipotência.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then, I shall show you God's free and unlimited workings in all matters.
verses.ro: sorekara wa Kami no hataraki nanimo kamo   juyojizai o shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: それからハ神のはたらきなにもかも
verses.jp2: ぢうよじざいをしてみせるでな
verses.kanji: それからは神の働き何もかも   自由自在をして見せるでな
verses.english: Then I, God, will manifest the omnipotence of My working on any and everything.

verses.pt: Se começar realmente os trabalhos de Deus, o espírito de todas as pessoas do mundo se purificará.
verses.en_6th_ed: When God in Truth begins to work, the minds of all in the world will be purified.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami no hataraki shikaketara   sekai ichiretsu kokoro sumikiru
verses.jp1: しんぢつの神のはたらきしかけたら
verses.jp2: せかい一れつ心すみきる
verses.kanji: 真実の神の働き仕掛けたら   世界一列心澄み切る
verses.english: When I, the true God, begin to work, the minds of the whole world shall become purified.

verses.pt: O que pensam serem estes trabalhos? É a devolução tão logo aceite o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: What are your thoughts concerning My workings? I shall give returns when I accept your minds.
verses.ro: hataraki mo ika naru koto to omou kana   kokoro uketori shidai kayashi o
verses.jp1: はたらきもいかなる事とをもうかな
verses.jp2: 心うけとりしだいかやしを
verses.kanji: 働きも如何なる事と思うかな   心受け取り次第返しを
verses.english: What do you think of My working? I will give a suitable return as soon as I accept your mind.

verses.pt: O que estão pensando ser esta devolução? Mesmo estando afastados a mil léguas...
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think these returns are about? They will reach you though you be a thousand leagues away.
verses.ro: kono kayashi nanino koto ya to omou kana   michinori sen ri hedate aritemo
verses.jp1: このかやしなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: みちのりせんりへだてありても
verses.kanji: この返し何の事やと思うかな   道程千里隔て有りても
verses.english: What do you think of this return? It shall reach you at once, even if you may be living one thousand ri away.

verses.pt: Não importa o que digam e pensem a respeito, será feita a devolução tão logo os aceite.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may say or think, I shall give returns as soon as I accept your minds.
verses.ro: kono koto wa nani o yutemo omotemo   uketori shidai suguni kayashi o
verses.jp1: この事ハなにをゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp2: うけとりしだいすぐにかやしを
verses.kanji: この事は何を言うても思うても   受け取り次第直ぐに返しを
verses.english: Whatever you may say or think, I will give you a return at once as soon as I accept your mind.

verses.pt: Não pensem no que consiste esta devolução, pois devolverei tudo, tanto o bem como o mal.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder what these returns are about. I shall give returns for both good and evil.
verses.ro: kono kayashi nanno koto ya to omouna yo   zen aku tomoni mina kayasu de na
verses.jp1: このかやしなんの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: せんあくともにみなかやすてな
verses.kanji: この返し何の事やと思うなよ   善悪共に皆返すでな
verses.english: Never wonder what this return should be! I will give a return for both good and evil.

verses.pt: Que digam coisas boas como pensem em coisas más, devolverei prontamente tal como são.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whether you speak good or think evil, I shall give returns at once as you deserve.
verses.ro: yoki koto o yutemo ashiki omotemo   sono mama suguni kayasu koto nari
verses.jp1: よき事をゆうてもあしきをもふても
verses.jp2: そのまゝすくにかやす事なり
verses.kanji: 善き事を言うても悪しき思うても   その侭直ぐに返す事なり
verses.english: Whether you may say good or think evil, I will give a return at once just as you deserve.

verses.pt: Quando este fato for visto, todos igualmente, quem quer que seja, alcançarão a purificação.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you begin to see this, My purification will reach any and everyone in the whole world.
verses.ro: kono koto o miekita naraba ichiretsu wa   donna mono demo mina sumiwataru
verses.jp1: この事をみへきたならば一れつわ
verses.jp2: どんなものでもみなすみわたる
verses.kanji: この事を見え来たならば一列は   どんな者でも皆澄み渡る
verses.english: When this appears, any and everyone of the whole world shall become purified.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, embora ainda nada seja visto, observem que tudo será visto no oitavo mês.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, though nothing is seen, look toward the eighth month. Then everything will be seen.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani ga mieru ya nai keredo   hachi gatsu o miyo mina mieru de na
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにがみへるやないけれど
verses.jp2: 八月をみよみなみへるでな
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何が見えるや無いけれど   八月を見よ皆見えるでな
