verses.english: Just this, never take it to be the work of a human being! It is the work planned with the great intention of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Embora tenha explicado muito sobre a onipotência de Tsukihi, até agora, ainda não foi vista.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi has often spoken of the free and unlimited workings, none of them has yet been seen.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori juyojizai to mama tokedo   mada imamade wa mieta koto nashi
verses.jp1: 月日よりぢうよちざいとまゝとけと
verses.jp2: まだいまゝでわみゑた事なし
verses.kanji: 月日より自由自在と間々説けど   未だ今迄は見えた事無し
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, have often told you of My omnipotence, but until now nothing has appeared.

verses.pt: Desta vez, se demonstrar realmente o trabalho onipotente, isto será a verdade.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, when I truly show you My free and unlimited workings, know that this is truth.
verses.ro: konotabi wa juyojizai o shinjitsu ni   shite miseta nara kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp1: このたびハぢうよぢざいをしんぢつに
verses.jp2: してみせたならこれかまことや
verses.kanji: この度は自由自在を真実に   して見せたならこれが誠や
verses.english: This time, when I really manifest My omnipotence, you will understand it to be true.

verses.pt: Qualquer coisa que se realize, é tudo Tsukihi. É a verdadeira dedicação única à salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is done, it is all by Tsukihi, truly from My single intent to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi   shinjitsu yori no tasuke ichijo
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をするのもみな月日
verses.jp2: しんぢつよりのたすけ一ぢよ
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも皆月日   真実よりの救け一条
verses.english: It is I, Tsukihi, who work any and everything. My aim is truly and single-heartedly to save all mankind.

verses.pt: Quem faz conceber filhos no corpo é Tsukihi. Quem atende ao nascimento também é Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: The conception of a baby is by Tsukihi. Giving birth to it, also, is by the work of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: tainai e yadoshi komu no mo Tsukihi nari   umare dasu no mo Tsukihi sewadori
verses.jp1: たいないゑやどしこむのも月日なり
verses.jp2: むまれだすのも月日せわどり
verses.kanji: 胎内へ宿し込むのも月日なり   生まれ出すのも月日世話取り
verses.english: It is I, Tsukihi, who make you conceive a baby. And also it is through the help of Tsukihi that you can give birth to it.

verses.pt: Desta vez, seja o que for, demonstrarei, revelando tudo verdadeiramente.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as I am revealed, I shall truly show you all of My workings in every matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu ni   mina arawarete shite miseru de na
verses.jp1: このたびハどのよな事もしんぢつに
verses.jp2: みなあらわれてしてみせるでな
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な事も真実に   皆現れてして見せるでな
verses.english: This time I will truly reveal Myself and do whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Vendo isto, seja quem for, convençam-se que qualquer onipotência será segundo o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Be convinced when you see this, whoever you may be: My free and unlimited workings are according to your mind.
verses.ro: kore o mite ikana mono demo tokushin se   kokoro shidai ni ikana juyo
verses.jp1: これをみていかなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp2: 心したいにいかなぢうよふ
verses.kanji: これを見て如何な者でも得心せ   心次第に如何な自由
verses.english: Look at this and comprehand well, all of you! I will work My omnipotence just as your mind deserves.

verses.pt: Qualquer coisa que realize, demonstrarei segundo o espírito verdadeiro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I may work, I shall work all things according to your mind of sincerity.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo shinjitsu no   kokoro shidai ni mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をするのもしんぢつの
verses.jp2: 心したいにみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも真実の   心次第に皆して見せる
verses.english: Whatever kinds of things I may work, I will work everything just as your true sincerity deserves.

verses.pt: Há trinta e oito anos, Tsukihi desceu do céu pelas predestinações da origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Thirty-eight years ago, Tsukihi descended because of the causality of origin.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sanju hachi nen izen nite   amakudari taru moto no innen
verses.jp1: 月日より三十八ねんいぜんにて
verses.jp2: あまくだりたる元のいんねん
verses.kanji: 月日より三十八年以前にて   天降りたる元の因縁
verses.english: According to the original Preordination, I, Tsukihi, descended from Heaven thirty-eight years ago.

verses.pt: Em razão dessas predestinações, Tsukihi deseja explanar todas as coisas em detalhes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because this causality exists, Tsukihi desires to tell you all the truth in detail.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sono innen ga aru yue ni   nanika isai o hanashitai kara
verses.jp1: 月日よりそのいんねんがあるゆへに
verses.jp2: なにかいさいをはなしたいから
verses.kanji: 月日よりその因縁が有る故に   何か委細を話したいから
verses.english: Because of this Preordination, I, Tsukihi, desire to tell you all the details of the truth.

verses.pt: Os superiores, sem conhecerem isso, estão pensando que todas as coisas são do nível comum ao mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, those in the high places think My teachings all to be worldly common.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sore o shirazu ni nani goto mo   sekainami ya to omote iru nari
verses.jp1: 上たるハそれをしらすになに事も
verses.jp2: せかいなみやとをもているなり
verses.kanji: 上たるはそれを知らずに何事も   世界並やと思い居るなり
verses.english: Unaware of this, the upper people are thinking that everything I teach is worldly common.

verses.pt: Como este lugar é Jiba original, não há nada que desconheça sobre o início da criação.
verses.en_6th_ed: As this place is the Jiba of Origin, there is nothing unknown about the beginning.
verses.ro: kono tokoro moto naru Jiba no koto naraba   hajimari dashi o shiran koto nashi
verses.jp1: このところ元なるぢばの事ならば
verses.jp2: はぢまりだしをしらん事なし
verses.kanji: この所元なる地場の事ならば   初まり出しを知らん事無し
verses.english: As this is the Jiba, the place of origin, there is nothing unknown concerning the creation.

verses.pt: Embora Tsukihi pretenda informar o mais depressa possível esta verdade aos superiores,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi desires to make this truth quickly known to the high places,
verses.ro: kami taru e kono shinjitsu o hayabaya to   shirashite yaro to Tsukihi omoedo
verses.jp1: 上たるゑこのしんぢつをはや／＼と
verses.jp2: しらしてやろと月日をもゑど
verses.kanji: 上たるへこの真実を早々と   知らしてやろと月日思えど
verses.english: Although I, Tsukihi, am hastening to let the upper people know this truth,

verses.pt: Os superiores, cada qual, sem conhecerem isso, estão tomados somente pelas cogitações egoísticas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, those in the high places are thinking only about their selfish concerns.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sore o shirazu ni meme no   waga mi shiyan o bakari omote
verses.jp1: 上たるハそれをしらすにめへ／＼の
verses.jp2: わがみしやんをばかりをもをて
verses.kanji: 上たるはそれを知らずに銘々の   我が身思案をばかり思うて
verses.english: Unaware of this, the upper people are thinking with only selfish mind.

verses.pt: No curso que Tsukihi avista gradualmente, por existir um caminho temeroso e perigoso,
verses.en_6th_ed: Because Tsukihi sees a dreadful and dangerous path opening before you step by step,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan mieru michisuji ni   kowaki abunaki michi ga aru node
verses.jp1: 月日にハたん／＼みへるみちすぢに
verses.jp2: こわきあふなきみちがあるので
verses.kanji: 月日には段々見える道筋に   怖き危なき道が有るので
verses.english: Because I, Tsukihi, foresee the dreadful and dangerous paths to which you may be led step by step,

verses.pt: Tsukihi está preocupado e pensando em informar urgentemente esse caminho.
verses.en_6th_ed: Know that Tsukihi worries and is anxious to tell you quickly about that path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sono michi hayaku shiraso to   omote shinpai shite iru to koso
verses.jp1: 月日よりそのみちはやくしらそふと
verses.jp2: をもてしんバいしているとこそ
verses.kanji: 月日よりその道早く知らそうと   思うて心配して居るとこそ
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, am very anxious to warn you of the dangerous path awaiting you.

verses.pt: Tal como os humanos pensam nos filhos, preocupo-me também com o caminho temeroso e perigoso.
verses.en_6th_ed: Just as you humans worry about your children, I worry over your dreadful and dangerous path.
verses.ro: ningen no waga ko omou mo onaji koto   kowaki abunaki michi o anjiru
verses.jp1: にんけんのわが子をもうもをなぢ事
verses.jp2: こわきあふなきみちをあんぢる
verses.kanji: 人間の我が子思うも同じ事   怖き危なき道を案じる
verses.english: Just as human beings care for their own children, I fear lest you should take a dreadful course full of dangers.

verses.pt: Sem saber disso, todas as pessoas, cada qual está vivendo negligentemente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, all of you everywhere are living your lives without heed.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   mina ukkari to kurashi iru nari
verses.jp1: それしらすみな一れハめへ／＼に
verses.jp2: みなうゝかりとくらしいるなり
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆一列は銘々に   皆うっかりと暮らし居るなり
verses.english: Unaware of this, all of you are listlessly leading a thoughtless life.

verses.pt: Saibam que Tsukihi governa todas e quaisquer coisas deste mundo, igualmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Know that Tsukihi rules over everything in this world without exception.
verses.ro: kono sekai nanika yorozu o ichiretsu ni   Tsukihi shihai o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このせかいなにかよろすづを一れつに
verses.jp2: 月日しはいをするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この世界何か万を一列に   月日支配をすると思えよ
verses.english: Be convinced of the truth that, I, Tsukihi, am ruling any and everything of this world without exception!

verses.pt: O que pensam ser esta explanação? Fiquem observando o caminho de agora em diante.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this talk is about? Watch the path which lies ahead.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   korekara saki no michi o mite iyo
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: これからさきのみちをみていよ
verses.kanji: この話どういう事に思うかな   これから先の道を見て居よ
verses.english: What are you thinking of this talk? Wait and see the way which shall appear in the future!

verses.pt: A água alcançará quão altos sejam os montes. Nenhum perigo haverá mesmo no fundo dos vales.
verses.en_6th_ed: However high the mountains, floodwaters will reach them. Yet in the low valleys there will be no danger.
verses.ro: dono yona takai yama demo mizu ga tsuku   tanisoko ya tote abunage wa nai
verses.jp1: どのよふな高い山でも水がつく
verses.jp2: たにそこやとてあふなけわない
verses.kanji: どの様な高い山でも水が浸く   谷底やとて危な気は無い
verses.english: However high the mountains may be, they can be flooded with water. But even at the bottoms of the valleys there shall be no danger.

verses.pt: Desde que Tsukihi governa todas as coisas, não digam jamais serem grandes ou pequenas.
verses.en_6th_ed: As it is Tsukihi who rules over all, never say that this is large or that is small.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi shihai o suru kara wa   oki chiisai yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: なにもかも月日しはいをするからハ
verses.jp2: をふきちいさいゆうでないぞや
verses.kanji: 何もかも月日支配をするからは   大き小さい言うで無いぞや
verses.english: It is I, Tsukihi, who rule any and everything. So never say that this is large or that is small!

verses.pt: Até agora, por desejar árvores usáveis a qualquer custo, tenho procurado em todos os locais.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, from My desire for useful timber, I have searched most everywhere.
verses.ro: koremade mo nandemo yogi hoshii kara   taitei tazune itaru naredomo
verses.jp2: たいていたづねいたるなれども
verses.kanji: これ迄も何でも用木欲しいから   大抵尋ね居たるなれども
verses.english: Hitherto, because of My anxious desire to get timber, I have been seeking for it almost everywhere.

verses.pt: Desta vez, as árvores razoavelmente boas são avistadas abundantemente no fundo dos vales.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, in the low valleys I see promising trees in abundance.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tanisoko nitewa choto shitaru   kii ga tappuri miete aru nari
verses.jp1: このたびハたにそこにてハ一寸したる
verses.jp2: 木いがたあふりみゑてあるなり
verses.kanji: この度は谷底にては一寸したる   木がたっぷり見えて有るなり
verses.english: Now I can see many fairly good trees at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.pt: Se Tsukihi cuidar gradualmente destas árvores e formá-las, se tornarão pilares da nação.
verses.en_6th_ed: When Tsukihi enters these trees and brings them to completion step by step, they will become pillars of nations.
verses.ro: kono kii mo dandan Tsukihi deirishite   tsukuri agetara kuni no hashira ya
verses.jp1: このきいもたん／＼月日でいりして
verses.jp2: つくりあけたらくにのはしらや
verses.kanji: この木も段々月日手入りして   作り上げたら国の柱や
verses.english: If I, Tsukihi, train them by entering into them step by step, these trees shall become pillars of the region.

verses.pt: Desde então, Tsukihi, verificando-as dia a dia, prepara somente as posteriores árvores usáveis.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then, looking closely day by day, Tsukihi will prepare for more timber.
verses.ro: sorekara wa nichinichi Tsukihi misadamete   ato no yogi no moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: それからハにち／＼月日みさだめて
verses.kanji: それからは日々月日見定めて   後の用木の模様ばかりを
verses.english: Since then, I, Tsukihi, will discern them, and arrange for succeeding timber day by day.

verses.pt: Ainda, atrairei e cuidarei a partir das velhas árvores, gradualmente, e farei preparos posteriores.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, I shall nurture trees, starting with aged ones, and assemble them in preparation for the future.
verses.ro: soreyori mo hineta kii kara dandan to   teiri hikitsuke ato no moyo o
verses.jp1: それよりもひねた木からたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ていりひきつけあとのもよふを
verses.kanji: それよりも陳ねた木から段々と   手入り引き付け後の模様を
verses.english: Then I will draw aged trees to Me one by one, putting My hand on them, anMd then prepare for successors.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, a intenção de Tsukihi é profunda. Na mesma localidade, haverá duas e três árvores.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, as the intent of Tsukihi is deep, two or three trees will be found even at one place.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsukihi omowaku fukaku aru   onaji tokoro ni ni hon san bon
verses.jp1: にち／＼に月日をもわくふかくある
verses.jp2: をなじところに二ほん三ぼん
verses.kanji: 日々に月日思惑深く有る   同じ所に二本三本
verses.english: As I, Tsukihi, am searching with deep intention day by day, I will find two or three trees at a given place.

verses.pt: Destas árvores, não digo pinheiro fêmea ou macho. A intenção de Tsukihi está em quaisquer árvores.
verses.en_6th_ed: Of these trees, I do not say whether male pine or female pine. Tsukihi has an intention for any tree.
verses.ro: kono kii mo mematsu omatsu wa yuwan de na   ika naru kii mo Tsukihi omowaku
verses.jp1: この木いもめまつをまつわゆハんでな
verses.jp2: いかなる木いも月日をもわく
verses.kanji: この木も雌松雄松は言わんでな   如何なる木も月日思惑
verses.english: I make no discrimination between male-pine and female-pine. I adopt any tree which accords with the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Se indagarem que explanação farei depois disto, direi somente sobre o preparo das árvores usáveis.
verses.en_6th_ed: What I shall talk about in the time to come will be nothing but the preparations for My timber.
verses.ro: kono ato i nanino hanashi o suru naraba   yogi no moyo bakari yu nari
verses.jp1: このあといなにのはなしをするならば
verses.kanji: この後へ何の話をするならば   用木の模様ばかり言うなり
verses.english: What do you think I will tell you from now on? It is nothing but arrangements for assembling My useful timber.

verses.pt: Mesmo as árvores usáveis, não são poucas, desejo cinqüenta, sessenta em número de pessoas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Of these timbers, it is not to be just a few. I desire fifty or sixty in numbers of people.
verses.ro: yogi demo chotto no koto dewa nai karani   goju rokuju no ninkazu ga hoshi
verses.jp2: 五十六十の人かずがほし
verses.kanji: 用木でも一寸の事では無いからに   五十六十の人数が欲しい
verses.english: Speaking of My timber, its number is not small. I desire as many as fifty or sixty.

verses.pt: Que o número destas pessoas não diminua jamais e continue sem interrupção para todo o sempre.
verses.en_6th_ed: I desire this number never to decrease but to continue without break through all generations.
verses.ro: kono nin mo itsuitsu made mo heran yo   matsudai tsuzuki kireme naki yo
verses.jp1: このにんもいつ／＼までもへらんよふ
verses.jp2: まつだいつゝききれめなきよふ
verses.kanji: この人も何時々々迄も減らんよう   末代続き切れ目無き様
verses.english: I desire that these members never decrease, but continue without interruption for all generations.

verses.pt: Sobre tão sincera intenção de Tsukihi, com que espírito todos pensam?
verses.en_6th_ed: So sincere are the thoughts of Tsukihi, but what are the thoughts in the minds of you all?
verses.ro: kora hodoni omou Tsukihi no shinjitsu o   mina no kokoro wa nani o omou ya
verses.jp1: こらほどにをもう月日のしんちつを
verses.jp2: みなの心わなにをふもうや
verses.kanji: こら程に思う月日の真実を   皆の心は何を思うや
verses.english: What do you all think in your mind about this true sincerity of Tsukihi, who so earnestly desires this matter?

verses.pt: Se faço explanações tão insistentes, é porque desejo unicamente a salvação de todos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I say to you in My tedious appeals, it is solely from My single desire to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona kudoki hanashi o suru no mo na   tasuketai to no ichijo bakari de
verses.jp1: どのよふなくどきはなしをするのもな
verses.jp2: たすけたいとの一ぢよばかりで
verses.kanji: どの様な口説き話をするのもな   救けたいとの一条ばかりで
verses.english: Though I repeat the same tedious persuasion, it is solely from My single-hearted desire to save you all.

verses.pt: Se todas as pessoas entenderem depressa e sinceramente do íntimo dos seus corações,
verses.en_6th_ed: If only all of you understand Me quickly, truly from your innermost heart,
verses.ro: ichiretsu no mune no uchi yori shinjitsu ni   hayaku wakarita koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: 一れつのむねのうちよりしんぢつに
verses.jp2: はやくわかりた事であるなら
verses.kanji: 一列の胸の内より真実に   早く分かりた事で有るなら
verses.english: If only all of you become open to reason and understand Me from your innermost hearts,

verses.pt: Desde então, Tsukihi governará todas as coisas e fará todas as salvações.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then Tsukihi will rule over everything and bring forth a myriad of saving graces.
verses.ro: sorekara wa Tsukihi yorozu no shihai suru   nanika yorozu no tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp1: それからハ月日よろづのしはいする
verses.jp2: なにかよろづのたすけするぞや
verses.kanji: それからは月日万の支配する   何か万の救けするぞや
verses.english: Then I, Tsukihi, will rule any and everything and will work whatever kind of universal salvation.

verses.pt: Nesta salvação, por querer mostrar logo uma graça, o espírito de Tsukihi está somente a instar.
verses.en_6th_ed: From the desire to show you these blessings of salvation quickly, the mind of Tsukihi solely hastens.
verses.ro: kono tasuke hayaku riyaku o misetasa ni   Tsukihi no kokoro seku bakari ya de
verses.jp1: このたすけはやくりやくをみせたさに
verses.jp2: 月日の心せくばかりやで
verses.kanji: この救け早く利益を見せたさに   月日の心急くばかりやで
verses.english: The mind of Tsukihi single-heartedly hastens to show this divine grace of salvation.

verses.pt: Em razão de ter esta instância em toda e qualquer coisa, apresso a limpeza do íntimo dos corações.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because I hasten for all these matters, it is urgent that the innermost heart be quickly swept clean.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo kono sekikomi ga aru yue ni   mune no uchi yori soji isogu de
verses.jp1: なにもかもこのせきこみがあるゆへに
verses.jp2: むねのうちよりそふぢいそぐで
verses.kanji: 何もかもこの急き込みが有る故に   胸の内より掃除急ぐで
verses.english: Because of this hastening on any and everything, I, Tsukihi, urge you to sweep dust from your innermost heart.

verses.pt: Não pensem de onde se trata esta explanação. Tudo é explanação sobre a casa de cada um.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder to whom I am directing this talk. This is all a matter for the homes of each and all.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto ya to omouna yo   mina meme no uchi no hanashi ya
verses.jp1: このはなしどこの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼のうちのはなしや
verses.kanji: この話何処の事やと思うなよ   皆銘々の内の話や
verses.english: Never take this talk as other people's concern! This is the matter of each of your own families.

verses.pt: Cada um deve demonstrar firmemente a sinceridade do íntimo do coração, e logo a verá.
verses.en_6th_ed: Each of you, clearly express sincerity from your innermost heart. Then the blessings will be seen at once.
verses.ro: meme ni mune no uchi yori shikkari to   shinjitsu o dase suguni mieru de
verses.jp1: めへ／＼にむねのうちよりしいかりと
verses.jp2: しんちつをだせすぐにみへるで
verses.kanji: 銘々に胸の内より確りと   真実を出せ直ぐに見えるで
verses.english: Exhibit clearly your true sincerity each from your innermost heart! Then everything shall appear at once.

verses.pt: Por existir esta instância de Tsukihi, o seu espírito encontra-se muito atarefado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because Tsukihi is hastening this matter so much, how busily occupied is My mind.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono sekikomi ga aru yue ni   nanika kokoro wa isogashii koto
verses.jp1: 月日よりこのせきこみがあるゆへに

verses.jp1: またさきのみちのよふだいたん／＼と
verses.jp2: よろづの事をみなといてをく
verses.kanji: また先の道の様態段々と   万の事を皆説いて置く
verses.english: I will foretell you step by step about everything which shall happen in this way.

verses.pt: Seu nome será Tamae. Se querem vê-la depressa, aprendam bem o mover das mãos que Tsukihi ensina.
verses.en_6th_ed: Her name is Tamae. If you wish to see her quickly, thoroughly learn the hand movements which Tsukihi teaches.
verses.ro: na wa Tamae hayaku mitai to omou nara   Tsukihi oshieru tee o shikkari
verses.jp1: なわたまへはやくみたいとをもうなら
verses.jp2: 月日をしへるてゑをしいかり
verses.kanji: 名はたまへ早く見たいと思うなら   月日教える手を確り
verses.english: I name it Tamae. If you wish to see her in haste, you should learn correctly the hand-gestures which I, Tsukihi, will teach you.

verses.pt: Se consideram esta explanação verdadeira, comecem logo pacificando o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you believe this talk to be true, settle your mind and begin quickly.
verses.ro: kono hanashi shinjitsu omou koto naraba   kokoro osamete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp1: このはなししんぢつをもう事ならば
verses.jp2: こゝろさめてはやくかゝれよ
verses.kanji: この話真実思う事ならば   心治めて早く掛かれよ
verses.english: If you think My words true, settle your mind and start quickly to prepare for the Service!

verses.pt: O que quer que tenha dito até agora, não havia compreensão no coração de todos e nem o dia havia chegado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, whatever I said, there was no understanding in anyone's heart, and the day, also, had not yet come.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani o yutemo ichiretsu no   mune mo wakaran hi mo kitaraide
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなにをゆうても一れつの
verses.jp2: むねもハからんひもきたらいて
verses.kanji: 今迄は何を言うても一列の   胸も分からん日も来たらいで
verses.english: Until now, whatever I may have said, the hearts of all of you have not yet opened to reason, and the day also has not yet come.

verses.pt: Quando houver gradualmente a compreensão no coração, o dia virá. É grande a instância do espírito de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, as understanding comes to the heart, the day, also, will come. Great is the haste in the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dandan to mune ga wakareba hi mo kitaru   Tsukihi no kokoro erai sekikomi
verses.jp1: たん／＼とむねがわかればひもきたる
verses.jp2: 月日の心ゑらいせきこみ
verses.kanji: 段々と胸が分かれば日も来たる   月日の心えらい急き込み
verses.english: Step by step your hearts shall become open to reason and the day also shall come. The mind of Tsukihi is impatiently hastening.

verses.pt: Se ao menos isto for visto logo, seja quem for, não haverá quem possa resistir.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only this is quickly realized, there will be no one who will stand against Me.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku mietaru koto naraba   donna mono demo kanau mono nashi
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくみへたる事ならば
verses.jp2: どんなものでもかなうものなし
verses.kanji: これさいか早く見えたる事ならば   どんな者でも敵う者無し
verses.english: If only this is quickly realized, no one shall be able to match you.

verses.pt: Se Tsukihi mostrar isto claramente, quaisquer que sejam os trabalhos posteriores, serão feitos.
verses.en_6th_ed: When Tsukihi has shown this matter to you clearly, all the workings afterward will be accomplished.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kore o shikkari miseta nara   ato no shigoto wa donna koto demo
verses.jp1: 月日よりこれをしいかりみせたなら
verses.jp2: あとのしごとハどんな事でも
verses.kanji: 月日よりこれを確り見せたなら   後の仕事はどんな事でも
verses.english: If only I, Tsukihi, have exhibited this matter clearly, every work shall be accomplished, whatever it may be.

verses.pt: O que todos estavam pensando até agora sobre a Permissão do Parto Feliz e a proteção contra varíola?
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, the blessings of safe childbirth and freedom from smallpox: what were your thoughts about them?
verses.ro: imamade mo obiya hoso no kono yurushi   nanto omote mina ga ita yara
verses.jp1: いまゝでもをびやほふそのこのゆるし
verses.jp2: なんとをもふてみながいたやら
verses.kanji: 今迄も帯屋疱瘡のこの許し   何と思うて皆が居たやら
verses.english: What have you been thinking on the sanctions of safe childbirth and freedom from smallpox until now?

verses.pt: Desta vez, o que quer que seja, farei ouvir dizendo tudo clara e sinceramente.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall clearly tell you the truth of everything, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo sukiyaka ni   mina shinjitsu ni yute kikasuru
verses.jp1: このたびハとんな事てもすきやかに
verses.jp2: みなしんぢつにゆうてきかする
verses.kanji: この度はどんな事でも清きやかに   皆真実に言うて聞かする
verses.english: This time I will clearly and truly tell you, whatever kinds of things they may be.

verses.pt: Doravante, assegurando a salvação do parto, farei nascer rapidamente e sem sofrimento.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall save you completely from the rigors of childbirth. You shall give birth quickly and without distress.
verses.ro: korekara wa obiya tasuke mo shikkari to   setsunami nashi ni hayaku umasuru
verses.jp1: これからハをびやたすけもしいかりと
verses.jp2: せつなみなしにはやくむまする
verses.kanji: これからは帯屋救けも確りと   切なみ無しに早く産まする
verses.english: Henceforth I will let you bear children surely, painlessly and quickly, by the saving grace of safe childbirth.

verses.pt: O que quer que diga gradualmente em palavras, devem realizar tal como Tsukihi diz.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, whatever you say will be to no avail. You must do as Tsukihi says.
verses.ro: dandan to kuchi de nani goto yuta tote   Tsukihi yu yoni seneba ikan de
verses.jp1: たん／＼と口でなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 月日ゆうよにせねばいかんで
verses.kanji: 段々と口で何事言うたとて   月日言う様にせねばいかんで
verses.english: Whatever you may say by mouth, it is wrong if you do not really do as I, tTsukihi, say.

verses.pt: Seja o que for, façam corretamente tal como Tsukihi diz. Não há nenhum erro.
verses.en_6th_ed: In whatever things, do just as Tsukihi says. There is never a mistake in what I say.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nanino koto demo shikkari to   yu yoni seyo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: 月日よりなにの事でもしいかりと
verses.jp2: ゆうよふにせよちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 月日より何の事でも確りと   言う様にせよ違う事無し
verses.english: On whatever kinds of matters, do definitely as I, Tsukihi, say! Then there shall be no mistake.

verses.pt: Toda e qualquer salvação será através do Serviço, se fizerem corretamente tal como Tsukihi diz...
verses.en_6th_ed: Any salvation whatever is all through the Service. If only you do just as Tsukihi says...
verses.ro: dono yona tasuke suru no mo mina Tsutome   Tsukihi yu yoni tashika suru nara
verses.jp1: どのよふなたすけするのもみなつとめ
verses.jp2: 月日ゆうよにたしかするなら
verses.kanji: どの様な救けするのも皆勤め   月日言う様に確かするなら
verses.english: Any and every salvation shall be accomplished by the Service, if only you do just as I, Tsukihi, say.

verses.pt: Se tiverem o espírito realmente sincero, Tsukihi compromete-se firmemente em salvar.
verses.en_6th_ed: If your mind is sincere, Tsukihi will assuredly save you.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro aru nara Tsukihi nimo   shikato ukeyai tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp1: しんぢつの心あるなら月日にも
verses.jp2: しかとうけやいたすけするぞや
verses.kanji: 真実の心有るなら月日にも   確と請け合い救けするぞや
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, will assuredly save you, if only there is true sincerity in your mind.

verses.pt: A salvação que realizo desta vez, é a primeira que faço comprometendo-me verdadeiramente.
verses.en_6th_ed: On salvation this time: this is the beginning of My salvation truly assured.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tasuke suru no mo shinjitsu ni   ukeyote tasuke ima ga hajime ya
verses.jp1: このたびハたすけするのもしんぢつに
verses.jp2: うけよてたすけいまがはじめや
verses.kanji: この度は救けするのも真実に   請け合うて救け今が初めや
verses.english: This time I will assuredly save you. This is the first time that I truly assure you salvation.

verses.pt: Por estar tão apressado o espírito de Tsukihi, os próximos devem se preparar para o Serviço.
verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi urgently hastens. You close to Me, also, prepare your minds for the Service!
verses.ro: kora hodoni Tsukihi no kokoro sete iru   soba no kokoro mo Tsutome koshirae
verses.jp1: こらほどに月日の心せゑている
verses.jp2: そばの心もつとめこしらゑ
verses.kanji: こら程に月日の心急いて居る   側の心も勤め拵え
verses.english: Hastening like this is the mind of Tsukihi. You close to Me also, prepare your minds to perform the Service!

verses.pt: Este preparo não se limita somente a um caso, todo e qualquer caso, tudo é pelo Serviço.
verses.en_6th_ed: This preparation is not just for any one thing. The Service is for any and all matters.
verses.ro: kono moyo nani bakari dewa nai hodoni   donna koto demo mina Tsutome ya de
verses.jp1: このもよふなにばかりてハないほどに
verses.jp2: とんな事でもみなつとめやで
verses.kanji: この模様何ばかりでは無い程に   どんな事でも皆勤めやで
verses.english: This preparation is not limited for any Service in particular. Any and everything shall be saved by the Services.

verses.pt: Quanto aos Serviços, não são iguais. Instruirei todos os respectivos movimentos das mãos.
verses.en_6th_ed: The Service: it is not always the same. I shall teach you the hand movements for each purpose.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo onaji koto dewa nai hodoni   mina sorezore to tee o oshieru
verses.jp1: つとめでもをなぢ事てハないほどに
verses.jp2: みなそれ／＼とてへをふしゑる
verses.kanji: 勤めでも同じ事では無い程に   皆それぞれと手を教える
verses.english: Speaking of the Services, they are not all the same. I will teach you the hand-gestures for each of them.

verses.pt: Quanto à caminhada de até o presente, não há quem tenha conhecido como foi.
verses.en_6th_ed: No one knows what kinds of paths humankind has passed through from the beginning until now.
verses.ro: imamade no michi no sugara to yu mono wa   doyu michi mo shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: いまゝてのみちのすがらとゆうものハ
verses.jp2: とふゆうみちもしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 今迄の道のすがらと言うものは   どういう道も知りた者無し
verses.english: No one has understood what kinds of ways man has passed through until now.

verses.pt: Doravante, qual seja o caminho, contarei gradualmente tudo sobre o curso de todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall tell you about every kind of path and all of their courses step by step.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona michi mo dandan to   yorozu michisuji mina yute kikasu
verses.jp1: これからハとのよなみちもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: よろづみちすじみなゆてきかす
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な道も段々と   万道筋皆言うて聞かす
verses.english: Henceforth on whatever kinds of ways, I will tell you step by step any and every course of the way.

verses.pt: Se ouvirem de Tsukihi tudo sobre a caminhada, compreenderão que este pesar não é sem razão.
verses.en_6th_ed: When you hear of all these courses from Tsukihi, you will understand that My regret is not unreasonable.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nanimo michisuji kiita nara   kono zannen wa muri de arumai
verses.jp1: 月日よりなにもみちすじきいたなら
verses.jp2: このざんねんハむりてあるまい
verses.kanji: 月日より何も道筋聞いたなら   この残念は無理で有るまい
verses.english: If you hear all of the way from Me, Tsukihi, you will understand that this regret is not unreasonable.

verses.pt: Se Tsukihi dissipar este sentimento único, todo o posterior será repleto de alegria.
verses.en_6th_ed: After Tsukihi has cleared away this one matter, there will only be joyousness.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono ichijo o harashitara   ato no tokoro wa yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: 月日よりこの一ぢよをはらしたら
verses.jp2: あとのところはよふきづくめや
verses.kanji: 月日よりこの一条を晴らしたら   後の所は陽気ずくめや
verses.english: When I, Tsukihi, have cleared away this one matter, thereafter everything will become full of joy.

verses.pt: O que se diz repleto de alegria dia a dia, não há quem saiba o que significa.
verses.en_6th_ed: This joyousness day after day: perhaps no one knows what it is.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni yokizukume to yu no wa na   ika naru koto ya tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: にち／＼によふきづくめとゆうのわな
verses.jp2: いかなる事やたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 日々に陽気ずくめと言うのはな   如何なる事や誰も知ろまい
verses.english: Day by day I teach you a life full of joy. But perhaps no one can understand what it truly means.

verses.pt: A alegria em todas as coisas deve-se ao Serviço. Ensino todas as coisas extraordinárias.
verses.en_6th_ed: Joy in everything is all by the Service. I shall teach you every kind of marvel.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo yoki to yu wa mina Tsutome   mezurashi koto o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: なにもかもよふきとゆうハみなつとめ
verses.jp2: めづらし事をみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: 何もかも陽気と言うは皆勤め   珍し事を皆教えるで
verses.english: Through this Service any and everything shall become joyous. I will teach you every remarkable thing.

verses.pt: Neste preparo para ensinar gradualmente o Serviço, purifico por completo o íntimo do coração.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, in preparing to teach you the Service, I shall sweep clean everyone's innermost heart.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsutome oshieru kono moyo   mune no uchi yori mina soji suru
verses.jp1: たん／＼とつとめをしへるこのもよふ
verses.jp2: むねのうちよりみなそふぢする
verses.kanji: 段々と勤め教えるこの模様   胸の内より皆掃除する
verses.english: In preparation for teaching the Services one by one, I will sweep dust from the innermost hearts of all of you.

verses.pt: Depois, o espírito se animará dia a dia, e instruirei o mover das mãos de todos os Serviços.
verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, your mind will become spirited day by day, and I shall teach you the hand movements for every Service.
verses.ro: ato naru wa nichinichi kokoro isamu de na   yorozu no Tsutome tee o tsukeru de
verses.jp1: あとなるハにち／＼心いさむでな
verses.jp2: よろづのつとめてへをつけるで
verses.kanji: 後なるは日々心勇むでな   万の勤め手を付けるで
verses.english: After that your minds shall become cheered up day by day. Then I will teach you the hand-gestures of every kind of Service.

verses.pt: O que pensam sobre estes Serviços? É a dedicação única à salvação do parto e da varíola.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this Service is? It is from My single intent to save you in childbirth and from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome doyu koto ni omou kana   obiya hoso no tasuke ichijo
verses.jp1: このつとめどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: をびやほふそのたすけ一ぢよふ
verses.kanji: この勤めどういう事に思うかな   帯屋疱瘡の救け一条
verses.english: What do you think is the object of these Services? It is single-hearted salvation for safe childbirth and against smallpox.

verses.pt: O que pensam ser esta salvação? Ensino o Serviço que previne da varíola.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this salvation is about? I shall teach the Service to free you from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke ika naru koto to omou kana   hoso sen yono Tsutome oshieru
verses.jp1: このたすけいかなる事とをもうかな
verses.jp2: ほふそせんよのつとめをしへる
verses.kanji: この救け如何なる事と思うかな   疱瘡せぬ様の勤め教える
verses.english: What do you think this salvation is? I teach you the Service against smallpox.

verses.pt: Este é o Serviço que ensina logo o caminho e que purificará o espírito de todos do mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: By this Service which teaches the path quickly, all minds in the world will be purified.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku oshieru kono Tsutome   sekai ichiretsu kokoro sumasuru
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくをしへるこのつとめ
verses.jp2: せかい一れつ心すまする
verses.kanji: この道を早く教えるこの勤め   世界一列心澄まする
verses.english: Through this Service which teaches the way swiftly, I will equally purify all minds of the world.

verses.pt: Como estão ouvindo esta explanação? É apenas o preparo para salvar o mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: How are you hearing this talk? It is solely about the preparations for the salvation of the world.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni kiite iru   sekai tasukeru moyo bakari o
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事にきいている
verses.jp2: せかいたすけるもよふばかりを
verses.kanji: この話どういう事に聞いている   世界救ける模様ばかりを
verses.english: What do you think on hearing this talk? I am single-heartedly preparing to save all people of the world.

verses.pt: Encarrego-me de todas e quaisquer salvações porque existe o Parens verdadeiro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Of whatever salvation, you are assured, because your true Parent lives.
verses.ro: dono yona tasuke suru no mo shinjitsu no   Oya ga iru kara mina hikiukeru
verses.jp1: どのようなたすけするのもしんちつの
verses.jp2: をやがいるからみなひきうける
verses.kanji: どの様な救けするのも真実の   親が居るから皆引き受ける
verses.english: Since your true Parent is living here, you are assured of whatever kind of salvation.

verses.pt: Se acreditam realmente neste fato, tudo será conforme o espírito de sinceridade verdadeira.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you believe this to be true, everything will be in accord with the mind of true sincerity.
verses.ro: kono koto o kore o makoto ni omou nara   makoto shinjitsu kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp1: この事をこれをまことにをもうなら
verses.jp2: まことしんぢつ心したいや
verses.kanji: この事をこれを真に思うなら   誠真実心次第や
verses.english: If you believe this matter to be true, I will work My omnipotence according as your minds become truly sincere.

verses.pt: Se ao menos ficar realmente puro o espírito, não haverá erro em qualquer coisa que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only your mind becomes truly pure, nothing at all will ever be in error.
verses.ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu sunda koto naraba   donna koto demo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: 心さいしんぢつすんだ事ならば
verses.jp2: どんな事でもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 心さい真実澄んだ事ならば   どんな事でも違う事無し
verses.english: If your minds become truly pure, there shall be nothing wrong.

verses.pt: Embora Tsukihi tenha pensado tanto até agora, não há compreensão no espírito dos próximos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, no matter how great was Tsukihi's concern, no understanding was in the minds of you close to Me.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi ika hodo omotemo   soba no kokoro ni wakari nai node
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ月日いかほどをもふても
verses.jp2: そばの心にわかりないので
verses.kanji: 今迄は月日如何ほど思うても   側の心に分かり無いので
verses.english: Until now, however earnestly I, Tsukihi, have thought of you, you close to Me have not been able to understand it in your minds.

verses.pt: Doravante, seja qual for o Serviço que ensino, não será pela cogitação humana.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, whatever Service I may teach, it is not from a human mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona Tsutome oshieru mo   ningen naru no kokoro dewa nai
verses.jp1: これからハどのよなつとめをしへるも
verses.jp2: にんけんなるの心でわない
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な勤め教えるも   人間なるの心では無い
verses.english: Henceforth, whatever kind of Service I may teach, it is not from a human mind.

verses.pt: Tsukihi ensinará quaisquer coisas, tudo que não existia desde o início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will teach on every kind of thing, things never known since I began this world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori dono yona koto mo oshieru de   kono yo hajimete nai koto bakari
verses.jp1: 月日よりどのよな事もをしゑるで
verses.jp2: このよはぢめてない事はかり
verses.kanji: 月日よりどの様な事も教えるで   この世初めて無い事ばかり
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, will teach any and everything which has never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Tsukihi jamais diz coisas como aquelas que são pensadas pelo espírito humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi never speaks about thoughts conceived in the minds of human beings.
verses.ro: ningen no kokoro de omou yona koto   Tsukihi wa nanimo yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: にんけんの心てをもうよふな事
verses.jp2: 月日わなにもゆうてないそや
verses.kanji: 人間の心で思う様な事   月日は何も言うて無いぞや
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, am not talking about things which lie in the thoughts of human minds.

verses.pt: Tsukihi deseja ensinar tudo igualmente a todos e fazê-los repletos de alegria.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will teach about every matter to all humankind equally, and the world will be filled with joy.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona koto mo ichiretsu ni   mina ni oshiete yokizukume ni
verses.jp1: 月日にハとのよな事も一れつに
verses.jp2: みなにをしへてよふきづくめに
verses.kanji: 月日にはどの様な事も一列に   皆に教えて陽気ずくめに
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, will teach any and everything to all of you, and thus make this world full of joy.

verses.pt: Se todos do mundo se purificarem e viverem igualmente repletos de alegria,
verses.en_6th_ed: If only human beings throughout the world have purified their minds and lead lives joyously...
verses.ro: sekaiju mina ichiretsu wa sumikirite   yokizukume ni kurasu koto nara
verses.jp1: せかいぢうみな一れつハすみきりて
verses.jp2: よふきづくめにくらす事なら
verses.kanji: 世界中皆一列は澄み切りて   陽気ずくめに暮らす事なら
verses.english: When all human beings have accomplished the purification of their minds and come to lead a life full of joy,

verses.pt: Se o espírito de Tsukihi animar-se certamente, todos os homens se animarão também igualmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: When the mind of Tsukihi is truly spirited, so will be all human beings.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo tashika kokoro ga isamu nara   ningen naru mo mina onaji koto
verses.jp1: 月日にもたしか心がいさむなら
verses.jp2: にんけんなるもみなをなし事
verses.kanji: 月日にも確か心が勇むなら   人間なるも皆同じ事
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, too, will become cheered up. And when I become cheered up, so will all human beings.

verses.pt: Se o espírito de todos do mundo se animar, Tsukihi e os seres humanos serão iguais.
verses.en_6th_ed: When the minds of all the world are spirited, Tsukihi and human beings will be one in mind.
verses.ro: kono yo no sekai no kokoro isamu nara   Tsukihi ningen onaji koto ya de
verses.jp1: このよふのせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp2: 月日にんけんをなじ事やで
verses.kanji: この世の世界の心勇むなら   月日人間同じ事やで
verses.english: When the minds of all of the world become cheered up, Tsukihi and human beings will become altogether cheered up in one accord.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, Tsukihi deseja dissipar os pesares que estão acumulados aos montes.
verses.en_6th_ed: The mountainous regret of Tsukihi piled up day by day: to clear it away is My desire.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsukihi zannen yamayama to   tsumorite aru o harashitai kara
verses.jp1: にち／＼に月日さんねん山／＼と
verses.jp2: つもりてあるをはらしたいから
verses.kanji: 日々に月日残念山々と   積りて有るを晴らしたいから
verses.english: I desire to clear away a mountainous regret of Tsukihi which has been piled up day by day.

verses.pt: Esta explanação feita gradualmente é sobre a intenção de Tsukihi de realizar todas as salvações.
verses.en_6th_ed: This talk, given step by step, is about the intention of Tsukihi: to bring forth universal salvation.
verses.ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi omowaku dandan to   nanika yorozu no tasuke naru no wa
verses.jp1: このはなし月日をもわくだん／＼と
verses.jp2: なにかよろづのたすけなるのわ
verses.kanji: この話月日思惑段々と   何か万の救けなるのは
verses.english: This talk is that I, Tsukihi, expect to realize all salvation step by step.

verses.pt: Ao realizar o Serviço, segundo o espírito sincero, haverá toda salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: If the mind is sincere, the performance of any kind of Service will all bring salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro shidai no dono yona   Tsutome suru no mo mina tasuke ya de
verses.jp1: しんちつの心したいにとのよふな
verses.jp2: つとめするのもみなたすけやで
verses.kanji: 真実の心次第にどの様な   勤めするのも皆救けやで
verses.english: If you perform any kind of Service with truly sincere mind, through that performance every salvation will be realized.

verses.pt: Para mim, Tsukihi, todos do mundo são meus filhos, e o meu desejo é somente salvá-los.
verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, all of you throughout the world are My children. My only desire is to save you.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju wa mina waga ko   tasuketai to no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp1: 月日にハせかいぢうゝハみなわが子
verses.jp2: たすけたいとの心ばかりで
verses.kanji: 月日には世界中は皆我が子   救けたいとの心ばかりで
verses.english: For Me, Tsukihi, people of the whole world are all My children; therefore I am burning with desire to save all of them.

verses.pt: Para o meu pesar, foi impedido e ainda, após isso, foi até mesmo proibido.
verses.en_6th_ed: Despite this, to My regret, they attempted to stop Me and, after that, even to forbid.
verses.ro: sono tokoro sashitome rarete zannen na   mada sono nochi wa toriharai made
verses.jp1: そのところさしとめられてさんねんな
verses.jp2: まだそのゝちハとりはらいまで
verses.kanji: その所差し止められて残念な   未だその後は取り払い迄
verses.english: However, to My deep regret, they prohibited the performance and after that even ordered demolition.

verses.pt: Por não poder realizar o Serviço da Salvação, é grande o pesar no espírito de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because of this, the Salvation Service cannot be performed. Oh, the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tasuke-zutome ga deken kara   Tsukihi no kokoro nanto zannen
verses.jp1: それゆへにたすけづとめがでけんから
verses.jp2: 月日の心なんとさんねん
verses.kanji: それ故に救け勤めが出来んから   月日の心何と残念
verses.english: On that account the Tasuke-Zutome, the Salvation Service, cannot be performed. Accordingly, how deeply regretful is the mind of Tsukihi!

verses.pt: Quanto ao Serviço, as mãos são ensinadas gradualmente por Tsukihi e não pela cogitação humana.
verses.en_6th_ed: As for the Service, it is Tsukihi who teaches you the hand movements step by step. It is not from a human mind.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo Tsukihi dandan te o oshie   ningen naru no kokoro dewa nai
verses.jp1: つとめでも月日たん／＼てをふしゑ
verses.jp2: にんけんなるの心でわない
verses.kanji: 勤めでも月日段々手を教え   人間なるの心では無い
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, have taught the hand-gestures of the Service step by step. It is not from a human mind.

verses.pt: Qualquer coisa que realize, não pensem em absoluto que haja espírito humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I may do, never think that it is from the human mind.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo ningen no   kokoro aru towa sarani omouna
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をするのもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも人間の   心有るとは更に思うな
verses.english: Whatever kinds of things I may work, never think that there is a human thought in My mind!

verses.pt: Neste lugar, quaisquer explanações são de Tsukihi, e também quaisquer preparos são todos de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: At this place, every talk is by Tsukihi and every preparation is by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro ikana hanashi mo Tsukihi nari   donna moyo mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp1: このところいかなはなしも月日なり
verses.jp2: どんなもよふもみな月日やで
verses.kanji: この所如何な話も月日やで   どんな模様も皆月日やで
verses.english: Whatever talks I may give at this place, they are all the remarks of Tsukihi, and whatever arrangements may be prepared, they are also by Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Qualquer incômodo que se manifeste, não pensem jamais que haja espírito humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever disorder may come to you, never think that it is from the human mind.
verses.ro: ika naru no sawari tsuitemo ningen no   kokoro wa sarani aru to omouna
verses.jp1: いかなるのさハりついてもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心わさらにあるとをもうな
verses.kanji: 如何なるの障り付いても人間の   心は更に有ると思うな
verses.english: Whatever kind of disorder you may experience, never think that it is due to a plan by a human mind!

verses.pt: Como Tsukihi iniciou este mundo, seja o que for, não existe nada que desconheça.
verses.en_6th_ed: Since it is Tsukihi who began this world, there is nothing unknown to Me.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru Tsukihi nara   donna koto demo shiranu koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめだしたる月日なら
verses.jp2: どんな事でもしらぬ事なし
verses.kanji: この世を初め出したる月日なら   どんな事でも知らぬ事無し
verses.english: As I am Tsukihi who created this world, there is nothing unknown to Me, no matter what it may be.

verses.pt: O íntimo do coração de todas as pessoas do mundo reflete-se inteiramente em Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: The innermost heart of everyone in the world is all reflected to Tsukihi.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu naru no mune no uchi   Tsukihi no ho e mina utsuru nari
verses.jp1: せかいぢう一れつなるのむねのうち
verses.jp2: つきひのほふゑみなうつるなり
verses.kanji: 世界中一列なるの胸の内   月日の方へ皆映るなり
verses.english: The innermost heart of everyone of the whole world is all reflected to Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Sem saber disso, o espírito de todos os seres humanos está tomado apenas pelas cogitações egoísticas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, in the human mind, everyone has only self-centered thoughts.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ningen no kokoro tote   waga mi shiyan o bakari omote
verses.jp1: それしらすみなにんけんの心とて
verses.jp2: わがみしやんをばかりをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆人間の心とて   我が身思案をばかり思うて
verses.english: Unaware of this, all are thinking only of their own selves, because they Mall have only selfish human thoughts.

verses.pt: De agora em diante, disponho-me a ensinar gradualmente tudo sobre o caminho da verdade.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall teach you everything about the true path step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa mina dandan to shinjitsu no   michi o oshieru koto de aru kara
verses.jp1: このさきハみなだん／＼としんぢつの
verses.jp2: みちをふしゑる事であるから
verses.kanji: この先は皆段々と真実の   道を教える事で有るから
verses.english: Henceforth I will teach you step by step everything about the way of truth.

verses.pt: O início deste mundo é Tsukihi, que começa a ensinar os detalhes de todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: The beginning of this world was by Tsukihi. I began to teach everything fully in detail.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi wa Tsukihi nari   nanika isai o mina oshiekake
verses.jp1: このよふのはじまりだしハ月日なり
verses.jp2: なにかいさいをみなをしゑかけ
verses.kanji: この世の初まり出しは月日なり   何か委細を皆教え掛け
verses.english: It is Tsukihi who created this world. Indeed, Tsukihi has begun to teach any and everything in detail.

verses.pt: Até então, não houve quem os tenha conhecido. Tudo se deve apenas à intenção de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until then, there was no one who knew. There were only the thoughts of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: soremade wa tare ka shiritaru mono wa nashi   nanika Tsukihi no shiyan bakari de
verses.jp1: それまでハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp2: なにか月日のしやんばかりで
verses.kanji: それ迄は誰か知りたる者は無し   何か月日の思案ばかりで
verses.english: Until that time no one had known the truth. Everything was begun by the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Embora tenha dito até hoje que todas as coisas se devem a Tsukihi, ainda não entendem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until today, I have been telling you that everything is by Tsukihi, but still you do not understand.
verses.ro: kyomade mo nani yono koto mo Tsukihi ya to   yute aredomo mada wakaran de
verses.jp1: けふまでもなによの事も月日やと
verses.jp2: ゆうてあれどもまだわからんで
verses.kanji: 今日迄も何よの事も月日やと   言うて有れども未だ分からんで
verses.english: Up to this day I have repeatedly taught you that everything depends upon Tsukihi. But you do not understand it yet.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Embora haja feito explanações explicando a verdade do início deste mundo,
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! Though I have already told you the truth of My beginning of this world,
verses.ro: shikato kike kono yo hajimeta shinjitsu to   yute hanashi wa toite aredomo
verses.jp1: しかときけこのよはじめたしんちつと
verses.jp2: ゆうてはなしハといてあれども
verses.kanji: 確と聞けこの世初めた真実と   言うて話は説いて有れども
verses.english: Listen attentively! I have so often told you the truth of the creation of this world.

verses.pt: No mundo, não há quem a tenha conhecido. O que quer que diga, dificilmente é entendido.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is no one in the world who knows. Whatever I say is difficult for you to understand.
verses.ro: sekai niwa tare ka shiritaru mono wa nashi   nani o yutemo wakari gatanai
verses.jp1: せかいにハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp2: なにをいうてもハかりがたない
verses.kanji: 世界には誰か知りたる者は無し   何を言うても分かり難ない
verses.english: In this world there is no one who understands this truth.Indeed, it should be difficult for you to understand what I say.

verses.pt: Isso é natural, pois tenho insistido gradualmente só sobre fatos inexistentes desde o início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: So should it be, for it is solely about things unknown since this world began, told repeatedly step by step.
verses.ro: sono hazu ya kono yo hajimete nai koto o   dandan kudoki bakari naru kara
verses.jp1: そのはづやこのよはじめてない事を
verses.jp2: たん／＼くどきばかりなるから
verses.kanji: その筈やこの世初めて無い事を   段々口説きばかりなるから
verses.english: It is natural, because I am teaching you step by step what has never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Não poderei deixar de informar a verdade do início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: I must have you know the truth about the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi no shinjitsu o   shirashite okan koto ni oite wa
verses.jp1: このよふのはじまりだしのしんぢつを
verses.jp2: しらしてをかん事にをいてわ
verses.kanji: この世の初まり出しの真実を   知らして置かん事に於いては
verses.english: Unless I should let you know the truth of the creation of this world,

verses.pt: Até agora, embora explicasse freqüentemente a dedicação única à salvação, não conhecem a verdade real.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, I have often taught about My single intent to save you, but you have not known the real truth.
verses.ro: imamade mo tasuke ichijo to mama tokedo   honshinjitsu o shiranu koto kara
verses.jp1: いまゝてもたすけ一ぢよとまゝとけど
verses.jp2: ほんしんぢつをしらぬ事から
verses.kanji: 今迄も救け一条と間々説けど   本真実を知らぬ事から
verses.english: Though until now I have often taught My desire for the single-hearted salvation, you did not understand because you have remained ignorant of the real truth about the original creation.

verses.pt: Qualquer coisa que seja, é dito por Tsukihi. Se escutarem isto considerando-o verdade,
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I say, it is the word of Tsukihi. If only you would listen to My words as the truth...
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Tsukihi yu koto ya   kore shinjitsu to omote kiku nara
verses.jp1: どのよふな事でも月日ゆう事や
verses.jp2: これしんぢつとをもてきくなら
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも月日言う事や   これ真実と思うて聞くなら
verses.english: Whatever I may say, it is the word of Tsukihi. If only you would listen to it, taking it to be true,

verses.pt: Explicarei gradualmente o que quer que seja. Compreendam considerando-o verdadeiro.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall tell you everything step by step. Listen to My words and understand them to be true.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo dandan yute kikasu   kore o makoto to omote kikiwake
verses.jp1: どのよふな事もたん／＼ゆてきかす
verses.jp2: これをまことゝをもてきゝわけ
verses.kanji: どの様な事も段々言うて聞かす   これを真と思うて聞き分け
verses.english: Step by step I will tell you whatever kinds of things. Listen and understand it well, taking My word to be true!

verses.pt: A origem real deste mundo não existe em outro lugar além deste.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is nowhere but this place that can be called the true origin of the world.
verses.ro: kono yo no honmoto naru to yu no wa na   kono tokoro yori hoka ni arumai
verses.jp1: このよふのほん元なるとゆうのハな
verses.jp2: このところよりほかにあるまい
verses.kanji: この世の本元なると言うのはな   この所より他に有るまい
verses.english: Truly you shall never be able to find the place of origin of this world except here.

verses.pt: O que pensam ser esta explanação? É meu desejo fazer toda e qualquer explanação.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think of this talk? It is from My desire to teach you all about everything.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   doyu hanashi mo mina shitai kara
verses.jp1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: どうゆはなしもみなしたいから
verses.kanji: この話どういう事に思うかな   どういう話も皆したいから
verses.english: What do you think of this talk? It is from My intention that I desire to tell you any and everything.

verses.pt: É preciso que todas as pessoas fiquem igualmente cientes da verdade do início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: All of you must be convinced of the truth about the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru shinjitsu o   mina ichiretsu wa shochi seneba
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめだしたるしんぢつを
verses.jp2: みな一れつハしよちせゑねば
verses.kanji: この世を初め出したる真実を   皆一列は承知せねば
verses.english: Unless you understand the truth of My creation of this world,

verses.pt: Qualquer salvação que venha a fazer, não digo nada que seja comum ao homem.
verses.en_6th_ed: This is because in whatever salvation I may work, I do not teach you of ordinary things.
verses.ro: dono yona tasuke suru nimo hitonami no   yo naru koto wa yu de nai kara
verses.jp1: どのよふなたすけするにも人なみの
verses.jp2: よふなる事ハゆうでないから
verses.kanji: どの様な救けするにも人並の   様なる事は言うで無いから
verses.english: Whatever kind of salvation I may work, I will never teach you in a human way.

verses.pt: Não direi absolutamente sobre as coisas vistas ou existentes até agora.
verses.en_6th_ed: I do not speak of things already seen or of things that already exist.
verses.ro: imamade ni mietaru koto ya aru koto wa   sonna koto owa yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いまゝてにみへたる事やある事わ
verses.jp2: そんな事をハゆうでないそや
verses.kanji: 今迄に見えたる事や有る事は   そんな事をは言うで無いぞや
verses.english: I will not talk about things which have already appeared or existed before.

verses.pt: Explicando somente fatos desconhecidos até agora, realizarei a salvação sincera.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall teach you only of things that have not existed before and bring true salvation.
verses.ro: koremade ni nai koto bakari yute kikashi   shinjitsu yori no tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp1: これまてにない事ばかりゆてきかし
verses.jp2: しんぢつよりのたすけするそや
verses.kanji: これ迄に無い事ばかり言うて聞かし   真実よりの救けするぞや
verses.english: I will talk solely of such things as have never existed before and will work a true salvation.

verses.pt: O que pensam sobre esta salvação? É o preparo do amuleto que previne da varíola.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this salvation is about? I am preparing the amulet to protect you from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   hoso sen yono Mamori koshirae
verses.jp1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: ほふそせんよのまむりこしらゑ
verses.kanji: この救けどういう事に思うかな   疱瘡せん様の守り拵え
verses.english: What do you think this salvation is ? I will prepare to issue the Mamori, the Amulet, against smallpox.

verses.pt: Realizo ainda a salvação onipotente no momento do parto, adiantando ou atrasando.
verses.en_6th_ed: Another salvation: My free and unlimited workings for the time of childbirth, either to delay or to quicken.
verses.ro: mata tasuke obiya juyo itsu nari to   nobashi nari tomo hayame nari tomo
verses.jp1: またたすけをひやぢうよふいつなりと
verses.jp2: のばしなりともはやめなりとも
verses.kanji: また救け帯屋自由何時なりと   延ばしなりとも早めなりとも
verses.english: Moreover I will work My omnipotence to save you in your childbirth, either postponing or advancing the time of delivery.

verses.pt: Embora diga sobre a minha plena onipotência, jamais julguem ser algo fácil.
verses.en_6th_ed: About these free and unlimited workings of which I speak: do not think of them as being trivial.
verses.ro: kora hodono juyojizai o yu no mo na   yoi naru koto to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: こらほとのぢうよじさいをゆうのもな
verses.jp2: よいなる事とさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: こら程の自由自在を言うのもな   容易なる事と更に思うな
verses.english: Never take it to be a trivial matter that I tell you so much of My omnipotence.

verses.pt: Embora Tsukihi tenha dedicado ao máximo, todos ainda estão no nível comum ao mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi is doing the utmost, everyone in the world continues to be ordinary.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa taite kokoro wa tsukuse domo   sekaiju wa mada sekainami
verses.jp1: 月日にハたいて心ハつくせとも
verses.jp2: せかいぢううハまだせかいなみ
verses.kanji: 月日には大抵心は尽くせども   世界中は未だ世界並
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, am doing the utmost. Yet people of the whole world remain in wordly thoughts.

verses.pt: É preciso deixar explicado sobre a intenção real do início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: I must have you know My true intent in beginning this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru honshin o   yute kikasan koto ni oite wa
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめたしたるほんしんを
verses.jp2: ゆうてきかさん事にをいてわ
verses.kanji: この世を初め出したる本心を   言うて聞かさん事に於いては
verses.english: I must tell you of My true heart why I have created this world.

verses.pt: Este é o Local do Serviço, onde criei os seres humanos.
verses.en_6th_ed: This place, the place for the Service, is the very place where I began human beings.
verses.ro: kono tokoro Tsutome basho wa ningen o   hajime dashitaru tokoro naru zo ya
verses.jp1: このところつとめばしよハにんけんを
verses.jp2: はじめだしたるところなるそや
verses.kanji: この所勤め場所は人間を   初め出したる所なるぞや
verses.english: This place for the Service is the spot where the human beings were first created.

verses.pt: Este Parens, que tem criado os seres humanos, permanece vivo. Isto é a verdade.
verses.en_6th_ed: This Parent, who began human beings, lives. This is the truth.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime dashitaru kono Oya wa   zonmee de iru kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp1: にんけんをはじめだしたるこのをやハ
verses.jp2: そんめゑでいるこれがまことや
verses.kanji: 人間を初め出したるこの親は   存命で居るこれが真や
verses.english: This Parent, who gave birth to human beings, lives here.This is the truth which no one can question.

verses.pt: Seja de onde for, não há absolutamente quem considere verdadeira esta explanação.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is perhaps no one anywhere who believes this talk to be the truth.
verses.ro: kono hanashi kore o makoto ni omou mono   doko no mono demo sarani arumai
verses.jp1: このはなしこれをまことにをもうもの
verses.jp2: どこのものでもさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: この話これを真に思う者   何処の者でも更に有るまい
verses.english: There may not be anyone of anywhere who easily believes this talk to be true.

verses.pt: Digo somente coisas inexistentes como estas, mas são todas reais e verdadeiras.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though I speak in this way about things which do not exist, it is all the real truth.
verses.ro: kono yona nai koto bakari yu no wa na   kore ga shinjitsu mina makoto ya de
verses.jp1: このよふなない事ばかりゆうのハな
verses.jp2: これがしんぢつみなまことやで
verses.kanji: この様な無い事ばかり言うのもな   これが真実皆真やで
verses.english: I tell you everything which does not yet exist. But this is indeed the real truth.

verses.pt: Tenho iniciado o mundo até então inexistente, começando a ensinar coisas desconhecidas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, when I began this world which did not exist, I began by teaching things unknown.
verses.ro: imamade mo nai sekai oba hajimeta wa   shiranu koto oba oshie hajimete
verses.jp1: いまゝでもないせかいをばはじめたハ
verses.jp2: しらぬ事をばをしゑはじめて
verses.kanji: 今迄も無い世界をば初めたは   知らぬ事をば教え初めて
verses.english: At the creation I began this world by teaching things which were all unknown.

verses.pt: Desta vez, começo novamente a ensinar, dizendo só coisas ainda inexistentes e desconhecidas.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time also, I begin to teach again, speaking only of things which do not exist and things unknown.
verses.ro: konotabi mo mata nai koto ya shiranu koto   bakari yuute mata oshiekake
verses.jp1: このたびもまたない事や知らぬ事
verses.jp2: ばかりゆううてまたをしへかけ
verses.kanji: この度もまた無い事や知らぬ事   ばかり言うてまた教え掛け
verses.english: This time again I will begin to teach everything which does not exist and which no one has ever known.

verses.pt: Seja quem for, são somente coisas desconhecidas. A intenção de Tsukihi consiste em ensinar isto.
verses.en_6th_ed: This is the intention of Tsukihi: to teach everything which no one has ever known.
verses.ro: dono yona mono demo shiranu koto bakari   kore o oshieru Tsukihi omowaku
verses.jp1: どのよふなものでもしらぬ事ばかり
verses.jp2: これをふしへる月日をもわく
verses.kanji: どの様な者でも知らぬ事ばかり   これを教える月日思惑
verses.english: The intention of Tsukihi is to teach everything no one has ever known.

verses.pt: Tsukihi salvará o mundo, ensinando gradualmente tudo sobre todas as coisas desconhecidas.
verses.en_6th_ed: By teaching everything solely about the unknown step by step, Tsukihi will save the world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan shiranu koto bakari   nanimo oshiete sekai tasukeru
verses.jp1: 月日にハたん／＼しらぬ事ばかり
verses.jp2: なにもをしへてせかいたすける
verses.kanji: 月日には段々知らぬ事ばかり   何も教えて世界救ける
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, will save the whole world by teaching step by step any and everything which no one has ever known.

verses.pt: As pessoas do mundo nada sabem acerca das preocupações tão intensas de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: So great is Tsukihi's concern, but those in the world are aware of nothing.
verses.ro: kora hodoni omou Tsukihi no shinpai o   sekai no mono wa nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp1: こらほどにをもう月日のしんばいを
verses.jp2: せかいのものハなにもしらずに
verses.kanji: こら程に思う月日の心配を   世界の者は何も知らずに
verses.english: In spite of the great anxiety of Tsukihi, those in the world are aware of nothing.

verses.pt: Se Tsukihi aceitar ao menos o espírito sincero, assegurará toda e qualquer salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only your mind is truly accepted by Tsukihi, you will be assured of any salvation whatever.
verses.ro: kokoro sai Tsukini shinjitsu uketoreba   donna tasuke mo mina ukeyau de
verses.jp1: 心さい月日しんぢつうけとれば
verses.jp2: どんなたすけもみなうけやうで
verses.kanji: 心さい月日真実受け取れば   どんな救けも皆請け合うで
verses.english: I assure you of any and every salvation, if only I, Tsukihi, accept the true sincerity of your mind.

verses.pt: Tsukihi diz que assegurará qualquer salvação porque existe o Parens verdadeiro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi assures you any and every salvation because your true Parent lives.
verses.ro: dono yona tasuke to yu mo shinjitsu no   Oya ga iru kara Tsukihi yu no ya
verses.jp1: とのよふなたすけとゆうもしんちつの
verses.jp2: をやがいるから月日ゆうのや
verses.kanji: どの様な救けと言うも真実の   親が居るから月日言うのや
verses.english: That I, Tsukihi, assure you any and every salvation is because the true Parent is living here.

verses.pt: Tsukihi mostrará sua onipotência porque existem a predestinação original e a Jiba da origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because the Jiba of Origin and the causality of origin exist, Tsukihi works freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: kono Tsukihi moto naru Jiba ya moto naru no   innen aru de juyojizai o
verses.jp1: この月日もとなるぢばや元なるの
verses.jp2: いんねんあるでちうよぢざいを
verses.kanji: この月日元なる地場や元なるの   因縁有るで自由自在を
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, work My omnipotence by virtue of the Preordination of the original Jiba and other original Preodinations.

verses.pt: Se indagarem por que esta explanação é tão insistente, é por ser a base que assegura a dedicação única à salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: You may wonder why I repeat this teaching so persistently. It is the basis of My assurance of single-hearted salvation.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nande kono yoni kudoi nara   tasuke ichijo ukeyau no moto
verses.jp1: このはなしなんでこのよにくどいなら
verses.jp2: たすけ一ぢよううけやうのもと
verses.kanji: この話何でこの様にくどいなら   救け一条請け合うの元
verses.english: You may wonder why I repeat this talk so persistently. This is indeed the basis for assuring My single-hearted salvation.

verses.pt: Onde quer que procurem esta origem, não há em absoluto quem a conheça.
verses.en_6th_ed: Wherever you may seek to find the origin, there will be no one who knows.
verses.ro: kono moto wa doko o tazunete mitaru tomo   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
verses.jp1: このもとハとこをたづねてみたるとも
verses.jp2: しりたるものハさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: この元は何処を尋ねて見たるとも   知りたる者は更に有るまい
verses.english: Wherever you may search, there will be no one who knows this origin.

verses.pt: Isso é natural, pois agora é a primeira vez que Tsukihi diz introduzindo-se no corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: So should it be, for this is the first time that Tsukihi has entered a body and speaks.
verses.ro: sono hazu ya Tsukihi tainai irikonde   hanashi suru no wa ima hajime ya de
verses.jp1: そのはづや月日たいない入りこんで
verses.jp2: はなしするのハいまはじめやで
verses.kanji: その筈や月日体内入り込んで   話するのは今初めやで
verses.english: It is natural, because this is the first time that I, Tsukihi, enter into a human body and speak.

verses.pt: Para Tsukihi, que vê todas as coisas do mundo, não existe nada que desconheça.
verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, who can see everything in this world, nothing is unknown.
verses.ro: kono sekai ichiretsu mieru Tsukihi nara   doko no koto demo shiranu koto nashi
verses.jp1: このせかい一れつみゑる月日なら
verses.jp2: とこの事でもしらぬ事なし
verses.kanji: この世界一列見える月日なら   何処の事でも知らぬ事無し
verses.english: As I, Tsukihi, am able to look all over the world, there is nothing which I do not know.

verses.pt: Observando todas as pessoas individualmente, Tsukihi fará a distinção entre o bem e o mal.
verses.en_6th_ed: Watching each and everyone of you, Tsukihi will discern the good and evil.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori mina sorezore to misadamete   zen to aku to o miwake suru zo ya
verses.jp1: 月日よりみなそれ／＼とみさだめて
verses.jp2: 善とあくとをみハけするぞや
verses.kanji: 月日より皆それぞれと見定めて   善と悪とを見分けするぞや
verses.english: Watching all individuals one and all, I, Tsukihi, distinguish good from evil.

verses.pt: O fato de Tsukihi ser assim tão insistente, é por compadecer de todos pelo mal que é visto.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you wonder why Tsukihi is so persistent, it is because I pity you when evil appears.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nande kono yoni kudoi nara   ashiki mieru ga kinodoku na kara
verses.jp1: 月日よりなんでこのよにくどいなら
verses.jp2: あしきみへるがきのどくなから
verses.kanji: 月日より何でこの様にくどいなら   悪しき見えるが気の毒なから
verses.english: The reason I, Tsukihi, teach you so persistently is that I feel pity for you if evil appears.

verses.pt: Se as dívidas se acumularem gradualmente, após haverá um caminho semelhante ao dos bois e cavalos.
verses.en_6th_ed: If your debts pile up step by step, a path of oxen and horses will finally appear.
verses.ro: dandan to on ga kasanari sono ue wa   gyuba to mieru michi ga aru kara
verses.jp1: たん／＼とをんかかさなりそのゆへハ
verses.jp2: きゆばいみへるみちがあるから
verses.kanji: 段々と恩が重なりその故は   牛馬と見える道が有るから
verses.english: If you continue to incur so much obligation, there shall appear a way of rebirth as oxen or horses in the future.

verses.pt: Se Tsukihi aceitar a sinceridade, salvará todos, seja quem for.
verses.en_6th_ed: But Tsukihi will save all of you, whoever you may be, if only your sincerity is accepted.
verses.ro: dono yona mono demo Tsukihi shinjitsu o   uketorita nara mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: とのよふなものでも月日しんぢつを
verses.jp2: うけとりたならみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: どの様な者でも月日真実を   受け取りたなら皆救けるで
verses.english: But I, Tsukihi, will save all of you, whoever you may be, if only I accept the true sincerity of your mind.

verses.pt: Embora até agora tenha feito qualquer espécie de explanações, nada tem sido visto.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, no matter what I had told you, you have not been able to see anything.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna hanashi o shitaru tomo   nanimo mietaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどんなはなしをしたるとも
verses.jp2: なにもみゑたる事ハなけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな話をしたるとも   何も見えたる事は無けれど
verses.english: Until now, whatever things I may have told you, nothing has yet appeared.

verses.pt: Embora até o presente tudo fosse visível, não conhecem a origem real.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, all things have already appeared, but you have not known their true origin.
verses.ro: koremade mo mina miekitaru koto naredo   honmoto naru o shiran koto kara
verses.jp1: これまてもみなみへきたる事なれど
verses.jp2: ほんもとなるをしらん事から
verses.kanji: これ迄も皆見え来たる事なれど   本元なるを知らん事から
verses.english: Until now in fact, things have appeared. But you could not understand them, because you were ignorant of the real origin.

verses.pt: Trovões, terremotos, vendavais e inundações, estes são também o pesar e a ira de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Thunder, earthquakes, great winds, and floods: these are from the regret and anger of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kaminari mo jishin okaze mizutsuki mo   kore wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku
verses.jp1: かみなりもぢしんをふかぜ水つきも
verses.jp2: これわ月日のざねんりいふく
verses.kanji: 雷も地震大風水浸きも   これは月日の残念立腹
verses.english: Thunder, earthquakes, typhoons and floods are nothing but the manifestations of the regret and anger of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Por ninguém conhecer este fato até agora, desta vez, Tsukihi informa previamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because no one has ever understood this matter, this time Tsukihi will tell you about them beforehand.
verses.ro: kono koto o imamade tare mo shiran kara   konotabi Tsukihi saki e shirasuru
verses.jp1: この事をいまゝでたれもしらんから
verses.jp2: このたび月日さきゑしらする
verses.kanji: この事を今迄誰も知らんから   この度月日先へ知らする
verses.english: Hitherto no one has understood this truth. Therefore this time I warn you beforehand.

verses.pt: Para mim, Tsukihi, todos são igualmente meus filhos, e embora tenha uma profunda afeição...
verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, each of you, one and all, is a child of Mine. I am filled with love for you.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa mina ichiretsu wa waga ko nari   kawai ippai omote iredomo
verses.jp1: 月日にハみな一れつハわが子なり
verses.jp2: かハいゝばいをもていれとも
verses.kanji: 月日には皆一列は我が子なり   可愛い一杯思うて居れども
verses.english: For Me, Tsukihi, one and all are My children. So I love you with overflowing affection.

verses.pt: Todas as pessoas têm cada qual no íntimo do coração muitas poeiras acumuladas.
verses.en_6th_ed: But the innermost heart of everyone of you is covered with piles of dust.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina meme no mune no uchi   hokori ippai tsumori aru kara
verses.jp1: 一れつハみなめへ／＼のむねのうち
verses.jp2: ほこりいゝばいつもりあるから
verses.kanji: 一列は皆銘々の胸の内   埃一杯積り有るから
verses.english: Yet in each innermost heart of all of you, dust is equally piled up so high.

verses.pt: Embora Tsukihi pense tanto, se não fizerem completamente a limpeza destas poeiras...
verses.en_6th_ed: Unless this dust is cleanly swept away, the deep concern of Tsukihi will be to naught.
verses.ro: kono hokori sukiyaka soji sen koto ni   Tsukihi ika hodo omotaru tote
verses.jp1: このほこりすきやかそふぢせん事に
verses.jp2: 月日いかほどをもふたるとて
verses.kanji: この埃清きやか掃除せん事に   月日如何程思うたるとて
verses.english: Unless this dust is cleanly swept away, it will be impossible to save you, however impatiently I, Tsukihi, so desire.

verses.pt: Tsukihi está preocupado com o caminho temeroso e perigoso, mas cada qual desconhece isso.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi is anxious about your dreadful and dangerous course. Yet none of you is aware.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kowaki abunaki michisuji o   anjite iredo meme shirazu ni
verses.jp1: 月日よりこわきあふなきみちすじを
verses.jp2: あんぢていれどめへ／＼しらすに
verses.kanji: 月日より怖き危なき道筋を   案じて居れど銘々知らずに
verses.english: Although I, Tsukihi, am anxious about the dreadful and dangerous path before you, no one of you knows anything about it.

verses.pt: Embora digam ser de quão altos lugares, para mim, Tsukihi, todos são meus filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: On however high a place you may be, everyone is a child of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona takai tokoro to yuta tote   Tsukihi no ta ni mina waga ko ya de
verses.jp1: とのよふなたかいところとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 月日のたあにみなわがこやで
verses.kanji: どの様な高い所と言うたとて   月日のたあに皆我が子やで
verses.english: However high your position may be, for Me, Tsukihi, you are all My children.

verses.pt: Sem saberem disso, proibiram e retiraram o que o Parens fez. Que pensam disto?
verses.en_6th_ed: Knowing nothing of it, you try to stop your Parent's work, even to take things away. What manner is this?
verses.ro: sore shirazu Oya no suru koto sashitomete   mata toriharote kore wa ikaga zo
verses.jp1: それしらずをやのする事さしとめて
verses.jp2: またとりはろてこれハいかゞぞ
verses.kanji: それ知らず親のする事差し止めて   また取り払ろうてこれは如何ぞ
verses.english: Knowing nothing about this truth, they have not only prohibited the working of the Parent but demolished the facilities for worship. How oppressive it is!

verses.pt: O que quer que tenha havido até agora, Tsukihi não havia se revelado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now Tsukihi has never come out into the open no matter what occurred,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa imamade donna koto ya tote   araware detaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: 月日にハいまゝでどんな事やとて
verses.jp2: あらわれでたる事わなけれど
verses.kanji: 月日には今迄どんな事やとて   現れ出たる事は無けれど
verses.english: Even though, I, Tsukihi, have never revealed Myself to the fore until now on whatever kinds of matters,

verses.pt: Desta vez, se não limpar plenamente o íntimo do coração, não é possível fazer os preparos posteriores.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, unless your innermost heart is made thoroughly clear, the preparations to follow cannot be made.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mune no uchi yori sukiyaka ni   harasan koto ni ato no moyo o
verses.jp1: このたびハむねのうちよりすきやかに
verses.jp2: はらさん事にあとのもよふを
verses.kanji: この度は胸の内より清きやかに   晴らさん事に後の模様を
verses.english: This time, unless I completely clear the gloom from My innermost heart, I cannot carry out the future plan.

verses.pt: Depois disto, tomarei somente medidas para salvar a todos igualmente, quem quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, I shall need only to proceed with the means to save all of you, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono ato wa dono yona mono mo ichiretsu ni   tasuketai to no shudan bakari o
verses.jp1: このあとハとのよなものも一れつに
verses.jp2: たすけたいとのしゆだんはかりを
verses.kanji: この後はどの様な者も一列に   救けたいとの手段ばかりを
verses.english: After that I will exert Myself to push forth all means to save any and everyone equally.

verses.pt: Doravante, se a dedicação única à salvação começar, seja quem for, virá somente a animar-se.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, when I begin My work of single-hearted salvation, everyone of you will only be spirited.
verses.ro: konosaki wa tasuke ichijo ni kakaritara   dono yona mono mo isamu bakari ya
verses.jp1: このさきハたすけ一ぢよにかゝりたら
verses.jp2: どのよなものもいさむばかりや
verses.kanji: この先は救け一条に掛かりたら   どの様な者も勇むばかりや
verses.english: Henceforth, when I begin My work of single-hearted salvation, any and everyone will become cheerful.

verses.pt: Seja no que for, uma vez dito por Tsukihi, jamais existirá erro algum.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
verses.ro: nani goto mo Tsukihi ichido yuta koto   chigai so naru koto wa nai zo ya
verses.jp1: なに事も月日一どふゆうた事
verses.jp2: ちがいそふなる事わないぞや
verses.kanji: 何事も月日一度言うた事   違いそうなる事は無いぞや
verses.english: What I, Tsukihi, have once said shall never become false.

verses.pt: Tenho explicado com excessiva insistência até agora, por não terem compreensão no espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, I have taught you so tediously, yet there is no understanding in your minds.
verses.ro: imamade mo akudoi hodo mo toite aru   naredo kokoro ni wakari nai kara
verses.jp1: いまゝてもあくどいほともといてある
verses.jp2: なれと心にわかりないから
verses.kanji: 今迄もあくどい程も説いて有る   なれど心に分かり無いから
verses.english: Till now I have often taught you so tediously, yet there is no understanding in your mind.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Errado é pensar que ela seja um ser humano igual a todos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! You are mistaken in thinking of Me as being human, the same as you.
verses.ro: shikato kike onaji ningen naru yoni   omote iru no wa kore wa chigau de
verses.jp1: しかときけをなじにんけんなるよふに
verses.jp2: をもているのハこれハちがうで
verses.kanji: 確と聞け同じ人間なる様に   思うて居るのはこれは違うで
verses.english: Listen attentively! You are entirely mistaken in thinking of Me as if I were human just as you are.

verses.pt: Para começar a ensinar todas as coisas, deve partir do Parens da origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: To begin teaching about all matters, one must be the Parent of Origin.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o oshiete kakaru no mo   moto naru Oya de nakuba ikan de
verses.jp1: どのような事をふしへてかゝるのも
verses.jp2: もとなるをやてなくばいかんで
verses.kanji: どの様な事を教えて掛かるのも   元なる親で無くばいかんで
verses.english: Unless I were the original Parent, it would be impossible that I begin to teach you any and everything.

verses.pt: Até agora, tudo que vim ensinando, tenho começado de acordo com este princípio.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, in all the teachings I have given you, I began them by this truth.
verses.ro: imamade mo nani o oshiete kitaru no mo   mina kono dori hajime kaketa de
verses.jp1: いまゝてもなにをふしへてきたるのも
verses.jp2: みなこのどふりはじめかけたで
verses.kanji: 今迄も何を教えて来たるのも   皆この道理初め掛けたで
verses.english: I have begun to teach you this truth in whatever things I have told you up to the present.

verses.pt: Se existir um outro parens que tenha criado os seres humanos, tentem encontrá-lo.
verses.en_6th_ed: If there should be another parent who began human beings, go and seek to find where.
verses.ro: ningen o hajimeta Oya ga mo ichi nin   doko ni aru nara tazune ite miyo
verses.jp1: にんけんをはじめたをやがも一にん
verses.jp2: どこにあるならたつねいてみよ
verses.kanji: 人間を初めた親がもう一人   何処に有るなら尋ね行てみよ
verses.english: If there should be another parent who gave birth to human beings, go and try to seek after her!

verses.pt: Embora venha dizendo gradualmente sobre coisas desconhecidas, elas são verdadeiras.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though I speak in this way of unknown things step by step, it is the truth.
verses.ro: kono yona shiranu koto oba dandan to   yute iredomo kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp1: このよふなしらぬ事をばだん／＼と
verses.jp2: ゆうていれどもこれがまことや
verses.kanji: この様な知らぬ事をば段々と   言うて居れどもこれが真や
verses.english: One by one I am talking about things you have never known before. Yet they are all true.

verses.pt: O prazer de Tsukihi é ensinar dia a dia coisas desconhecidas e inexistentes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, teaching you of the unknown and of things yet to be is the pleasure of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni shiranu koto o ya nai koto o   kore oshieru ga Tsukihi tanoshimi
verses.jp1: にち／＼にしらぬ事をやない事を
verses.jp2: これをしへるが月日たのしみ
verses.kanji: 日々に知らぬ事をや無い事を   これ教えるが月日楽しみ
verses.english: It is a pleasure for Me, Tsukihi, to teach you day by day about things which are quite unknown or have never existed before.

verses.pt: Embora tenham ouvido que o Parens da criação dos seres humanos terá a dádiva do céu...
verses.en_6th_ed: You have heard of the Gift of Heaven to be given to the Parent of this world's human beginnings.
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen hajime Oya naru ni   ten no atae wa aru to kikedomo
verses.jp1: このよふのにんけんはじめをやなるに
verses.jp2: 天のあたゑハあるときけども
verses.kanji: この世の人間初めた親なるに   天の与えは有ると聞けども
verses.english: You may have heard that the Gift of Heaven shall be conferred to the Parent who gave birth to human beings of this world.

verses.pt: Não podem compreender facilmente o que seja esta explanação. Tsukihi diz que dará o alimento celeste.
verses.en_6th_ed: You may not know what this talk is about. Tsukihi wishes to bestow the Food of Heaven.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto yara choto shiren   Tsukihi jikimotsu yaro to yu no ya
verses.jp1: このはなしなにの事やら一寸しれん
verses.jp2: 月日ぢきもつやろとゆうのや
verses.kanji: この話何の事やら一寸知れん   月日食物やろうと言うのや
verses.english: Perhaps you cannot comprehend so easily what I mean by this talk. I mean that I,Tsukihi, wish to give Her the Jikimotsu the Heavenly Food.

verses.pt: Quanto a esta explanação, trata-se de colocar um tacho raso sobre o Kanrodai.
verses.en_6th_ed: Further about this talk: place a flat vessel on the Kanrodai.
