verses.english: Henceforth day by day I will cheer up your mind. Everything shall appear just as I say.

verses.pt: Quão difíceis pareçam ser, salvarei todos através do Serviço Alegre.
verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult things may appear, I shall save you all by the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: dono yoni mutsukashiku yo mieta tote   Yoki-zutome de mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: どのよふにむつかしくよふみへたとて
verses.jp2: よふきつとめてみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: どの様に難しく様見えたとて   陽気勤めで皆救けるで
verses.english: However difficult it may look, I will save all of you in whatever kinds of matters through the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service.

verses.pt: Não se sabe que trabalho realizarei doravante, farei tudo segundo o espírito de cada um.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what workings I shall do from now on. In accordance with your minds, I shall do anything, however great.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona shigoto suru yara na   kokoro shidai ni donna koto demo
verses.jp1: これからわどのよなしことするやらな
verses.jp2: 心したいにとんな事でも
verses.kanji: これからはどの様な仕事するやらな   心次第にどんな事でも
verses.english: From now on there is no knowing what kinds of works I will manifest. I will do whatever works just as your minds deserve.

verses.pt: Gradualmente, Tsukihi dissipará os pesares do seu espírito, sejam quais forem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi will clear away all the mind's regret step by step, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan kokoro zannen o   donna koto demo mina harasu de na
verses.jp1: 月日にわだん／＼心ざんねんを
verses.jp2: どんな事てもみなはらすでな
verses.kanji: 月日には段々心残念を   どんな事でも皆晴らすでな
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, will clear away whatever kind of regret which has piled up.

verses.pt: Qualquer coisa que diga, é tudo Tsukihi. Não sabem que trabalho será realizado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. There is no knowing the workings I shall do.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   ikana shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
verses.jp2: いかなしごとをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うのも皆月日   如何な仕事をするや知れんで
verses.english: Whatever I may say, I, Tsukihi, speak all of it. No one can foretell what working I will manifest.

verses.pt: O que quer que possa ser visto, é tudo Tsukihi. Não pensem que haja cogitação humana.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever appears, it is all by Tsukihi. Do not think I have a human mind.
verses.ro: ika naru no koto ga mieru mo mina Tsukihi   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
verses.jp1: いかなるの事がみゑるもみな月日
verses.jp2: にんけん心あるとをもうな
verses.kanji: 如何なるの事が見えるも皆月日   人間心有ると思うな
verses.english: Whatever things may appear, they are all the working of Tsukihi. Never think My mind is that of a human being!

verses.pt: Não sabem que trabalho irei realizar de hoje em diante, apressando o que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: From today, I shall hasten all matters. No one knows the workings I shall do.
verses.ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto mo sekikonde   donna hataraki suru ya shiromai
verses.jp1: けふからハどのよな事もせきこんで
verses.jp2: どんなはたらきするやしろまい
verses.kanji: 今日からはどの様な事も急き込んで   どんな働きするや知ろまい
verses.english: From today I will hasten any and everything, and will work whatever thingMs which no one can foretell.

verses.pt: Aquilo que Tsukihi pensa neste momento, a boca é humana, mas o espírito é Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: These thoughts of Tsukihi are spoken through Her: the mouth is human, the mind is that of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: ima naru no Tsukihi no omou koto naru wa   kuchi wa ningen kokoro Tsukihi ya
verses.jp1: いまなるの月日のをもう事なるわ
verses.jp2: くちわにんけん心月日や
verses.kanji: 今なるの月日の思う事なるは   口は人間心月日や
verses.english: What I, Tsukihi, think now is spoken through Her mouth. Human is the mouth that speaks, but divine is the mind that thinks within.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Tsukihi tomou emprestado a boca e emprestou-lhe o seu espírito inteiramente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! I, Tsukihi, am borrowing Her mouth wholly, and I, Tsukihi, am lending My mind wholly.
verses.ro: shikato kike kuchi wa Tsukihi ga mina karite   kokoro wa Tsukihi mina kashite iru
verses.jp1: しかときけくちハ月日がみなかりて
verses.jp2: 心ハ月日みなかしている
verses.kanji: 確と聞け口は月日が皆借りて   心は月日皆貸して居る
verses.english: Listen attentively to Me! It is because I, Tsukihi, borrow Her mouth, while I, Tsukihi, lend My mind to Her.

verses.pt: Se tiverem rancor disso, seja o que for, Tsukihi fará a devolução em tudo.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you are harboring doubts over this, Tsukihi will give a full return in whatever matters.
verses.ro: kore bakari urami aru nara dono yona   koto mo Tsukihi ga mina kayasu de na
verses.jp1: こればかりうらみあるならとのよふな
verses.jp2: 事も月日かみなかやすてな
verses.kanji: こればかり恨み有るならどの様な   事も月日が皆返すでな
verses.english: Just this, if you harbor a grudge in whatever kinds of matters, I, Tsukihi, will give a full return.

verses.pt: Qualquer coisa que diga, é tudo Tsukihi. Não mesclo em absoluto o espírito humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. Never is there mixed the least bit of a human mind.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   ningen gokoro sarani mazen de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
verses.jp2: にんけん心さらにまぜんで
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うのも皆月日   人間心更に混ぜんで
verses.english: Whatever I may say, it is all the talk of Tsukihi. Indeed, there is never mixed the least bit of human mind.

verses.pt: Quão difíceis pensem ser, não se preocupem, Tsukihi se encarregará.
verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult you think matters to be, you need not worry. Tsukihi takes charge.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi yoni omota tote   Tsukihi hikiuke anji nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いかほどにむつかしよふにをもたとて
verses.jp2: 月日ひきうけあんちないぞや
verses.kanji: 如何程に難し様に思うたとて   月日引き受け案じ無いぞや
verses.english: However difficult you may think it is, there is nothing to worry about, because I, Tsukihi, take charge of it.

verses.pt: Tenham todos o prazer do caminho posterior, se for dissipado o pesar de Deus...
verses.en_6th_ed: All of you in the world, look forward to the path ahead. If only the regret of God is all cleared away...
verses.ro: konosaki no michi o tanoshime ichiretsu wa   Kami no zannen harashitaru nara
verses.jp1: このさきのみちをたのしめ一れつわ
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんはらしたるなら
verses.kanji: この先の道を楽しめ一列は   神の残念晴らしたるなら
verses.english: Look forward to the way in the future with pleasure, all of you equally! If only the regret of God is all cleared away,

verses.pt: Se começar dia a dia a limpeza do coração, seja quem for, não haverá quem possa resistir.
verses.en_6th_ed: When I set out to cleanse your heart day by day, there will be none able to resist Me.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mune no soji ni kakaritara   donna mono demo kanau mono nashi
verses.jp1: にち／＼にむねのそふぢにかゝりたら
verses.jp2: どんなものでもかなうものなし
verses.kanji: 日々に胸の掃除に掛かりたら   どんな者でも敵う者無し
verses.english: When I begin sweeping dust from your minds day by day, no one shall be able to stand against Me, whoever one may be.

verses.pt: O que pensam que significa esta limpeza? Tsukihi se introduzirá nos corpos.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this cleansing is about? Tsukihi will enter the bodies of all.
verses.ro: kono soji doyu koto ni omou kana   Tsukihi tainai mina irikomu de
verses.jp1: このそふぢどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: 月日たいないみな入こむで
verses.kanji: この掃除どういう事に思うかな   月日体内皆入り込むで
verses.english: What do you think of this sweeping? I, Tsukihi, will enter into the bodies of all of you.

verses.pt: De onde pensam que seja esta explanação? Revelarei todas as coisas nos altos lugares.
verses.en_6th_ed: Where do you think this talk is about? I shall fully manifest My workings in the high places.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto ya to omou kana   takai tokoro de mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: このはなしとこの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: 高いところでみなあらわすで
verses.kanji: この話何処の事やと思うかな   高い所で皆現すで
verses.english: You may wonder where is the place of which I speak. I will manifest all of My working at high places.

verses.pt: Reflitam sobre tudo que Tsukihi disser. O que quer que diga, não haverá erro.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over everything Tsukihi says. There is not an error in anything I say.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi yu koto shiyan seyo   nani o yutemo kore chigawan de
verses.jp1: なにもかも月日ゆう事しやんせよ
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもこれちがわんで
verses.kanji: 何もかも月日言う事思案せよ   何を言うてもこれ違わんで
verses.english: Ponder over the words of Tsukihi, whatever they may be! Whatever I, Tsukihi, once said shall never fail.

verses.pt: Desejo purificar o espírito de todos do mundo. Não sabem o que Tsukihi poderá realizar.
verses.en_6th_ed: As I desire to purify the mind of everyone throughout the world, there is no knowing what Tsukihi will do.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu kokoro sumashitasa   donna koto oba Tsukihi suru yara
verses.jp1: せかいぢう一れつ心すましたさ
verses.jp2: どんな事をば月日するやら
verses.kanji: 世界中一列心澄ましたさ   どんな事をば月日するやら
verses.english: As I earnestly desire to sweep dust from the minds of all people of the whole world, there is no knowing what kinds of things I, Tsukihi, may work.

verses.pt: O que quer que Tsukihi realize, é somente pelo desejo único de salvá-los.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I do, it is solely from Tsukihi's single desire to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo Tsukihi niwa   tasuketai to no ichijo bakari de
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をするのも月日には
verses.jp2: たすけたいとの一ちよはかりで
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも月日には   救けたいとの一条ばかりで
verses.english: Whatever I, Tsukihi, may work, it is solely from My intention to save all of you.

verses.pt: Observem todos atentamente o futuro, a limpeza do coração se realizará por si só.
verses.en_6th_ed: All of you in the world, keep your eyes firmly on the future. The cleansing of the heart will be accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: konosaki o tashika mite iyo ichiretsu wa   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp1: このさきをたしかみていよ一れつわ
verses.jp2: むねのそふちがひとりでけるで
verses.kanji: この先を確か見て居よ一列は   胸の掃除が独り出来るで
verses.english: Look at the events which shall appear in the near future! Then the sweeping of the minds of all of you equally shall be accomplished by itself.

verses.pt: Quando esta limpeza for completamente realizada, assim começarei logo o preparo do amuleto.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this cleansing is thoroughly done, I shall begin at once to prepare for the Amulet.
verses.ro: kono soji sukiyaka shitaru koto naraba   sono mama suguni Mamori goshirae
verses.jp1: このそふちすきやかしたる事ならば
verses.jp2: そのまゝすぐにまむりごしらゑ
verses.kanji: この掃除清きやかしたる事ならば   その侭直ぐに守り拵え
verses.english: When this sweeping is clearly accomplished, I will begin at once to prepare the Mamori, the Amulet.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, Tsukihi está apressando este caminho, no entanto, ninguém está ciente disto.
verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi hastens daily for such a path to be, but no one is aware of it.
verses.ro: kono michi o Tsukihi no kokoro nichinichi ni   sekikonde iru tare mo shirazu ni
verses.jp1: このみちを月日の心にち／＼に
verses.jp2: せきこんでいるたれもしらずに
verses.kanji: この道を月日の心日々に   急き込んで居る誰も知らずに
verses.english: Day by day, the mind of Tsukihi impatiently hastens for this way. But there is no one who is aware of it.

verses.pt: Se chegarem logo a este caminho, seja quem for, todos se animarão.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you come onto this path quickly, all of you will be spirited, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono michi e hayaku tsuitaru koto naraba   donna mono demo mina isamu de na
verses.jp1: このみちゑはやくついたる事ならば
verses.jp2: どんなものでもみないさむてな
verses.kanji: この道へ早く付いたる事ならば   どんな者でも皆勇むでな
verses.english: If only you come to follow this way quickly, all of you shall become cheered up, whoever you may be.

verses.pt: Não pensem quem faz esta explanação, é somente o espírito de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder who is giving this talk. It is solely the mind of Tsukihi speaking.
verses.ro: kono hanashi tare ga suru towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari yu no ya
verses.jp1: このはなしたれがするとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 月日の心はかりゆうのや
verses.kanji: この話誰がするとは思うなよ   月日の心ばかり言うのや
verses.english: Never wonder who is giving this talk! It is no other than the mind of Tsukihi who speaks now.

verses.pt: Desejo informar de algum modo a verdade deste mundo a todos.
verses.en_6th_ed: It is because I desire to make the truth of this world known by all means to the entire world.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu naru o sekaiju e   doshite nari to shirashitai yue
verses.jp1: このよふのしんちつなるをせかへちうへ
verses.jp2: とふしてなりとしらしたいゆへ
verses.kanji: この世の真実なるを世界中に   どうしてなりと知らしたい故
verses.english: It is because I earnestly desire to make the truth of this world known to all people of the whole world.

verses.pt: Embora até hoje viesse adiando, seja por um dia, e estivesse reservado no que quer que fosse,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until today I have let the days go by and held back in whatever matters,
verses.ro: kyomade wa ichi nichi narito hi o nobashi   dono yona koto mo shikae iredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわ一日なりとひをのばし
verses.jp2: とのよな事もしかゑいれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄は一日なりと日を延ばし   どの様な事も控え居れども
verses.english: Though until today each day I have postponed and held back whatever kinds of things,

verses.pt: Desta vez, o dia está próximo, não é mais possível ficar reservado.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as the day is pressing, I cannot hold back even for a moment.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsumari kiru kara wa   domu shikaeru koto wa deken de
verses.jp1: このたびハもふひがつまりきるからハ
verses.jp2: どふむしかゑる事ハでけんで
verses.kanji: この度はもう日が詰り切るからは   どうも控える事は出来んで
verses.english: This time, as the day is pressing I cannot hold back even for a moment.

verses.pt: Tudo que ouvirem, quando quer que seja, é o pesar e a ira de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you hear and whenever you hear of it, it is the regret and anger of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: nandoki ni dono yona koto o kiita tote   kore wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku
verses.jp1: なんどきにとのよな事をきいたとて
verses.jp2: これハ月日のざねんりいふく
verses.kanji: 何時にどの様な事を聞いたとて   これは月日の残念立腹
verses.english: Whenever and whatever matters you may hear unexpectedly,they are all the manifestations of the regret and anger of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Para mim, Tsukihi, seja quem for, são meus filhos, e embora esteja vendo-os com plena afeição...
verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, everyone is My child, whoever you may be. Though I have been watching over you with nothing but love,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona mono mo waga ko nari   kawai bakari de mite wa iredomo
verses.jp1: 月日にわどのよなものもわが子なり
verses.jp2: かわいばかりでみてハいれども
verses.kanji: 月日にはどの様な者も我が子なり   可愛いばかりで見ては居れども
verses.english: For Me, Tsukihi, any and everyone is My child, whoever he may be. So I am looking after him with nothing but parental affection.

verses.pt: Embora até agora todos do mundo estejam cada qual refletindo igualmente,
verses.en_6th_ed: And though each of you throughout the world has been pondering until now,
verses.ro: imamade wa sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   meme shiyan o shite wa iredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハせかいぢううハ一れつに
verses.jp2: めゑ／＼しやんをしてわいれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は世界中は一列に   銘々思案をしては居れども
verses.english: Until now each and everyone throughout the world has been concerned only with himself.

verses.pt: Como quer que reflitam, é lamentável por não terem o espírito de salvar os outros.
verses.en_6th_ed: To My sorrow, no matter how deeply you have pondered, you have no mind to save others.
verses.ro: nasake nai dono yoni shiyan shita totemo   hito o tasukeru kokoro nai node
verses.jp1: なさけないとのよにしやんしたとても
verses.jp2: 人をたすける心ないので
verses.kanji: 情け無いどの様に思案したとても   人を救ける心無いので
verses.english: How pitiful it is! You have no mind to help others, however hard you may think it over.

verses.pt: Doravante, é o pedido de Tsukihi; que todos reformem firmemente o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now, Tsukihi requests you, everyone in the world, to replace your mind firmly.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi tanomi ya ichiretsu wa   kokoro shikkari irekaete kure
verses.jp1: これからハ月日たのみや一れつわ
verses.jp2: 心しいかりいれかゑてくれ
verses.kanji: これからは月日頼みや一列は   心確り入れ替えて呉れ
verses.english: Henceforth, replace your mind definitely! I, Tsukihi, request it from you all equally.

verses.pt: Se indagarem como deve ser este espírito: somente o desejo único de salvar o mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what kind of mind it is to be: it is none other than to save the world single-heartedly.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doyu koto de aru naraba   sekai tasukeru ichijo bakari o
verses.jp1: この心どふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp2: せかいたすける一ちよばかりを
verses.kanji: この心どういう事で有るならば   世界救ける一条ばかりを
verses.english: If you ask what kind of mind it is, it is the mind to save single-heartedly all people of the whole world.

verses.pt: Doravante, se todos do mundo, igualmente, se salvarem mutuamente em todas as coisas,
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, if all of you throughout the world save one another in every matter,
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   yorozu tagaini tasuke suru nara
verses.jp1: このさきハせかいぢううハ一れつに
verses.jp2: よろづたがいにたすけするなら
verses.kanji: この先は世界中は一列に   万互いに救けするなら
verses.english: Henceforth, if only all people of the world equally help each other on any and every matter,

verses.pt: Saibam que Tsukihi aceitará esse espírito e fará toda e qualquer salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: Know that Tsukihi will accept that mind and will provide any salvation whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo sono kokoro oba uketorite   donna tasuke mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: 月日にもその心をばうけとりて
verses.jp2: どんなたすけもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 月日にもその心をば受け取りて   どんな救けもすると思えよ
verses.english: Believe that I, Tsukihi, will accept your minds and will work any and every kind of salvation!

verses.pt: O que pensam sobre esta salvação? Certamente, encarrego-me para não terem varíola.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this salvation is? It is My assurance of your freedom from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   hoso sen yoni tashika ukeyau
verses.jp1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: ほふそせんよにたしかうけやう
verses.kanji: この救けどういう事に思うかな   疱瘡せん様に確か請け合う
verses.english: What do you think this saving grace is? I surely assure you freedom from smallpox.

verses.pt: Ainda por salvação, desejo ensinar a produção sempre farta em todas as colheitas, seja onde for.
verses.en_6th_ed: Another salvation I desire to teach: an equally abundant harvest everywhere at all times.
verses.ro: mata tasuke ryuke ichiretsu dokomade mo   itsumo hosaku oshietai kara
verses.jp1: またゝすけりうけ一れつどこまでも
verses.jp2: いつもほふさくをしゑたいから
verses.kanji: また救け立毛一列何処迄も   何時も豊作教えたいから
verses.english: One more salvation which I desire to teach you is that which assures you a rich harvest of all kinds of crops throughout the world and every time.

verses.pt: Embora pense em instruir logo este caminho, todas as pessoas não o compreendem.
verses.en_6th_ed: To train you in such a path quickly is My desire, but there is no understanding in anyone's mind.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku shikomo to omoedomo   ichiretsu kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp1: このみちをはやくしこもとをもゑども
verses.jp2: 一れつ心わかりないので
verses.kanji: この道を早く仕込もうと思えども   一列心分かり無いので
verses.english: In spite of My earnest desire to train you for this way quickly, all of your minds equally are yet closed to reason.

verses.pt: Não há discriminação no mundo, onde quer que seja; peço que todas as pessoas reflitam.
verses.en_6th_ed: I do not discriminate among any of you in the world. Please ponder, each of you.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko ni hedate wa nai hodoni   ichiretsu shiyan shite kureru yo
verses.jp1: せかいぢうどこにへだてわないほどに
verses.jp2: 一れつしやんしてくれるよふ
verses.kanji: 世界中何処に隔ては無い程に   一列思案して呉れる様
verses.english: There is no discrimination indeed whatsoever in the whole world. Please ponder over it well, all of you equally!

verses.pt: Se todos determinarem sinceramente o espírito e não contrariarem os dizeres de Deus,
verses.en_6th_ed: If a true resolve comes to your mind, and you do not turn away from the words of God,
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro ni sadame mina tsuite   Kami no yu koto somuki nakereba
verses.jp1: しんぢつに心にさだめみなついて
verses.jp2: 神のゆう事そむきなければ
verses.kanji: 真実に心に定め皆付いて   神の言う事背き無ければ
verses.english: If only you determine the true sincerity of your mind, and never go against the words of God,

verses.pt: Então, o espírito de Tsukihi apressará a salvação assim que o aceite seguramente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then Tsukihi will firmly accept this mind and directly hasten your salvation.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Tsukihi no kokoro shikkari to   uketori shidai tasuke sekikomu
verses.jp1: それよりも月日の心しいかりと
verses.jp2: うけとりしだいたすけせきこむ
verses.kanji: それよりも月日の心確りと   受け取り次第救け急き込む
verses.english: Then I, Tsukihi, will hasten to save all of you, as soon as I accept it with certainty.

verses.pt: Não pensem ser esta salvação insignificante, é o Registro principal da região dos esclarecidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think of this salvation as being trivial. It is the principal matter of the Divine Record of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono tasuke chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   kore wa nihon no ichi no Koki ya
verses.jp1: このたすけ一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: これわにほんの一のこふきや
verses.kanji: この救け一寸の事やと思うなよ   これは日本の一のこうきや
verses.english: Never take this salvation as trivial matter! This is the prime Koki, the Divine Record, which shall be written in the region where My teachings spread early.

verses.pt: Se mostrar ao menos isto logo e firmemente, mesmo que sejam de quão altos lugares,
verses.en_6th_ed: If only I show this quickly and clearly, however high your place may be...
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku shikkari miseta nara   dono yona takai tokoro naru tomo
verses.jp1: これさいかはやくしいかりみせたなら
verses.jp2: とのよな高いところなるとも
verses.kanji: これさいか早く確り見せたなら   どの様な高い所なるとも
verses.english: If only this is quickly and clearly shown, you shall understand Me, however high your position may be.

verses.pt: Como isto não é um trabalho humano, não podem contrariar a onipotência de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: This indeed is not human workings. No one will be able to turn away from the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kore bakari ningen waza de nai karani   Tsukihi juyo somuki dekemai
verses.jp1: こればかりにんけんハさでないからに
verses.jp2: 月日ぢうよふそむきでけまい
verses.kanji: こればかり人間業で無いからに   月日自由背き出来まい
verses.english: Indeed, this one thing is not human work. No one shall be able to stand against the omnipotence of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Se assim fizer, sejam de quão altos lugares, jamais poderão imitar-me. Procurem refletir.
verses.en_6th_ed: When it is shown, however high your place may be, you will not be able to imitate it. Ponder this.
verses.ro: shitaru nara ika hodo takai tokoro demo   mane wa dekemai shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp1: したるならいかほと高いところても
verses.jp2: まねハてけまいしやんしてみよ
verses.kanji: したるなら如何程高い所でも   真似は出来まい思案して見よ
verses.english: Therefore, however high your position may be, it is impossible to imitate Me, Tsukihi. Ponder over it well!

verses.pt: Embora Tsukihi queira apresentar logo a prova da vida sem doença, nem morte e enfraquecimento,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi desires to show proof quickly against illness, death, and weakening,
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yamazu shinazu ni yowaran no   hayaku shoko daso to omoedo
verses.jp1: 月日よりやますしなすによわらんの
verses.jp2: はやくしよこふだそとをもへど
verses.kanji: 月日より病まず死なずに弱らんの   早く証拠を出そうと思えど
verses.english: Although I, Tsukihi, impatiently desire to produce the proof against illness, death or becoming weak,

verses.pt: Seja quem for, todos estão duvidando e pensando que é algo comum ao mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: All of you everywhere doubt Me and take My words as being worldly common.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina utagote tare nitemo   sekainami ya to omote iru node
verses.jp1: 一れつハみなうたごふてたれにても
verses.jp2: せかいなみやとをもているので
verses.kanji: 一列は皆疑うて誰にても   世界並やと思うて居るので
verses.english: Yet, all of you equally doubt My words, and take My words to be worldly.

verses.pt: Neste lugar, não há em absoluto a cogitação humana, existe somente a intenção de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is not at all a human mind at this place. There are only the thoughts of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro ningen gokoro sarani nashi   Tsukihi no omou koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: このところにんけん心さらになし
verses.jp2: 月日のをもう事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: この所人間心更に無し   月日の思う事ばかりやで
verses.english: Here in My mind nothing human is mixed. All come from the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Como ninguém conhece esse fato, a incompreensão é o pesar de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: But there is no one who knows this. That there is no understanding is the regret of God.
verses.ro: sono koto o tare demo shiranu koto ya kara   wakari nai no ga Kami no zannen
verses.jp1: その事をたれてもしらぬ事やから
verses.jp2: わかりないのが神のさんねん
verses.kanji: その事を誰でも知らぬ事やから   分かり無いのが神の残念
verses.english: As it is a matter which no one has ever known, you cannot understand it. This is indeed the cause of the regret of God.

verses.pt: Não há algum meio para purificar realmente o espírito de todos?
verses.en_6th_ed: Is there not a way that the minds of all of you can be truly purified?
verses.ro: kono kokoro dozo shinjitsu ichiretsu no   kokoro sumasuru moyo nai ka yo
verses.jp1: この心どふぞしんちつ一れつの
verses.jp2: 心すまするもよふないかよ
verses.kanji: この心どうぞ真実一列の   心澄まする模様無いかよ
verses.english: How can I find by any means the way to purify truly the minds of all of you equally?

verses.pt: Se ao menos o espírito compreender logo, apresentarei a prova tal qual, prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only your minds quickly become open to reason, I shall show you the proof at once.
verses.ro: kokoro sai hayaku wakarita koto naraba   sono mama suguni shoko dasu no ni
verses.jp1: 心さいはやくハかりた事ならば
verses.jp2: そのまゝすぐにしよこだすのに
verses.kanji: 心さい早く分かりた事ならば   その侭直ぐに証拠出すのに
verses.english: If only your minds become open to reason, I will put forth the evidence at once.

verses.pt: Até agora, estive ouvindo quaisquer mentiras, mas, doravante, já não as ouvirei.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have listened to all kinds of falsehood, but from now on I shall hear them no more.
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona uso mo kiite ita   mo korekara wa uso wa kikan de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハとのよなうそもきいていた
verses.jp2: もふこれからハうそハきかんで
verses.kanji: 今迄はどの様な嘘も聞いて居た   もうこれからは嘘は聞かんで
verses.english: Until now I have heard whatever kind of falsehood, but henceforth no falsehood shall be heard.

verses.pt: Doravante, aquele que mentir se tornará também mentira. Estão cientes disto?
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, if you speak falsely, you yourself will become false. Beware!
verses.ro: korekara wa uso o yu tara sono mono ga   uso ni naru nomo kore ga shochi ka
verses.jp1: これからハうそをゆうたらそのものが
verses.jp2: うそになるのもこれがしよちか
verses.kanji: これからは嘘を言うたらその者が   嘘になるのもこれが承知か
verses.english: Henceforth, if you tell a falsehood, you yourself shall also become false. Are you aware of it?

verses.pt: Tsukihi detesta a mentira e a lisonja. Doravante, Tsukihi se retirará.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi dislikes falsehood and flattery. If you persist, Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa uso to tsuisho kore kirai   konosaki naru wa Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp1: 月日にハうそとついしよこれきらい
verses.jp2: このさきなるわ月日しりぞく
verses.kanji: 月日には嘘と追従これ嫌い   この先なるは月日退く
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, dislike falsehood and flattery. If you persist in them, God will withdraw.

verses.pt: Por isso, vim adiando mesmo por um dia e tolerando quase tudo, seja o que for.
verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, I have postponed yet another day, overlooking almost all of them.
verses.ro: soreyue ni ichi nichi narito hi o nobashi   taitei nanimo miyurushite ita
verses.jp1: それゆへに一日なりとひをのばし
verses.jp2: たいていなにもみゆるしていた
verses.kanji: それ故に一日なりと日を延ばし   大抵何も見許して居た
verses.english: Therefore I have postponed yet another day, and overlooked most of them.

verses.pt: O que pensam, desta vez, sobre o fato de dizer que desejo apresentar logo a prova?
verses.en_6th_ed: I say that I desire to show the proof quickly at this time. What do you think of My words?
verses.ro: konotabi no hayaku shoko dashitai to   yute iru no o nanto omou zo
verses.jp1: このたびのはやくしよこふだしたいと
verses.jp2: ゆうているのをなんとをもうぞ
verses.kanji: この度の早く証拠を出したいと   言うて居るのを何と思うぞ
verses.english: What do you think of My words, that at this time I want to produce the evidence quickly?

verses.pt: O que pensam ser esta prova? Certamente, a experiência no seu corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think the proof is to be? I have put a clear test on the body.
verses.ro: shoko mo doyu koto ni omou kana   minouchi yori ni tashika tameshi o
verses.jp1: しよこふもとふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: みのうちよりにたしかためしを
verses.kanji: 証拠もどういう事に思うかな   身の内よりに確か試しを
verses.english: What do you think the evidence is? I will surely prove it by a test on your body.

verses.pt: Saibam realmente que esta provação do pesar de Tsukihi não é coisa insignificante.
verses.en_6th_ed: About this test: know that the regret of Tsukihi is no small matter.
verses.ro: kono tameshi makoto Tsukihi no zannen wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このためしまこと月日のさんねんわ
verses.jp2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この試し真月日の残念は   容易なる事で無いと思えよ
verses.english: Concerning this test I, Tsukihi, harbor regret which is far from slight. Remember it well!

verses.pt: Tsukihi fez sofrer, torcendo o seu corpo o qual não tinha deficiência em parte alguma.
verses.en_6th_ed: A body that had no disorder anywhere: Tsukihi bent it and caused you much trouble.
verses.ro: minouchi ni doko ni fusoku no nai mono ni   Tsukihi igamete kuro kaketa de
verses.jp1: みのうちにとこにふそくのないものに
verses.jp2: 月日いがめてくろふかけたで
verses.kanji: 身の内に何処に不足の無い者に   月日歪めて苦労掛けたで
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, made you lame, though you had to that time no bodily defect at all. This has given you much trouble.

verses.pt: Desde há trinta e nove anos, dei-lhe muitas preocupações, sofrimentos e aflições.
verses.en_6th_ed: The time was thirty-nine years ago. Since then, I have given you worries, troubles, and suffering.
verses.ro: nengen wa sanju ku nen mo izen nite   shinpai kuro nayami kaketa de
verses.jp1: ねんけんハ三十九ねんもいせんにて
verses.jp2: しんばいくろふなやみかけたで
verses.kanji: 年限は三十九年も以前にて   心配苦労悩み掛けたで
verses.english: That was thirty-nine years ago. Ever since, I have caused you much anxiety, troubles and worries.

verses.pt: Por isso, é natural que esteja duvidando a respeito de todas as coisas que Tsukihi diz.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because of it, you doubt all the words of Tsukihi. It is not unreasonable.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi yu koto nani goto mo   utagote iru kore muri de nai
verses.jp1: それゆへに月日ゆう事なに事も
verses.jp2: うたこふているこれむりでない
verses.kanji: それ故に月日言う事何事も   疑うて居るこれ無理で無い
verses.english: Therefore you are doubting whatever words I, Tsukihi, may say. But, it is natural.

verses.pt: Desta vez, o preparo para clarear completamente o íntimo deste coração é o mais importante.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I am preparing to clear up your innermost heart. This is the first matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono mune no uchi sukiyaka ni   harasu moyo ya kore ga daiichi
verses.jp1: このたびハ此むねのうちすきやかに
verses.jp2: はらすもよふやこれがだい一
verses.kanji: この度はこの胸の内清きやかに   晴らす模様やこれが第一
verses.english: This time I am preparing to clear up your innermost heart. This is the prime matter.

verses.pt: Seja qual for a explanação, caso não atrair firmemente este espírito para o lado de Tsukihi...
verses.en_6th_ed: Unless your mind is turned toward Tsukihi, any talk will be to no avail.
verses.ro: kono kokoro Tsukihi no ho e shikkarito   tsuken koto niwa donna hanashi mo
verses.jp1: この心月日のほふゑしいかりと
verses.jp2: つけん事にハどんなはなしも
verses.kanji: この心月日の方へ確りと   付けん事にはどんな話も
verses.english: Unless I attract your mind to Tsukihi, any talk shall be to no avail.

verses.pt: O que quer que seja realizado, tudo se deve a Tsukihi; no entanto, não há quem saiba disso.
verses.en_6th_ed: Everything that has been done is all by Tsukihi, but there is perhaps no one who knows this.
verses.ro: ika naru no koto o shitaru mo mina Tsukihi   konna koto oba tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: いかなるの事をしたるもみな月日
verses.jp2: こんな事をばたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 如何なるの事をしたるも皆月日   こんな事をば誰も知ろまい
verses.english: It is all I, Tsukihi, who have done whatever kinds of things. Perhaps no one is aware of it.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, mostrarei imediatamente a prova, não tendo tempo nem para um relance.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, there will be no time even to look aside. I shall show you the proof quickly.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa yokome furu ma mo nai hodoni   hayaku shoko dashite miseru de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハよこめふるまもないほどに
verses.jp2: はやくしよこふだしてみせるで
verses.kanji: 今日の日は横目振る間も無い程に   早く証拠を出して見せるで
verses.english: Today there will be no time even for a side glance, because I will produce the evidence at once.

verses.pt: Vendo isto, seja quem for, convença-se. Qualquer explanação, tudo é segundo este princípio.
verses.en_6th_ed: When you see it, be convinced, whoever you are. All of My talks proceed in this way.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo tokushin se   nanino hanashi mo mina kono dori
verses.jp1: これみたらとんなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp2: なにのはなしもみなこのどふり
verses.kanji: これ見たらどんな者でも得心せ   何の話も皆この通り
verses.english: Looking at this, you must become convinced of the truth, whoever you may be. Any and every talk shall be realized in this manner.

verses.pt: Quanto ao pesar de até agora, não é um fato que se possa expressar em palavras.
verses.en_6th_ed: My regret up till now is not something that can be told in words.
verses.ro: imamade no kono zannen to yu mono wa   kuchi de yu yona koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでのこのさんねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: くちでゆうよな事てないぞや
verses.kanji: 今迄のこの残念と言うものは   口で言う様な事で無いぞや
verses.english: My regret which has piled up to the present is not slight, so it cannot be expressed by word of mouth.

verses.pt: Até agora, vim passando por muitos pesares. Desta vez, se isto for dissipado,
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have passed through a mountain of regrets. If I clear them away at this time,
verses.ro: imamade wa yamayama zanen torinuke   konotabi kore o harashi taru nara
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ山／＼さねんとふりぬけ
verses.jp2: このたびこれをはらしたるなら
verses.kanji: 今迄は山々残念通り抜け   この度これを晴らしたるなら
verses.english: Until now I have been passing through a mountainous regret. If only I can clear it all away this time,

verses.pt: Então, seja qual for a doença e o fato, salvarei todos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Thereafter, whatever illness or whatever else may be troubling you, you shall be saved from them all.
verses.ro: ato naru wa donna yamai mo ika naru no   koto de aro ga mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: あとなるハどんなやまいもいかなるの
verses.jp2: 事であろふがみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: 後なるはどんな病も如何なるの   事で有ろうが皆救けるで
verses.english: Thereafter I will save you from any and every kind of disease or trouble, however serious it may be.

verses.pt: Se deixar informado ao mundo inteiro a respeito da origem dos seres humanos,
verses.en_6th_ed: If I should make the origin of human beings known to the whole world,
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen moto o sekaiju   shirashite oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このよふのにんけんもとをせかいちう
verses.jp2: しらしてをいた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この世の人間元を世界中へ   知らして置いた事で有るなら
verses.english: If only I can teach the origin of human beings throughout the world,

verses.pt: Desde então, realizarei toda e qualquer salvação. Salvarei todos mesmo com uma só palavra.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then I shall provide any salvation whatever. With but a word, I shall save you all.
verses.ro: sorekara wa donna tasuke mo suru hodoni   hito koto made de mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: それからハどんなたすけもするほとに
verses.jp2: 一事までゝみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: それからはどんな救けもする程に   一言迄で皆救けるで
verses.english: Then I will work whatever kind of salvation. Indeed, with a single word I will save you from any and every matter.

verses.pt: Embora até agora tenha explicado gradual e insistentemente, não entendem a essência.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, though I have repeatedly taught the truth step by step, you do not understand the core.
verses.ro: koremade wa dandan kudoki kotowari o   yute aredomo shin ga wakaran
verses.jp1: これまでハたん／＼くどきことハりを
verses.jp2: ゆうてあれどもしんかわからん
verses.kanji: これ迄は段々口説き断りを   言うて有れども芯が分からん
verses.english: Hitherto I have so often tried to persuade and warned you, but you did not understand the core of the truth.

verses.pt: Quanto a esta essência, o mais importante é a reflexão do íntimo do coração.
verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what this core is: the pondering of your heart is the primary concern.
verses.ro: kono shin wa doyu koto de aro nara   mune no shiyan o kore ga daiichi
verses.jp1: このしんハどふゆう事であろふなら
verses.jp2: むねのしやんをこれがたいゝち
verses.kanji: この芯はどういう事で有ろうなら   胸の思案をこれが第一
verses.english: What is the core? You may wonder. It is most important to ponder over in your heart.

verses.pt: Seja em que for, se o coração e a boca diferirem, é impossível corresponder à intenção de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: If the heart and the mouth differ in any matter, never will it accord with the mind of God.
verses.ro: nani nitemo mune to kuchi to ga chigote wa   Kami no kokoro ni kore wa kanawan
verses.jp1: なにゝてもむねとくちとがちこふてハ
verses.jp2: 神の心にこれハかなわん
verses.kanji: 何にても胸と口とが違うては   神の心にこれは適わん
verses.english: On whatever kinds of matters, if there is a discrepancy between your heart and mouth, it will never comply with the intention of God.

verses.pt: Se a sinceridade não corresponder à intenção de Deus, por mais que dedique o espírito...
verses.en_6th_ed: If your sincerity does not accord with the mind of God, in vain is devotion, however great it may be.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ga Kami no kokoro ni kanawaneba   ika hodo kokoro tsukushitaru tomo
verses.jp1: しんちつが神の心にかなハねば
verses.jp2: いかほど心つくしたるとも
verses.kanji: 真実が神の心に適わねば   如何程心尽くしたるとも
verses.english: If your sincerity does not comply with the intention of God, all shall be done in vain, however earnestly you may exhaust yourself.

verses.pt: Quanto a isto, por mais que alguém peça insistentemente, não será aceito. Tsukihi se retirará.
verses.en_6th_ed: On this one matter, whoever may come and however he may plead, it cannot be accepted. Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: kore bakari ika hodo tare ga sodan mo   totemo kanawan Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp1: こればかりいかほどたれがそふたんも
verses.jp2: とてもかなハん月日しりぞく
verses.kanji: こればかり如何程誰が相談も   とても適わん月日退く
verses.english: Just this, whoever may come to consult, he will not be heard. My anger being so severe, I, Tsukihi, will only withdraw.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem o que Deus diz. Em tudo que for dito, não há erro algum.
verses.en_6th_ed: In any matter, listen closely to the words of God. In whatever I say, there is never a mistake.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Kami no yu koto shikato kike   nani o yutemo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: なにもかも神のゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 何もかも神の言う事確と聞け   何を言うても違う事無し
verses.english: Listen attentively to whatever words I, God, may say! Nothing which I have ever said shall fail to appear.

verses.pt: No desejo sincero de ensinar a salvação extraordinária é que se diz todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: I truly desire to teach you marvelous salvation. That is why I tell you everything whatever.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni mezurashi tasuke oshietasa   sokode dono yona koto mo yu no ya
verses.jp1: しんちつにめつらしたすけをしへたさ
verses.jp2: そこでとのよな事もゆうのや
verses.kanji: 真実に珍し救け教えたさ   そこでどの様な事も言うのや
verses.english: As I desire to teach you the truly remarkable salvation, I tell you any and everything.

verses.pt: Desejo ensinar sobre todas as coisas inexistentes desde quando iniciei este mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: I desire to teach you everything that has been unknown since I began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nai koto o   donna koto omo oshietai kara
verses.jp1: このよふを初てからにない事を
verses.jp2: どんな事をもをしへたいから
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに無い事を   どんな事をも教えたいから
verses.english: As I desire to teach you any and everything which has never existed since the creation of this world,

verses.pt: Devem estar sempre plenamente cientes da verdade da origem real deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: You must clearly understand the truth concerning the real origin of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no honmoto naru no shinjitsu o   shikkari shochi seneba ikan de
verses.jp1: このよふのほんもとなるのしんちつを
verses.jp2: しいかりしよちせねばいかんで
verses.kanji: この世の本元なるの真実を   確り承知せねばいかんで
verses.english: You must not remain without firm conviction of the truth of the real origin of this world.

verses.pt: Seja de onde for, não há absolutamente quem tenha conhecido plenamente esta origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is perhaps no one anywhere who knows this origin clearly.
verses.ro: kono moto o shikkari shirite iru mono wa   doko no mono demo sarani arumai
verses.jp1: このもとをしいかりしりているものハ
verses.jp2: とこのものでもさらにあるまい
verses.kanji: この元を確り知りて居る者は   何処の者でも更に有るまい
verses.english: There shall be found no one who knows of this origin clearly even if you search after one any and everywhere.

verses.pt: Desta vez, explicarei a verdade real. O que quer que diga, fiquem plenamente cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, I shall tell you the real truth. Whatever I say, you must understand clearly.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu o yute kikasu   nani o yutemo shikato shochi se
verses.jp1: このたびハほんしんちつをゆてきかす
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしかとしよちせ
verses.kanji: この度は本真実を言うて聞かす   何を言うても確と承知せ
verses.english: This time I will tell you the real truth of this origin. Understand it surely, whatever I may say!

verses.pt: Os instrumentos da criação dos seres humanos na Residência são Izanagui e Izanami.
verses.en_6th_ed: Among the instruments used in the beginning of human beings at this Residence, Izanagi and Izanami,
verses.ro: kono yashiki ningen hajime dogu wa na   Izanagiii to Izanami to nari
verses.jp1: このやしきにんけんはじめどふぐハな
verses.jp2: いざなぎいゝといざなみとなり
verses.kanji: この屋敷人間初め道具はな   いざなぎといざなみとなり
verses.english: In this Residence, the instruments for the creation of human beings are Izanagi and Izanami.

verses.pt: Tsukiyomi, Kunissazuti, Kumoyomi e Kashikone são os primeiros instrumentos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukiyomi, Kunisazuchi, Kumoyomi, and Kashikone are the primary instruments.
verses.ro: Tsukiyomi to Kunisazuchii to Kumoyomi to   Kashikonee to ga ichi no dogu ya
verses.jp1: 月よみとくにさづちいとくもよみと
verses.jp2: かしこねへとが一のとふぐや
verses.kanji: つきよみとくにさずちとくもよみと   かしこねとが一の道具や
verses.english: Tsukiyomi, Kunisazuchi, Kumoyomi and Kashikone are each the prime instruments.

verses.pt: Além deles, o chamado Otonobe é o instrumento principal do cultivo e colheita.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then, the one called Otonobe is the primary instrument for the crops.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Otonobee to yu no wa na   kore wa ryuke no ichi no dogu ya
verses.jp1: それよりもをふとのべへとゆうのハな
verses.jp2: これわりゆけの一のどふくや
verses.kanji: それよりもおおとのべと言うのはな   これは立毛の一の道具や
verses.english: Then Otonobe is the prime instrument for the harvest.

verses.pt: O instrumento seguinte chamado Taishokuten é a tesoura do mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Next, the one called Taishokuten is the scissors of the world.
verses.ro: tsugi naru wa Taishokuten to yu no wa na   kore wa sekai no hasami naru zo ya
verses.jp1: つきなるハたいしよく天とゆうのハな
verses.jp2: これわせかいのはさみなるぞや
verses.kanji: 次なるはたいしょくてんと言うのはな   これは世界の鋏なるぞや
verses.english: Next Taishokuten is the scissors in the world.

verses.pt: Até o presente, reunindo todos os instrumentos, passei por diversos caminhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until this time, calling together all the instruments, I have passed through every kind of path.
verses.ro: koremade wa dogu issai mina yosete   dono yona michi mo torinuketa de
verses.jp1: これまでハどふぐいゝさいみなよせて
verses.jp2: とのよなみちもとふりぬけたで
verses.kanji: これ迄は道具一切皆寄せて   どの様な道も通り抜けたで
verses.english: Hitherto calling together all necessary instruments, I have passed through whatever kinds of ways full of hardships.

verses.pt: Doravante, discernindo os instrumentos reunidos, apressarei apenas o preparo para instruí-los.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall distinguish the instruments called together and hasten preparations to train them.
verses.ro: konosaki wa yoseta dogu o miwake shite   shikomu moyo o isogu bakari ya
verses.jp1: このさきハよせたどふぐをみハけして
verses.jp2: しこむもよふをいそぐばかりや
verses.kanji: この先は寄せた道具を見分けして   仕込む模様を急ぐばかりや
verses.english: Henceforth I will distinguish the instruments called together and hasten single-heartedly to train them.

verses.pt: Não pensem onde estão estas pessoas, existem duas com idade de onze anos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder where they can be found. Here are two, both eleven years old.
verses.ro: kono mono wa doko ni aru ya to omouna yo   toshi wa ju ichi ni nin iru zo ya
verses.jp1: このものハとこにあるやとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: としわ十一二人いるぞや
verses.kanji: この者は何処に有るやと思うなよ   年は十一二人居るぞや
verses.english: Never wonder where these persons shall be found! Here are two boys both aged eleven years.

verses.pt: Estas pessoas são: o instrumento da criação dos seres humanos e o da proteção do cultivo e colheita em geral.
verses.en_6th_ed: One is an instrument used to begin human beings. The other is for the providence for all crops.
verses.ro: kono nin wa ningen hajime kaketaru to   ryuke issai shugo dogu ya
verses.jp1: この人ハにんけんはじめかけたると
verses.jp2: りうけいゝさいしゆごふどふぐや
verses.kanji: この人は人間初め掛けたると   立毛一切守護道具や
verses.english: One of them has the affinity to the instrument of the creation of human beings, and the other to the instrument that protects all crops.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, digo todas e quaisquer coisas. O que quer que diga, fiquem cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, I shall speak about any and all matters. Whatever I say, understand Me, please.
verses.ro: kyonohi ni dono yona koto mo yu hodoni   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: けふの日にどのよな事もゆうほどに
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日の日にどの様な事も言う程に   何を言うても承知して呉れ
verses.english: Today I will tell you any and everything. Please understand well, whatever I may say!

verses.pt: Embora houvesse até agora tanta intenção de Deus, esteve reservado por não ter chegado o dia.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, there were many intentions of God, but as the day had not come, I have held back.
verses.ro: imamade mo Kami no omowaku mama aredo   hi ga kitaran de shikae itaru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでも神のをもハくまゝあれど
verses.jp2: ひがきたらんでしかゑいたるで
verses.kanji: 今迄も神の思惑深く有る   日が来たらんで控え居たるで
verses.english: Hitherto also, I, God, often desired to speak My intentions. But, as the day had not yet come, I have been holding back.

verses.pt: Por já estar o dia se tornando iminente, deixo explanado acerca de todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: But as the day is pressing step by step, I shall give you all of My teachings.
verses.ro: dandan to mo hi ga tsumari kiru kara wa   donna koto demo yute oku zo ya
verses.jp1: だん／＼ともふひがつまりきるからハ
verses.jp2: どんな事でもゆうてをくぞや
verses.kanji: 段々ともう日が詰り切るからは   どんな事でも言うて置くぞや
verses.english: But now step by step the day is pressing, so I will tell you any and everything beforehand.

verses.pt: Até o presente, seja quem for, da mesma maneira, todos duvidaram de tudo que foi dito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, people everywhere have been alike. Whatever I said, all was doubted.
verses.ro: koremade wa doko no hito demo onaji koto   nani o yutemo mina utagote
verses.jp1: これまでハどこの人でもをなじ事
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもみなうたごふて
verses.kanji: これ迄は何処の人でも同じ事   何を言うても皆疑うて
verses.english: Until now everyone everywhere has equally doubted My words, whatever I may say.

verses.pt: Desta vez, por se tratar da verdade real, se a isto contrariarem, devolverei prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, it is the real truth. If you turn away from it, I shall give you a return at once.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu de aru karani   kore somuitara suguni kayasu de
verses.jp1: このたびハほんしんぢつであるからに
verses.jp2: これそむいたらすぐにかやすで
verses.kanji: この度は本真実で有るからに   これ背いたら直ぐに返すで
verses.english: But this time it is the absolute truth. So, if you stand against Me, I will give a return at once.

verses.pt: No mundo, embora estejam desejando chuvas, ninguém conhece acerca de sua origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: In the world, there are those who desire rain, but perhaps no one knows its origin.
verses.ro: sekai niwa ame o hoshii to omota tote   kono moto naru o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: せかいにわあめをほしいとをもたとて
verses.jp2: このもとなるをたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 世界には雨を欲しいと思うたとて   この元なるを誰も知ろまい
verses.english: There are people in the world who want rain. But perhaps there is no one who knows the origin of it.

verses.pt: Começarei a explanar claramente esta origem, se ficarem cientes de todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to tell you clearly about this origin. If only you would understand all that I say...
verses.ro: kono moto o shikkari yute kakaru kara   donna koto demo shochi suru nara
verses.jp1: このもとをしいかりゆうてかゝるから
verses.jp2: どんな事でもしよちするなら
verses.kanji: この元を確り言うて掛かるから   どんな事でも承知して呉れ
verses.english: Now I will begin to tell you clearly about this truth. If only you understand My words, whatever I may say,

verses.pt: Hoje, faço a explanação não tida desde o início deste mundo. O que quer que diga, peço que a ouçam.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, a talk never given since this world began: please listen to whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa kono yo hajimete nai hanashi   nani o yutemo kore kiite kure
verses.jp1: けふの日ハこのよはじめてないはなし
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもこれきいてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日の日はこの世初めて無い話   何を言うてもこれ聞いて呉れ
verses.english: Today I will give you a talk which no one has ever heard since the creation. So, please listen to Me, whatever I may say!

verses.pt: Embora digam que este é o mundo de Deus, não conhecem a essência de todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though you are saying that this world is the world of God, you do not know the core of all matters.
verses.ro: kono yo wa Kami no sekai to yui nagara   donna koto demo shin wa shiran de
verses.jp1: このよふわ神のせかいとゆいながら
verses.jp2: どんな事でもしんわしらんで
verses.kanji: この世は神の世界と言いながら   どんな事でも芯は知らんで
verses.english: Even though you say that this is the world of God, you know nothing of the core of the truth of whatever things.

verses.pt: Mostrarei esta essência com sinceridade verdadeira. Vendo-a, convençam-se todos.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall truly manifest this core. When you see it, be convinced, all of you.
verses.ro: kono shin o makoto shinjitsu shite miseru   kore mita naraba mina tokushin se
verses.jp1: このしんをまことしんぢつしてみせる
verses.jp2: これみたならばみなとくしんせ
verses.kanji: この芯を誠真実して見せる   これ見たならば皆得心せ
verses.english: I will truly and really manifest this core of the truth. Looking at this, become convinced of it, all of you!

verses.pt: Qualquer coisa que se realize, é tudo Tsukihi. O que quer que diga, também, é tudo Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is done, it is all by Tsukihi. Whatever is said, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi   nani o yu no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をするのもみな月日
verses.jp2: なにをゆうのもみな月日やで
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするのも皆月日   何を言うのも皆月日やで
verses.english: Whatever I may do or say, it is all from the intention of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Desta vez, revelarei todas as coisas inexistentes desde quando iniciei este mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall manifest all things which have never existed since the world began.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono yo hajimete nai koto o   donna koto demo mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: このたびハこのよはじめてない事を
verses.jp2: どんな事でもみなあらわすで
verses.kanji: この度はこの世初めて無い事を   どんな事でも皆現すで
verses.english: This time I will manifest whatever things which have never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Tsukihi, mantendo-se abrigado no corpo humano, não se sabe que trabalhos poderá realizar.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi is dwelling within the body. There is no knowing what workings I shall do.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa tainai yori mo komori ite   donna shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: 月日にわたいないよりもこもりいて
verses.jp2: どんなしごとをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: 月日には体内よりも篭り居て   どんな仕事をするや知れんで
verses.english: Being inside your bodies, I, Tsukihi, will work whatever things which no one can foresee.

verses.pt: Qualquer que seja o sonho, é tudo Tsukihi. A realidade é também tudo Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may dream, it is all by Tsukihi. The reality seen, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona yume o miru no mo mina Tsukihi   makoto miru no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふなゆめをみるのもみな月日
verses.jp2: まことみるのもみな月日やで
verses.kanji: どの様な夢を見るのも皆月日   真見るのも皆月日やで
verses.english: Whatever things you may dream or actually see, they are all the providence of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Até o presente, nunca disse a respeito da origem da água deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Never yet have I spoken about the origin of water in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no mizu no moto naru koto oba na   mada koremade wa yuta koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふの水のもとなる事をばな
verses.jp2: まだこれまでわゆうた事なし
verses.kanji: この世の水の元なる事をばな   未だこれ迄は言うた事無し
verses.english: I have never told you yet the true origin of the water of this world.

verses.pt: Desta vez, a respeito da verdade real da água, não sabem que explanação poderei fazer.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, on the real truth of water, there is no knowing what kind of talk I shall give.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu no mizu no koto   donna hanashi o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: このたびハほんしんぢつの水の事
verses.jp2: どんなはなしをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: この度は本真実の水の事   どんな話をするや知れんで
verses.english: This time there is no knowing what kind of talk I may begin on the true origin of water.

verses.pt: Começarei a dizer certamente sobre esta origem, porém, não posso dizer enquanto estiverem no nível comum.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall begin to tell you about this origin clearly, but I cannot tell it as long as you think in common worldly ways.
verses.ro: kono moto o tashikani yute kakaru kara   sekainami naru koto de yuwaren
verses.jp1: この元をたしかにゆうてかゝるから
verses.jp2: せかいなみなる事でゆハれん
verses.kanji: この元を確かに言うて掛かるから   世界並なる事で言われん
verses.english: But, this time I am going to tell you about this origin surely. So I cannot tell it as long as you think in worldly ways.

verses.pt: De hoje em diante, começo a dizer todas as coisas. O que quer que diga, ouçam-me atentamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: From today, I shall begin to tell you about all matters whatever. Listen carefully to whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto mo yuikakeru   nani o yutemo shikato kiku nari
verses.jp1: けふからわどのよな事もゆいかける
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしかときくなり
verses.kanji: 今日からはどの様な事も言い掛ける   何を言うても確と聞くなり
verses.english: From today I begin to tell you any and everything. Listen attentively to whatever I may say!

verses.pt: Dia a dia, as pessoas dos altos montes procurarão e solicitarão gradualmente o que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day and step by step, those on the high mountains will come to Me to request or inquire whatever things.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni takayama nitewa dandan to   donna koto oba tanomi tazuneru
verses.jp1: にち／＼に高山にてわだん／＼と
verses.jp2: どんな事をばたのみたつねる
verses.kanji: 日々に高山にては段々と   どんな事をば頼み尋ねる
verses.english: Day by day and step by step, those who are on the high mountains will come to Me to entreat or inquire whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Se ao menos isto for visto, não haverá nenhum perigo no que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this comes to be, there will be no danger in any matters whatever.
verses.ro: kore saika mie kita naraba dono yona   koto mo abunaki sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: これさいかみゑきたならばどのよふな
verses.jp2: 事もあふなきさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: これさいか見え来たならばどの様な   事も危なき更に無いぞや
verses.english: If only this is realized, there shall be nothing dangerous on whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Não se sabe que explanação faço no dia de hoje. Peço que fiquem cientes do que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, there is no knowing what talks I shall give. Please understand whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o suru yara na   donna koto demo shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをするやらな
verses.jp2: どんな事でもしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何の話をするやらな   どんな事でも承知して呉れ
verses.english: Today there is no knowing what kind of talk I will tell you. Please comply with whatever I say!

verses.pt: Seja qual for o espírito de cada um, revelarei tudo seguramente no corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall make everything in the mind of each of you clearly manifest on your body.
verses.ro: meme no kokoro minouchi dono yona   koto demo shikato mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: めへ／＼の心みのうちどのよふな
verses.jp2: 事でもしかとみなあらわすで
verses.kanji: 銘々の心身の内どの様な   事でも確と皆現すで
verses.english: Whatever working of each of your minds, I will clearly show it in your bodies.

verses.pt: Ao ver isto, seja quem for, a limpeza do coração se realizará realmente por si só.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whoever you may be, when this is seen, the cleansing of the heart will be truly accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp1: これみたらどんなものでもしんぢつに
verses.jp2: むねのそふちがひとりてけるで
verses.kanji: これ見たらどんな者でも真実に   胸の掃除が独り出来るで
verses.english: You looking at this, the sweeping of your hearts will be truly accomplished of itself, whoever you may be.

verses.pt: Desta vez, o que quer que seja, realizarei revelando tudo claramente.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall bring all things clearly out into the open and demonstrate My working.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo sukiyaka ni   araware dashite mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: このたびハどんな事でもすきやかに
verses.jp2: あらわれだしてみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: この度はどんな事でも清きやかに   現れ出して皆して見せる
verses.english: Revealing Myself, this time I will positively manifest whatever kind of My working.

verses.pt: Não há quem conheça o que existe dentro do próprio corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is perhaps no one who knows what exists inside the body.
verses.ro: tainai ni nani ga aru yara dono yona   mono demo shirita mono wa arumai
verses.jp1: たいないになにがあるやらどのよふな
verses.jp2: ものでもしりたものわあるまい
verses.kanji: 体内に何が有るやらどの様な   者でも知りた者は有るまい
verses.english: Whoever you may be, you do not know what really exists inside your own body.

verses.pt: Nesta explanação, vejam o trabalho de Tsukihi. Não sabem o que realizará segundo o espírito de cada um.
verses.en_6th_ed: About this talk: look at the workings of Tsukihi! There is no knowing what I shall do in accordance with your mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi no shigoto kore o miyo   kokoro shidai ni nani o suru yara
verses.jp1: このはなし月日のし事これをみよ
verses.jp2: 心しだいになにをするやら
verses.kanji: この話月日の仕事これを見よ   心次第に何をするやら
verses.english: Now I am talking about the working of Tsukihi. Look at this! I will do whatever working which no one can foresee, in accordance with your mind.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, todos estão sem nada saber por permanecerem no nível comum ao mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, being aware of nothing, all people remain in a common worldly state.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanimo shirazu ni tare nitemo   sekainami naru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにもしらすにたれにても
verses.jp2: せかいなみなる事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何も知らずに誰にても   世界並なる事で有れども
verses.english: Today knowing nothing about it, you are all worldly.

verses.pt: Não sabem que caminho poderão ver amanhã. A essência do espírito se revelará.
verses.en_6th_ed: But what path will be seen tomorrow? The core of your mind will become apparent.
verses.ro: asunichi wa doyu michi o miru yara na   shin no kokoro ga arawarete kuru
verses.jp1: あすにちハどふゆうみちをみるやらな
verses.jp2: しんの心があらわれてくる
verses.kanji: 明日日はどういう道を見るやらな   芯の心が現れて来る
verses.english: There is no knowing what way shall come into sight tomorrow. My working shall appear in accordance with the true core of your mind.

verses.pt: Se este espírito for revelado, não há quem possa opor-se em absoluto.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this mind is fully apparent, no one will ever be able to turn away.
verses.ro: kono kokoro araware detaru koto naraba   tare mo somuki wa sarani dekemai
verses.jp1: この心あらわれでたる事ならば
verses.jp2: たれもそむきわさらにてけまい
verses.kanji: この心現れ出たる事ならば   誰も背きは更に出来まい
verses.english: When the working of God appears in accordance with each of your minds, no one shall be able to stand against it.

verses.pt: Ao ver isto, seja quem for, todos refletirão profundamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this is seen, all of you, whoever you may be, will bow your head and truly ponder.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   atama katagete mina shiyan suru
verses.jp1: これみたらどんなものでもしんちつに
verses.jp2: あたまかたけてみなしやんする
verses.kanji: これ見たらどんな者でも真実に   頭傾けて皆思案する
verses.english: When you look at this, you shall truly ponder over it with your head bent, whoever you may be.

verses.pt: Reflitam bem! Se ao menos este espírito vier a ser determinado seguramente...
verses.en_6th_ed: Now ponder! If only the settling of this mind is definitely accomplished...
verses.ro: sa shiyan kono kokoro sai shikkari to   sadame tsuitaru koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: さあしやんこの心さいしいかりと
verses.jp2: さだめついたる事であるなら
verses.kanji: さあ思案この心さい確りと   定め付いたる事で有るなら
verses.english: Now, ponder over it well! If only your mind is firmly determined,

verses.pt: Estas explanações são inteiramente do espírito de Tsukihi. Não pensem que haja cogitação humana.
verses.en_6th_ed: This talk is solely from the mind of Tsukihi. Do not think I have a human mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi no kokoro bakari ya de   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
verses.jp1: このはなし月日の心ばかりやで
verses.jp2: にんけん心あるとをもうな
verses.kanji: この話月日の心ばかりやで   人間心有ると思うな
verses.english: This talk is from none other than the mind of Tsukihi. Never think that I have a human mind!

verses.pt: Se todas as pessoas, igualmente, pedirem crendo nisso com sinceridade, tudo será atendido.
verses.en_6th_ed: If all of you in the world pray with this thought sincerely held, you shall receive any blessing, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: kono koto o mina ichiretsu wa shinjitsu ni   omote tanomeba donna koto demo
verses.jp1: この事をみな一れつハしんちつに
verses.jp2: をもてたのめばどんな事でも
verses.kanji: この事を皆一列は真実に   思うて頼めばどんな事でも
verses.english: If all of you equally pray to Me with this belief, I will answer all your prayers, whatever they may be.

verses.pt: Embora até hoje tivessem diversas preocupações, a partir de amanhã, terão um amplo caminho.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you have worried about many things. But from tomorrow, a broad path will open.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanika shinpai shita naredo   asunichi kara wa okwan no michi
verses.jp1: 一けふまでわなにかしんばいしたなれど
verses.jp2: あすにちからわをふくハんのみち
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何か心配したなれど   明日日からは往還の道
verses.english: Until today you have experienced anxiety about everything. But from tomorrow you will come up to a broad way.

verses.pt: Até agora, vim somente informando, pois eram vistas várias dificuldades no caminho.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, because I foresaw all the paths of hardship, My words were filled with warnings.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna nanju na michisuji mo   miete aru kara kotowari bakari
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどんななんぢうなみちすちも
verses.jp2: みへてあるからことわりばかり
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな難渋な道筋も   見えて有るから断りばかり
verses.english: Until now I have been solely warning you, because whatever way of hardships has always been in My sight.

verses.pt: Doravante, Tsukihi certamente se encarregará. Seja em que for, não haverá qualquer perigo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, as it is Tsukihi who firmly assures you, there will be no danger in anything at all.
verses.ro: konosaki wa tashika ukeyau Tsukihi niwa   donna koto demo abunaki wa nai
verses.jp1: このさきハたしかうけやう月日にハ
verses.jp2: どんな事でもあふなきハない
verses.kanji: この先は確か請け合う月日には   どんな事でも危なきは無い
verses.english: Henceforth I, Tsukihi, will guarantee everything assuredly. So there shall remain nothing dangerous in whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Seja qual for a explanação que ouvirem gradualmente, todos do mundo, tenham prazer! É trabalho de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever tidings you may hear step by step, rejoice all the world. They are the workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dandan to donna hanashi o kiita tote   sekai tanoshime Tsukihi hataraki
verses.jp1: たん／＼とどんなはなしをきいたとて
verses.jp2: せかいたのしめ月日はたらき
verses.kanji: 段々とどんな話を聞いたとて   世界楽しめ月日働き
verses.english: Whatever talks you may hear one after another, rejoice in them, all of you of the world! Because they are the working of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Doravante, Tsukihi sairá e trabalhará, e ninguém sabe o que poderá realizar.
verses.en_6th_ed: The work that Tsukihi will go forth to do from now on: perhaps no one knows what it will be.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   nani o suru tomo tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: これからわ月日でかけるはたらきに
verses.jp2: なにをするともたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: これからは月日出掛ける働きに   何をするとも誰も知ろまい
verses.english: From now on I, Tsukihi, will go forth to work. Perhaps no one knows what I will do.

verses.pt: Ao observar dia a dia o mundo, todos os filhos me inspiram compaixão.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, looking throughout the world, I feel pity for all My children.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni sekai no tokoro misumaseba   ichiretsu kodomo ijirashii koto
verses.jp1: にち／＼にせかいのところみすませば
verses.jp2: 一れつこどもいぢらしい事
verses.kanji: 日々に世界の所見澄ませば   一列子供いじらしい事
verses.english: Looking through all the the regions of the world day by day, I feel deep pity for all My children.

verses.pt: Tsukihi apressa somente as preparações para salvar gradualmente o que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: All the efforts of Tsukihi made step by step are solely to hasten preparations for your salvation.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan donna koto demo na   tasukeru moyo seku bakari ya de
verses.jp1: 月日にわたん／＼どんな事でもな
verses.jp2: たすけるもよふせくはかりやで
verses.kanji: 月日には段々どんな事でもな   救ける模様急くばかりやで
verses.english: Step by step I, Tsukihi, am single-heartedly hastening arrangements to save you from any and every suffering.

verses.pt: Até o presente, só tenho dado informações. Doravante, já não darei mais informações.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I have given you nothing but warnings. From now on, there will be warnings no longer.
verses.ro: koremade wa kotowari bakari yute oita   mo korekara wa kotowari wa nai
verses.jp1: これまでハことわりはかりゆてをいた
verses.jp2: もふこれからハことハりわない
verses.kanji: これ迄は断りばかり言うて置いた   もうこれからは断りは無い
verses.english: Hitherto I have always given you warning and nothing else. But henceforth there shall be no more of it.

verses.pt: Até hoje, sem nada saberem, estiveram preocupados apenas com cogitação humana.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, being aware of nothing, you have used only the human mind and worried yourselves.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ningen no   kokoro bakari de shinpai o shita
verses.jp1: けふまでわなにもしらすににんけんの
verses.jp2: 心ばかりでしんはいをした
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何も知らずに人間の   心ばかりで心配をした
verses.english: Unil today, being aware of nothing, you have experienced anxiety only with human thoughts.

verses.pt: Doravante, reformando firmemente o espírito e amparados em Deus, executem o Serviço Alegre.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now, firmly replace that mind, lean on God, and do the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: korekara wa kokoro shikkari irekaete   Kami ni motarete Yoki-zutome o
verses.jp1: これからハ心しいかりいれかへて
verses.jp2: 神にもたれてよふきつとめを
verses.kanji: これからは心確り入れ替えて   神に凭れて陽気勤めを
verses.english: Henceforth replacing your mind definitely, lean upon God and thus perform the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service!

verses.pt: Se assim fizerem, revelarei tal qual segura e prontamente uma graça. Peço que observem isto.
verses.en_6th_ed: When it is done, I shall directly reveal blessings clearly. Watch for them.
verses.ro: shitaru nara sono mama suguni shikkari to   riyaku arawasu kore o mite kure
verses.jp1: したるならそのまゝすくにしいかりと
verses.jp2: りやくあらわすこれをみてくれ
verses.kanji: したるならその侭直ぐに確りと   利益現すこれを見て呉れ
verses.english: Then at once I will assuredly manifest the divine grace. Look at this!

verses.pt: Se ao menos esta graça for certamente vista, depois tudo será Kanrodai para sempre.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only the blessings are clearly seen, thereafter all will be the Kanrodai for all time.
verses.ro: kore saika tashika riyaku ga mieta nara   ato wa itsu demo mina Kanrodai
verses.jp1: これさいかたしかりやくがみへたなら
verses.jp2: あとわいつてもみなかんろふだい
verses.kanji: これさいか確か利益が見えたなら   後は何時でも皆甘露台
verses.english: If only this divine grace assuredly appears, thereafter the world of the  Kanrodai shall be realized at any moment on whatever kinds of matters.

verses.pt: Doravante, uma vez dito por Tsukihi, o que quer que seja, não poderão contrariar.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, you shall not be able to turn away from whatever words Tsukihi once says.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Tsukihi ichido yuta koto   donna koto demo somuki dekemai
verses.jp1: このさきわ月日一どふゆうた事
verses.jp2: どんな事でもそむきでけまい
verses.kanji: この先は月日一度言うた事   どんな事でも背き出来まい
verses.english: Henceforth you shall never be able to go against the words which I, Tsukihi, have once said.

verses.pt: Se desprezarem o que Tsukihi disser, me retirarei imediatamente. Fiquem cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you erase the words of Tsukihi, I shall withdraw at once. Beware!
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yutaru koto o kesu naraba   suguni shirizoku shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: 月日よりゆうたる事をけすならば
verses.jp2: すぐにしりぞくしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: 月日より言うたる事を消すならば   直ぐに退く承知して居よ
verses.english: If you put out the words which I, Tsukihi, have once said, I will withdraw from your body at once. Be forewarned!

verses.pt: Até agora, tanto os de casa como os do mundo, por não terem no espírito a verdadeira compreensão,
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, in the minds of those within and those of the world, there has been no true understanding.
verses.ro: imamade wa uchi mo sekai mo shinjitsu no   kokoro ni wakari sarani nai node
verses.jp1: いまゝでハうちもせかいもしんちつの
verses.jp2: 心にわかりさらにないので
verses.kanji: 今迄は内も世界も真実の   心に分かり更に無いので
verses.english: Until now both you familiar with Me, and other people of the world could not understand My intention at all in your true mind.

verses.pt: Para Tsukihi, isto é o maior pesar. Se pudesse purificar de algum modo...
verses.en_6th_ed: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. If I could somehow make your minds clear...
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nanto kore oba sumashitaru nara
verses.jp1: 月日にハ大一これがざんねんな
verses.jp2: なんとこれをばすましたるなら
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これが残念な   何とこれをば澄ましたるなら
verses.english: For Me, Tsukihi,this has been the cause of My utmost regret. If only I can make your minds clear,

verses.pt: Como fazer para entender este espírito? De alguma maneira, é necessário advertir.
verses.en_6th_ed: How can I bring understanding to your minds? In any case I must admonish you.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doshita naraba wakaru yara   nandemo iken seneba naran de
verses.jp1: この心どふしたならばわかるやら
verses.jp2: なんてもいけんせねならんで
verses.kanji: この心どうしたならば分かるやら   何でも意見せねばならんで
verses.english: How can I make your minds understand Me? In any case I must admonish you.

verses.pt: A advertência é difícil, pois não se limita a poucas pessoas, mas, aos corações de muitas.
verses.en_6th_ed: This admonition is not just for a few. As it concerns the hearts of so many, it is indeed difficult.
verses.ro: iken demo chotto no hito dewa nai karani   oku no mune ga kore wa mutsukashi
verses.jp1: いけんでも一寸の人でわないからに
verses.jp2: をふくのむねがこれわむつかし
verses.kanji: 意見でも一寸の人では無いからに   多くの胸がこれは難し
verses.english: It is not just a few people whom I must admonish. It is indeed very difficult to purify the hearts of numerous people.

verses.pt: Por mais que tenha dito ser difícil, advirto tal como fazem com os seus próprios filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: However difficult it may be, I shall admonish My children, one and all.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   meme no kodomo iken suru zo ya
verses.jp1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp2: めへ／＼のこどもいけんするぞや
verses.kanji: 如何程に難し事と言うたとて   銘々の子供意見するぞや
verses.english: However difficult it may be, I will admonish you because you are all My children.

verses.pt: Qual a melhor forma de se fazer isto? De algum modo, o pesar de Deus será revelado.
verses.en_6th_ed: What is the best way to accomplish it? By all means, I shall manifest the regret of God.
verses.ro: kono moyo doshita naraba yokaro zo   nandemo Kami no zanen arawasu
verses.jp1: このもよふどふしたならばよかろふぞ
verses.jp2: なんでも神のさねんあらわす
verses.kanji: この模様どうしたならば良かろうぞ   何でも神の残念現す
verses.english: By what means can I accomplish this admonition? By all means I will manifest the regret of God.

verses.pt: Embora as poeiras se acumulem dia a dia e gradualmente também no coração de Deus,
verses.en_6th_ed: Day by day and step by step, the dust piles up and fills the heart of God.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no mune niwa dandan to   hokori ippai tsumori aredomo
verses.jp1: にち／＼に神のむねにハたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ほこりいゝばいつもりあれども
verses.kanji: 日々に神の胸には段々と   埃一杯積り有れども
verses.english: Day by day, so much dust has gradually been piled up that regret fills the heart of God.

verses.pt: É difícil fazer a limpeza destas poeiras. Se ao menos começarem a executar o Serviço...
verses.en_6th_ed: This dust is difficult to sweep away. But if you only begin the Service...
verses.ro: kono hokori soji suru no wa mutsukashii   Tsutome nari tomo kakaritaru nara
verses.jp1: このほこりそふぢするのハむつかしい
verses.jp2: つとめなりともかゝりたるなら
verses.kanji: この埃掃除するのは難しい   勤めなりとも掛かりたるなら
verses.english: It is difficult to clear this dust away. But if you only begin to perform the Service,

verses.pt: Se Deus aceitar ao menos a sinceridade do espírito, fará a limpeza de qualquer poeira.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only your minds are truly accepted by God, I shall sweep away any dust whatever.
verses.ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu Kami ga uketoreba   donna hokori mo soji suru nari
verses.jp1: 心さいしんぢつ神がうけとれば
verses.jp2: どんなほこりもそふぢするなり
verses.kanji: 心さい真実神が受け取れば   どんな埃も掃除するなり
verses.english: If only I, God, accept the sincerity of your mind, I will sweep away any and every dust, whatever it may be.

verses.pt: Se ao menos for feita plenamente a limpeza do íntimo do coração de todos,
verses.en_6th_ed: If only the innermost hearts of all humankind are swept clean,
verses.ro: ichiretsu no mune no uchi sai sukiyaka ni   soji shitateta koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: いちれつのむねのうちさいすきやかに
verses.jp2: そふちしたてた事であるなら
verses.kanji: 一列の胸の内さい清きやかに   掃除仕立てた事で有るなら
verses.english: If only I accomplish this sweeping of dust from the inner-most hearts of all of you,

verses.pt: Desde então, o mundo inteiro se animará e se tornará naturalmente repleto de alegria.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then, the whole world will be spirited and joyousness will come of its own accord.
verses.ro: sorekara wa sekaiju wa ki ga isamu   yokizukume ni hitori naru zo ya
verses.jp1: それからわせかいぢううハきがいさむ
verses.jp2: よふきづくめにひとりなるぞや
verses.kanji: それからは世界中は気が勇む   陽気ずくめに独りなるぞや
verses.english: Thereafter all people of the whole world shall become cheered up, and this world shall become full of joy of its own accord.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Observando tanto os altos montes como o fundo dos vales, são todos filhos de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! From the high mountains to the low valleys, I see no one but Tsukihi's children.
verses.ro: shikato kike takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   mireba Tsukihi no kodomo bakari ya
verses.jp1: しかときけ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp2: みれば月日のこどもばかりや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け高山にても谷底も   見れば月日の子供ばかりや
verses.english: Listen attentively! Looking over the high mountains and into the bottoms of the valleys, I, Tsukihi, find no one but My children.

verses.pt: Todos os seres humanos também têm afeição pelos filhos. Reflitam sobre o pesar de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: You human beings must all love your children. From this, please think of the regret of God.
verses.ro: ningen mo ichiretsu kodomo kawaikaro   Kami no zannen kore omote kure
verses.jp1: にんけんも一れつこともかハいかろ
verses.jp2: 神のさんねんこれをもてくれ
verses.kanji: 人間も一列子供可愛かろ   神の残念これ思うて呉れ
verses.english: Every one of you human beings must be loving your own children. From that feel for the regret of God!

verses.pt: Embora até agora tenha visto quaisquer fatos, Deus ficou apenas observando.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hitherto, no matter what had been seen, God only looked on, keeping still.
verses.ro: koremade wa dono yona koto o mita totemo   Kami no ho niwa jitto mite ita
verses.jp1: これまてハどのよな事をみたとても
verses.jp2: 神のほふにハぢいとみていた
verses.kanji: これ迄はどの様な事を見たとても   神の方にはじっと見て居た
verses.english: Hitherto, whatever I may have seen, I, God, have overlooked it keeping quiet.

verses.pt: Desta vez, o dia já chegou, de modo que, o que quer que seja, tudo será dito.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as the day is pressing, I shall speak out on everything, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna koto demo mina yu hodoni
verses.jp1: このたびわもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp2: どんな事でもみなゆうほどに
verses.kanji: この度はもう日が詰んで有るからな   どんな事でも皆言う程に
verses.english: But this time as the day is pressing, I will tell you any and everything, whatever it may be.

verses.pt: Embora Tsukihi observe o mundo inteiro, não há quem conheça a criação original.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though Tsukihi looks all over the world, there is no one who knows the origin.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju o miwatasedo   moto hajimari o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: 月日にわせかいぢううをみハたせど
verses.jp2: もとはじまりをしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 月日には世界中を見渡せど   元初まりを知りた者無し
verses.english: Looking all over the whole world, I, Tsukihi, find no one who knows the truth about the creation.

verses.pt: Pelo desejo profundo de ensinar esta origem ao mundo, Tsukihi veio a revelar-se.
verses.en_6th_ed: Desiring to teach this origin to the world by all means, Tsukihi has become revealed.
verses.ro: kono moto o dozo sekai e oshietasa   sokode Tsukihi ga arawarete deta
verses.jp1: このもとをどふぞせかいへをしへたさ
verses.jp2: そこで月日があらわれてゞた
verses.kanji: この元をどうぞ世界へ教えたさ   そこで月日が現れて出た
verses.english: From My earnest desire to teach this origin to all people of the world, I, Tsukihi, have revealed Myself.

verses.pt: Saibam que este pesar de Tsukihi não é coisa insignificante.
verses.en_6th_ed: About the regret of Tsukihi at this time: know that it is not a small matter.
verses.ro: konotabi no Tsukihi zanen to yu mono wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このたびの月日ざねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この度の月日残念と言うものは   容易なる事で無いと思えよ
verses.english: This time the regret of Tsukihi is not a slight one. Understand it well!

verses.pt: Tsukihi deseja ensinar esta verdade ao mundo inteiro, de toda e qualquer maneira.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi desires to teach this truth throughout the world by all means.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   doshite nari to oshietai kara
verses.jp1: 月日にハこのしんぢつをせかへぢうゑ
verses.jp2: どふしてなりとをしへたいから
verses.kanji: 月日にはこの真実を世界中へ   どうしてなりと教えたいから
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, desire to teach this truth to all people of the whole world by all means.

verses.pt: Sem saber disso, desprezando tudo que Tsukihi diz, alastra-se a cogitação humana.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of it, you erase all the words of Tsukihi, and all that remains is rampant human thinking.
verses.ro: sore shirazu Tsukihi yu koto mina keshite   ato wa ningen gokoro habikaru
verses.jp1: それしらず月日ゆう事みなけして
verses.jp2: あとわにんけん心はびかる
verses.kanji: それ知らず月日言う事皆消して   後は人間心蔓延る
verses.english: Unaware of this, you put out all the words of Tsukihi, and thereafter only selfish human thoughts grow rampant.

verses.pt: De agora em diante, Tsukihi dissipará todo o seu pesar e a ira. Estão cientes disto?
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall clear away all the regret and anger of Tsukihi. Are you aware of it?
verses.ro: konosaki wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku o   mina harasu de na kore ga shochi ka
verses.jp1: このさきハ月日のざねんりいふくを
verses.jp2: みなはらすでなこれがしよちか
verses.kanji: この先は月日の残念立腹を   皆晴らすでなこれが承知か
verses.english: Henceforth I will clear away all the regret and anger of Tsukihi. Are you well aware of it?

verses.pt: Após dissipar o pesar e a ira, Tsukihi abrirá um caminho extraordinário.
verses.en_6th_ed: After the regret and anger of Tsukihi are cleared away, I shall open a marvelous path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo zanen rippuku harashitara   ato wa mezurashi michi o tsukeru de
verses.jp1: 月日にもざねんりいふくはらしたら
verses.jp2: あとハめづらしみちをつけるで
verses.kanji: 月日にも残念立腹晴らしたら   後は珍し道を付けるで
verses.english: When the regret and anger of Tsukihi is cleared away, I will open a remarkable way.

verses.pt: Que imaginam ser este caminho? Somente a salvação mútua em todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this path is to be? It is solely mutual help among all people in all matters.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   yorozu tagaini tasuke bakari o
verses.jp1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: よろづたがいにたすけばかりを
verses.kanji: この道はどういう事に思うかな   万互いに救けばかりを
verses.english: What do you think this way is? It is a way solely to help each other in any and everything.

verses.pt: Se o mundo inteiro salvarem-se mutuamente, Tsukihi se encarregará do espírito de todos.
verses.en_6th_ed: If all the world comes to help one another, Tsukihi will accept all your minds.
verses.ro: sekaiju tagaini tasuke suru naraba   Tsukihi mo kokoro mina hikiukeru
verses.jp1: せかいぢうたがいにたすけするならば
verses.jp2: 月日も心みなひきうける
verses.kanji: 世界中互いに救けするならば   月日も心皆引き受ける
verses.english: If all people of the whole world help each other, I, Tsukihi, will heartily take charge of any and everything.

verses.pt: Ao encarregar-se do espírito, Tsukihi realizará qualquer trabalho.
