verses.en_6th_ed: If Tsukihi accepts your minds, I shall work in all matters whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo kokoro hikiuke suru kara wa   donna koto demo hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: 月日にも心ひきうけするからわ
verses.jp2: どんな事でもはたらきをする
verses.kanji: 月日にも心引き受けするからは   どんな事でも働きをする
verses.english: When I, Tsukihi, heartily take charge of, I will work My omnipotence on whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: O que pensam ser este trabalho? Consiste somente em distinguir entre o bem e o mal.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this working is to be? It is solely to distinguish between good and evil.
verses.ro: hataraki mo doyu koto ni omou kana   zen to aku to o wakeru bakari ya
verses.jp1: はたらきもどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: 善とあくとをわけるばかりや
verses.kanji: 働きもどういう事に思うかな   善と悪とを分けるばかりや
verses.english: What do you think of My workings? They are solely workings to distinguish good from evil.

verses.pt: Qualquer que seja o mal referido até hoje, não há quem o reconheça em seu próprio corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, whatever wrongdoing there is said to be, perhaps none of you has known of it on your body.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna akuji to yuta tote   waga mi ni shirita mono wa arumai
verses.jp1: けふまでわどんなあくじとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: わがみにしりたものハあるまい
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな悪事と言うたとて   我が身に知りた者は有るまい
verses.english: Until today, whatever wrongdoing one may commit, no one has ever known how it shall appear in one's own body.

verses.pt: Deus explicará a verdade sobre este espírito. Reflitam todos igualmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: God will teach you the truth about this. Ponder over it, all of you.
verses.ro: kono kokoro Kami ga shinjitsu yute kikasu   mina ichiretsu wa shiyan shite kure
verses.jp1: この心神がしんぢつゆてきかす
verses.jp2: みないちれつわしやんしてくれ
verses.kanji: この心神が真実言うて聞かす   皆一列は思案して呉れ
verses.english: I, God, will truly tell you about this kind of mind. Please ponder over it deeply, all of you!

verses.pt: Todas as pessoas do mundo são igualmente irmãos, não há quem seja estranho.
verses.en_6th_ed: All of you throughout the world are brothers and sisters. There should be no one called an outsider.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu wa mina kyodai ya   tanin to yu wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp1: せかいぢういちれつわみなきよたいや
verses.jp2: たにんとゆうわさらにないぞや
verses.kanji: 世界中一列は皆兄弟や   他人と言うは更に無いぞや
verses.english: All people of the whole world are equally brothers and sisters. There is no one who is an utter stranger.

verses.pt: Não há quem conheça esta origem. Isto é o pesar de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: That there is no one who knows the origin of this is the very cause of the regret of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node na   sore ga Tsukihi no zanen bakari ya
verses.jp1: このもとをしりたるものハないのでな
verses.jp2: それが月日のざねんばかりや
verses.kanji: この元を知りたる者は無いのでな   それが月日の残念ばかりや
verses.english: There is no one who has known the truth of this origin. It is the very cause of the regret of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Tanto as pessoas que vivem nos altos montes como no fundo dos vales, são todas almas iguais.
verses.en_6th_ed: Those living in the high mountains and those living in the low valleys: their souls are all the same.
verses.ro: takayama ni kurashite irumo tanisoko ni   kurashite irumo onashi tamahii
verses.jp1: 高山にくらしているもたにそこに
verses.jp2: くらしているもをなしたまひい
verses.kanji: 高山に暮らして居るも谷底に   暮らして居るも同じ魂
verses.english: The souls of all people are equal, whether they live on the high mountains or at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.pt: Além disso, os instrumentos usados gradualmente são todos emprestados por Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Furthermore, the instruments you use daily are all things lent by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: soreyori mo dandan tsukau dogu wa na   mina Tsukihi yori kashimono naru zo
verses.jp1: それよりもたん／＼つかうどふぐわな
verses.jp2: みな月日よりかしものなるぞ
verses.kanji: それよりも段々使う道具はな   皆月日より貸し物なるぞ
verses.english: Furthermore, the instruments which you daily use are things which I, Tsukihi, lend you.

verses.pt: Sem saber disso, o espírito humano julga que há tanto o alto como o baixo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, the thought in the minds of all human beings is that there are the high and the low.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ningen no kokoro dewa   nando takabiku aru to omote
verses.jp1: それしらすみなにんけんの心でわ
verses.jp2: なんどたかびくあるとをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆人間の心では   なんぞ高低有ると思うて
verses.english: Unaware of this, through human mind you all have the misconception that there is discrimination between high and low.

verses.pt: Tsukihi deseja ensinar esta verdade ao mundo inteiro. Fiquem firmemente cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: By all means, Tsukihi desires to make the truth of this matter clearly understood by the whole world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari shochi sashitai
verses.jp1: 月日にハこのしんぢつをせかいぢうへ
verses.jp2: どふぞしいかりしよちさしたい
verses.kanji: 月日にはこの真実を世界中へ   どうぞ確り承知さしたい
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, earnestly desire to make people of the whole world clearly understand this truth.

verses.pt: Se ao menos ficarem certamente cientes disto, as raízes dos conflitos serão cortadas.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only this is clearly understood, the root of rebellion will be cut off.
verses.ro: kore saika tashikani shochi shita naraba   muhon no ne wa kirete shimau ni
verses.jp1: これさいかたしかにしよちしたならば
verses.jp2: むほんのねへわきれてしまうに
verses.kanji: これさいか確かに承知したならば   謀反の根は切れてしまうに
verses.english: If only you can clearly understand this truth, the root of rebellion shall be entirely cut off.

verses.pt: Tsukihi deseja sinceramente pôr fim ao menos às guerras dos altos montes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi sincerely desires only to end the wars among those on the high mountains.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu omou takayama no   tatakai saika osametaru nara
verses.jp1: 月日よりしんぢつをもう高山の
verses.jp2: たゝかいさいかをさめたるなら
verses.kanji: 月日より真実思う高山の   戦いさいか治めたるなら
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, sincerely desire to settle the war among the people on the high mountains.

verses.pt: Como fazer para pacificar estas situações? Se começarem a executar o Serviço Alegre...
verses.en_6th_ed: By what means can they be ended? If only you set forth on the Joyous Service...
verses.ro: kono moyo doshita naraba osamaro   Yoki-zutome ni detaru koto nara
verses.jp1: このもよふどふしたならばをさまろふ
verses.jp2: よふきづとめにでたる事なら
verses.kanji: この模様どうしたならば治まろう   陽気勤めに出たる事なら
verses.english: With what arrangements can it be settled? Peace shall come, if only you go forth to perform the Yoki-Zutome, the Joyous Service.

verses.pt: Não julguem de quem seja esta intenção. É somente do espírito de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder from whose mind these words come. They are solely from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono kokoro tare ga yu towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp1: この心たれがゆうとハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.kanji: この心誰が言うとは思うなよ   月日の心ばかりなるぞや
verses.english: Never wonder from whom these words come! They come from none other than the mind of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Este Serviço é difícil devido aos altos montes, entretanto, Deus se encarregará firmemente.
verses.en_6th_ed: It is difficult to do this Service because of the high mountains, but God gives you firm assurance.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome takayama nitewa mutsukashii   Kami ga shikkari hikiuke o suru
verses.jp1: このつとめ高山にてハむつかしい
verses.jp2: 神がしいかりひきうけをする
verses.kanji: この勤め高山にては難しい   神が確り引き受けをする
verses.english: This Service may be interfered with by those on the high mountains. But God will assuredly take charge of its performance.

verses.pt: Desta vez, encarregando-se de tudo, realizará os seus trabalhos seguramente.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, in all matters, I shall truly give you My firm assurance and shall work.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo shinjitsu ni   tashika ukeyai hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: このたびわどんな事でもしんちつに
verses.jp2: たしかうけやいはたらきをする
verses.kanji: この度はどんな事でも真実に   確か請け合い働きをする
verses.english: This time I will truly and assuredly guarantee it and work My omnipotence, despite whatever kinds of things that may occur.

verses.pt: Se Deus revelar-se e trabalhar no mundo inteiro, qual seja o Serviço, nada haverá a temer.
verses.en_6th_ed: When God goes forth and works throughout the world, there will be nothing to fear in doing any Service.
verses.ro: Kami ga dete sekaiju o hatarakeba   donna Tsutome mo kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp1: 神がでゝせかいぢううをはたらけば
verses.jp2: どんなつとめもこハみないぞや
verses.kanji: 神が出て世界中を働けば   どんな勤めも怖み無いぞや
verses.english: When I, God, rush out to the fore and work all over the world, any and every Service can be performed without fear.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Embora os altos montes viessem submetendo o fundo dos vales à sua vontade,
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! Though the high mountains, boastful, have done as they pleased to the low valleys,
verses.ro: shikato kike takayama ya tote tanisoko o   mamani shirareta koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: しかときけ高山やとてたにそこを
verses.jp2: まゝにしられた事であれども
verses.kanji: 確と聞け高山やとて谷底を   侭にしられた事で有れども
verses.english: Listen attentively! Although the people on the high mountains have hitherto done as they please to the people at the bottoms of the valleys,

verses.pt: De agora em diante, Tsukihi sairá no lugar destes. Se querem submeter à sua vontade, tentem fazê-lo.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, Tsukihi shall come out in their place. Let them try to do as they please if they dare.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi kawari ni deru hodoni   mamani shiyo nara sureba shite miyo
verses.jp1: これからわ月日かハりにでるほどに
verses.jp2: まゝにしよならすればしてみよ
verses.kanji: これからは月日代わりに出る程に   侭にしようならすればして見よ
verses.english: From now on, I, Tsukihi, will go forth instead of them. Let them act as they please, if they think it possible!

verses.pt: De agora em diante, a expressão será diferente. Será à vontade de Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: Everything will be different from what it has been until now. From now on, it will be as God intends.
verses.ro: imamade to nanika monku ga chigau de na   korekara saki wa Kami no mama ya de
verses.jp1: いまゝでとなにかもんくがちがうてな
verses.jp2: これからさきハ神のまゝやで
verses.kanji: 今迄と何か文句が違うでな   これから先は神の侭やで
verses.english: The state of everything shall be changed from what it has been so far. In the future everything shall be realized as I, God, intend.

verses.pt: A intenção com que Tsukihi desceu do céu, não há quem saiba o que possa ser.
verses.en_6th_ed: Perhaps no one knows the intention of Tsukihi in descending from Heaven.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori amakudari taru kokoro na   nanno koto yara tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: 月日よりあまくだりたる心な
verses.jp2: なんの事やらたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 月日より天下りたる心はな   何の事やら誰も知ろまい
verses.english: Perhaps no one knows My intention, why I, God, have descended from Heaven.

verses.pt: Por ser mais importante ajudar no cultivo e colheita, deseja ensinar unicamente sobre o fertilizante.
verses.en_6th_ed: First, to help those who grow crops, I desired to teach you on the matter of the fertilizer.
verses.ro: daiichi wa ryuke tsukuru o tasuketasa   koe ichijo o oshietai kara
verses.jp1: 大一わりゆうけつくるをたすけたさ
verses.jp2: こゑ一ぢよふをしへたいから
verses.kanji: 第一は立毛作るを救けたさ   肥一条を教えたいから
verses.english: First, to help you cultivate crops, I desired to teach you on the matter of the fertilizer.

verses.pt: Quanto ao fertilizante, não sabem como o seu efeito ocorre. É quando Deus aceitar o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder why the fertilizer is effective. If only God accepts your mind...
verses.ro: koe demo na doshite kiku to omouna yo   kokoro o Kami ga uketorita nara
verses.jp1: こゑてもなどふしてきくとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: こゝろを神がうけとりたなら
verses.kanji: 肥でもなどうして効くと思うなよ   心を神が受け取りたなら
verses.english: Never wonder why the divine fertilizer is so effective! If only I, God, accept your mind,

verses.pt: Embora até agora Deus tenha dito a verdade, somente duvidaram, a começar pelos de casa.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though God has been speaking the truth until now, even those within only have doubts.
verses.ro: imamade wa shinjitsu Kami ga yute aredo   uchi kara shitemo utagau bakari
verses.jp1: いまゝてハしんぢつ神がゆてあれど
verses.jp2: うちからしてもうたがうはかり
verses.kanji: 今迄は真実神が言うて有れど   内からしても疑うばかり
verses.english: Although I, God, have hitherto been speaking the truth, even you familiar with me have always entertained a doubt.

verses.pt: Desta vez, o que quer que diga, não duvidem. Se duvidarem, Tsukihi se retirará.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, do not doubt whatever I say. If you doubt, Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nani o yutemo utagau na   kore utagaeba Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp1: 此のたびハなにをゆうてもうたがうな
verses.jp2: これうたがへば月日しりぞく
verses.kanji: この度は何を言うても疑うな   これ疑えば月日退く
verses.english: This time, never doubt whatever I say! If you doubt, I, God, will withdraw.

verses.pt: Este fato é dito insistentemente. Se duvidarem, se arrependerão realmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: I repeat this to you tediously. If you doubt, you will truly repent it.
verses.ro: kono koto wa akudoi hodomo yute oku   kore utagaeba makoto kokwai
verses.jp1: この事ハあくどいほともゆうてをく
verses.jp2: これうたがへばまことこふくハい
verses.kanji: この事はあくどい程も言うて置く   これ疑えば誠後悔
verses.english: This matter I repeat to you so tediously that it may seem excessive. If you doubt it, you will indeed repent of it.

verses.pt: O que Tsukihi deixar dito uma vez, quando quer que seja, não haverá algo que falhe.
verses.en_6th_ed: What Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori ichido yute oita koto   itsu ni naritemo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: 月日より一どふゆうてをいた事
verses.jp2: いつになりてもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 月日より一度言うて置いた事   何時になりても違う事無し
verses.english: What I, Tsukihi, have once said shall never fail forever.

verses.pt: Tudo que Tsukihi disse até agora, todos vieram somente duvidando e desprezando.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, all of you have only doubted whatever Tsukihi said, always erasing it by your words.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi nani goto yuta tote   mina utagote yuikesu bakari
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ月日なに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: みなうたごふてゆいけすばかり
verses.kanji: 今迄は月日何事言うたとて   皆疑うて言う消すばかり
verses.english: Until now, whatever I, Tsukihi, may have said, all of you have only doubted and always put it out with your words.

verses.pt: Para Tsukihi, isto é o maior pesar. A qualquer custo, isto será definido.
verses.en_6th_ed: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. I shall correct this matter by all means.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nandemo kore o shikato kimeru de
verses.jp1: 月日にハ大一これがざんねんな
verses.jp2: なんでもこれをしかときめるで
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これが残念な   何でもこれを確と決めるで
verses.english: This is the prime regret of Tsukihi. By all means I will settle this matter definitely.

verses.pt: Doravante, o que quer que Tsukihi diga, não contrariem. Amparem-se em Deus.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, you must not turn away from whatever Tsukihi says. You must lean on God.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi yu koto nani goto mo   somukan yoni Kami ni motare yo
verses.jp1: これからハ月日ゆう事なに事も
verses.jp2: そむかんよふに神にもたれよ
verses.kanji: これからは月日言う事何事も   背かん様に神に凭れよ
verses.english: Henceforth never go against whatever I, Tsukihi, say! You must lean upon God.

verses.pt: Se assim fizerem, Deus também se encarregará e realizará seguramente o seu trabalho.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then I, God, shall truly give you My firm assurance and shall work.
verses.ro: shitaru nara Kami no ho nimo shinjitsu ni   tashika hikiuke hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: したるなら神のほふにもしんちつに
verses.jp2: たしかひきうけはたらきをする
verses.kanji: したるなら神の方にも真実に   確か引き受け働きをする
verses.english: If you do so, on My side I, God, will surely take charge of and manifest My working.

verses.pt: Uma vez que Tsukihi insiste tanto, se tiverem erros espirituais, se retirará prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: As Tsukihi persuades you to such a degree, if your mind is in error, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kora hodo kudoki tsumeru kara   kokoro chigaeba suguni shirizoku
verses.jp1: 月日にハこらほどくどきつめるから
verses.jp2: 心ちがゑばすぐにしりぞく
verses.kanji: 月日にはこら程口説き詰めるから   心違えば直ぐに退ぞく
verses.english: As I, Tsukihi, have repeatedly tried to persuade you to this degree; if your mind should err, I will withdraw at once.

verses.pt: Se tiverem realmente a sinceridade no espírito, não haverá falha em qualquer salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: If your mind is truly sincere, there will never be a failure in any salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro ni makoto aru naraba   donna tasuke mo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp1: しんちつに心にまことあるならば
verses.jp2: どんなたすけもちがう事なし
verses.kanji: 真実に心に誠有るならば   どんな救けも違う事無し
verses.english: If there is true sincerity in your mind, any and every salvation shall be realized without fail.

verses.pt: Doravante, não falhem na fertilização do cultivo. Peço que fiquem firmemente cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, in order that there be no failure in the fertilizer for the crops, please understand Me clearly.
verses.ro: konosaki wa ryuke no koe o chigawan yo   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: このさきハりゆけのこへをちがハんよ
verses.jp2: どふぞしいかりしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: この先は立毛の肥を違わん様   どうぞ確り承知して呉れ
verses.english: Henceforth you must clearly understand My teachings and not err in the fertilizer for the crops.

verses.pt: De hoje em diante, tudo que Tsukihi pensa, começará a ser dito.
verses.en_6th_ed: From today, I shall begin to tell you the thoughts of Tsukihi on all matters whatever.
verses.ro: kyokara wa Tsukihi no omou koto oba na   dono yona koto mo mina yuikakeru
verses.jp1: けふからわ月日のをもう事をばな
verses.jp2: どのよな事もみなゆいかける
verses.kanji: 今日からは月日の思う事をばな   どの様な事も皆言い掛ける
verses.english: From today I will begin to speak any and everything which I, Tsukihi, am intending.

verses.pt: Embora tenha explicado quase tudo até agora, ainda não foi dita a intenção de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though even until now I have told you almost everything, I have not yet told you Tsukihi's intention.
verses.ro: imamade mo taite hanashi mo toitaredo   Tsukihi omowaku mada yute nai
verses.jp1: いまゝでもたいてはなしもといたれど
verses.jp2: 月日をもハくまだゆうてない
verses.kanji: 今迄も大抵話も説いたれど   月日思惑未だ言うて無い
verses.english: Until now I have already told you almost everything. Yet I, Tsukihi, have not told of My intention.

verses.pt: De agora em diante, o que quer que seja explanado, não pensem jamais que seja mentira.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, whatever talks I may give, never think that they are false.
verses.ro: korekara wa donna hanashi o shitaru tomo   kore o kanarazu uso to omouna
verses.jp1: これからハどんなはなしをしたるとも
verses.jp2: これをかならすうそをもうな
verses.kanji: これからはどんな話をしたるとも   これを必ず嘘と思うな
verses.english: Henceforth, whatever I may tell you, never take it to be false!

verses.pt: Não sabem o que poderei dizer. O espírito de Tsukihi está apressado.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what I shall say, for the mind of Tsukihi hastens.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   Tsukihi no kokoro sete iru kara
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうやらしれんてな
verses.jp2: 月日の心せゑているから
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うやら知れんでな   月日の心急いて居るから
verses.english: There is no knowing whatever kinds of things I will say, because the mind of Tsukihi hastens impatiently.

verses.pt: O que pensam ser esta intenção? Abrange a região dos esclarecidos, a dos não-esclarecidos e a dos longínquos.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think My thoughts are about? They are about Nihon, Kara, and Tenjiku.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doyu koto ni omou kana   nihon mo kara mo tenjiku made mo
verses.jp1: この心どふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: にほんもからもてんちくまでも
verses.kanji: この心どういう事に思うかな   日本も唐も天竺迄も
verses.english: What do you think of this mind? I, Tsukihi, hasten to save equally all the people in the regions where My teachings spread early, later and last.

verses.pt: Embora haja nesse entremeio uma longa distância, realizará o seu trabalho mesmo em uma noite.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though there are many leagues in between, I shall work even in a single night.
verses.ro: kono aida michinori yohodo aru keredo   ichiya no ma nimo hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: このあいだみちのりよほどあるけれど
verses.jp2: いちやのまにもはたらきをする
verses.kanji: この間道程余程有るけれど   一夜の間にも働きをする
verses.english: Although there is a long distance to cover, I will work My omnipotence even in a single night.

verses.pt: O que os seres humanos pensam sobre esta explanação? Por serem emprestados por mim, Tsukihi, todos são meus filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: What are you humans thinking of this talk? Your bodies are things lent by Tsukihi and you are all children of Mine.
verses.ro: kono hanashi ningen nanto omote iru   Tsukihi kashimono mina waga kodomo
verses.jp1: このはなしにんけんなんとをもている
verses.jp2: 月日かしものみなわがこども
verses.kanji: この話人間何と思うて居る   月日貸し物皆我が子供
verses.english: What are you human beings thinking of this talk? All of your bodies are things which I have lent and you are all My children.

verses.pt: Enquanto Tsukihi ficar reservado, nunca haverá indício de paz.
verses.en_6th_ed: So long as Tsukihi keeps still, there will be no hope of a settling.
verses.ro: itsumade mo Tsukihi jikkuri shite ireba   itsu ni naritemo osamaru me nashi
verses.jp1: いつまでも月日ぢいくりしていれば
verses.jp2: いつになりてもをさまるめなし
verses.kanji: 何時迄も月日じっくりしていれば   何時になりても治まる目無し
verses.english: If I, Tsukihi, keep still without hurry, peace shall never come.

verses.pt: Assim, Tsukihi sairá para trabalhar, no entanto, não há quem saiba para onde irá.
verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, Tsukihi will go forth to work. There is no one who knows where I shall go.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   doko e deru yara shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: それゆへに月日でかけるはたらきに
verses.jp2: とこへでるやらしりたものなし
verses.kanji: それ故に月日出掛ける働きに   何処へ出るやら知りた者無し
verses.english: Therefore I, Tsukihi, will go forth and manifest My working. No one can foresee where I am going to work.

verses.pt: O espírito de todos do mundo será purificado. Jamais pensem que seja algo insignificante.
verses.en_6th_ed: I say that I shall purify all minds throughout the world. Never think of it as a small matter.
verses.ro: sekaiju kokoro sumasu to yu kara wa   chotto no koto ya to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: せかいぢう心すますとゆうからわ
verses.jp2: 一寸の事やとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 世界中心澄ますと言うからは   一寸の事やと更に思うな
verses.english: I say that I will purify the minds throughout the world. Do not think that this is a trivial matter!

verses.pt: Seja o que for, se o íntimo do coração de cada um for purificado, não haverá nenhum perigo.
verses.en_6th_ed: In whatever matters, if the innermost heart of each of you is purified, there will be no danger.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo meme mune no uchi   sumashita naraba abunaki wa nai
verses.jp1: どのよふな事てもめへ／＼むねのうち
verses.jp2: すましたならばあふなきわない
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも銘々胸の内   澄ましたならば危な気は無い
verses.english: Whatever kinds of things may occur, if each of you has purified your innermost heart, there shall be nothing dangerous.

verses.pt: Dia a dia, a intenção de Tsukihi é somente esperar um grande número de pessoas, gradativamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the thought of Tsukihi is only to wait for a large number of people to come to Me step by step.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsukihi nichinichi omowaku wa   oku no hito o matsu bakari ya de
verses.jp1: たん／＼と月日にち／＼をもハくわ
verses.jp2: をふくの人をまつばかりやで
verses.kanji: 段々と月日日々思惑は   多くの人を待つばかりやで
verses.english: Step by step and day after day, the intention of Tsukihi is only to wait expecting a huge number of people to gather.

verses.pt: A razão por que espero por estas pessoas é por querer salvar igualmente todos os meus filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: The reason I am waiting for these people is that I desire to save all of My children in the world.
verses.ro: kono hito o doyu koto de matsu naraba   ichiretsu waga ko tasuketai kara
verses.jp1: この人をどふゆう事でまつならば
verses.jp2: 一れつわがこたすけたいから
verses.kanji: この人をどういう事で待つならば   一列我が子救けたいから
verses.english: You may wonder why I am waiting so eagerly for them. It is because I desire to save all of My children.

verses.pt: Não se sabe quão extraordinário curso de caminho poderá ser visto neste ano.
verses.en_6th_ed: You cannot know what a marvelous path will come into sight this year.
verses.ro: kotoshi niwa donna mezurashi michisuji ga   miete kuru yara kore shiren de na
verses.jp1: ことしにハどんなめづらしみちすじが
verses.jp2: みゑてくるやらこれしれんてな
verses.kanji: 今年にはどんな珍し道筋が   見えて来るやらこれ知れんでな
verses.english: It is impossible to know beforehand what a remarkable way shall come into sight this year.

verses.pt: Por mais que diga a verdade através da palavra, não há quem a compreenda.
verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how I try to tell you the truth by words, there is no one who understands.
verses.ro: kuchi saki de nanbo shinjitsu yuta tote   tare ka kikiwake suru mono wa nai
verses.jp1: 口さきでなんほしんちつゆうたとて
verses.jp2: たれかきゝわけするものハない
verses.kanji: 口先で何ぼ真実言うたとて   誰か聞き分けする者は無い
verses.english: However earnestly I may try to persuade you of the truth by mouth, no one listens and understands Me.

verses.pt: Em razão disso, desta vez, Tsukihi demonstrará toda verdade, seja o que for.
verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, Tsukihi will at this time demonstrate the truth for you in all matters.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi konotabi dono yona   koto mo shinjitsu mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: それゆへに月日このたびどのよふな
verses.jp2: 事もしんちつみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: それ故に月日この度どの様な   事も真実皆して見せる
verses.english: Therefore this time I, Tsukihi, will realize any and every-thing to show you.

verses.pt: O que quer que faça, não pensem em absoluto que esteja misturado o espírito humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I do, never think that there is any human mind mixed in it.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o shitaru mo ningen no   kokoro majiru to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をしたるもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心まぢるとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: どの様な事をしたるも人間の   心混じると更に思うな
verses.english: Whatever I may do, you must not think that there is any human mind mixed in it.

verses.pt: Tsukihi, por não poder ignorar mais a realidade, realiza qualquer coisa.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi cannot bear to look on any longer. That is why I shall work in all matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa amari shinjitsu mikaneru de   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp1: 月日にハあまりしんぢつみかねるで
verses.jp2: そこでとのよな事もするのや
verses.kanji: 月日には余り真実見兼ねるで   そこでどの様な事もするのや
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, can no longer remain a mere spectator, so I am going to work whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Por mais que sejam fortes ou jovens, jamais contem com isso.
verses.en_6th_ed: However strong or youthful you may be, never think that such a condition is reliable.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki tarumo wakaki demo   kore o tayori to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: いかほどのごうてきたるもハかきても
verses.jp2: これをたよりとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: 如何程の強敵たるも若きでも   これを頼りと更に思うな
verses.english: However strong or youthful you may be, never think that such a condition is reliable!

verses.pt: Desta vez, Deus, revelando-se diante de todos, faz as explanações onipotentemente.
verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, God is openly revealed and speaks to you freely without restriction.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i arawarete   juyojizai ni hanashi suru kara
verses.jp1: このたびハ神がをもていあらハれて
verses.jp2: ぢうよぢざいにはなしするから
verses.kanji: この度は神が表へ現れて   自由自在に話するから
verses.english: This time I, God, reveal Myself to the fore, and speak to you freely and unrestrictedly.

verses.pt: Por realizar tudo conforme a verdade, o íntimo do coração será purificado naturalmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: As I shall work in truth in all matters, your innermost heart will, of itself, be made clear.
verses.ro: donoyo na koto mo shinjitsu suru kara wa   mune no uchi yori hitori sumikiru
verses.jp1: どのよふな事もしんぢつするからハ
verses.jp2: むねのうちよりひとりすみきる
verses.kanji: どの様な事も真実するからは   胸の内より独り澄み切る
verses.english: As I manifest any and everything truly and really, all of you shall become naturally purified from your innermost hearts.

verses.pt: Até o presente, todas as pessoas vieram refletindo somente com pensamento humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, all humankind has been pondering only with the human mind.
verses.ro: imamade wa ichiretsu wa mina ningen no   kokoro bakari de shiyan shitaredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ一れつハみなにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心ばかりてしやんしたれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は一列は皆人間の   心ばかりで思案したれど
verses.english: Until now all of you have been pondering only with human thoughts.

verses.pt: Desta vez, seja no que for, é absolutamente desnecessária a reflexão com o pensamento humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, there is no need at all to ponder with the human mind on any matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo ningen no   kokoro shiyan wa sarani iran de
verses.jp1: このたびわどのよな事もにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心しやんわさらにいらんで
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な事も人間の   心思案は更に要らんで
verses.english: This time there is no need at all to ponder with human thoughts, on whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Deixarei dito todas as coisas. O que quer que diga, nunca pensem ser mentira.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall tell you any and everything. Whatever I say, never take it to be false.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo yute oku   nani o yutemo uso to omouna
verses.jp1: なにもかもとのよな事もゆうてをく
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもうそとをもうな
verses.kanji: 何もかもどの様な事も言うて置く   何を言うても嘘と思うな
verses.english: I will tell you any and everything beforehand. Never take it to be a falsehood, whatever I may say!

verses.pt: Embora nos altos montes se alastrem quaisquer pessoas, não há quem conheça a verdade.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever kind of people may be rampant on the high mountains, no one knows the truth.
verses.ro: takayama de dono yona mono ga habikaru mo   kono shinjitsu o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: 高山でとのよなものがはびかるも
verses.jp2: このしんちつをたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 高山でどの様な者が蔓延るも   この真実を誰も知るまい
verses.english: Whatever kind of people may be rampant on the high mountains perhaps no one knows the true meaning of it.

verses.pt: Onde quer que estejam as pessoas, Tsukihi está observando atentamente o íntimo do coração.
verses.en_6th_ed: Wherever you may be, Tsukihi clearly sees your innermost heart.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna tokoro ni iru mono mo   mune no uchi oba shikato mite iru
verses.jp1: 月日にわどんなところにいるものも
verses.jp2: むねのうちをばしかとみている
verses.kanji: 月日にはどんな所に居る者も   胸の内をば確と見て居る
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, clearly see your innermost hearts, wherever you may be.

verses.pt: Se o íntimo do coração corresponder à sua intenção, Tsukihi sustentará firme para sempre.
verses.en_6th_ed: If your innermost heart accords with the mind of Tsukihi, I shall exert Myself in your favor forever.
verses.ro: mune no uchi Tsukihi kokoro ni kanotara   itsu made nari to shikato funbaru
verses.jp1: むねのうち月日心にかのふたら
verses.jp2: いつまでなりとしかとふんばる
verses.kanji: 胸の内月日心に適うたら   何時迄なりと確と踏ん張る
verses.english: If only your innermost heart is in accordance with the mind of Tsukihi, I will firmly exert Myself to protect you forever.

verses.pt: Embora o espírito de Tsukihi apresse dia a dia, não há compreensão no espírito dos próximos.
verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day. Yet there is no understanding in the minds of you close to Me.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikomedo   soba no kokoro ni wakari nai node
verses.jp1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめど
verses.jp2: そばの心にわかりないので
verses.kanji: 月日より日々心急き込めど   側の心に分かり無いので
verses.english: Although the mind of Tsukihi hastens so impatiently day by day, the minds of you close to Me do not understand it.

verses.pt: O que pensam ser esta pressa? Se fizerem plantações, necessitarão de água.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think My hastening is about? If you grow crops, you may be in need of water.
verses.ro: sekikomi mo nanino koto ya to omou kana   ryuke tsukureba mizu ga hoshikaro
verses.jp1: せきこみもなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: りゆけつくれば水がほしかろ
verses.kanji: 急き込みも何の事やと思うかな   立毛作れば水が欲しかろ
verses.english: On what matter do you think I hasten? When you grow crops, you may be in need of water.

verses.pt: Como todas as pessoas estão refletindo sobre estas explanações?
verses.en_6th_ed: In the minds of all of you, with what thoughts are you pondering over this talk?
verses.ro: kono hanashi mina ichiretsu no kokoro niwa   nanto omote shiyan shite iru
verses.jp1: このはなしみな一れつの心にわ
verses.jp2: なんとをもふてしやんしている
verses.kanji: この話皆一列の心には   何と思うて思案して居る
verses.english: With what thoughts are the minds of all of you thinking over this talk?

verses.pt: Para Tsukihi, o mais importante é conceder esta proteção, por isso, diz todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi desires first to help you in your needs. That is why I speak of all things whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore o tasuketasa   sokode dono yona koto mo yu no ya
verses.jp1: 月日にわ大一これをたすけたさ
verses.jp2: そこでどのよな事もゆうのや
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これを救けたさ   そこでどの様な事も言うのや
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, desire to save you first from those hardships. Thereupon I say whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Embora Tsukihi explique insistentemente todas as coisas, não há quem as ouça com sinceridade.
verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how Tsukihi tries to persuade you of all matters, no one listens to My words as the truth.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi ika hodo kudoitemo   makoto ni kiite kureru mono nashi
verses.jp1: なにもかも月日いかほどくどいても
verses.jp2: まことにきいてくれるものなし
verses.kanji: 何もかも月日如何程口説いても   誠に聞いて呉れる者無し
verses.english: On whatever kinds of things, however repeatedly I may try to persuade, no one listens to My words as the truth.

verses.pt: Em razão disso, o pesar e a ira de Tsukihi estão muito acumulados e empilhados.
verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, the regret and anger of Tsukihi have piled up like a mountain.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi no zanen rippuku ga   yamayama tsumori kasanarite aru
verses.jp1: それゆへに月日のざねんりいふくが
verses.jp2: 山／＼つもりかさなりてある
verses.kanji: それ故に月日の残念立腹が   山々積り重なりて有る
verses.english: Therefore the regret and anger of Tsukihi has piled up like a mountain.

verses.pt: Embora até agora o dia não houvesse chegado e, em razão disso, permanecesse reservado...
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, as the month and day has not yet come, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi kitaran soreyue ni   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ月日きたらんそれゆへに
verses.jp2: ぢいとしていた事であれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は月日来たらんそれ故に   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.english: Until now months and days have not yet come, so I have continued to keep still.

verses.pt: Desta vez, o dia já chegou, de modo que começarei depressa qualquer trabalho.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as the time is pressing, I shall quickly begin any work whatever.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna shigoto mo hayaku kakaru de
verses.jp1: このたびわもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp2: とんなしごともはやくかゝるで
verses.kanji: この度はもう日が詰んで有るからな   どんな仕事も早く掛かるで
verses.english: But this time, as the day is pressing, I will quickly begin whatever kind of work.

verses.pt: Doravante, mesmo que haja qualquer caminho, não tenham rancor dos outros, mas reprovem a si mesmos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, on whatever path you may find yourself, never bear a grudge against others. Reproach yourself.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona michi ga aru totemo   hito o uramina waga mi urami ya
verses.jp1: このさきわどのよなみちがあるとても
verses.jp2: 人をうらみなハがみうらみや
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な道が有るとても   人を恨みな我が身恨みや
verses.english: Henceforth, whatever kinds of ways may appear, never bear a grudge against others, but only reproach yourself!

verses.pt: Não digo de onde se trata esta explanação, tanto dos altos montes como do fundo dos vales.
verses.en_6th_ed: This talk is not for a particular place. It is for the high mountains as well as for the low valleys.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   takayama nitemo tanisoko made mo
verses.jp1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんでな
verses.jp2: 高山にてもたにそこまても
verses.kanji: この話何処の事とも言わんでな   高山にても谷底迄も
verses.english: I never make this talk, indicating anyone in particular. It applies equally to both the people on the high mountains and the people at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.pt: O que quer que diga, é pelo desejo de salvá-los. Por isso, tenho insistido de vários modos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Everything I say is from My desire to save you. That is the reason for My various and repeated persuasions.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo tasuketasa   sokode iroiro kudoki tsumeta de
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうのもたすけたさ
verses.jp2: そこていろ／＼くどきつめたで
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うのも救けたさ   そこで色々口説き詰めたで
verses.english: It is simply because I desire to save all of you that I say whatever kinds of things. Therefore I have earnestly tried to persuade you to My utmost in various ways.

verses.pt: Doravante, mesmo dizendo toda e qualquer coisa, jamais direi coisas más.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, know that in whatever I say and in whatever matters, I say nothing evil.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yutemo dono yona   koto demo ashiki koto wa yuwan de
verses.jp1: このさきわなにをゆうてもとのよふな
verses.jp2: 事でもあしき事わゆハんで
verses.kanji: この先は何を言うてもどの様な   事でも悪しき事は言わんで
verses.english: Henceforth, whatever kinds of things I may say, I will never speak of anything evil.

verses.pt: Desde que apresso a salvação verdadeira, tenho advertido gradualmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: The reason I admonished you step by step is only that I hasten for your true salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no tasuke bakari o seku karani   sokode dandan iken shita no ya
verses.jp1: しんぢつのたすけばかりをせくからに
verses.jp2: そこでたん／＼いけんしたのや
verses.kanji: 真実の救けばかりを急くからに   そこで段々意見したのや
verses.english: As I am hastening single-heartedly the true salvation, I have often admonished you.

verses.pt: Quando purificarem verdadeiramente o espírito, ensinarei depressa os meios para salvar.
verses.en_6th_ed: Once your mind has become truly purified, I shall quickly teach you the means to salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro sumashita sono ue wa   tasukeru moyo hayaku oshieru
verses.jp1: しんぢつに心すましたそのゆへわ
verses.jp2: たすけるもよふはやくをしへる
verses.kanji: 真実に心澄まするその故は   救ける模様早く教える
verses.english: After you have truly purified your minds, I will quickly teach you the way of salvation.

verses.pt: Esta salvação refere-se ao Serviço da proteção que previne da varíola.
verses.en_6th_ed: To explain what this salvation is about: it is the Service for the protection against smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto de aru naraba   hoso sen yono Mamori Tsutome o
verses.jp1: このたすけどふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp2: ほふそせんよのまむりつとめを
verses.kanji: この救けどういう事で有るならば   疱瘡せん様の守り勤めを
verses.english: You may wonder what salvation this is. It is the Service for the Mamori, the Amulet, to protect you against smallpox.

verses.pt: Ainda sobre a salvação, quero dar logo o amuleto-prova que protege da doença, da morte e do enfraquecimento.
verses.en_6th_ed: Another salvation: I desire quickly to give you the Proof-Amulet that protects you from illness, death, and weakening.
verses.ro: mata tasuke yamazu shinazu ni yowaran no   Shoko Mamori o hayaku yaritai
verses.jp1: またたすけやますしなずによハらんの
verses.jp2: しよこまむりをはやくやりたい
verses.kanji: また救け病まず死なずに弱らんの   証拠守りを早くやりたい
verses.english: One more salvation: I desire quickly to bestow on you the Shoko-Mamori, the Amulet in proof of returning to the Jiba, to protect you against falling ill, dying or becoming weak.

verses.pt: Por apressar a salvação de toda e qualquer coisa, farei tudo segundo o espírito de cada um.
verses.en_6th_ed: As I am hastening universal salvation, I shall work in all matters according to your mind.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo yorozu tasuke o seku karani   kokoro shidai ni donna koto demo
verses.jp1: なにもかもよろづたすけをせくからに
verses.jp2: 心したいにどんな事ても
verses.kanji: 何もかも万救けを急くからに   心次第にどんな事でも
verses.english: As I am impatiently hastening any and every salvation,I will save you on whatever things in accordance with your mind.

verses.pt: Todas as pessoas serão segundo o coração de cada um. Nada deixará de ser atendido.
verses.en_6th_ed: All humankind, everything depends on the heart of each of you. There is nothing that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina meme no mune shidai   donna koto oga kanawan de nashi
verses.jp1: 一れつわみなめへ／＼のむねしだい
verses.jp2: どんな事をがかなハんてなし
verses.kanji: 一列は皆銘々の胸次第   どんな事をが叶わんで無し
verses.english: Accordingly as each and every heart becomes sincere, there is no prayer which will not be heard.

verses.pt: Quanto às preces pelas chuvas, embora até agora Deus nada tivesse dito verdadeiramente,
verses.en_6th_ed: About the prayer for rain, though God has not said anything yet in truth,
verses.ro: amagoi mo imamade Kami ga shinjitsu ni   nanimo yutaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: あまごいもいまゝで神がしんぢつに
verses.jp2: なにもゆうたる事わなけれど
verses.kanji: 雨乞いも今迄神が真実に   何も言うたる事は無けれど
verses.english: Although I have not yet told you about the prayer for rain truly,

verses.pt: Desta vez, explicarei a verdade de toda e qualquer coisa, se vierem me consultar.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, if you come seeking to Me, I shall tell you all the truth of all matters.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   tazune kuru nara mina yute kikasu
verses.jp1: このたびハとのよな事もしんぢつを
verses.jp2: たづねくるならみなゆてきかす
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な事も真実を   尋ね来るなら皆言うて聞かす
verses.english: This time, if you come to Me, I will teach you any and every truth.

verses.pt: Tsukihi jamais diz que algo não será atendido. Tudo será segundo o espírito de cada um.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever it may be, Tsukihi will never say that it cannot be realized. It all depends on the mind of each of you.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa nani kanawan to yuwan de na   mina meme no kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp1: 月日にハなにかなハんとゆハんてな
verses.jp2: みなめへ／＼の心したいや
verses.kanji: 月日には何叶わんと言わんでな   皆銘々の心次第や
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, will never say that any prayer will not be heard. It depends all upon the mind of each and everyone of you.

verses.pt: Qual seja o sonho que tenha, é Tsukihi. O que quer que diga, também, é tudo Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may dream, it is by Tsukihi. Whatever is said, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona yume o miru no mo Tsukihi nari   nani o yu no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp1: どのよふなゆめをみるのも月日なり
verses.jp2: なにをゆうのもみな月日やで
verses.kanji: どの様な夢を見るのも月日なり   何を言うのも皆月日やで
verses.english: Whatever you may dream, it is the working of Tsukihi. And whatever words Mmay be spoken, they are all working of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Embora o espírito de Tsukihi apresse dia a dia, o espírito dos próximos está somente a desanimar-se.
verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, but the minds of you close to Me are only depressed.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikomedo   soba no kokoro wa izumu bakari de
verses.jp1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめと
verses.jp2: そばの心わいづむばかりで
verses.kanji: 月日より日々心急き込めど   側の心はいずむばかりで
verses.english: In spite of the hastening of the mind of Tsukihi, the minds of you close to Me are only hesitant.

verses.pt: O fato de se desanimar ocorre porque os superiores nada sabem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Why are you depressed? It is because those in high places know nothing.
verses.ro: izumu no mo doshite izumu koto naraba   kami niwa nanimo shiran yue nari
verses.jp1: いつむのもどふしていつむ事ならば
verses.jp2: 上にハなにもしらんゆへなり
verses.kanji: いずむのもどうしていずむ事ならば   上には何も知らん故なり
verses.english: What is the reason they are so hesitant? It is because the upper people remain entirely ignorant.

verses.pt: Sem saber disso, no mundo, estão todos desanimados, subordinando-se a eles em tudo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, the whole world follows them in all matters and is depressed.
verses.ro: sekai niwa sore o shirazu ni nani goto mo   mina shitagote izumi iru nari
verses.jp1: せかいにハそれをしらすになに事も
verses.jp2: みなしたこふていつみいるなり
verses.kanji: 世界にはそれを知らずに何事も   皆従うていずみ居るなり
verses.english: Unaware of this, people of the world follow them in all things.

verses.pt: Para Tsukihi, isto é o maior pesar. Por isso, realiza qualquer coisa.
verses.en_6th_ed: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. That is why I do whatever things.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp1: 月日にわ大一これがさんねんな
verses.jp2: そこでどのよな事もするのや
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これが残念な   そこでどの様な事もするのや
verses.english: This is the cause of the prime regret of Tsukihi. Therefore I work whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Embora o espírito de Tsukihi apresse dia a dia, mesmo querendo, não há como expressar em palavras.
verses.en_6th_ed: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, but I cannot tell of it in words, even should I so desire.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro seta tote   kuchi dewa domu yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp1: 月日よりにち／＼心せゑたとで
verses.jp2: くちでわとふむゆうにゆハれん
verses.kanji: 月日より日々心急いたとて   口ではどうも言うに言われん
verses.english: However impatiently I, Tsukihi, may hasten day by day, I cannot tell of it by mouth, even though I desire to do so.

verses.pt: Em razão disso, lanço a fragrância mesmo em sonho. Reflitam logo sobre isso.
verses.en_6th_ed: That is why I put the fragrance even into your dreams. Quickly ponder over it, please.
verses.ro: soreyue ni yume de nari tomo nioigake   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp1: それゆへにゆめでなりともにをいがけ
verses.jp2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ
verses.kanji: それ故に夢でなりとも匂い掛け   早く思案をして呉れる様
verses.english: Therefore I put the fragrance even into your dreams. So I request you to begin immediately to ponder over My intention.

verses.pt: Para Tsukihi, este pesar não é um fato que se possa expressar em palavras.
verses.en_6th_ed: This regret of Tsukihi is not something that can be told in words.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono zannen to yu mono wa   kuchi de yu yona koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp1: 月日にハこのざんねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: くちてゆうよな事でないぞや
verses.kanji: 月日にはこの残念と言うものは   口で言う様な事で無いぞや
verses.english: This regret of Tsukihi is not so slight as I can tell it by mouth.

verses.pt: Até hoje, embora viesse fazendo gradualmente, de diversas maneiras, qualquer explanação,
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, in My talks on whatever matters, I have taught you various things step by step.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna hanashi mo dandan to   iroiro toite kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわどんなはなしもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: いろ／＼といてきたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな話も段々と   色々説いて来たるなれども
verses.english: Although until today I have taught you whatever kinds of talks one by one in various ways,

verses.pt: O que quer que dissesse, por não ter chegado o dia e o tempo oportuno, nada foi visto.
verses.en_6th_ed: But as the day of the appointed time has not yet come, you have seen nothing.
verses.ro: nani yu mo higara kokugen kitaran de   nanimo mietaru koto wa nai node
verses.jp1: なにゆうもひがらこくけんきたらんで
verses.jp2: なにもみゑたる事わないので
verses.kanji: 何言うも日柄刻限来たらんで   何も見えたる事は無いので
verses.english: After all, as the fixed time of the fixed day has not yet come, nothing has really appeared.

verses.pt: Em razão disso, o que quer que Tsukihi dissesse, todos vieram somente duvidando e desprezando.
verses.en_6th_ed: That is why all of you doubt and erase by your words whatever Tsukihi says.
verses.ro: soreyue ni nani o Tsukihi ga yuta tote   mina utagote yuikesu bakari
verses.jp1: それゆへになにを月日がゆうたとて
verses.jp2: みなうたごふてゆいけすばかり
verses.kanji: それ故に何を月日が言うたとて   皆疑うて言い消すばかり
verses.english: Therefore you always doubt and put out by your words whatever I, Tsukihi, say.

verses.pt: Para Tsukihi, isto é o maior pesar. De qualquer modo, será revelado certamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. By all means, I shall clearly reveal what I have said.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nandemo kore o shikato arawasu
verses.jp1: 月日にハ大一これがさんねんな
verses.jp2: なんでもこれをしかとあらわす
verses.kanji: 月日には第一これが残念な   何でもこれを確と現す
verses.english: This is the prime regret of Tsukihi. So by all means, I will clearly manifest what I have said.

verses.pt: Embora tenha dito tudo até agora, nada tem sido prontamente visto.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now there was never a time that whatever I said was immediately seen,
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto oba yuta tote   suguni mietaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどんな事をばゆうたとて
verses.jp2: すぐにみゑたる事わなけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな事をば言うたとて   直ぐに見えたる事は無けれど
verses.english: Until now, of whatever I said, nothing appeared immediately.

verses.pt: Desta vez, não sabem que explanações do mundo poderão ouvir gradualmente, dentro de três dias.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, within three days, no one knows what you will hear in the talk of the world step by step.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mikka no uchi ni dandan to   sekai no hanashi nani o kiku yara
verses.jp1: このたびわ三かのうちにたん／＼と
verses.jp2: せかいのはなしなにをきくやら
verses.kanji: この度は三日の内に段々と   世界の話何を聞くやら
verses.english: This time within three days, one by one you will hear whatever talk about the world which no one can foresee.

verses.pt: Doravante, Tsukihi trabalhará dia a dia. Não se sabe que trabalhos poderá realizar.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, Tsukihi will work day after day. There is no knowing what work I shall do.
verses.ro: korekara wa nichinichi Tsukihi hataraku de   donna shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: これからハにち／＼月日はたらくで
verses.jp2: とんなしごとをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: これからは日々月日働くで   どんな仕事をするや知れんで
verses.english: From now on I, Tsukihi, will work day by day. There is no knowing whatever I may work.

verses.pt: Jamais pensem que existam maldições, espíritos do mal e fantasmas neste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Never think in the least that curses, demons, or evil spirits exist in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo ni kamai tsukimono bakemono mo   kanarazu aru to sarani omouna
verses.jp1: このよふにかまいつきものばけものも
verses.jp2: かならすあるとさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: この世にかまい憑き物化け物も   必ず有ると更に思うな
verses.english: Never think even in the least that curses, demons or apparitions exist in this world!

verses.pt: Tsukihi dissipará todo o pesar, que está muito acumulado até agora.
verses.en_6th_ed: I shall clear away all the regret of Tsukihi which has piled up mountainously until now.
verses.ro: imamade ni Tsukihi zannen yamayama to   tsumorite aru o mina harasu de na
verses.jp1: いまゝでに月日ざんねん山／＼と
verses.jp2: つもりてあるをみなはらすでな
verses.kanji: 今迄に月日残念山々と   積りて有るを皆晴らすでな
verses.english: I will completely clear away the regret of Tsukihi which has until now piled up mountainously.

verses.pt: Quanto ao modo de se fazer esta dissipação, Tsukihi mostrará realizando toda a sua intenção.
verses.en_6th_ed: To explain how it will be cleared away: I, Tsukihi, shall do all that I intend.
verses.ro: kono harashi doshite harasu koto naraba   Tsukihi no kokoro mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: このはらしどふしてはらす事ならば
verses.jp2: 月日の心みなしてみせる
verses.kanji: この晴らしどうして晴らす事ならば   月日の心皆して見せる
verses.english: You may wonder how I will accomplish this clearing. I, Tsukihi, will work to manifest all of My intention.

verses.pt: Embora os dias tenham passado desde o início deste mundo, não sabem ainda a verdade de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: Many days have passed since I began this world. Yet perhaps you do not know the truth of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kyomade wa kono yo hajimete hi wa tatedo   Tsukihi shinjitsu mada shiromai na
verses.jp1: けふまでハこのよはじめてひわたてど
verses.jp2: 月日しんちつまだしろまいな
verses.kanji: 今日迄はこの世初めて日は経てど   月日真実未だ知ろまいな
verses.english: Till today many days have passed since the creation of this world. But perhaps you do not know the true sincerity of Tsukihi.

verses.pt: Todas as coisas são realizações de Tsukihi. Seja o que for, não é doença.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever is done, is done by Tsukihi. Whatever happens, know that it is not an illness.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Tsukihi suru koto ya   ikana koto demo yamai dewa nai
verses.jp1: とのよふな事でも月日する事や
verses.jp2: いかな事でもやまいでわない
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも月日する事や   如何な事でも病では無い
verses.english: Whatever may happen, it is all the work of Tsukihi. In any case, it is not an illness.

verses.pt: O que quer que Tsukihi faça no corpo, não é uma doença, e sim, o seu cuidado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I do to the body, it is not an illness but the care of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: minouchi ni dono yona koto o shita totemo   yamai dewa nai Tsukihi teiri ya
verses.jp1: みのうちにとのよな事をしたとても
verses.jp2: やまいでわない月日ていりや
verses.kanji: 身の内にどの様な事をしたとても   病では無い月日手入りや
verses.english: Whatever may happen in your body, it is by no means illness, but the hand of Tsukihi put in to repair your mind.

verses.pt: Aquilo que o mundo chama de cólera, é um aviso do pesar de Tsukihi.
verses.en_6th_ed: The world is saying that it is cholera, but it is Tsukihi informing you of the regret.
verses.ro: sekai niwa korera to yute iru keredo   Tsukihi zannen shirasu koto nari
verses.jp1: せかいにハこれらとゆうているけれど
verses.jp2: 月日さんねんしらす事なり
verses.kanji: 世界にはコレラと言うて居るけれど   月日残念知らす事なり
verses.english: In the world people call it cholera. But it is the means by which I, Tsukihi, let you know My regret.

verses.pt: No mundo, acontece o mesmo com todas as pessoas: têm o espírito que só se desanima.
verses.en_6th_ed: Everywhere in the world, people are the same: they only have depressed minds.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko no hito demo onaji koto   izumu bakari no kokoro naredomo
verses.jp1: せかいぢうどこの人でもをなぢ事
verses.jp2: いつむばかりの心なれとも
verses.kanji: 世界中何処の人でも同じ事   いずむばかりの心なれども
verses.english: In the whole world, people everywhere are apt to have gloomy and depressed minds.

verses.pt: Doravante, reformando firmemente o espírito, tornem-no repleto de alegria.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, firmly replace the mind and become the mind of joyousness.
verses.ro: korekara wa kokoro shikkari irekaete   yokizukume no kokoro naru yo
verses.jp1: これからハ心しいかりいれかへて
verses.jp2: よふきづくめの心なるよふ
verses.kanji: これからは心確り入れ替えて   陽気ずくめの心なる様
verses.english: But henceforth, determine to replace your mind definitely with the mind full of joy!

verses.pt: Tsukihi criou os seres humanos por desejar ver o viver alegre e feliz.
verses.en_6th_ed: The reason Tsukihi began human beings was the desire to see you lead a joyous life.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa ningen hajime kaketa no wa   yokiyusan ga mitai yue kara
verses.jp1: 月日にわにんけんはじめかけたのわ
verses.jp2: よふきゆさんがみたいゆへから
verses.kanji: 月日には人間初め掛けたのは   陽気遊山が見たい故から
verses.english: I created you human beings because I desired to see you lead a joyous life.

verses.pt: No mundo, por não conhecerem esta verdade, todos estão somente a desanimar-se.
verses.en_6th_ed: Because the world does not know this truth, everyone sinks only deeper into depression.
verses.ro: sekai niwa kono shinjitsu o shiran kara   mina dokomade mo izumu bakari de
verses.jp1: せかいにハこのしんぢつをしらんから
verses.jp2: みなどこまでもいつむはかりで
verses.kanji: 世界にはこの真実を知らんから   皆何処迄もいずむばかりで
verses.english: Knowing nothing of this truth, all of you in the world continue to sink deep into the mire of despondency.

verses.pt: Se impedirem o viver repleto de alegria que Tsukihi diz, o seu pesar se tornará maior.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi desires to bring joyousness to all. If anyone dares to stop this, the regret will grow enormous.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yokizukume to yu no o na   kore tometa nara zanen eronaru
verses.jp1: 月日よりよふきづくめとゆうのをな
verses.jp2: これとめたならさねんゑろなる
verses.kanji: 月日より陽気ずくめと言うのをな   これ止めたなら残念えろうなる
verses.english: I, Tsukihi, desire you to be full of joy. If you stop Me, My regret shall become enormous.

verses.pt: Compreendendo seguramente estas explanações, reflitam logo sobre isso.
verses.en_6th_ed: I request you to understand this talk clearly and to ponder quickly.
verses.ro: kono hanashi dozo shikkari kikiwakete   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp1: このはなしどふぞしいかりきゝハけて
verses.jp2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ
verses.kanji: この話どうぞ確り聞き分けて   早く思案をして呉れる様
verses.english: Please listen attentively to the reason of this talk and ponder over it quickly!

verses.pt: Embora até agora viesse chamando-se de Tsukihi, de hoje em diante, mudará de nome.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I taught you by the name Tsukihi, but from today I shall use another name.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi to yute toitaredo   mo kyokara wa namai kaeru de
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ月日とゆうてといたれど
verses.jp2: もふけふからハなまいかゑるで
verses.kanji: 今迄は月日と言うて説いたれど   もう今日からは名前変えるで
verses.english: Hitherto I have taught you by the name of Tsukihi, but from today I will change My name.

verses.pt: Embora até hoje os grandes templos e altos montes alastrassem e agissem à vontade,
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, though the grand shrines and high mountains have thrived and done as they pleased,
verses.ro: kyomade wa taisha takayama habikarite   mamani shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでハたいしや高山はびかりて
verses.jp2: まゝにしていた事であれとも
verses.kanji: 今日迄は大社高山蔓延りて   侭にしていた事で有れども
verses.english: Although until today the grand shrines and the people on the high mountains have been rampant and managed everything as they please,

verses.pt: Doravante, o Parens, no lugar deles, agirá à sua vontade. Se a isto contrariarem, devolverá prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I, the Parent, shall do as I please instead. Defy Me and I shall give a return at once.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya ga kawarite mamani suru   kore somuitara suguni kayasu de
verses.jp1: これからわをやがかハりてまゝにする
verses.jp2: これそむいたらすぐにかやすで
verses.kanji: これからは親が代わりて侭にする   これ背いたら直ぐに返すで
verses.english: Henceforth I, the Parent, will manage everything as I intend. If you go against Me, I will give you a return at once.

verses.pt: Até hoje, saibam que o pesar do Parens não tem sido coisa insignificante.
verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the regret of the Parent even before today has not been slight.
verses.ro: kyomade mo Oya no zanen to yu mono wa   chotto no koto dewa nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: けふまてもをやのさねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: 一寸の事でわないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 今日迄も親の残念と言うものは   一寸の事では無いと思えよ
verses.english: Understand that even before today the regret of the Parent has not been slight!

verses.pt: Desta vez, ainda há no mundo aqueles que em tudo se alastram, sem nada saberem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Yet at this time, the world is only rampant in all matters, knowing nothing.
verses.ro: konotabi mo mada sekai niwa nani goto mo   habikaru bakari nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp1: このたびもまだせかいにハなに事も
verses.jp2: はびかるばかりなにもしらすに
verses.kanji: この度は未だ世界には何事も   蔓延るばかり何も知らずに
verses.english: This time also, knowing nothing of this truth, people of the world are simply as rampant as they please.

verses.pt: Os seres humanos também têm afeição por seus filhos. Peço que reflitam pensando nisso.
verses.en_6th_ed: With you humans, also, your children are dear to you. Think of this and ponder, please.
verses.ro: ningen mo kodomo kawai de aro ga na   sore o omote shiyan shite kure
verses.jp1: にんけんもこ共かわいであろをがな
verses.jp2: それをふもをてしやんしてくれ
verses.kanji: 人間も子供可愛いで有ろうがな   それを思うて思案して呉れ
verses.english: You human beings must love your own children. Thinking of this, please understand My love for you!

verses.pt: No dia-a-dia, o desejo do Parens é somente preparar meios para salvar.
verses.en_6th_ed: Day after day, the concern of the Parent is only about the means to save you.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Oya no shiyan to yu mono wa   tasukeru moyo bakari omoteru
verses.jp1: にち／＼にをやのしやんとゆうものわ
verses.jp2: たすけるもよふばかりをもてる
verses.kanji: 日々に親の思案と言うものは   救ける模様ばかり思うてる
verses.english: The daily concern of the Parent is single-heartedly how best I can advance arrangements to save all of you.

verses.pt: Sem saberem disso, todas as pessoas do mundo pensam como se fosse algo mau.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, everyone in the world thinks that I am intending something evil.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   nando ashiki no yoni omote
verses.jp1: それしらすみなせかいぢうハ一れつに
verses.jp2: なんとあしきのよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず皆世界中は一列に   何と悪しきの様に思うて
verses.english: Unaware of this, each and everyone throughout the world thinks that I am intending something evil.

verses.pt: Reflitam bem nos pesares do Parens, que se vê advertido pelos filhos em todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: In all matters, think well about the Parent's regret, always being opposed by My own children.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Oya no zannen yoku omoe   kodomo bakari ni iken shirarete
verses.jp1: なにもかもをやのさんねんよくをもへ
verses.jp2: こ共はかりにいけんしられて
verses.kanji: 何もかも親の残念よく思え   子供ばかりに意見しられて
verses.english: Ponder deeply over the regret of the Parent on whatever kinds of matters! It is because I have always been admonished by My  own children.

verses.pt: Doravante, seja advertência de onde for, o Parens não aceitará, pois tem-se revelado.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, as the Parent is revealed, I shall not take opposition from wherever it may come.
verses.ro: korekara wa donna tokoro no iken demo   Oya ga dete iru ukeru koto nashi
verses.jp1: これからわどんなところのいけんでも
verses.jp2: をやがでゝいるうける事なし
verses.kanji: これからはどんな所の意見でも   親が出ている受ける事無し
verses.english: Henceforth I will never accept any admonition from whatever place it may come, because I, the Parent, am presenting Myself to the fore.

verses.pt: Se pensar em fazer esta advertência, alastrando-se, seja quem for, me retirarei prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: This opposition: if anyone becomes rampant and directs it at Me, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: kono iken dono yona mono ga habikarite   yu to omoeba suguni shirizoku
verses.jp1: このいけんとのよなものがはひかりて
verses.jp2: ゆふとをもゑばすぐにしりぞく
verses.kanji: この意見どの様な者が蔓延りて   言うと思えば直ぐに退く
verses.english: If anyone becomes rampant and directs an admonition to Me, I will withdraw at once.

verses.pt: Qual for o trabalho que realize, deixo-lhes informado previamente, ao máximo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I may work, I shall give you as much notice in advance as I possibly can.
verses.ro: dono yona shigoto suru nimo saki i yori   seeippai ni kotowarite oku
verses.jp1: とのよふなしごとするにもさきいより
verses.jp2: せへいゝはいにことわりてをく
verses.kanji: どの様な仕事するにも先いより   精一杯に断りて置く
verses.english: Whatever kind of working I may do, I always warn you beforehand as possible as I can.

verses.pt: Até hoje, embora se preocupassem dia a dia com toda e qualquer coisa,
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, though you have been worrying about all matters day after day,
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna koto omo nichinichi ni   shinpai shitaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまてハどんな事をもにち／＼に
verses.jp2: しんばいしたる事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな事をも日々に   心配したる事で有れども
verses.english: Even though until today you have been anxious about any and everything day by day,

verses.pt: De amanhã em diante, o que for que vejam e o que escutem, só terão prazer.
verses.en_6th_ed: From tomorrow on, whatever you see and whatever you hear will only give you delight.
verses.ro: asukara wa donna koto oba mita totemo   nani o kiite mo tanoshimi bakari
verses.jp1: あすからわどんな事をばみたとても
verses.jp2: なにをきいてもたのしみばかり
verses.kanji: 明日からはどんな事をば見たとても   何を聞いても楽しみばかり
verses.english: From tomorrow on, whatever you see or hear will all be truly delightful.

verses.pt: Embora, até este momento, tivessem recebido toda e qualquer ordem dos altos montes,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until this time the high mountains have given directives on every matter,
verses.ro: koremade wa takayama kara wa nanimo kamo   donna sashizu mo uketa naredomo
verses.jp1: これまでハ高山からわなにもかも
verses.jp2: どんなさしすもうけたなれとも
verses.kanji: これ迄は高山からは何もかも   どんな指図も受けたなれども
verses.english: Although hitherto we have accepted any order from the people on the high mountains on whatever kinds of matters,

verses.pt: De agora em diante, o que quer que seja dito, não aceito em absoluto. É a indicação do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, it is the Parent who will direct. Nothing said against Me shall I ever accept.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o yuwaretemo   Oya no sashizu ya sarani uken de
verses.jp1: このさきハとのよな事をゆハれても
verses.jp2: をやのさしすやさらにうけんで
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な事を言われても   親の指図や更に受けんで
verses.english: Henceforth, whatever kind of order they may give, I will never accept it because this is the direction of the Parent.

verses.pt: Até agora, por não ter chegado o dia, permaneci reservado no que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, as the day has not yet come, I have been keeping still on whatever matters.
verses.ro: imamade wa higara mo chitto kitaran de   donna koto demo jitto shite ita
verses.jp1: いまゝでわひがらもちいときたらんで
verses.jp2: とんな事てもちいとしていた
verses.kanji: 今迄は日柄もちいと来たらんで   どんな事でもじっとして居た
verses.english: Until now, as the day has been a little late in coming, I have kept still on whatever matters.

verses.pt: Mas hoje, o dia já chegou plenamente. Seja o que for, realizarei prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: But today, the time is fully pressing. I shall directly do whatever things as I intend.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa hi ga jubun ni tsunde aru   donna koto demo sono mamani suru
verses.jp1: もふけふハひがぢうふんにつんである
verses.jp2: とんな事でもそのまゝにする
verses.kanji: もう今日は日が十分に詰んで有る   どんな事でもその侭にする
verses.english: But today the time is sufficiently pressing. So I will work everything at once just as I intend.

verses.pt: Doravante, tudo será como o Parens pensa. Se disser uma palavra, jamais falhará.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, everything will be as the Parent intends. Just a word and it will be realized without fail.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya no omou koto bakari   hito koto yueba kore chigawan de
verses.jp1: これからハをやのをもふう事はかり
verses.jp2: 一事ゆゑばこれちがわんで
verses.kanji: これからは親の思う事ばかり   一言言えばこれ違わんで
verses.english: Henceforth everything shall become as I intend. If I say a word, it will always be realized without fail.

verses.pt: Todas as pessoas do mundo, sejam de onde for, não sabem o que poderá haver.
verses.en_6th_ed: Throughout the world unto its farthest places, no one knows what will happen.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu wa mina dokomade mo   donna koto oga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: せかいぢう一れつハみなとこまても
verses.jp2: どんな事をがあるやしれんで
verses.kanji: 世界中一列は皆何処迄も   どんな事が有るや知れんで
verses.english: I warn you all people of the whole world equally. There shall appear events which no one can foresee.

verses.pt: Haja o que houver, de acordo com o espírito sincero, nada haverá a temer.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever may happen, there will be nothing to fear, depending on your mind of sincerity.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo shinjitsu no   kokoro shidai ni kowai koto nashi
verses.jp1: どのよふな事がありてもしんちつの
verses.jp2: 心したいにこわい事なし
verses.kanji: どの様な事が有りても真実の   心次第に怖い事無し
verses.english: Whatever events may occur, you need fear nothing, depending on the sincerity of your mind.

verses.pt: Se ao menos o espírito for purificado completamente, tudo será somente prazer.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only the mind is purified completely, there will be nothing but delight in everything.
verses.ro: kokoro sai sukiyaka sunda koto naraba   donna koto demo tanoshimi bakari
verses.jp1: 心さいすきやかすんたことならば
verses.jp2: どんな事てもたのしみばかり
verses.kanji: 心さい清きやか澄んだ事ならば   どんな事でも楽しみばかり
verses.english: If only your mind becomes clear and clean, everything shall become full of delight.

verses.pt: Se têm o espírito que duvida destas explanações, fiquem cientes do caminho que terão.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you are of mind to doubt this talk, beware of the paths you may come upon.
verses.ro: kono hanashi utagau kokoro aru naraba   shochi shite iyo donna michi yara
verses.jp1: このはなしうたがう心あるならば
verses.jp2: しよちしていよとんなみちやら
verses.kanji: この話疑う心有るならば   承知して居よどんな道やら
verses.english: If you are of a mind to doubt this talk, be ready for what-ever kinds of ways to appear!

verses.pt: Para o Parens, todos do mundo são seus filhos. Não sabem o que dirá por ter tanta afeição.
verses.en_6th_ed: Everyone throughout the world is a child dear to the Parent. There is no knowing what I may say out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: sekaiju wa Oya no ta niwa mina kodomo   kawai amarite nani o yu yara
verses.jp1: せかいぢうわをやのたあにハみなこ共
verses.jp2: かわいあまりてなにをゆうやら
verses.kanji: 世界中は親のたあには皆子供   可愛い余りて何を言うやら
verses.english: People all over the world are all children for Me, the Parent; therefore because of My overwhelming parental love I must say whatever kinds of things which no one can foresee.

verses.pt: Neste mundo, tanto os altos montes como o fundo dos vales, para o Parens, são todos seus filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: In this world, whether it be in the high mountains or the low valleys, everyone is a child of Mine, the Parent.
verses.ro: kono sekai takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   Oya no ta niwa kodomo bakari ya
verses.jp1: このせかい高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp2: をやのたにわこ共はかりや
verses.kanji: この世界高山にても谷底も   親のたあには子供ばかりや
verses.english: For Me, the Parent, people of this world are all My children whether they may be on the high mountains or at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.pt: Desta vez, de todo e qualquer modo, desejo fazer conhecer o espírito do Parens verdadeiro.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I must have you know the mind of your true Parent.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo shinjitsu no   Oya no kokoro o shirashitai kara
verses.jp1: このたびわなんてもかてもしんぢつの
verses.jp2: をやの心をしらしたいから
verses.kanji: この度は何でもかでも真実の   親の心を知らしたいから
verses.english: This time I desire to make you know by all means necessary the true sincerity of the mind of the Parent.

verses.pt: Se ao menos ficarem certamente cientes disto, serão repletos de alegria para sempre.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only you have understood it clearly, your life will be filled with joy forever.
verses.ro: kore saika tashikani shochi shita naraba   itsu made ite mo yokizukume ya
verses.jp1: これさいかたしかにしよちしたならば
verses.jp2: いつまでいてもよふきつくめや
verses.kanji: これさいか確かに承知したならば   何時迄居ても陽気ずくめや
verses.english: If only you can thoroughly understand it, your life will be full of joy, however long you may be living.

verses.pt: Este caminho é um pedido do Parens. Que todas as pessoas fiquem firmemente cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Please become firmly convinced of this path. The Parent requests this of all humankind.
verses.ro: kono michi wa Oya ga tanomiya ichiretsu wa   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: このみちハをやがたのみや一れつわ
verses.jp2: どふそしいかりしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: この道は親が頼みや一列は   どうぞ確り承知して呉れ
verses.english: Please become firmly convinced of this way, all of you! Because I, the Parent, request you to do it.

verses.pt: Embora até hoje viesse passando gradualmente por todo e qualquer caminho,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until today we have passed through every kind of path step by step,
verses.ro: kyomade mo dono yona michi mo dandan to   torinukete wa kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでもどのよなみちもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: とふりぬけてわきたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄もどの様な道も段々と   通り抜けては来たるなれども
verses.english: Although until today, step by step we have passed through any and every way,

verses.pt: O caminho de agora em diante será extraordinário. Se passarem por este caminho,
verses.en_6th_ed: The path from now on will be entirely new and marvelous. If we pass through this path,
verses.ro: korekara no michi wa nandemo mezurashii   kono michi tori nuketa koto nara
verses.jp1: これからのみちハなんてもめつらしい
verses.jp2: このみちとふりぬけた事なら
verses.kanji: これからの道は何でも珍しい   この道通り抜けた事なら
verses.english: In the future there will appear an entirely remarkable way. If only we can pass through this way,

verses.pt: Depois disso, o espírito do Parens, animando-se, começará a realizar quaisquer coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Then the mind of the Parent will spring forth spiritedly, and I shall begin any and every working.
verses.ro: sorekara wa Oya no kokoro ga isami dete   donna koto demo hajime kakeru de
verses.jp1: それからハをやの心がいさみでゝ
verses.jp2: とんな事でもはじめかけるで
verses.kanji: それからは親の心が勇み出て   どんな事でも初め掛けるで
verses.english: Thence, the mind of the Parent shall spring forth and will begin any and everything.

verses.pt: Se ao menos isto for começado, quem quer que seja, se amparará no Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only I begin the workings, everyone, whoever one may be, will lean on the Parent.
verses.ro: kore saika hajime kaketaru koto naraba   donna mono demo Oya ni motareru
verses.jp1: これさいかはぢめかけたる事ならば
verses.jp2: とんなものてもをやにもたれる
verses.kanji: これさいか初め掛けたる事ならば   どんな者でも親に凭れる
verses.english: If only I begin this working, everyone shall lean upon Me, the Parent, whoever one may be.

verses.pt: Para abrir este caminho, tenho feito preparativos, mas, seja quem for, ainda não sabe disso.
verses.en_6th_ed: I have been preparing to open this path, but perhaps no one is yet aware of it.
verses.ro: kono michi o tsukeyo tote ni shikoshirae   donna mono demo mada shiromai na
verses.jp1: このみちをつけよふとてにしこしらゑ
verses.jp2: とんなものてもまたしろまいな
verses.kanji: この道を付け様とてに仕拵え   どんな者でも未だ知ろまいな
verses.english: To open this way, I have been preparing arrangements. Yet, perhaps no one is aware of it.

verses.pt: Comecem já! No curso do caminho de agora em diante, não haverá perigo algum, seja para quem for.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now begin! In the course of this path from now on, no danger will come to anyone, whoever one may be.
verses.ro: sa kakare mo korekara no michisuji wa   donna mono demo abunaki wa nai
verses.jp1: さあかゝれもふこれからのみちすじハ
verses.jp2: とんなものでもあふなきわない
verses.kanji: さあ掛かれもうこれからの道筋は   どんな者でも危なきは無い
verses.english: Now begin! Hereafter, on the course of this way, there shall be no danger to anyone of you, whoever you may be.

verses.pt: Embora até agora viesse causando diversas preocupações também às pessoas da casa,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have brought anxiety to those within about various matters,
verses.ro: imamade wa uchi no mono nimo iroiro ni   shinpai kakete kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわうちのものにもいろ／＼に
verses.jp2: しんばいかけてきたるなれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は内の者にも色々に   心配掛けて来たるなれども
verses.english: Although until now I have troubled My familiar people with anxiety in various ways,

verses.pt: A partir de amanhã, o Parens sairá na frente e fará a devolução do que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: From tomorrow on, the Parent will go forth a step ahead of you and give a return for every matter.
verses.ro: asukara wa Oya ga ichihana deru hodoni   donna koto demo kayashi shite yaru
verses.jp1: あすからハをやが一はなでるほとに
verses.jp2: とんな事てもかやしゝてやる
verses.kanji: 明日からは親が一端出る程に   どんな事でも返ししてやる
verses.english: From tomorrow on I, the Parent, will go ahead of you and will give a return for whatever kinds of matters.

verses.pt: Hoje, façam qualquer explanação passo a passo e detalhadamente, pois o tempo já chegou.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, you must explain My talks to others in detail step by step. The time has at last come.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa nanino hanashi mo dandan to   komakashiku yue mo setsu ya
verses.jp1: さあけふわなにのはなしもだん／＼と
verses.jp2: こまかしくゆへもふせへつうや
verses.kanji: さあ今日は何の話も段々と   細かしく言えもう節や
verses.english: Now you may explain whatever kinds of talks in detail step by step. The time has already come.

verses.pt: Seja em que for, se não falarem, nada será compreendido. Expliquem os detalhes de tudo.
verses.en_6th_ed: There will be no understanding about anything unless you tell them. Tell them everything, all in detail.
verses.ro: nani nitemo yuwazu ni ite wa wakaran de   nanika isai o mina yute kikase
verses.jp1: なにゝてもゆハすにいてハわからんで
verses.jp2: なにかいさいをみなゆてきかせ
verses.kanji: 何にても言わずに居ては分からんで   何か委細を皆言うて聞かせ
verses.english: On whatever kinds of things, if one does not speak, no one will be able to understand. Teach them any and everything all in detail!

verses.pt: Não sabem do que se trata estas explanações. Deixem dito tudo acerca do trabalho do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: Perhaps you do not know what this talk is about. Tell them all about the workings of the Parent.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto yara shiromai na   Oya no hataraki mina yute oke
verses.jp1: このはなしなにの事やらしろまいな
verses.jp2: をやのはたらきみなゆうてをけ
verses.kanji: この話何の事やら知ろまいな   親の働き皆言うて置け
verses.english: Perhaps you do not know what the true meaning of this talk is. Teach them all the working of the Parent beforehand!

verses.pt: Quanto ao trabalho, também não sabem do que se trata. Revelarei todos os espíritos do mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Perhaps you do not know what My workings are. I shall make all minds in the world be revealed.
verses.ro: hataraki mo nanino koto yara shiromai na   sekai no kokoro mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: はたらきもなにの事やらしろまいな
verses.jp2: せかいの心みなあらわすで
verses.kanji: 働きも何の事やら知ろまいな   世界の心皆表すで
verses.english: Perhaps you do not know what My working is. I will show clearly all the minds of all people of the world.

verses.pt: Começarei a revelar isto, fazendo com que todos comecem a dizer através da própria boca.
verses.en_6th_ed: To explain how they are to be revealed: each of you will speak it by your own mouth.
verses.ro: kore oba na araware dasu to yu no mo na   meme no kuchi de mina yuikakeru
verses.jp1: これをはなあらハれだすとゆうのもな
verses.jp2: めゑめゑのくちでみなゆいかける
verses.kanji: これをばな現れ出すと言うのもな   銘々の口で皆言い掛ける
verses.english: You may wonder in what way these minds can be manifested. Each one of you will speak it by your own mouth.

verses.pt: Seja o que for, se é dito através da sua própria boca, nada se pode fazer.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever kind of thing it may be, when you speak it by your own mouth, it may be impossible to deny.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo waga mi kuchi i yori   yu koto naraba zehi wa arumai
verses.jp1: どのよふな事てもわがみくちいより
verses.jp2: ゆう事ならばぜひハあるまい
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも我が身口より   言う事ならば是非は有るまい
verses.english: Whatever kind of thing it may be, if you speak it by your own mouth, it is inevitable.

verses.pt: Doravante, mesmo que cada qual nada venha a dizer, o Parens, introduzindo-se, começará a dizer.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, even if each of you keeps silent, the Parent will enter you and make you begin to speak out.
verses.ro: korekara wa meme ni nanimo yuwai demo   Oya ga irikomi yute kakaru de
verses.jp1: これからハめゑめになにもゆハいでも
verses.jp2: をやが入こみゆうてかゝるで
verses.kanji: これからは銘々に何も言わいでも   親が入り込み言うて掛かるで
verses.english: Hereafter, even though each of you may keep silent, I, the Parent, will enter into your body and make you begin to speak out.

verses.pt: Doravante, começo a fazer realmente a limpeza do coração de quem quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hereafter, I shall truly begin to sweep clean the heart of everyone of you, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: konosaki wa donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   mune no soji o mina shite kakaru
verses.jp1: このさきハどんなものでもしんちつに
verses.jp2: むねのそふちをみなしてかゝる
verses.kanji: この先はどんな者でも真実に   胸の掃除を皆して掛かる
verses.english: Henceforth I will begin truly to sweep dust from the hearts of all of you, whoever you may be.

verses.pt: Como pensam que realizarei esta limpeza? Não sabem que advertência poderei fazer.
verses.en_6th_ed: How do you think this sweeping is to be done? There is no knowing how I shall admonish you.
verses.ro: kono soji doshite suru to omou kana   donna iken o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: このそふぢどふしてするとをもうかな
verses.jp2: とんないけんをするやしれんで
verses.kanji: この掃除どうしてすると思うかな   どんな意見をするや知れんで
verses.english: You may wonder how I can accomplish this sweeping. There is no knowing what kind of admonition I may give.

verses.pt: Haja o que houver, não se preocupem, tudo é advertência do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever happens, do not worry. Everything that happens is an admonition by the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo anjina yo   nanika yorozu wa Oya no iken ya
verses.jp1: とのよふな事がありてもあんちなよ
verses.jp2: なにかよろすわをやのいけんや
verses.kanji: どの様な事が有りても案じなよ   何か万は親の意見や
verses.english: Whatever may happen, you need not become anxious. All these events are admonitions of the Parent.

verses.pt: Por mais que diga a verdade através da palavra, não há quem compreenda. É o pesar do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: No matter how I try to tell you the truth by words, there is no understanding. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: kuchi saki de nanbo shinjitsu yuta tote   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp1: くちさきでなんぼしんぢつゆうたとて
verses.jp2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん
verses.kanji: 口先で何ぼ真実言うたとて   聞き分けが無い親の残念
verses.english: However earnestly I may tell you My true sincerity by mouth, you do not understand My intention. This is the cause of the regret of the Parent.

verses.pt: Em razão disso, o Parens se introduzirá no corpo. Não sabem o que poderá realizar.
verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, the Parent will enter the body. There is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Oya ga tainai irikonde   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: それゆへにをやがたいない入こんで
verses.jp2: とんな事をばするやしれんで
verses.kanji: それ故に親が体内入り込んで   どんな事をばするや知れんで
verses.english: Therefore I, the Parent, will enter into your bodies. Thence there shall be no knowing whatever kinds of things I may work.

verses.pt: Quão dolorosos sejam os sofrimentos, não é doença, e sim, o pesar do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: However trying your condition may be, it is not an illness but the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona setsunai koto ga aritemo na   yamai dewa nai Oya no zanen ya
verses.jp1: とのよふなせつない事がありてもな
verses.jp2: やまいでわないをやのさねんや
verses.kanji: どの様な切ない事が有りてもな   病では無い親の残念や
verses.english: However painful your suffering may be, it is not an illness but the regret of the Parent.

verses.pt: Não digo de onde se trata esta explanação. Para mim, o Parens, todos são meus filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: I do not direct this talk at a particular place. You are all children of Mine, the Parent.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   Oya no ta niwa mina waga ko ya de
verses.jp1: このはなしどこの事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp2: をやのたあにわみなわがこやで
verses.kanji: この話何処の事とも言わんでな   親のたあには皆我が子やで
