verses.english: By this talk, I do not indicate any place in particular. For Me, the Parent, you are all My children.

verses.pt: Se o pesar do Parens verdadeiro for manifestado, não há quem saiba como apaziguar.
verses.en_6th_ed: When the regret of the true Parent comes out, perhaps no one knows the way to settle it.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Oya no zannen deta naraba   kono osamekata tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: しんぢつのをやのさんねんでたならば
verses.jp2: このをさめかたたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 真実の親の残念でたならば   この治め方誰も知ろまい
verses.english: If the regret of the true Parent appears, perhaps no one can find the way to appease it.

verses.pt: Quanto a isto, se houver sinceridade verdadeira, explicarei seja o que for.
verses.en_6th_ed: But if you are truly sincere, I shall teach you everything whatever.
verses.ro: kore oba na makoto shinjitsu aru naraba   donna koto demo yute kikasuru
verses.jp1: これをばなまことしんぢつあるならば
verses.jp2: どんな事でもゆうてきかする
verses.kanji: これをばな誠真実有るならば   どんな事でも言うて聞かする
verses.english: If only you have true sincerity, I will teach you any and everything.

verses.pt: Não sabem o que poderei dizer. Se contrariarem a isto, me retirarei imediatamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what I shall say, but should you reject it, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   kore somuitara suguni shirizoku
verses.jp1: どのよふな事をゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp2: これそむいたらすぐにしりぞく
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うやら知れんでな   これ背いたら直ぐに退く
verses.english: There is no knowing what kinds of things I will say. If you go against My word, I will withdraw at once.

verses.pt: Até agora, por estarem somente contrariando, vieram impedindo tudo o que tenho realizado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, I was stopped from whatever I did. There was nothing but rejection.
verses.ro: koremade wa nani o shita tote tomerarete   somuku bakari no koto de aru kara
verses.jp1: これまでハなにをしたとてとめられて
verses.jp2: そむくばかりの事であるから
verses.kanji: これ迄は何をしたとて止められて   背くばかりの事で有るから
verses.english: Hitherto whatever I have done, they have always stopped Me and you have always gone against Me.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, o que quer que realize ou diga, não devem me contrariar.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, whatever I may do or whatever I may say, do not reject it.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto o shita totemo   nani o yutemo somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハとのよな事をしたとても
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: 今日の日はどの様な事もしたとても   何を言うても背き無き様
verses.english: But today, never go against Me, whatever I may do or say.

verses.pt: Desde que peço insistentemente por este caminho, nada há a se preocupar, o Parens se encarregará.
verses.en_6th_ed: I earnestly request you to take this path. The Parent assures you, so there is no need for worry.
verses.ro: kono michi wa kuregure tanomi oku hodoni   Oya ga hikiuke anji nai zo ya
verses.jp1: このみちハくれ／＼たのみをくほとに
verses.jp2: をやがひきうけあんぢないぞや
verses.kanji: この道はくれぐれ頼み置く程に   親が引き受け案じ無いぞや
verses.english: I earnestly request you indeed to go on this way. There is nothing to be anxious about, because I, the Parent, will take charge of.

verses.pt: Não pensem o que seja este fato; desejo logo o Serviço com os instrumentos musicais.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder what this is about. I need musical instruments for the Service quickly.
verses.ro: kono koto wa nanino koto ya to omouna yo   Tsutome narimono hayaku hoshii de
verses.jp1: この事ハなにの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: つとめなりものはやくほしいで
verses.kanji: この事は何の事やと思うなよ   勤め鳴り物早く欲しいで
verses.english: Never wonder what this means! I want to prepare the musical instruments for the Service as quickly as possible.

verses.pt: Hoje, embora realizem o que quer que seja, não se preocupem, pois o Parens se encarregará.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, whatever you may do, you need not worry, for the Parent assures you.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa donna koto oba shita totemo   nanimo anjina Oya no ukeyai
verses.jp1: もふけふわどんな事をばしたとても
verses.jp2: なにもあんぢなをやのうけやい
verses.kanji: もう今日はどんな事をばしたとても   何も案じな親の請け合い
verses.english: Now today, never be anxious about whatever you may do! I, the Parent, will assure any and everything.

verses.pt: Até agora, os superiores, por nada saberem, somente proibiram e advertiram.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, because they know nothing, those in high places have always forbidden and opposed Me.
verses.ro: imamade wa kami niwa nanimo shiran kara   sashitome bakari iken shitaredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ上にわなにもしらんから
verses.jp2: さしとめはかりいけんしたれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は上には何も知らんから   差し止めばかり意見したれど
verses.english: Until now, because of their complete ignorance of My intention, the upper people have always tried to forbid and reproach My work.

verses.pt: Desta vez, seja quem for, não poderá enfrentar-me. Se tiver tal espírito, o Parens se retirará.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, no one will be able to stand against Me. From anyone who is of mind to defy, the Parent will withdraw!
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna mono demo kanawan de   yu kokoro nara Oya ga shirizoku
verses.jp1: このたびハどんなものでもかなハんで
verses.jp2: ゆう心ならをやがしりぞく
verses.kanji: この度はどんな者でも敵わんで   言う心なら親が退く
verses.english: But this time no one can stand against Me, whoever he may be. If anyone intends to stand against Me, I, the Parent, will withdraw from his body.

verses.pt: Determinem pronta e firmemente o espírito sobre este fato e comecem a executá-lo depressa.
verses.en_6th_ed: On this matter, hasten to resolve your minds firmly and begin quickly.
verses.ro: kono koto o hayaku kokoro o shikkari to   sadame o tsukete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp1: この事をはやく心しいかりと
verses.jp2: さだめをつけてはやくかゝれよ
verses.kanji: この事を早く心確りと   定めを付けて早く掛かれよ
verses.english: Awakening to this, hasten to determine your mind firmly, and quickly begin the Service!

verses.pt: Preparem logo toda e qualquer coisa do Serviço, pois o Parens se encarregará. Nada há a temer.
verses.en_6th_ed: Hasten to prepare everything for the Service. Fear nothing, for the Parent gives you assurance.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo hayaku Tsutome no shikoshirae   Oya no ukeyai kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp1: なにもかもはやくつとめのしこしらへ
verses.jp2: をやのうけやいこわみないぞや
verses.kanji: なにもかも早く勤めの仕拵え   親の請け合い怖み無いぞや
verses.english: Hasten to prepare all arrangements for the Service! Fear nothing! Because I, the Parent, am assuring it.

verses.pt: Reflitam sobre isto, determinando o espírito. Apresso a preparação do pessoal o quanto antes.
verses.en_6th_ed: On this matter, resolve your minds and ponder. I am in haste to assemble the performers.
verses.ro: kore oba na kokoro sadamete shiyan shite   hayaku ninju no moyo isogu de
verses.jp1: これをはな心さだめてしやんして
verses.jp2: はやくにんぢうのもよふいそぐで
verses.kanji: これをばな心定めて思案して   早く人衆の模様急ぐで
verses.english: So pondering over what I say with firmly determined mind, quickly hasten to complete the number of the performers!

verses.pt: O mundo se pacificará se realizarem logo e firmemente o Serviço, com espíritos unidos.
verses.en_6th_ed: If you quickly unite your minds and do the Service correctly, the world will settle.
verses.ro: hayabaya to kokoro sorote shikkari to   Tsutome suru nara sekai osamaru
verses.jp1: はや／＼と心そろをてしいかりと
verses.jp2: つとめするならせかいをさまる
verses.kanji: 早々と心揃えて確りと   勤めするなら世界治まる
verses.english: If you quickly perform the Service correctly with your minds in harmony, peace shall reign all over the world.

verses.pt: Até hoje, permaneci reservado,sem dizer nada a respeito do que quer que fosse.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, I have been biding My time, refraining from speaking out on whatever matters.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanino koto demo jikkuri to   yuwazu ni itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわなにの事でもちいくりと
verses.jp2: ゆハすにいたる事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何の事でもじっくりと   言わずにいたる事で有れども
verses.english: Although until today I have been keeping silent and have been in no hurry on whatever kinds of things,

verses.pt: Hoje, digo toda e qualquer coisa. Peço para que pensem no pesar do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: But today, I shall speak out on any and every matter. Please think of the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo yu hodoni   Oya no zannen kore omote kure
verses.jp1: もふけふわなんでもかでもゆうほどに
verses.jp2: をやのざんねんこれをもてくれ
verses.kanji: もう今日は何でもかでも言う程に   親の残念これ思うて呉れ
verses.english: Now today I will speak any and everything. Feel for the regret of your Parent!

verses.pt: Até hoje, o que quer que tenha dito, vieram julgando como se fosse algo do espírito humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you have been thinking that whatever I said was from a human mind.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro no yoni omote itaredo
verses.jp1: けふまてハなにをゆうてもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心のよふにをもていたれど
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何を言うても人間の   心の様に思うて居たれど
verses.english: Until today, whatever I may have told you, you have been thinking that it comes from a human mind.

verses.pt: Mas, agora, o que quer que diga, não pensem em absoluto que haja espírito humano.
verses.en_6th_ed: But now, whatever I may say, do not think in the least that I have a human mind.
verses.ro: sa ima wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro aru towa sarani omouna
verses.jp1: さあいまわなにをいうてもにんけんの
verses.jp2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな
verses.kanji: さあ今は何を言うても人間の   心有るとは更に思うな
verses.english: But now, never think that there is a human mind within, whatever kinds of things I may say!

verses.pt: Não sabem o que poderei dizer. O que quer que diga, fiquem cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: You do not know what I shall say, but whatever I may say, please comply.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: どの様な事を言うやら知れんでな   何を言うても承知して呉れ
verses.english: I shall say any kind of thing which no one can foresee. But please comply with Me, whatever I may say!

verses.pt: Desta vez, não sabem que experiência será feita. Com isto, determinem firmemente o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, whatever test I may put you through, resolve your mind firmly by it.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna tameshi o suru yara na   kore de shikkari kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp1: このたびハどんなためしをするやらな
verses.jp2: これでしいかり心さだめよ
verses.kanji: この度はどんな試しをするやらな   これで確り心定めよ
verses.english: This time, there is no knowing whatever test I may put to you. But through it determine your mind firmly!

verses.pt: Não digo a quem se refere esta explanação. Tudo é a determinação do espírito de cada um.
verses.en_6th_ed: I do not indicate anyone in particular by this talk. It is for each of you to resolve the mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi tare ga koto tomo yuwan de na   mina meme no kokoro sadame ya
verses.jp1: このはなしたれが事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp2: みなめゑ／＼の心さだめや
verses.kanji: この話誰が事とも言わんでな   皆銘々の心定めや
verses.english: I do not say that this talk indicates any person in particular. Each one of you must determine your own mind.

verses.pt: Quão dolorosos sejam os sofrimentos, fiquem cientes de que o Parens os sustentará.
verses.en_6th_ed: However trying your condition may be, the Parent will work to the utmost. Take heart!
verses.ro: ika hodoni setsunai koto ga aritemo na   Oya ga funbaru shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: いかほどにせつない事がありてもな
verses.jp2: をやがふんばるしようちしていよ
verses.kanji: 如何程に切ない事が有りてもな   親が踏ん張る承知して居よ
verses.english: However painfully you may suffer, be convinced that I, the Parent, will exert Myself to the utmost to protect you!

verses.pt: Doravante, peço que fiquem firmemente cientes dos dizeres do Parens, e não terão preocupações.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, please be firmly convinced of the words of the Parent. There is no need to worry.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya no yu koto shikkari to   shochi shite kure anji nai zo ya
verses.jp1: これからハをやのゆう事しいかりと
verses.jp2: しよちしてくれあんぢないぞや
verses.kanji: これからは親の言う事確りと   承知して呉れ案じ無いぞや
verses.english: Henceforth comply firmly with the word which I, the Parent, will tell you! Then there shall be nothing to fear.

verses.pt: A partir de amanhã, o Parens fará o trabalho. Seja quem for, não poderá contrariá-lo.
verses.en_6th_ed: From tomorrow, the Parent will begin the workings. Perhaps there will be no one able to defy Me.
verses.ro: asukara wa Oya ga hataraki suru hodoni   donna mono demo somuki dekemai
verses.jp1: あすからハをやがはたらきするほどに
verses.jp2: どんなものでもそむきでけまい
verses.kanji: 明日からは親が働きする程に   どんな者でも背き出来まい
verses.english: From tomorrow on I, the Parent, will begin My working. Then no one will be able to stand against it.

verses.pt: Há quarenta e três anos até agora, o Parens, revelando-se, tem começado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Forty-three years ago, the Parent became revealed and has been teaching even until now.
verses.ro: imamade mo yonju san nen izen kara   Oya ga araware hajime kaketa de
verses.jp1: いまゝでも四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: をやがあらハれはじめかけたで
verses.kanji: 今迄も四十三年以前から   親が現れ初め掛けたで
verses.english: From forty-three years ago till now I, the Parent, have revealed Myself to begin these teachings.

verses.pt: Embora até hoje houvesse tantos pesares por várias vezes, e permanecesse reservado...
verses.en_6th_ed: Yet until today, despite My many regrets, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: kyomade wa taite zanen mo iku tabi mo   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまてハたいてさねんもいくたびも
verses.jp2: ちいとしていた事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄は大抵残念も幾度も   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.english: Although until today I have very often kept still through much regret,

verses.pt: Hoje, enfim, a paciência de Tsukihi esgotou-se, embora permanecesse reservado.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, though I have been holding back, the stomach of Tsukihi has burst open.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa Tsukihi no hara ga hajiketa de   shikaete itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: さあけふハ月日のはらがはぢけたで
verses.jp2: しかゑていたる事であれども
verses.kanji: さあ今日は月日の腹が弾けたで   控えて居たる事で有れども
verses.english: Now today the abdomen of Tsukihi has burst open in spite of My effort to hold back.

verses.pt: Até agora, considerando-os da vizinhança, tenho estado ainda reservado passivamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, with the thought that you are neighbors, I have been quiet in restraint.
verses.ro: imamade wa mura ya to omote jikkuri to   mada osamarite itaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ村やとをもてちいくりと
verses.jp2: まだをさまりていたるなれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄は村やと思うてじっくりと   未だ治まりて居たるなれども
verses.english: Although until now I have quietly forborne things with the thought that they are all the villagers of this same village,

verses.pt: Desta vez, sejam pessoas de que espírito for, distinguindo-as, trabalharei prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: But this time, I shall discern your mind, whoever you are, and begin to work at once.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona kokoro iru mono mo   misadame tsukete suguni hataraku
verses.jp1: このたびハとのよな心いるものも
verses.jp2: みさだめつけてすぐにはたらく
verses.kanji: この度はどの様な心居る者も   見定め付けて直ぐに働く
verses.english: This time whatever mind you may have, I discern each of you and will begin to work at once.

verses.pt: Embora os pesares estejam tão acumulados, salvarei todos segundo o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though regret is so piled up within Me, I shall save all of you according to your minds.
verses.ro: kora hodoni zanen tsumorite aru keredo   kokoro shidai ni mina tasukeru de
verses.jp1: こらほどにさねんつもりてあるけれど
verses.jp2: 心しだいにみなたすけるで
verses.kanji: こら程に残念積りて有るけれど   心次第に皆救けるで
verses.english: Even though My regret has piled up in My heart, I will save all of you according to your mind.

verses.pt: Quão acumulados estejam os pesares, farei os trabalhos persistentemente.
verses.en_6th_ed: However high My regret is piled, I shall work, holding fast to the utmost.
verses.ro: ika hodoni zanen tsumorite aru totemo   funbari kirite hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: いかほどにさねんつもりてあるとても
verses.jp2: ふんばりきりてはたらきをする
verses.kanji: 如何程に残念積りて有るとても   踏ん張り切りて働きをする
verses.english: However high My regret has piled up, to save all of you I will do My workings, holding fast to the utmost.

verses.pt: Não se sabe o que poderei dizer no dia de hoje, revelarei todos os pesares do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, there is no knowing what I may say. I shall reveal all the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani o yu yara shiren de na   Oya no zannen mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにをゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp2: をやのざんねんみなあらわすで
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何を言うやら知れんでな   親の残念皆現す表すで
verses.english: Today there is no knowing what I may say. I, the Parent, will manifest all My regret.

verses.pt: Até agora, embora não houvesse em absoluto quem soubesse a verdade do espírito humano,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now no one has known the truth of the human mind,
verses.ro: imamade wa hito no kokoro no shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでわ人の心のしんちつを
verses.jp2: しりたるものハさらになけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は人の心の真実を   知りたる者は更に無けれど
verses.english: Although until now no one has known the truth of a human mind,

verses.pt: Hoje, será revelado certamente o verdadeiro íntimo do coração, seja de quem for.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, whoever you may be, I shall clearly reveal your true innermost heart.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa donna mono demo shinjitsu no   mune no uchi oba tashika arawasu
verses.jp1: さあけふハどんなものでもしんちつの
verses.jp2: むねのうちをばたしかあらハす
verses.kanji: さあ今日はどんな者でも真実の   胸の内をば確か現す
verses.english: Now today I will show clearly the true innermost heart of everyone, whoever one may be.

verses.pt: Se ao menos isto for todo revelado, a limpeza do coração se realizará por si só.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only it is revealed entirely, the sweeping of the heart will be accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: kore saika mina arawashita koto naraba   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp1: これさいかみなあらハした事ならば
verses.jp2: むねのそふぢがひとりでけるで
verses.kanji: これさいか皆現した事ならば   胸の掃除が独り出来るで
verses.english: If only I have manifested all of your mind, the sweeping of human hearts shall naturally be accomplished.

verses.pt: De hoje em diante, seja qual for a explanação e o que quer que diga, fiquem cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: From today on, whatever talks I shall begin and whatever I shall say, please comply.
verses.ro: kyokara wa donna hanashi o shikaketemo   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: けふからハとんなはなしをしかけても
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日からはどんな話を仕掛けても   何を言うても承知して呉れ
verses.english: From today on, whatever I may begin to say, please comply with it!

verses.pt: Não se sabe o que poderei dizer gradualmente. Realizarei a minha intenção, seja no que for.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what I shall say step by step. I shall carry out My intentions on whatever things.
verses.ro: dandan to nani o yu yara kore shiren   donna koto demo omowaku o suru
verses.jp1: たん／＼となにをゆうやらこれしれん
verses.jp2: とんな事てもをもわくをする
verses.kanji: 段々と何を言うやらこれ知れん   どんな事でも思惑をする
verses.english: There is no knowing what I may say step by step. I will do everything as I intend.

verses.pt: Há quarenta e três anos até agora, fiz sofrer da perna, e isto é uma preocupação.
verses.en_6th_ed: From forty-three years ago until now, I have caused your leg torment. This is My worry.
verses.ro: imamade wa yonju-san nen izen kara   ashi o nayameta kore ga shinpai
verses.jp1: いまゝてハ四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: あしをなやめたこれがしんはい
verses.kanji: 今迄は四十三年以前から   足を悩めたこれが心配
verses.english: From forty-three years ago until now I have afflicted your leg. This is My grave anxiety.

verses.pt: Desta vez, de toda e qualquer maneira, farei voltar isto ao estado anterior.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I shall restore it just as it was before.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo kore oba na   moto no tori ni shite kayasu de na
verses.jp1: このたびハなんでもかでもこれをはな
verses.jp2: もとのとふりにしてかやすでな
verses.kanji: この度は何でもかでもこれをばな   元の通りにして返すでな
verses.english: This time by all means I will restore it just as it was before.

verses.pt: O que quer que Tsukihi diga nesta explanação, não devem contrariá-lo, seja no que for.
verses.en_6th_ed: In this talk, whatever Tsukihi may say concerning any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nani o Tsukihi ga yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: このはなしなにを月日がゆうたとて
verses.jp2: どんな事てもそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: この話何を月日が言うたとて   どんな事でも背き無き様
verses.english: This remark: whatever I, Tsukihi, may say, never go against it!

verses.pt: Doravante, o pedido do Parens será só isto. Não direi nada a respeito de outra coisa.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, the Parent will request just one matter of you. I shall speak of nothing else.
verses.ro: korekara no Oya no tanomi wa kore bakari   hoka naru koto wa nanimo yuwan de
verses.jp1: これからのをやのたのみハこればかり
verses.jp2: ほかなる事わなにもゆハんで
verses.kanji: これからの親の頼みはこればかり   他なる事は何も言わんで
verses.english: From now on I, the Parent, request just this matter. I will speak of nothing else.

verses.pt: O que pensam ser este pedido a que refiro? É a dedicação única ao Serviço.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this request is? It is solely about the Service.
verses.ro: kono koto o nani o tanomu to omou kana   Tsutome ichijo no koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: この事をなにをたのむとをもうかな
verses.jp2: つとめ一ぢよの事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: この事を何を頼むと思うかな   勤め一条の事ばかりやで
verses.english: What do you think My request can be? It is solely the single-hearted performance of the Service.

verses.pt: Este Serviço é o início deste mundo. Se pelo menos isto vier a ser realizado...
verses.en_6th_ed: This Service is the beginning of this world. If only this is realized...
verses.ro: kono Tsutome kore ga kono yo no hajimari ya   kore sai kanota koto de aru nara
verses.jp1: このつとめこれがこのよのはぢまりや
verses.jp2: これさいかのた事であるなら
verses.kanji: この勤めこれがこの世の初まりや   これさい叶のうた事で有るなら
verses.english: This Service is indeed the beginning of this world. How satisfied I shall feel, if only this is fulfilled!

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, que o espírito dos próximos, seja no que for, não contrarie os dizeres do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, you close to Me, let your minds not be opposed to the Parent's words on any matter.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa Oya no yu koto nani goto mo   soba no kokoro ni somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: さあけふハをやのゆう事なに事も
verses.jp2: そはの心にそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: さあ今日は親の言う事何事も   側の心に背き無き様
verses.english: Now today you close to Me must take care never to go against the words of your Parent, whatever they may be.

verses.pt: Se o espírito dos próximos errar, não há escolha. Assim, deixo dito repetidas vezes.
verses.en_6th_ed: If the minds of you close to Me are in error, there will be no help. That is why I speak so repeatedly.
verses.ro: soba naru no kokoro chigaeba zehi ga nai   sokode kudokudo yute oku zo ya
verses.jp1: そはなるの心ちがゑばぜひがない
verses.jp2: そこでくど／＼ゆうてをくぞや
verses.kanji: 側なるの心違えば是非が無い   そこでくどくど言うて置くぞや
verses.english: But, if you close to Me misuse your minds, there shall be no help. Accordingly I give you such repeated persuasion.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, embora no mundo não haja absolutamente quem saiba a respeito de tudo,
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, though there is yet no one in the world who knows any and everything,
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani yono koto mo sekai niwa   shiritaru hito wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなによの事もせかいにハ
verses.jp2: しりたる人ハさらになけれど
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何よの事も世界には   知りたる人は更に無けれど
verses.english: Today in the world there is no one who knows any and everything.

verses.pt: Aos olhos do Parens, é visto seguramente, entretanto, ninguém sabe do que se trata.
verses.en_6th_ed: It is clearly seen in the eyes of the Parent. Perhaps no one is yet aware of what it might be.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni shikkari miete aru hodoni   donna koto yara tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: をやのめにしいかりみへてあるほどに
verses.jp2: とんな事やらたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 親の目に確り見えて有る程に   どんな事やら誰も知ろまい
verses.english: Indeed, it is clearly visible to the eyes of the Parent. Perhaps no one is yet aware of what it is.

verses.pt: Desde quando iniciei este mundo até agora, são somente coisas desconhecidas por todos.
verses.en_6th_ed: It is solely about things unknown from the time I began this world until now.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara ni imamade wa   tare demo shiranu koto bakari ya de
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめてからにいまゝてハ
verses.jp2: たれてもしらぬ事ばかりやで
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに今迄は   誰でも知らぬ事ばかりやで
verses.english: From the creation to the present there are all such things which no one has ever known before.

verses.pt: Por desejar ensinar essas coisas, realizo gradativamente qualquer coisa.
verses.en_6th_ed: I desire to teach them to you. That is why I am doing all that I do step by step.
verses.ro: sono koto o oshietai kara dandan to   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp1: その事をふしゑたいからたん／＼と
verses.jp2: そこでとのよな事もするのや
verses.kanji: その事を教えようとて段々と   そこでどの様な事もするのや
verses.english: As I desire to teach them to you, step by step I work any and everything.

verses.pt: Deixando dito tudo e qualquer coisa, após isto, o Parens realizará o seu trabalho.
verses.en_6th_ed: After telling you any and everything about all matters, the Parent will work.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo yute oite   sorekara Oya ga hataraki o suru
verses.jp1: なにもかもとのよな事もゆてをいて
verses.jp2: それからをやがはたらきをする
verses.kanji: 何もかもどの様な事も言うて置いて   それから親が働きをする
verses.english: After having taught you any and everything beforehand, I, the Parent, will do My working.

verses.pt: Quanto ao trabalho, não se sabe de que se trata. O mundo todo é corpo do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: You might not know what this working is. The whole universe is the body of the Parent.
verses.ro: hataraki mo donna koto yara shiromai na   sekaiju wa Oya no karada ya
verses.jp1: はたらきもとんな事やらしろまいな
verses.jp2: せかいちうハをやのからだや
verses.kanji: 働きもどんな事やら知ろまいな   世界中は親の体や
verses.english: Perhaps you may not know what My working is. Truly this whole universe is the body of the Parent.

verses.pt: Por desejar informar os pesares do Parens de até agora, desta vez, mostrarei tudo, realizando.
verses.en_6th_ed: I desire that you know the regret of the Parent up to now. So at this time, I shall reveal all of it.
verses.ro: imamade no Oya no zannen shirashitasa   sokode konotabi mina shite miseru
verses.jp1: いまゝてのをやのざんねんしらしたさ
verses.jp2: そこでこのたびみなしてみせる
verses.kanji: 今迄の親の残念知らしたさ   そこでこの度皆して見せる
verses.english: I desire to let you know the regret of the Parent in the past. Therefore, now I will work to show you all of it.

verses.pt: Não se sabe que coisa poderei realizar. Fiquem todos igualmente cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what I am going to do. Take notice, each and everyone of you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru yara shiren de na   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をするやらしれんてな
verses.jp2: みな一れつハしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: どの様な事をするやら知れんでな   皆一列は承知して居よ
verses.english: There is no knowing what kinds of things I may work. Be aware of this, all of you!

verses.pt: Sobre a insistente explanação deste pesar, o que todas as pessoas estão pensando?
verses.en_6th_ed: What are all of you thinking of this talk about My regret and appeals at this time?
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen kudoki no kono hanashi   mina ichiretsu wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp1: このたびのさねんくときのこのはなし
verses.jp2: みな一れつわなんとをもてる
verses.kanji: この度の残念口説きのこの話   皆一列は何と思うてる
verses.english: What are you all thinking of this persuading talk over My regret?

verses.pt: Esta origem remonta há quarenta e três anos, quando comecei uma grande experiência.
verses.en_6th_ed: The origin of it is forty-three years ago. It is then that I began a great test.
verses.ro: kono moto wa yonju san nen izen kara   erai tameshi ga kakete aru zo ya
verses.jp1: このもとわ四十三ねんいぜんから
verses.jp2: ゑらいためしがかけてあるぞや
verses.kanji: この元は四十三年以前から   えらい試しが掛けて有るぞや
verses.english: The beginning of this matter can be traced back forty-three years ago. From that time on I have been conducting a test of great importance.

verses.pt: Se ao menos ficarem firmemente cientes disto, nada deixará de ser atendido.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only this matter is clearly understood, there will be nothing that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: kore saika shikkari shochi shita naraba   donna koto oga kanawan de nashi
verses.jp1: これさいかしいかりしよちしたならば
verses.jp2: とんな事をがかなわんでなし
verses.kanji: これさいか確り承知したならば   どんな事をが叶わんで無し
verses.english: If only you understand this matter clearly, there shall be no prayer which cannot be heard.

verses.pt: Por desejar salvar igualmente todas as pessoas do mundo, a experiência é de grande importância.
verses.en_6th_ed: As I desire to save all people of the whole world, this test is of great importance.
verses.ro: sekaiju o mina ichiretsu o tasuketasa   sokode tameshi ga erai koto ya de
verses.jp1: せかいちうをみな一れつをたすけたさ
verses.jp2: そこでためしがゑらい事やで
verses.kanji: 世界中を皆一列を救けたさ   そこで試しがえらい事やで
verses.english: I earnestly desire to save all people of the whole world equally. Therefore the test is very momentous.

verses.pt: Embora até hoje tenha passado por quaisquer caminhos e permanecesse reservado,
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, while going through every kind of path, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: kyomade wa dono yona michi mo torinuke   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: けふまでわとのよなみちもとふりぬけ
verses.jp2: ぢいとしていた事であれども
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどの様な道も通り抜け   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.english: Although until today I have passed through whatever kinds of ways and yet have kept still,

verses.pt: Já hoje, de toda e qualquer maneira, começarei a realizar a verdade. Fiquem cientes disso.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now at last, I shall stop at nothing in beginning to reveal the truth. Be aware of it, all of you.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo shinjitsu o   shite kakaru de na shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: もふけふハなんでもかでもしんぢつを
verses.jp2: してかゝるでなしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: もう今日は何でもかでも真実を   して掛かるでな承知して居よ
verses.english: Now today by all means I will begin to manifest the truth. Be aware of it!

verses.pt: O caminho de até agora mudará completamente. Todas as pessoas, igualmente, determinem o espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: The path will change entirely from what it has been until now. All of you, settle your minds.
verses.ro: imamade to michi ga korori to kawaru de na   mina ichiretsu wa kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp1: いまゝでとみちがころりとかハるでな
verses.jp2: みな一れつわ心さためよ
verses.kanji: 今迄と道がころりと変わるでな   皆一列は心定めよ
verses.english: The way shall be entirely changed from what has been before. Determine your mind, all of you equally!

verses.pt: Este caminho não discrimina os de casa dos do mundo, consiste em limpar os corações do mundo inteiro.
verses.en_6th_ed: This path does not discriminate between those within and the others. It is to sweep the heart of everyone in the world.
verses.ro: kono michi wa uchi mo sekai mo hedate nai   sekaiju no mune no soji ya
verses.jp1: このみちハうちもせかいもへたてない
verses.jp2: せかいちううのむねのそふぢや
verses.kanji: この道は内も世界も隔てない   世界中の胸の掃除や
verses.english: In this way there is no discrimination between those familiar with Me and other people of the world. This way is the sweeping dust of the hearts of all people of the whole world.

verses.pt: Desde quando iniciei este mundo até hoje, nada tenho dito a respeito da verdade real.
verses.en_6th_ed: From the time I began this world until today, I have not yet told the real truth.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani kyomade wa   honshinjitsu o yuta koto nashi
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめてからにけふまでわ
verses.jp2: ほんしんぢつをゆうた事なし
verses.kanji: この世を初めてからに今日迄は   本真実を言うた事無し
verses.english: Since the creation of this world until today, I have never told you the ultimate truth yet.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, começo a dizer a verdade real. Peço que fiquem firmemente cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, I shall begin to tell you the real truth. Please understand it clearly.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa honshinjitsu o yuikakeru   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp1: けふの日ハほんしんちつをゆいかける
verses.jp2: とふぞしいかりしよちしてくれ
verses.kanji: 今日の日は本真実を言い掛ける   どうぞ確り承知して呉れ
verses.english: Today I wil begin to tell you the ultimate truth. I hope you will become firmly convinced of it.

verses.pt: Esta explanação remonta há quarenta e três anos. É unicamente sobre a grande experiência.
verses.en_6th_ed: This talk is solely about the great test from forty-three years ago.
verses.ro: kono hanashi yonju san nen izen kara   erai tameshi ga kore ga ichijo
verses.jp1: このはなし四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: ゑらいためしがこれが一ちよ
verses.kanji: この話四十三年以前から   えらい試しがこれが一条
verses.english: These remarks are on the momentous test which I have been conducting since forty-three years ago.

verses.pt: Que pensam ser esta experiência? É o preparo para apressar a dedicação única ao Serviço.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this test is about? It is solely about the preparations to hasten the Service.
verses.ro: kono tameshi nanino koto ya to omou kana   Tsutome ichijo seku moyo ya de
verses.jp1: このためしなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: つとめ一ぢよせくもよふやで
verses.kanji: この試し何の事やと思うかな   勤め一条急く模様やで
verses.english: But why, you may wonder, do I make such a test? It is the preparation to hasten the single-hearted performance of the Service.

verses.pt: O que pensam sobre este Serviço? É o preparo do pessoal com a inclusão dos instrumentos musicais.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think about this Service? Prepare for the performers including the musical instruments.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome doyu koto ni omou kana   narimono irete ninju no moyo
verses.jp1: このつとめどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp2: なりもの入て人ちうのもよふ
verses.kanji: この勤めどういう事に思うかな   鳴り物入れて人衆の模様
verses.english: What do you think of this Service? I hasten to assemble the whole number of performers including those necessary for the musical instruments.

verses.pt: Seja quem for, reflita sobre este Serviço. Se o parar, o próprio corpo parará.
verses.en_6th_ed: Ponder over this Service, whoever you are. If you dare to stop it, your life will be stopped.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome donna mono demo shiyan seyo   kore tometa nara waga mi tomaru de
verses.jp1: このつとめどんなものでもしやんせよ
verses.jp2: これとめたならわがみとまるで
verses.kanji: この勤めどんな者でも思案せよ   これ止めたなら我が身止まるで
verses.english: Ponder deeply over the significance of this Service, any and everyone of you! If anyone dares to stop it, he himself shall be stopped.

verses.pt: Tal como quando iniciei este mundo, criei o ser humano ainda inexistente.
verses.en_6th_ed: It is the same as the way I began this world. I began human beings that never existed.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime kaketa mo onaji koto   nai ningen o hajime kaketa de
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめかけたもをなぢ事
verses.jp2: ないにんけんをはちめかけたで
verses.kanji: この様を初め掛けたも同じ事   無い人間を初め掛けたで
verses.english: I have commenced to create the human beings who had not existed before, the same as I had done in the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Se ao menos isto for começado, assegurarei toda e qualquer salvação.
verses.en_6th_ed: If only this is begun, I shall assure you any salvation whatever.
verses.ro: kore saika hajime kaketaru koto naraba   donna tasuke mo mina ukeyau de
verses.jp1: これさいかはじめかけたる事ならば
verses.jp2: とんなたすけもみなうけやうで
verses.kanji: これさいか初め掛けたる事ならば   どんな救けも皆請け合うで
verses.english: If only you begin this Service, I will fully assure any and every kind of salvation.

verses.pt: Devem ficar firmemente cientes deste fato. Se o impedirem, me retirarei imediatamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: You must clearly understand this matter. If it is stopped, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: kono koto wa shikkari shochi sen naran   kore tometa nara suguni shirizoku
verses.jp1: この事ハしいかりしよちせんならん
verses.jp2: これとめたならすくにしりぞく
verses.kanji: この事は確り承知せんならん   これ止めたなら直ぐに退く
verses.english: You must be firmly convinced of this matter. If you stop it, I will withdraw Myself at once.

verses.pt: Embora até agora os altos montes, com insultos, agissem à vontade,
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, the high mountains, boastful, have noisily done as they pleased.
verses.ro: imamade wa takayama ya tote kenken to   mamani shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝてハ高山やとてけん／＼と
verses.jp2: まゝにしていた事てあれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は高山やとて喧々と   侭にして居た事で有れども
verses.english: Although until now those who are on the high mountains have done anything as they please, scolding noisily,

verses.pt: Doravante, sejam de quão altos montes, jamais poderão agir à vontade no fundo dos vales.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, however high the mountains may be, they will never be able to do as they please to the low valleys.
verses.ro: korekara wa ika hodo takai yama demo na   tanisoko mamani sarani dekemai
verses.jp1: これからハいかほどたかい山でもな
verses.jp2: たにそこまゝにさらにてけまい
verses.kanji: これからは如何程高い山でもな   谷底侭に更に出来まい
verses.english: Henceforth, however high their position may be, those who are on the high mountains shall never be able to do as they please to those who are at the bottoms of the valleys.

verses.pt: De agora em diante, serão gradualmente avistadas numerosas árvores usáveis no fundo dos vales.
verses.en_6th_ed: I see many useful timbers ahead, appearing in the low valleys step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa tanisoko nitewa dandan to   oku yoki ga miete aru zo ya
verses.jp1: このさきわたにそこにてハだん／＼と
verses.jp2: をふくよふきがみゑてあるぞや
verses.kanji: この先は谷底にては段々と   多く用木が見えて有るぞや
verses.english: Henceforth at the bottoms of the valleys many useful timbers are appearing one by one.

verses.pt: Gradualmente, o Parens, que iniciou este mundo, se introduzirá em todas as madeiras usáveis.
verses.en_6th_ed: Step by step, the Parent, who began this universe, will enter these useful timbers.
verses.ro: dandan to yoboku nitewa kono yo o   hajimeta Oya ga mina irikomu de
verses.jp1: たん／＼とよふぼくにてハこのよふを
verses.jp2: はしめたをやがみな入こむで
verses.kanji: 段々と用木にてはこの世を   初めた親が皆入り込むで
verses.english: Step by step I, the Parent, who created this universe will enter into all of My timber.

verses.pt: Se o Parens, que iniciou este mundo, se introduzir no corpo, não sabem o que poderá realizar.
verses.en_6th_ed: When the Parent, who began this universe, enters them, there is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Oya ga irikomeba   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: このよふをはじめたをやか入こめば
verses.jp2: どんな事をばするやしれんで
verses.kanji: この世を初めた親が入り込めば   どんな事をばするや知れんで
verses.english: When I, the Parent, who created this universe enter into your bodies, there is no knowing what kinds of wonders I may work.

verses.pt: O que quer que seja feito, não se preocupem. O Parens se encarregará de todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I do, do not worry. Any and everything is assured by the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o shita tote anjina yo   nanika yorozu wa Oya no ukeyai
verses.jp1: とのよふな事をしたとてあんぢなよ
verses.jp2: なにかよろつわをやのうけやい
verses.kanji: どの様な事をしたとて案じなよ   何か万は親の請け合い
verses.english: Never fear, whatever work I may do! I, the Parent, assure any and everything.

verses.pt: Determinem pronta e firmemente o espírito sobre este fato e comecem a executá-lo depressa.
verses.en_6th_ed: Quickly settle this matter firmly in your mind and hasten to begin.
verses.ro: kono koto o hayaku kokoro o shikkari to   sadame o tsukete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp1: この事をはやく心をしいかりと
verses.jp2: さだめをつけてはやくかゝれよ
verses.kanji: この事を早く心を確りと   定めを付けて早く掛かれよ
verses.english: Understand this matter, and quickly making up your mind, firmly hasten to begin the Service at once!

verses.pt: Até hoje, embora não houvesse em absoluto quem soubesse como era o caminho,
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, there has been no one who has known what kind of a path this is.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna michi yara tare nitemo   shiritaru mono wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp1: けふまてハどんなみちやらたれにても
verses.jp2: しりたるものハさらになけれど
verses.kanji: 今日迄はどんな道やら誰にても   知りたる者は更に無けれど
verses.english: Until today there has been no one who has known what kind of way this is.

verses.pt: Mas hoje, revelo gradualmente todo o espírito verdadeiro. Fiquem cientes disso.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now at last, I shall fully reveal the mind's core step by step. Take notice!
verses.ro: mo kyo wa shin no kokoro o dandan to   mina arawasu de shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: もふけふハしんのこころをたん／＼と
verses.jp2: みなあらわすでしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: もう今日は芯の心を段々と   皆現すで承知して居よ
verses.english: But now today step by step the core of My mind shall entirely appear. Be aware of it!

verses.pt: Quem corresponder aos olhos do Parens, dia a dia, o espírito só se animará gradualmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Those who are acceptable in the eyes of the Parent will grow only more spirited step by step and day by day.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni kanota mono wa nichinichi ni   dandan kokoro isamu bakari ya
verses.jp1: をやのめにかのふたものハにち／＼に
verses.jp2: だん／＼心いさむばかりや
verses.kanji: 親の目に適うた者は日々に   段々心勇むばかりや
verses.english: Those who meet the eyes of the Parent shall continue to become cheered up step by step and day by day.

verses.pt: Quem for um pesar aos olhos do Parens, não se sabe quando poderá dissipar-se, como um sonho.
verses.en_6th_ed: Those who are regrettable in the eyes of the Parent may be gone in a moment as in a dream.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni zanen no mono wa nandoki ni   yume mita yoni chiru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: をやのめにさねんのものハなんときに
verses.jp2: ゆめみたよふにちるやしれんで
verses.kanji: 親の目に残念の者は何時に   夢見た様に散るや知れんで
verses.english: Those who are regrettable in the eyes of the Parent may be gone at any moment as in a dream.

verses.pt: Não digo de onde se trata esta explanação. Todos do mundo inteiro são meus filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: By this talk, I do not indicate any particular place. All people in the world are My own children.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   sekaiju wa mina waga ko ya de
verses.jp1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんでな
verses.jp2: せかいちううハみなわがこやで
verses.kanji: この話何処の事とも言わんでな   世界中は皆我が子やで
verses.english: I do not give this talk indicating any place in particular. People of the whole world are all My children.

verses.pt: Tenho plena afeição por todos os filhos, igualmente. Seja de onde for, não há distinção absolutamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: All children in the world are equally dear to Me. Though there is no discrimination whatsoever,
verses.ro: ichiretsu no kodomo wa kawai bakari nari   doko ni hedate wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp1: 一れつのこどもハかわいばかりなり
verses.jp2: とこにへたてわさらになけれど
verses.kanji: 一列の子供は可愛いばかりなり   何処に隔ては更に無けれど
verses.english: I love all My children equally with all My heart. Therefore there is no discrimination whatsoever.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Se tiverem erros espirituais, não há escolha. Por isso, os cuidarei gradualmente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! There will be no help if your mind is in error. That is why I am giving you My care step by step.
verses.ro: shikato kike kokoro chigaeba zehi ga nai   sokode dandan teiri suru no ya
verses.jp1: しかときけ心ちがゑばせひがない
verses.jp2: そこでだん／＼ていりするのや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け心違えば是非が無い   そこで段々手入りするのや
verses.english: Listen attentively! If you misuse your mind, there will be no help. Therefore I repeatedly put in My hand to repair.

verses.pt: Quanto a este fato, tanto os dos altos montes como os do fundo dos vales, determinem o espírito sem se descuidar.
verses.en_6th_ed: On this matter, you on the high mountains as well as in the low valleys, set your mind so as not to be unaware.
verses.ro: kono koto wa takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   yudan naki yoni kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp1: この事ハ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp2: ゆだんなきよに心さだめよ
verses.kanji: この事は高山にても谷底も   油断無き様に心定めよ
verses.english: On this matter, determine your minds without negligence, both those on the high mountains and those at the bottoms of the valleys!

verses.pt: Peço-lhes, mas o que pensam que vou pedir? Reúnam os instrumentos musicais e treinem o quanto antes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now a request. What do you think I request? Quickly assemble the musical instruments and begin practice.
verses.ro: sa tanomu nani o tanomu to omou kana   hayaku narimono yosete keiko
verses.jp1: さあたのむなにをたのむとをもうかな
verses.jp2: はやくなりものよせてけいこふ
verses.kanji: さあ頼む何を頼むと思うかな   早く鳴り物寄せて稽古を
verses.english: Now I request. You may wonder what I am going to request. I begin to learn how to play them.

verses.pt: Até o presente, seja em que for, tenho estado ainda reservado passivamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until this time I have continued to keep still on whatever matters,
verses.ro: koremade wa donna koto demo jikkuri to   mada osamarite itaru naredomo
verses.jp1: これまてハとんな事てもちいくりと
verses.jp2: またをさまりていたるなれども
verses.kanji: これ迄はどんな事でもじっくりと   未だ治まりて居たるなれども
verses.english: Hitherto I have continued to hold Myself back without hurrying on whatever kinds of matters.

verses.pt: Mas, hoje, devem realizar o Serviço imediatamente, de toda e qualquer maneira.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now today, by all means, you must quickly do the Service.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo hayabaya to   Tsutome seneba naran koto ya de
verses.jp1: もふけふわなんてもかてもはや／＼と
verses.jp2: つとめせゑねばならん事やで
verses.kanji: もう今日は何でもかでも早々と   勤めせえねばならん事やで
verses.english: But now today you must quickly perform the Service by all means.

verses.pt: Até agora, embora tenha feito gradualmente diversos pedidos do que quer que fosse,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have made requests of you in various matters step by step,
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto demo dandan to   iroiro tanomi kakete aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝてハどんな事でもたん／＼と
verses.jp2: いろ／＼たのみかけてあれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな事でも段々と   色々頼み掛けて有れども
verses.english: Until now I have made requests to you step by step in various matters of whatever kinds.

verses.pt: O que quer que peça, não há quem compreenda. É o pesar do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever I request, no one understands. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: nani goto o tanonda totemo tare nitemo   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp1: なに事をたのんだとてもたれにても
verses.jp2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん
verses.kanji: 何事を頼んだとても誰にても   聞き分けが無い親の残念
verses.english: But whatever I may have requested, no one has complied with Me. This lack is regrettable to Me, the Parent.

verses.pt: Sobre a insistente explanação deste pesar, peço que compreendam bem.
verses.en_6th_ed: Please clearly understand this talk about My regret and appeals at this time.
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen kudoki no kono hanashi   dozo shikkari kikiwakete kure
verses.jp1: このたびのざねんくどきのこのはなし
verses.jp2: とふぞしいかりきゝわけてくれ
verses.kanji: この度の残念口説きのこの話   どうぞ確り聞き分けて呉れ
verses.english: This time I will persuade you talking over My regret. Please hear it attentively and understand it well!

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, o que quer que o Parens diga, não devem contrariá-lo, seja no que for.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, whatever the Parent may say concerning any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa Oya ga nani goto yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: けふの日ハをやがなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: どんな事でもそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: 今日の日は親が何事言うたとて   どんな事でも背き無き様
verses.english: Today, whatever I, the Parent, may tell you, never go against it, whatever it may be!

verses.pt: Qualquer explanação feita até agora, e tudo que tenha dito, foi somente fragrância.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, whatever talks I gave and whatever I said were but a fragrance.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna hanashi o shita totemo   nani o yutemo nioi bakari ya
verses.jp1: いまゝでハどんなはなしをしたとても
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもにをいはかりや
verses.kanji: 今迄はどんな話をしたとても   何を言うても匂いばかりや
verses.english: Hitherto, whatever talks I have given you, they were mere fragrance.

verses.pt: As explanações do dia de hoje são ditas por ter chegado o tempo e serão vistas tal qual prontamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: But My talks today are in the fullness of time. Everything I say will be seen at once.
verses.ro: kyonohi no hanashi to yu wa setsu ya   mo sono mamani suguni mieru de
verses.jp1: けふの日のはなしとゆうハせへつうや
verses.jp2: もふそのまゝにすぐにみへるで
verses.kanji: 今日の日の話と言うは節や   もうその侭に直ぐに見えるで
verses.english: But today I am talking to you in the due time which has at last come. Now everything shall soon appear just as I say.

verses.pt: Esta explanação remonta há quarenta e três anos. Agora, dissiparei o pesar do coração.
verses.en_6th_ed: This talk is that, now, I shall clear away the regret piling in My heart for forty-three years.
verses.ro: kono hanashi yonju san nen izen kara   mune no zannen ima harasu de na
verses.jp1: このはなし四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: むねのざんねんいまはらすてな
verses.kanji: この話四十三年以前から   胸の残念今晴らすでな
verses.english: This talk is that now I will clear away My regret which has piled up for forthy-three years.

verses.pt: Sem saber disso, as pessoas de casa pensam que tudo é coisa do nível comum.
verses.en_6th_ed: Unaware of this, those of you within are thinking of everything as being worldly common.
verses.ro: sore shirazu uchi naru mono wa nanimo kamo   sekainami naru yoni omote
verses.jp1: それしらすうちなるものハなにもかも
verses.jp2: せかいなみなるよふにをもふて
verses.kanji: それ知らず内なる者は何もかも   世界並なる様に思うて
verses.english: Unaware of this, you familiar with Me are taking everything as if it were a wordly matter.

verses.pt: Este caminho remonta há quarenta e três anos, tendo passado por caminhos realmente penosos.
verses.en_6th_ed: This path has truly been a path of hardship for forty-three years.
verses.ro: kono michi wa yonju san nen izen kara   makoto nanju na michi o torita
verses.jp1: このみちハ四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp2: まことなんぢうなみちをとふりた
verses.kanji: この道は四十三年以前から   誠難渋な道を通りた
verses.english: For forty-three years the way has passed through extreme hardships.

verses.pt: Mesmo que ninguém soubesse disso até agora, desta vez, dissiparei tudo isto.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though no one has known of it until now, this time I shall clear it all away.
verses.ro: sono koto o imamade tare mo shirai demo   konotabi kore o mina harasu de na
verses.jp1: その事をいまゝでたれもしらいでも
verses.jp2: このたびこれをみなはらすでな
verses.kanji: その事を今迄誰も知らいでも   この度これを皆晴らすでな
verses.english: Even though no one has known about it hitherto, this time I will make it all clear.

verses.pt: Quanto ao modo de se fazer esta dissipação, revelarei tudo pela dedicação única ao Serviço.
verses.en_6th_ed: To explain how it will be cleared away: I shall reveal everything solely by the Service.
verses.ro: kono harashi doshite harasu koto naraba   Tsutome ichijo de mina arawasu de
verses.jp1: このはらしどふしてはらす事ならば
verses.jp2: つとめ一ぢよてみなあらハすで
verses.kanji: この晴らしどうして晴らす事ならば   勤め一条で皆現すで
verses.english: You may wonder how I can make it clear. I will realize it by means of the single-hearted performance of the Service.

verses.pt: Qualquer coisa que o Parens diga sobre este Serviço, não devem contrariá-lo, seja no que for.
verses.en_6th_ed: As to this Service, whatever the Parent may say about any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome Oya ga nani goto yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp1: このつとめをやがなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: とんな事てもそむきなきよふ
verses.kanji: この勤め親が何事言うたとて   どんな事でも背き無き様
verses.english: As to this Service, never go against My words, whatever I, the Parent, may say!

verses.pt: Deixo pedido isto com insistência, para que não haja arrependimento posterior.
verses.en_6th_ed: I request you earnestly, especially in this matter, so you will not be remorseful later.
verses.ro: kore bakari kuregure tanomi oku hodoni   ato de kokwai naki yoni ya de
verses.jp1: こればかりくれ／＼たのみをくほとに
verses.jp2: あとでこふくハいなきよふにやで
verses.kanji: こればかりくれぐれ頼み置く程に   後で後悔無き様にやで
verses.english: Just this, I earnestly request you to bear it in mind lest you should repent of it afterwards.

verses.pt: Se impedirem a dedicação única ao Serviço, me retirarei logo, mesmo que seja do representante.
verses.en_6th_ed: If anyone dares to stop this Service, I shall withdraw even from the proxy at once.
verses.ro: konotabi no Tsutome ichijo tomeru nara   myodai nari to suguni chirizoku
verses.jp1: この度のつとめ一ちよとめるなら
verses.jp2: みよだいなりとすぐにしりぞく
verses.kanji: この度の勤め一条止めるなら   名代なりと直ぐに退く
verses.english: If anyone tries to stop this Service, even if he may be the proxy, I will withdraw from his body at once.

verses.pt: O que pensam os próximos acerca desta explanação? Não posso esperar nem por um momento.
verses.en_6th_ed: You close to Me, what are you thinking about this talk? I cannot wait even for a breath.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote soba na mono   mo hitoiki mo machite iraren
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてそはなもの
verses.jp2: もふひといきもまちていられん
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて側な者   もう一息も待ちておられん
verses.english: How are you close to Me hearing these words? I can wait no more even for a breath.

verses.pt: Comecem a preparar logo os instrumentos musicais, estou apressando somente a execução do Serviço.
verses.en_6th_ed: Quickly begin to bring out the musical instruments at least. I am hastening solely for the Service.
verses.ro: hayabaya to narimono nari to dashikake yo   Tsutome bakari o sete iru kara
verses.jp1: はや／＼となりものなりとたしかけよ
verses.jp2: つとめはかりをせへているから
verses.kanji: 早々と鳴り物なりと出し掛けよ   勤めばかりを急いて居るから
verses.english: Quickly begin to arrange the musical instruments at least! I am hastening single-heartedly for the performance of the Service.

verses.pt: Até agora, não há quem conheça a verdade da origem do homem e o início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: Until now, perhaps no one has known about the origin of human beings at the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: imamade wa kono yo hajimeta ningen no   moto naru koto o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: いまゝてハこのよはじめたにんけんの
verses.jp2: もとなる事をたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 今迄はこの世初めた人間の   元なる事を誰も知ろまい
verses.english: Until now perhaps no one has ever known the origin of human beings at the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Desta vez, desejo ensinar firmemente ao mundo, tudo acerca desta origem.
verses.en_6th_ed: At this time, by all means, I wish to teach everything about this origin clearly to the world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono moto naru o shikkari to   dozo sekai e mina oshietai
verses.jp1: このたびわこのもとなるをしいかりと
verses.jp2: とふぞせかいゑみなをしゑたい
verses.kanji: この度はこの元なるを確りと   どうぞ世界へ皆教えたい
verses.english: This time I heartily desire to teach clearly to the world everything about this origin.

verses.pt: Esta origem é a dupla do Serviço de Kagura. Esta é a verdade do início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: The origin is performed by two members of the Kagura. Truly, this is the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono moto wa Kagura ryonin Tsutome wa na   kore ga shinjitsu kono yo hajimari
verses.jp1: このもとハかぐらりよにんつとめハな
verses.jp2: これがしんぢつこのよはしまり
verses.kanji: この元は神楽両人勤めはな   これが真実この世初まり
verses.english: This origin is represented by the two performers of the Kagura. Truly this is the beginning of this world.

verses.pt: Este referido Kagura é o Parens que criou os seres humanos.
verses.en_6th_ed: What is called the Kagura this time is the Parent who began human beings.
verses.ro: konotabi no Kagura to yu wa ningen o   hajime kaketaru Oya de aru zo ya
verses.jp1: このたびのかぐらというハにんけんを
verses.jp2: はじめかけたるをやであるぞや
verses.kanji: この度の神楽と言うは人間を   初め掛けたる親で有るぞや
verses.english: The Kagura at this time is no other than the Parent who created human beings.

verses.pt: Não há quem conheça esta origem, por isso, ensinarei tudo sobre esta verdade.
verses.en_6th_ed: There being no one who knows this origin, I shall teach you all of this truth.
verses.ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node na   kono shinjitsu o mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このもとをしりたるものハないのてな
verses.jp2: このしんぢつをみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: この元を知りたる者は無いのでな   この真実を皆教えるで
verses.english: But there is no one who knows of this origin. So I will teach you all of this truth.

verses.pt: Embora até agora tenha insistido dia a dia e tenha explicado gradualmente,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though even until now I have tried to persuade you day after day and to teach you step by step,
verses.ro: imamade mo nichinichi kudoki dandan to   yute kikashita koto wa aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝてもにち／＼くときたん／＼と
verses.jp2: ゆうてきかした事ハあれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄も日々口説き段々と   言うて聞かした事は有れども
verses.english: Even though until now I have persuaded you day after day and instructed you step by step,

verses.pt: Hoje, por mais que Tsukihi diga, todas as pessoas não o compreendem.
verses.en_6th_ed: And yet today, no matter how Tsukihi strives to teach, there is no understanding in the minds of all.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa ika hodo Tsukihi yuta tote   ichiretsu kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp1: もふけふハいかほど月日ゆうたとて
verses.jp2: 一れつ心わかりないので
verses.kanji: もう今日は如何程月日言うたとて   一列心分かり無いので
verses.english: Now today however earnestly I, Tsukihi, may speak, the minds of all of you do not understand Me.

verses.pt: Em razão disso e por ter chegado o tempo, não há escolha, e faço agora a devolução.
verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, as the time has already come, I must now give you a return.
verses.ro: soreyue ni mo setsu ga kitaru kara   zehi naku ima wa kayashi suru zo ya
verses.jp1: それゆへにもふせへつうがきたるから
verses.jp2: せひなくいまわかやしするぞや
verses.kanji: それ故にもう節が来たるから   是非無く今は返しするぞや
verses.english: Therefore, as the time has already come, I am obliged to give a return to you.

verses.pt: Não pensem ser esta devolução insignificante, é vista em grande quantidade aqui e acolá.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not think this return is a small matter. It will appear here and there in a great number.
verses.ro: kono kayashi chotto no koto towa omouna yo   atchi kotchi ni oku mieru de
verses.jp1: このかやし一寸の事とハをもうなよ
verses.jp2: あゝちこゝちにをふくみゑるで
verses.kanji: この返し一寸の事とは思うなよ   あっちこっちに多く見えるで
verses.english: Never think that this return is a mere trifle! It will appear as many things here and there.

verses.pt: Seja quem for, nada sabe ainda sobre a criação original dos seres humanos deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is perhaps no one anywhere, still, who knows the origin of human beginnings in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen hajime moto naru o   doko no hito demo mada shiromai na
verses.jp1: このよふのにんけんはじめ元なるを
verses.jp2: どこの人でもまだしろまいな
verses.kanji: この世の人間初め元なるを   何処の人でも未だ知ろまいな
verses.english: Perhaps no one anywhere knows the truth of the creation of human beings of this world.

verses.pt: Desta vez, desejo ensinar esta verdade, de algum modo e com firmeza, tudo ao mundo inteiro.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, by all means, I wish to teach all of this truth clearly to the entire world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari mina oshietai
verses.jp1: このたびハこのしんちつをせかへぢうへ
verses.jp2: どふぞしいかりみなをしゑたい
verses.kanji: この度ハこの真実を世界中へ   どうぞ確り皆教えたい
verses.english: This time I sincerely desire to teach this truth clearly to all people of the whole world.

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Esta origem são os adoráveis Kunitokotati e Omotari.
verses.en_6th_ed: Listen! This origin is the venerable Kunitokotachi and Omotari.
verses.ro: shikato kike kono moto naru to yu no wa na   Kunitokotachi ni Omotari sama ya
verses.jp1: しかときけこのもとなるとゆうのハな
verses.jp2: くにとこたちにをもたりさまや
verses.kanji: 確と聞けこの元なると言うのはな   くにとこたちとおもたり様や
verses.english: Listen attentively! The originators are Kunitokotachi and Omotari Sama.

verses.pt: Eles, observando por todo o mar de lama, atraíram junto a si o sirênio e a cobra branca.
verses.en_6th_ed: After looking through the muddy waters, these personages drew a fish and a serpent to them.
verses.ro: kono okata doromizu naka o misumashite   uo to mii to o soba i hikiyose
verses.jp1: このをかたどろみづなかをみすまして
verses.jp2: うをとみいとをそばいひきよせ
verses.kanji: このお方泥水中を見澄まして   魚と巳とを側に引き寄せ
verses.english: This couple, looking through the muddy water, drew near a fish and a serpent.

verses.pt: O pesar desta vez é profundo. Não há meio para dissipá-lo?
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, My regret is at the heart's core. Is there not a means to clear it away?
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen to yu wa shin kara ya   kore o harasuru noyo nai kayo
verses.jp1: このたびのざねんとゆうわしんからや
verses.jp2: これをはらするもよふないかよ
verses.kanji: この度の残念と言うは芯からや   これを晴らする模様無いかよ
verses.english: This time My regret is deep from the core of My heart. How can I find a way of clearing it away?

verses.pt: Deus se encarregará firmemente deste fato. Saibam que fará qualquer devolução.
verses.en_6th_ed: Of this matter, God will firmly take charge. Know that I shall give every kind of return.
verses.ro: kono koto o Kami ga shikkari hikiukeru   donna kayashi mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp1: このことを神がしいかりひきうける
verses.jp2: どんなかやしもするとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: この事を神が確り引き受ける   どんな返しもすると思えよ
verses.english: I, God, will assuredly take charge of this matter. Understand that I will give any and every kind of returen!

verses.pt: Se esta devolução for vista, seja até onde for, a limpeza do coração se realizará por si só.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this return is seen, the heart of everyone in the world will be swept clean of its own accord.
verses.ro: kono kayashi mietaru naraba dokomade mo   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp1: このかやしみへたるならばどこまでも
verses.jp2: むねのそふぢがひとりでけるで
verses.kanji: この返し見えたるならば何処迄も   胸の掃除が独り出来るで
verses.english: When this return appears, the sweeping of the dust from your hearts shall all naturally be accomplished throughout the world.

verses.pt: Embora até agora, tolerando o que quer que seja, permanecesse reservado...
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have been keeping still, overlooking every kind of thing,
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona koto mo miyurushite   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハとのよな事をみゆるして
verses.jp2: ちいとしていた事であれども
verses.kanji: 今迄はどの様な事も見許して   じっとして居た事で有れども
verses.english: Although until now, overlooking every kind of thing, I have been keeping still,

verses.pt: Mas hoje, o dia já está chegando, seja o que for, devolverei imediatamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now, as the day is pressing, I shall give a return for all things at once.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna koto demo suguni kayasu de
verses.jp1: けふの日わもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp2: とんな事でもすぐにかやすで
verses.kanji: 今日の日はもう日が詰んで有るからな   どんな事でも直ぐに返すで
verses.english: Today as the time is pressing, I will give a return at once for whatever kinds of things.

verses.pt: Se vierem a este lugar com o espírito de impedir, não sabem para onde Tsukihi sairá.
verses.en_6th_ed: If anyone comes here with a mind to stop Me, there is no knowing where Tsukihi will at once appear.
verses.ro: kono tokoro tomeru kokoro de kuru naraba   sono mama doko i Tsukihi deru yara
verses.jp1: このところとめる心でくるならば
verses.jp2: そのまゝとこい月日でるやら
verses.kanji: この所止める心で来るならば   その侭何処へ月日出るやら
verses.english: If anyone comes here with intent to stop My work, there is no knowing where I, Tsukihi, will go out immediately.

verses.pt: Quanto ao fato de sair, não se sabe do que se trata. Tsukihi sairá para buscar. Fiquem cientes.
verses.en_6th_ed: You may not know what My appearance means. Tsukihi will appear to take him away. Beware.
verses.ro: deru no mo na donna koto yara shiromai na   Tsukihi mukai ni deru de shochi se
verses.jp1: てるのもなどんな事やらしろまいな
verses.jp2: 月日むかいにでるでしよちせ
verses.kanji: 出るのもなどんな事やら知ろまいな   月日迎いに出るで承知せ
verses.english: Perhaps you may wonder what it means for Me to go out. Understand that it means that I, Tsukihi, will go out to meet you!

verses.pt: Hoje, o dia já chegou plenamente, não sabem que caminho poderá haver.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, the time is fully pressing. There is no knowing what kinds of paths there will be.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo jubun ni tsunde aru   dono yona michi ga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハもふぢうふんにつんてある
verses.jp2: とのよなみちがあるやしれんで
verses.kanji: 今日の日はもう十分に詰んで有る   どの様な道が有るや知れんで
verses.english: Today the time is sufficiently pressing. There is no knowing what kinds of ways will appear.

verses.pt: Todas as pessoas do mundo, fiquem cientes. Não sabem quando Tsukihi sairá para buscar.
verses.en_6th_ed: Be aware, all of you throughout the world. There is no knowing when Tsukihi will appear to take you.
verses.ro: sekaiju mina ichiretsu wa shikato seyo   nandoki Tsukihi tsureni deru yara
verses.jp1: せかいぢうみな一れつハしかとせよ
verses.jp2: なんとき月日つれにてるやら
verses.kanji: 世界中皆一列は確とせよ   何時月日連れに出るやら
verses.english: Determine your mind firmly, all of you of the whole world! At any moment, I, Tsukihi, will go out to take you away.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, começarei a dizer algo extraordinário, mas ninguém sabe o que poderei dizer.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, I shall begin to tell you of a marvelous thing. No one knows what I shall say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mezurashi koto o yuikakeru   nani o yu tomo tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: けふの日ハめづらし事をゆいかける
verses.jp2: なにをゆうともたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 今日の日は珍し事を言い掛ける   何を言うとも誰も知ろまい
verses.english: Today I will begin to tell you a remarkable thing. No one knows what kinds of things I am going to say.

verses.pt: No mundo, até onde for, todos são iguais, fazem preparos para o casamento dos seus filhos.
verses.en_6th_ed: Everywhere in the world, people are alike: you prepare to marry off your children.
verses.ro: sekai niwa mina dokomade mo onaji koto   kodomo katazuke koshirae o suru
verses.jp1: せかいにハみなとこまてもをなし事
verses.jp2: 子共かたずけこしらゑをする
verses.kanji: 世界には皆何処迄も同じ事   子供片付け拵えをする
verses.english: In the world everyone everywhere is the same. People prepare to marry off their children.

verses.pt: Por mais que façam os preparos, não há quem saiba como será o futuro.
verses.en_6th_ed: But no matter how well you prepare, no one knows what the future might be.
verses.ro: ika hodoni koshirae shita to yuta tote   sonosaki naru wa tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: いかほどにこしらゑしたとゆうたとて
verses.jp2: そのさきなるわたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 如何程に拵えしたと言うたとて   その先なるは誰も知ろまい
verses.english: However carefully you might have prepared, no one can know how it shall turn out thereafter.

verses.pt: Não se sabe qual é a intenção de Tsukihi. Não há quem conheça o curso deste caminho.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever intention Tsukihi may have, there is no one who knows the course of its path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna omowaku aru yara na   kono michisuji wa shirita mono nashi
verses.jp1: 月日にわどんなをもハくあるやらな
verses.jp2: このみちすじハしりたものなし
verses.kanji: 月日にはどんな思惑有るやらな   この道筋は知りた者無し
verses.english: What intention I, Tsukihi, may have; there is no one who knows the course of the way.

verses.pt: Não sabem que sonho poderão ter doravante; as expressões mudarão e o espírito se animará.
verses.en_6th_ed: There is no knowing what you may see in a dream. Hereafter, things will change and your mind will be spirited.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona yume o miru yara na   monku kawarite kokoro isamu de
verses.jp1: このさきハとのよなゆめをみるやらな
verses.jp2: もんくかハりて心いさむで
verses.kanji: この先はどの様な夢を見るやらな   文句変わりて心勇むで
verses.english: In the future you may see a dream which you have never expected. Thence everything shall be changed, and you shall become cheerful.

verses.pt: Não sabem quão extraordinário sonho poderão ter. Tendo-o como um sinal, comecem o Serviço.
verses.en_6th_ed: You may dream of marvelous things. Take it as a sign to begin the Service.
verses.ro: dono yona mezurashi yume o miru yara na   kore o aizu ni Tsutome ni kakare
verses.jp1: とのよふなめづらしゆめをみるやらな
verses.jp2: これをあいつにつとめにかゝれ
verses.kanji: どの様な珍し夢を見るやらな   これを合図に勤めに掛かれ
verses.english: There is no knowing what a remarkable dream you may see. Taking it as a signal, begin to perform the Service!

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, estou ouvindo o que quer que seja. Não sabem quando a expressão mudará.
verses.en_6th_ed: Today, you have heard Me on any and every matter. At any moment, things will change.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto mo kiite iru   nandoki monku kawaru koto yara
verses.jp1: けふの日ハとのよな事もきいている
verses.jp2: なんどきもんくかわる事やら
verses.kanji: 今日の日はどの様な事も聞いて居る   何時文句変わる事やら
verses.english: Today you have already heard any and everything. At any moment the state of things shall be changed.

verses.pt: Haja o que houver, nunca tenham rancor. Tudo é coisa que cada um faz.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever may happen, bear no grudge. It is all what you have done to yourselves.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo uramina yo   mina meme ni suru koto ya de na
verses.jp1: とのよふな事がありてもうらみなよ
verses.jp2: みなめゑ／＼にする事やでな
verses.kanji: どの様な事が有りても恨みなよ   皆銘々にする事やでな
verses.english: Whatever kinds of things may happen, never bear a grudge against others! Everything is the result of what each of you has done yourself.

verses.pt: Para mim, Tsukihi, todos são igualmente meus filhos, e embora tenha uma profunda afeição,
verses.en_6th_ed: To Tsukihi, all of you equally are children of Mine. Though love for you fills My thoughts,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa mina ichiretsu wa waga ko nari   kawai ippai omote iredomo
verses.jp1: 月日にわみな一れつハわが子なり
verses.jp2: かハいいゝはいをもていれども
verses.kanji: 月日には皆一列は我が子なり   可愛い一杯思うて居れども
verses.english: For Me, Tsukihi, all people of the world are equally My children. Though I love them with all My heart,

verses.pt: Se cada um faz só o que quer, não há escolha. Por isso, estou observando atentamente.
verses.en_6th_ed: There can be no help for what each of you has done self-centeredly. I can only look on caringly.
verses.ro: meme ni suru koto bakari zehi wa nai   sokode jikkuri mite iru no ya de
verses.jp1: めへ／＼にする事ばかりせひハない
verses.jp2: そこでちいくりみているのやで
verses.kanji: めいめいにする事ばかり是非は無い   そこでじっくり見て居るのやで
verses.english: I cannot control things which are done by each mind selfishly. So I am patiently observing them.

verses.pt: Embora hoje estejam sem nada saber, vejam o amanhã, quando terão um amplo caminho.
verses.en_6th_ed: Though today you know nothing at all, look toward the morrow. A great broad path will open.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanimo shirazu ni iru keredo   asunichi o miyo erai okwan
verses.jp1: けふの日ハなにもしらすにいるけれど
verses.jp2: あすにちをみよゑらいをふかん
verses.kanji: 今日の日は何も知らずに居るけれど   明日日を見よえらい往還
verses.english: Although today you know nothing at all, tomorrow a splendid broad way shall be opened before you.

verses.pt: Quando este caminho for visto, não haverá quem possa resistir.
verses.en_6th_ed: When this path comes to be seen, there will be no one able to stand against Me.
verses.ro: kono michi ga mietaru naraba dono yona   mono demo kanau mono wa arumai
verses.jp1: このみちがみへたるならばとのよふな
verses.jp2: ものでもかなうものわあるまい
verses.kanji: この道が見えたるならばどの様な   者でも敵う者は有るまい
verses.english: When this way has appeared, no one shall be able to stand against Me, whoever one may be.

verses.pt: Não se sabe qual é a intenção de Tsukihi, e não há quem conheça o seu espírito.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever intent Tsukihi may have, there is perhaps no one who knows this mind.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna omowaku aru yara na   kono kokoro oba tare mo shiromai
verses.jp1: 月日にハどんなをもハくあるやらな
verses.jp2: この心をばたれもしろまい
verses.kanji: 月日にはどんな思惑有るやらな   この心をば誰も知ろまい
verses.english: What intention do I, Tsukihi, have now? No one knows what it is.

verses.pt: Se isto começar a ser visto, seja de onde for, o íntimo do coração será purificado por si só.
verses.en_6th_ed: When it begins to be seen, the innermost heart of you everywhere will be purified of its own accord.
verses.ro: kore oba na miekaketa nara dokomade mo   mune no uchi oba hitori sumikiru
verses.jp1: これをばなみへかけたならとこまでも
verses.jp2: むねのうちをばひとりすみきる
verses.kanji: これをばな見え掛けたなら何処迄も   胸の内をば独り澄み切る
verses.english: When this intention begins to appear, you shall become thoroughly purified from your innermost hearts naturally.

verses.pt: Doravante, começarei a dizer sobre todas as coisas inexistentes desde o início deste mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: From now on, I shall speak solely about all things unknown since this world began.
verses.ro: korekara wa kono yo hajimete nanimo kamo   nai koto bakari yuikakeru nari
verses.jp1: これからハこのよはじめてなにもかも
verses.jp2: ない事ばかりゆいかけるなり
verses.kanji: これからはこの世初めて何もかも   無い事ばかり言い掛けるなり
verses.english: From now on I will begin to tell you of any and everything which has never existed since the creation of this world.

verses.pt: Até agora, embora não houvesse quem soubesse a verdade do espírito humano,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now no one has known the truth of the human mind,
verses.ro: imamade wa hito no kokoro no shinjitsu o   tare ka shiritaru mono wa nakeredo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハ人の心のしんちつを
verses.jp2: たれかしりたるものハなけれど
verses.kanji: 今迄は人の心の真実を   誰か知りたる者は無けれど
verses.english: Although until now there has been no one who knows the truth of the human mind,

verses.pt: Desta vez, por Deus ter-se revelado ao mundo, ensinará tudo acerca do que quer que seja.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, as God is openly revealed, I shall teach you everything about all matters.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i deteru kara   donna koto demo mina oshieru de
verses.jp1: このたびハ神がをもていでゝるから
verses.jp2: どんな事でもみなをしゑるで
verses.kanji: この度は神が表へ出てるから   どんな事でも皆教えるで
verses.english: This time because I, God, reveal Myself to the fore, I will teach everything whatever it may be.

verses.pt: Não digo de onde se trata esta explanação, mas avisarei com incômodos no corpo.
verses.en_6th_ed: I do not indicate anyone in particular by this talk. I shall give notice through bodily disorders.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   minouchi sawari kore de shirasuru
verses.jp1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp2: みのうちさハりこれでしらする
verses.kanji: この話何処の事とも言わんでな   身の内障りこれで知らする
verses.english: I do not tell you this indicating any place in particular. I will warn you through the disorders of your bodies.

verses.pt: Não pensem por que digo tal coisa. Digo-a por minha profunda afeição.
verses.en_6th_ed: Do not wonder why I say such things. I speak out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: konna koto nande yu ya to omouna yo   kawai amarite yu koto ya de na
verses.jp1: こんな事なんでゆうやとをもうなよ
verses.jp2: かわいあまりてゆう事やでな
verses.kanji: こんな事何で言うやと思うなよ   可愛い余り言う事やでな
verses.english: Never wonder why I am speaking like this! It is indeed in the excess of My affection.

verses.pt: Seja o que for, não há nada que Deus não saiba nas coisas que cada um faz.
verses.en_6th_ed: Whatever you may do, there is nothing which is unknown to God.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo waga mi suru koto ni   Kami no shiran to yu koto wa nai
verses.jp1: どのよふな事でもわがみする事に
verses.jp2: 神のしらんとゆう事わない
verses.kanji: どの様な事でも我が身する事に   神の知らんと言う事は無い
verses.english: There is nothing of which I, God, do not know, whatever kinds of things you may do.

verses.pt: Por isso, são trabalhos que começo, informando previamente tudo sobre todas as coisas.
verses.en_6th_ed: Therefore, I shall give you notice of everything beforehand, and then begin My work.
verses.ro: soreyue ni nanimo yorozu o kotowarite   sono ue kakaru shigoto naru zo ya
verses.jp1: それゆへになにもよろづをことハりて
verses.jp2: そのゆゑかゝるしことなるぞや
verses.kanji: それ故に何も万を断りて   その故掛かる仕事なるぞや
verses.english: Therefore I warn you beforehand on any and every kind of thing. And then I begin My work.

verses.pt: Embora até agora, diante do que quer que seja, permanecesse pacientemente reservado...
verses.en_6th_ed: Though until now I have been patiently holding back in whatever matters,
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo jikkuri to   shikaete itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでハなによの事もぢいくりと
verses.jp2: しかゑていたることであれども
verses.kanji: 今迄は何よの事もじっくりと   控えて居たる事で有れども
verses.english: Although until now I have been patiently holding back on whatever kinds of things,

verses.pt: Ouçam bem! Quanto às explanações de até agora, o que quer que dissesse, apenas ouviram.
verses.en_6th_ed: Now hear Me! Until now, you have only listened to what I said in My talks.
verses.ro: shikato kike imamade naru no hanashi wa na   nani o yutemo kiita bakari ya
verses.jp1: しかときけいまゝでなるのはなしハな
verses.jp2: なにをゆうてもきいたばかりや
verses.kanji: 確と聞け今迄なるの話はな   何を言うても聞いたばかりや
verses.english: Listen attentively! Hitherto you have only heard whatever I have told you.

verses.pt: No dia de hoje, por estar apressando o caminho, seja o que for, poderá ser prontamente visto.
verses.en_6th_ed: But today, as I am hastening the path, all things will quickly appear.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa michi ga isoide iru kara na   donna koto demo hayaku mieru de
verses.jp1: けふの日ハみちがいそいでいるからな
verses.jp2: どんな事てもはやくみへるで
verses.kanji: 今日の日は道が急いで居るからな   どんな事でも早く見えるで
verses.english: But today, as I am hastening the way, everything shall appear quickly.

verses.pt: Em razão disso, uma vez manifestado, nada se pode fazer; por isso, todos devem refletir.
verses.en_6th_ed: Once they begin to appear, it will be too late. Therefore, all of you must ponder.
verses.ro: soreyue ni dekakete kara wa domunaran   sokode ichiretsu shiyan suru yo
verses.jp1: それゆへにでかけてからハとむならん
verses.jp2: そこで一れつしやんするよふ
verses.kanji: それ故に出掛けてからはどうもならん   そこで一列思案する様
verses.english: Therefore there will be no help after everything has occurred. So, I request all of you equally to ponder deeply.

verses.pt: Até agora, embora viesse explicando gradualmente de diversas maneiras a persuasão de Deus,
verses.en_6th_ed: Though even until now God has tried to persuade you by teaching you various things step by step,
verses.ro: imamade mo Kami no kudoki wa dandan to   iroiro toite kitaru naredomo
verses.jp1: いまゝでも神のくどきわたん／＼と
verses.jp2: いろ／＼といてきたるなれとも
verses.kanji: 今迄も神の口説きは段々と   色々説いて来たるなれども
verses.english: Even though hitherto I, God, have tried to persuade you step by step and in various ways,

verses.pt: Por mais que tenha persuadido, não há quem compreenda. É o pesar do Parens.
verses.en_6th_ed: However earnestly I appeal to you, no one understands. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: ika hodoni kudoita totemo tare nitemo   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp1: いかほとにくどいたとてもたれにても
verses.jp2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん
verses.kanji: 如何程に口説いたとても誰にても   聞き分けが無い親の残念
verses.english: However earnestly I have tried to persuade you, none of you understood Me. This caused Me serious regret.

verses.pt: Até o presente, a persuasão não tem sido tarefa fácil. Desta vez, devem refletir.
verses.en_6th_ed: Even until now, I made great efforts to persuade you. This time, indeed, you must ponder.
verses.ro: kokomade mo yoi na kudoki ya nai hodoni   konotabi koso wa shiyan suru yo
verses.jp1: ここまてもよいなくときやないほとに
verses.jp2: このたびこそハしやんするよふ
verses.kanji: 此処迄も容易な口説きや無い程に   この度こそは思案する様
verses.english: Hitherto it was not an easy task to try to persuade all of you. This time, ponder deeply from your innermost hearts!

verses.pt: Com que pensamento estão ouvindo esta explanação? É a conseqüência do acúmulo e empilhamento.
verses.en_6th_ed: What are you thinking on hearing this talk? It is the result of matters accumulated and piled up.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   tsumori kasanari yue no koto ya de
verses.jp1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp2: つもりかさなりゆへの事やで
verses.kanji: この話何と思うて聞いて居る   積り重なり故の事やで
verses.english: With what thoughts are you listening to these talks? They are because of My accumulated and piled up regret.

verses.pt: Saibam que o pesar e a ira de Deus, no dia de hoje, não são coisas insignificantes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Know that the regret and anger of God on this day are not small matters.
verses.ro: kyonohi no Kami no zannen rippuku wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp1: けふの日の神のさんねんりいふくわ
verses.jp2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ
verses.kanji: 今日の日の神の残念立腹は   容易なる事で無いと思えよ
verses.english: Understand that today the regret and anger of God is not slight!

verses.pt: Tsukihi é o Parens que criou os seres humanos e o mundo ainda inexistentes.
verses.en_6th_ed: Tsukihi is the Parent who began human beings and this world which did not exist.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nai ningen ya nai sekai   hajime kaketaru Oya de aru zo ya
verses.jp1: 月日よりないにんけんやないせかい
verses.jp2: はじめかけたるをやであるぞや
verses.kanji: 月日より無い人間や無い世界   初め掛けたる親で有るぞや
verses.english: I am the Parent, who as Tsukihi created human beings and the world which had never existed.

verses.pt: Entretanto, o bombo foi proibido pelos filhosque nada conheciam. Vejam este pesar.
verses.en_6th_ed: Be that as it may, the drum is being stopped by children who know nothing. Behold My regret.
verses.ro: sono tokoro nanimo shirazaru kodomo ni na   taiko tomerare kono zanen miyo
verses.jp1: そのところなにもしらざる子共にな
verses.jp2: たいことめられこのさねんみよ
verses.kanji: その所何も知らざる子供にな   太鼓止められこの残念見よ
verses.english: However, the drum was prohibited by children who knew nothing of this truth. Behold My severe regret!

verses.pt: Desta vez, faço a devolução disto. Estejam todos cientes até onde for.
verses.en_6th_ed: This time, I shall give a return for this. Beware of it, all of you, wherever you may be.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono kayashi oba suru hodoni   mina dokomade mo shochi shite iyo
verses.jp1: このたびハこのかやしをばするほとに
verses.jp2: みなとこまでもしよちしていよ
verses.kanji: この度はこの返しをばする程に   皆何処迄も承知して居よ
verses.english: This time I will give them a return for this. Be aware of it, all of you, wherever you may be!

verses.pt: Embora até hoje de nada soubessem, já começou a se avistar. Que grande prazer!
verses.en_6th_ed: Until today, you have known nothing. But now, things are beginning to appearﾑa great promise.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ita keredo   sa miekaketa erai tanoshimi
verses.jp1: けふまてわなにもしらすにいたけれと
verses.jp2: さあみへかけたゑらいたのしみ
verses.kanji: 今日迄は何も知らずに居たけれど   さあ見え掛けたえらい楽しみ
verses.english: Until today you have known nothing whatsoever. But now great delight is making its appearance.

verses.pt: Como imaginam ser este caminho? É limpeza do coração de todas as pessoas do mundo.
verses.en_6th_ed: What do you think this path is about? It is to cleanse the heart of everyone in the world.
verses.ro: kono michi wa donna koto ya to omou kana   sekai ichiretsu mune no soji ya
verses.jp1: このみちハどんな事やとをもうかな
verses.jp2: せかい一れつむねのそふぢや
